title: sa_somadeva-kathāsaritsāgaravetālapañcaviṃśatikā
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>
<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.21' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>pratiṣṭhānābhidhāno 'sti deśo godāvarītaṭe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.21'>
<lg>
<l>pratiṣṭhāna-abhidhāno 'sti deśo godāvarī-taṭe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.22' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tatra vikramasenasya putraḥ śakraparākramaḥ /</l>
<l>prāk trivikramasenākhyaḥ khyātakīrtir abhūn nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.22'>
<lg>
<l>tatra vikramasenasya putraḥ śakra-parākramaḥ /</l>
<l>prāk trivikramasena-ākhyaḥ khyāta-kīrtir abhūn nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.23' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tasya pratyaham āsthānagatasyopetya bhūpateḥ /</l>
<l>sevārthaṃ kṣāntiśīlākhyo bhikṣuḥ phalam upānayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.23'>
<lg>
<l>tasya praty-aham āsthāna-gatasya upetya bhū-pateḥ /</l>
<l>sevā-arthaṃ kṣāntiśīla-ākhyo bhikṣuḥ phalam upānayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.24' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>so 'pi rājā tad ādāya phalam āsannavartinaḥ /</l>
<l>haste dadau pratidinaṃ koṣāgārādhikāriṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.24'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi rājā tad ādāya phalam āsanna-vartinaḥ /</l>
<l>haste dadau prati-dinaṃ koṣa-agāra-adhikāriṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.25' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>itthaṃ gateṣu varṣeṣu daśasv atra kilaikadā /</l>
<l>dattvā rājñe phalaṃ tasmai bhikṣāv āsthānato gate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.25'>
<lg>
<l>itthaṃ gateṣu varṣeṣu daśasv atra kila ekadā /</l>
<l>dattvā rājñe phalaṃ tasmai bhikṣāv āsthānato gate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.26' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>sa rājā tat phalaṃ prādāt praviṣṭāyātra daivataḥ /</l>
<l>krīḍāmarkaṭapotāya hastabhraṣṭāya rakṣiṇām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.26'>
<lg>
<l>sa rājā tat phalaṃ prādāt praviṣṭāya atra daivataḥ /</l>
<l>krīḍā-markaṭa-potāya hasta-bhraṣṭāya rakṣiṇām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.27' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>sa markaṭas tad aśnāti yāvat tāvat phalāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>vibhinnamadhyān niragād anarghaṃ ratnam uttamam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.27'>
<lg>
<l>sa markaṭas tad aśnāti yāvat tāvat phalāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>vibhinna-madhyān niragād anarghaṃ ratnam uttamam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.28' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvādāya papraccha taṃ bhāṇḍāgārikaṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>bhikṣūpanītāni mayā yāni nityaṃ phalāni te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.28'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā ādāya papraccha taṃ bhāṇḍa-agārikaṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>bhikṣu-upanītāni mayā yāni nityaṃ phalāni te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.29' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>haste dattāni tāni kva sthāpitāni sadā tvayā /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā taṃ sa sabhayaḥ koṣādhyakṣo vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.29'>
<lg>
<l>haste dattāni tāni kva sthāpitāni sadā tvayā /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā taṃ sa sa-bhayaḥ koṣa-adhyakṣo vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.30' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>kṣiptāni tāny anudghāṭya mayā gañje gavākṣataḥ /</l>
<l>yady ādiśasi tad deva tam udghāṭya gaveṣaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.30'>
<lg>
<l>kṣiptāni tāny an-udghāṭya mayā gañje gavākṣataḥ /</l>
<l>yady ādiśasi tad deva tam udghāṭya gaveṣaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.31' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>iti ūcivān anumato rajñā gatvā kṣaṇena saḥ /</l>
<l>koṣādhyakṣaḥ samāgatya prabhuṃ vyajñāpayat punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.31'>
<lg>
<l>iti ūcivān anumato rajñā gatvā kṣaṇena saḥ /</l>
<l>koṣa-adhyakṣaḥ samāgatya prabhuṃ vyajñāpayat punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.32' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>śīrṇāni nātra paśyāmi koṣe tāni phalāny aham /</l>
<l>ratnarāśiṃ tu paśyāmi raśmijvālākulaṃ vibho //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.32'>
<lg>
<l>śīrṇāni na atra paśyāmi koṣe tāni phalāny aham /</l>
<l>ratna-rāśiṃ tu paśyāmi raśmi-jvāla-ākulaṃ vibho //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.33' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tac chrutvā tān manīn dattvā tuṣṭo 'smai koṣarakṣiṇe /</l>
<l>rājānyedyur apṛcchat sa bhikṣuṃ taṃ prāgvad āgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.33'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā tān manīn dattvā tuṣṭo 'smai koṣa-rakṣiṇe /</l>
<l>rāja ānye-dyur apṛcchat sa bhikṣuṃ taṃ prāg-vad āgatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.34' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>bhikṣo dhanavyayenaivaṃ sevase māṃ kim anvaham /</l>
<l>nedānīṃ te grahīṣyāmi phalaṃ yāvan na vakṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.34'>
<lg>
<l>bhikṣo dhana-vyayena evaṃ sevase māṃ kim anv-aham /</l>
<l>na idānīṃ te grahīṣyāmi phalaṃ yāvan na vakṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.35' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ bhikṣus taṃ vijane 'bravīt /</l>
<l>vīrasācivyasāpekṣaṃ mantrasādhanam asti me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.35'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ bhikṣus taṃ vijane 'bravīt /</l>
<l>vīra-sācivya-sa-apekṣaṃ mantra-sādhanam asti me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.36' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tatra vīrendra sāhāyyaṃ kriyamānaṃ tvayārthaye /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā pratipede tat tathety asya sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.36'>
<lg>
<l>tatra vīra-indra sāhāyyaṃ kriyamānaṃ tvaya ārthaye /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā pratipede tat tatha īty asya sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.37' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tataḥ sa śramaṇas tuṣṭo nṛpaṃ puna uvāca tam /</l>
<l>tarhi kṛṣṇacaturdaśyām āgāminyāṃ niśāgame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.37'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa śramaṇas tuṣṭo nṛ-paṃ puna uvāca tam /</l>
<l>tarhi kṛṣṇa-caturdaśyām āgāminyāṃ niśā-āgame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.38' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>ito mahāśmaśānāntaḥvaṭasyādhaḥ sthitasya me /</l>
<l>āgantavyaṃ tvayā deva pratipālayato 'ntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.38'>
<lg>
<l>ito mahā-śmaśāna-antaḥ-vaṭasya adhaḥ sthitasya me /</l>
<l>āgantavyaṃ tvayā deva pratipālayato 'ntikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.39' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmīty ukte tena mahībhujā /</l>
<l>sa kṣāntiśīlaḥ śramaṇo hṛṣṭaḥ svanilayaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.39'>
<lg>
<l>bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmi ity ukte tena mahī-bhujā /</l>
<l>sa kṣāntiśīlaḥ śramaṇo hṛṣṭaḥ sva-nilayaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.40' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>atha tāṃ sa mahāsattvaḥ prāpya kṛṣṇacaturdaśīm /</l>
<l>prārthanāṃ pratipannāṃ tāṃ bhikṣos tasya nṛpaḥ smaran //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.40'>
<lg>
<l>atha tāṃ sa mahā-sattvaḥ prāpya kṛṣṇa-caturdaśīm /</l>
<l>prārthanāṃ pratipannāṃ tāṃ bhikṣos tasya nṛ-paḥ smaran //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.41' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>pradoṣe nīlavasanas tamālakṛtaśekharaḥ /</l>
<l>niryayau rājadhānītaḥ khaḍgapāṇir alakṣitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.41'>
<lg>
<l>pradoṣe nīla-vasanas tamāla-kṛta-śekharaḥ /</l>
<l>niryayau rāja-dhānītaḥ khaḍga-pāṇir alakṣitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.42' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>yayau ca ghoranibiḍadhvāntavrātamalīmasam /</l>
<l>citānalogranayanajvālādāruṇadarśanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.42'>
<lg>
<l>yayau ca ghora-nibiḍa-dhvānta-vrāta-malīmasam /</l>
<l>citā-nala-ugra-nayana-jvālā-dāruṇa-darśanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.43' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>asaṃkhyanarakaṅkālakapālāsthiviśaṅkaṭam /</l>
<l>hṛṣyatsaṃnihitottālabhūtavetālaveṣṭitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.43'>
<lg>
<l>a-saṃkhya-nara-kaṅkāla-kapāla-asthi-viśaṅkaṭam /</l>
<l>hṛṣyat-saṃnihita-uttāla-bhūta-vetāla-veṣṭitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.44' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>bhairavasyāparaṃ rūpam iva gambhīrabhīṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.44'>
<lg>
<l>bhairavasya aparaṃ rūpam iva gambhīra-bhīṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>



<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.45' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
  <l>sphūrjan mahāśivārāvaṃ śmaśānaṃ tad avihvalaḥ /</l>
<l>vicitya cātra taṃ prāpya bhikṣuṃ vaṭataror adhaḥ /</l>
<l>kurvāṇaṃ maṇḍalanyāsam upasṛtya jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.45'>
<lg>
  <l>sphūrjan mahā-śiva-arāvaṃ śmaśānaṃ tad avihvalaḥ /</l>
<l>vicitya ca atra taṃ prāpya bhikṣuṃ vaṭa-taror adhaḥ /</l>
<l>kurvāṇaṃ maṇḍala-nyāsam upasṛtya jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.46' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>eṣo 'ham āgato bhikṣo brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā sa nṛpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭo bhikṣur uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.46'>
<lg>
<l>eṣo 'ham āgato bhikṣo brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā sa nṛ-paṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭo bhikṣur uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.47' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>rājan kṛtaḥ prasādaś cet tad ito dakṣiṇāmukham /</l>
<l>gatvā vidūram ekākī vidyate śiṃśapātaruḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.47'>
<lg>
<l>rājan kṛtaḥ prasādaś cet tad ito dakṣiṇā-mukham /</l>
<l>gatvā vidūram ekākī vidyate śiṃśapā-taruḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.48' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tasminn ullambitamṛtaḥ ko 'py ekaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ /</l>
<l>tam ihānaya gatvā tvaṃ sānāthyaṃ kuru vīra me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.48'>
<lg>
<l>tasminn ullambita-mṛtaḥ ko 'py ekaḥ puruṣaḥ sthitaḥ /</l>
<l>tam ihā anaya gatvā tvaṃ sānāthyaṃ kuru vīra me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.49' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tac chṛutvaiva tathety uktvā sa rājā satyasaṃgaraḥ /</l>
<l>dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ālambya pravīraḥ prayayau tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.49'>
<lg>
<l>tac chṛutva aiva tatha īty uktvā sa rājā satya-saṃgaraḥ /</l>
<l>dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ālambya pravīraḥ prayayau tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.50' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>āttadīptacitālātalakṣitena pathātra saḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā tamasi taṃ prāpa kathaṃcic chiṃśapātarum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.50'>
<lg>
<l>ātta-dīpta-citā-alāta-lakṣitena patha ātra saḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā tamasi taṃ prāpa kathaṃcic chiṃśapā-tarum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.51' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tasya skandhe citādhūmadagdhasya kravyagandhinaḥ /</l>
<l>so 'paśyal lambamānaṃ taṃ bhūtasyeva śavaṃ taroḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.51'>
<lg>
<l>tasya skandhe citā-dhūma-dagdhasya kravya-gandhinaḥ /</l>
<l>so 'paśyal lambamānaṃ taṃ bhūtasya iva śavaṃ taroḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.52' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>āruhya cātra bhūmau taṃ chinna rajjum apātayat /</l>
<l>patitaś cātra so 'kasmāc cakranda vyathito yathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.52'>
<lg>
<l>āruhya ca atra bhūmau taṃ chinna rajjum apātayat /</l>
<l>patitaś ca atra so 'kasmāc cakranda vyathito yathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.53' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tato 'varuhya kṛpayā jīvāśaṅkī sa tasya yat /</l>
<l>rājāṅgaṃ prāmṛśat tena so 'ṭṭahāsaṃ vyadhāc chavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.53'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'varuhya kṛpayā jīva-āśaṅkī sa tasya yat /</l>
<l>rāja āṅgaṃ prāmṛśat tena so 'ṭṭahāsaṃ vyadhāc chavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.54' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tataḥ sa rājā matvā taṃ vetālādhiṣṭhitaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>kiṃ hasasy ehi gacchāva iti yāvad akampitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.54'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa rājā matvā taṃ vetāla-adhiṣṭhitaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>kiṃ hasasy ehi gacchāva iti yāvad a-kampitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.55' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>vakti tāvan na bhūmau savetālaṃ śavam aikṣata /</l>
<l>aikṣatātraiva vṛkṣe tu lambamānaṃ sthitaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.55'>
<lg>
<l>vakti tāvan na bhūmau sa-vetālaṃ śavam aikṣata /</l>
<l>aikṣata atra eva vṛkṣe tu lambamānaṃ sthitaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.56' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>tato 'dhiruhya bhūyo 'pi tam avātārayat tataḥ /</l>
<l>vajrād api hi vīrāṇāṃ cittaratnam akhaṇḍitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.56'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'dhiruhya bhūyo 'pi tam avātārayat tataḥ /</l>
<l>vajrād api hi vīrāṇāṃ citta-ratnam a-khaṇḍitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.57' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>āropya ca savetālaṃ skandhe maunena taṃ śavam /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha rājā gantuṃ pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.57'>
<lg>
<l>āropya ca sa-vetālaṃ skandhe maunena taṃ śavam /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha rājā gantuṃ pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.58' corresp='Vet_Intro'>
<l>yāntaṃ ca taṃ śavāntaḥstho vetālo 'ṃsasthito 'bravīt /</l>
<l>rājann adhvavinodāya kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.58'>
<lg>
<l>yāntaṃ ca taṃ śava-antaḥ-stho vetālo 'ṃsa-sthito 'bravīt /</l>
<l>rājann adhva-vinodāya kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.59' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>asti vārāṇasī nāma purārivasatiḥ purī /</l>
<l>sthalīva kailāsagirer yā puṇyajanasevitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.59'>
<lg>
<l>asti vārāṇasī nāma purāri-vasatiḥ purī /</l>
<l>sthali īva kailāsa-girer yā puṇya-jana-sevitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.60' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>bhūrivāribhṛtā śaśvadupakaṇṭhaniveśinī /</l>
<l>hārayaṣṭir ivābhāti yasyāḥ svargataraṅgiṇī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.60'>
<lg>
<l>bhūri-vāri-bhṛtā śaśvad-upakaṇṭha-niveśinī /</l>
<l>hāra-yaṣṭir ivā abhāti yasyāḥ svarga-taraṅgiṇī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.61' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pratāpānalanirdagdhavipakṣakulakānanaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāṃ pratāpamukuṭo nāma rājābhavat purā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.61'>
<lg>
<l>pratāpa-anala-nirdagdha-vipakṣa-kula-kānanaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāṃ pratāpamukuṭo nāma rāja ābhavat purā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.62' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tasyābhūd vajramukuṭas tanayo rūpaśauryayoḥ /</l>
<l>kurvāṇo darpadalanaṃ smarasyārijanasya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.62'>
<lg>
<l>tasya abhūd vajramukuṭas tanayo rūpa-śauryayoḥ /</l>
<l>kurvāṇo darpa-dalanaṃ smarasya ari-janasya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.63' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>rājaputrasya tasyātra mantriputro mahāmatiḥ /</l>
<l>āsīd buddhiśarīrākhyaḥ śarīrābhyadhikaḥ sakhā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.63'>
<lg>
<l>rāja-putrasya tasya atra mantri-putro mahā-matiḥ /</l>
<l>āsīd buddhiśarīra-ākhyaḥ śarīra-abhyadhikaḥ sakhā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.64' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tena sakhyā saha krīḍan sa kadācin nṛpātmajaḥ /</l>
<l>jagāma dūram adhvānaṃ mṛgayāti prasaṅgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.64'>
<lg>
<l>tena sakhyā saha krīḍan sa kadā-cin nṛ-pa-ātmajaḥ /</l>
<l>jagāma dūram adhvānaṃ mṛgayā-ati prasaṅgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.65' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>śauryaśṛīcāmarānīva siṃhānāṃ mastakāni saḥ /</l>
<l>chindac charaiḥ saṭālāni viveśaikaṃ mahāvanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.65'>
<lg>
<l>śaurya-śṛī-cāmarāni iva siṃhānāṃ mastakāni saḥ /</l>
<l>chindac charaiḥ sa-ṭālāni viveśa ekaṃ mahā-vanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.66' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatrāsthāne smarasyeva paṭhat kokilabandini /</l>
<l>dattopakāre tarubhir mañjarīcalacāmaraiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.66'>
<lg>
<l>tatrā asthāne smarasya iva paṭhat kokila-bandini /</l>
<l>datta-upakāre tarubhir mañjarī-cala-cāmaraiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.67' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>so 'nvito mantriputreṇa tenāpaśyat saraḥvaram /</l>
<l>vicitrakamalotpattidhāmāmbudhim ivāparam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.67'>
<lg>
<l>so 'nvito mantri-putreṇa tena apaśyat saraḥ-varam /</l>
<l>vicitra-kamala-utpatti-dhāma ambudhim iva aparam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.68' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tasmiṃs tadaiva sarasi snānārthaṃ kācid āgatā /</l>
<l>tena divyākṛtiḥ kanyā dadṛśe saparicchadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.68'>
<lg>
<l>tasmiṃs tada aiva sarasi snāna-arthaṃ kā-cid āgatā /</l>
<l>tena divya-ākṛtiḥ kanyā dadṛśe sa-paricchadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.69' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pūrayantīva lāvaṇyaniḥjhareṇa saraḥvaram /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭipātaiḥ sṛjantīva tatrotpalavanaṃ navam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.69'>
<lg>
<l>pūrayanti īva lāvaṇya-niḥ-jhareṇa saraḥ-varam /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭi-pātaiḥ sṛjanti īva tatra utpala-vanaṃ navam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.70' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pratyādiśantīva mukhenāmbujāni jitendunā /</l>
<l>sā jahāra manas tasya rājaputrasya tatkṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.70'>
<lg>
<l>pratyādiśanti īva mukhena ambu-jāni jita-indunā /</l>
<l>sā jahāra manas tasya rāja-putrasya tat-kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.71' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>so 'py ahārṣīt tathā tasyā yuvā dṛṣṭvā vilocane /</l>
<l>yathā naikṣata sā kanyā lajjāṃ svām apy alaṃkṛtim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.71'>
<lg>
<l>so 'py ahārṣīt tathā tasyā yuvā dṛṣṭvā vilocane /</l>
<l>yathā nā ekṣata sā kanyā lajjāṃ svām apy alaṃkṛtim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.72' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>yūni paśyati tasmin sā keyaṃ syāditi sānuge /</l>
<l>saṃjñāṃ svadeśādyākhyātuṃ vilāsachadmanākarot //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.72'>
<lg>
<l>yūni paśyati tasmin sā ka īyaṃ syāditi sa-anuge /</l>
<l>saṃjñāṃ sva-deśa-ādy-ākhyātuṃ vilāsa-chadmana ākarot //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.73' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>karoti smautpalaṃ karṇe gṛhītvā puṣpaśekharāt /</l>
<l>ciraṃ ca dantaracanāṃ cakārādāya ca vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.73'>
<lg>
<l>karoti smautpalaṃ karṇe gṛhītvā puṣpa-śekharāt /</l>
<l>ciraṃ ca danta-racanāṃ cakārā adāya ca vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.74' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>padmaṃ śirasi sākūtaṃ hṛdaye cādadhe karam /</l>
<l>rājaputraś ca tasyās tāṃ saṃjñāṃ na jñātavāṃs tadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.74'>
<lg>
<l>padmaṃ śirasi sākūtaṃ hṛdaye cā adadhe karam /</l>
<l>rāja-putraś ca tasyās tāṃ saṃjñāṃ na jñātavāṃs tadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.75' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>mantriputras tu bubudhe sa sakhā tasya buddhimān /</l>
<l>kṣaṇāc ca sā yayau kanyā nīyamānānugais tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.75'>
<lg>
<l>mantri-putras tu bubudhe sa sakhā tasya buddhimān /</l>
<l>kṣaṇāc ca sā yayau kanyā nīyamāna ānugais tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.76' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>prāpya ca svagṛhaṃ tasthau paryaṅge 'ṅgaṃ nidhāya sā /</l>
<l>cittaṃ tu nijasaṃjñārtham āsthāt tasmin nṛpātmaje //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.76'>
<lg>
<l>prāpya ca sva-gṛhaṃ tasthau paryaṅge 'ṅgaṃ nidhāya sā /</l>
<l>cittaṃ tu nija-saṃjña-artham āsthāt tasmin nṛ-pa-ātmaje //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.77' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>so 'pi rājasuto bhraṣṭavidyo vidyādharo yathā /</l>
<l>gatvā svanagarīṃ kṛcchrāṃ prāpāvasthāṃ tayā vinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.77'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi rāja-suto bhraṣṭa-vidyo vidyādharo yathā /</l>
<l>gatvā sva-nagarīṃ kṛcchrāṃ prāpa avasthāṃ tayā vinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.78' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sakhyā ca mantriputreṇa tena pṛṣṭas tadā rahaḥ /</l>
<l>śaṃsatā tām aduṣprāpāṃ tyaktadhairyo jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.78'>
<lg>
<l>sakhyā ca mantri-putreṇa tena pṛṣṭas tadā rahaḥ /</l>
<l>śaṃsatā tām aduṣprāpāṃ tyakta-dhairyo jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.79' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>yasyā na nāma na grāmo nānvayo vāvabudhyate /</l>
<l>sā kathaṃ prāpyate tan mām āśvāsayasi kiṃ mṛṣā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.79'>
<lg>
<l>yasyā na nāma na grāmo nānvayo va āvabudhyate /</l>
<l>sā kathaṃ prāpyate tan mām āśvāsayasi kiṃ mṛṣā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.80' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity ukto rājaputreṇa mantriputras tam abhyadhāt /</l>
<l>kiṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tad yat saṃjñayā sūcitaṃ tayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.80'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto rāja-putreṇa mantri-putras tam abhyadhāt /</l>
<l>kiṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā tad yat saṃjñayā sūcitaṃ tayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.81' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>nyastaṃ yad utpalaṃ karṇe tenaitat te tayoditam /</l>
<l>karṇotpalasya rāṣṭre 'haṃ nivasāmi mahībhṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.81'>
<lg>
<l>nyastaṃ yad utpalaṃ karṇe tena etat te taya ūditam /</l>
<l>karṇotpalasya rāṣṭre 'haṃ nivasāmi mahī-bhṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.82' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>kṛtā yad dantaracanā tenaitat kathitaṃ tayā /</l>
<l>tatra jānīhi māṃ dantaghāṭakasya sutām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.82'>
<lg>
<l>kṛtā yad danta-racanā tena etat kathitaṃ tayā /</l>
<l>tatra jānīhi māṃ danta-ghāṭakasya sutām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.83' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>padmāvatīti nāmoktaṃ tayottaṃsitapadmayā /</l>
<l>tvayi prāṇā iti proktaṃ hṛdayārpitahastayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.83'>
<lg>
<l>padmāvati īti nāma uktaṃ taya ūttaṃsita-padmayā /</l>
<l>tvayi prāṇā iti proktaṃ hṛdaya-arpita-hastayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.84' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>kaliṅgadeśe hy asty atra khyātaḥ karṇotpalo nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya prasādavitto 'sti mahān yo dantaghaṭakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.84'>
<lg>
<l>kaliṅga-deśe hy asty atra khyātaḥ karṇotpalo nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>tasya prasāda-vitto 'sti mahān yo danta-ghaṭakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.85' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>saṅgrāmavardhanākhyasya tasyāpy asti jagattraye /</l>
<l>ratnaṃ padmāvatī nāma kanyā prāṇādhikapriyā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.85'>
<lg>
<l>saṅgrāmavardhana-ākhyasya tasya apy asti jagat-traye /</l>
<l>ratnaṃ padmāvatī nāma kanyā prāṇa-adhika-priyā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.86' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>etac ca lokato deva yathāvad viditaṃ mama /</l>
<l>ato jñātā mayā saṃjñā tasyā deśādiśaṃsinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.86'>
<lg>
<l>etac ca lokato deva yathāvad viditaṃ mama /</l>
<l>ato jñātā mayā saṃjñā tasyā deśa-ādi-śaṃsinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.87' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity ukto mantriputrena tena rājasuto 'tha saḥ /</l>
<l>tutoṣa tasmai sudhiye labdhopāyo jaharṣa ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.87'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto mantri-putrena tena rāja-suto 'tha saḥ /</l>
<l>tutoṣa tasmai su-dhiye labdha-upāyo jaharṣa ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.88' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>saṃmantrya ca samaṃ tena sa tadyuktaḥ svamandirāt /</l>
<l>priyārthī mṛgayāvyājāt punas tām agamad diśam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.88'>
<lg>
<l>saṃmantrya ca samaṃ tena sa tad-yuktaḥ sva-mandirāt /</l>
<l>priyā-arthī mṛgayā-vyājāt punas tām agamad diśam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.89' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ardhamārge ca vātāśvavegavañcitasainikaḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ mantriputraikayutaḥ kaliṅgaviṣayaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.89'>
<lg>
<l>ardha-mārge ca vāta-aśva-vega-vañcita-sainikaḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ mantri-putra-eka-yutaḥ kaliṅga-viṣayaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.90' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatra tau prāpya nagaraṃ karṇotpalamahībhṛtaḥ /</l>
<l>anviṣya dṛṣṭvā bhavanaṃ dantaghāṭasya tasya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.90'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tau prāpya nagaraṃ karṇotpala-mahī-bhṛtaḥ /</l>
<l>anviṣya dṛṣṭvā bhavanaṃ danta-ghāṭasya tasya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.91' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tadadūre ca vāsārtham ekasya vṛddhayoṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>gṛhaṃ prāviśatāṃ mantriputrarājasutāv ubhau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.91'>
<lg>
<l>tad-adūre ca vāsa-artham ekasya vṛddha-yoṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>gṛhaṃ prāviśatāṃ mantri-putra-rāja-sutāv ubhau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.92' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>dattāmbuyavasau vāhau gupte 'vasthāpya cātra saḥ /</l>
<l>rājaputre sthite vṛddhāṃ mantriputro jagāda tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.92'>
<lg>
<l>datta-ambu-yavasau vāhau gupte 'vasthāpya ca atra saḥ /</l>
<l>rāja-putre sthite vṛddhāṃ mantri-putro jagāda tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.93' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>kaccid vetsy amba saṅgrāmavardhanaṃ dantaghāṭakam /</l>
<l>tac chṛutvā sā jaradyoṣit saśraddhā tam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.93'>
<lg>
<l>kaccid vetsy amba saṅgrāmavardhanaṃ danta-ghāṭakam /</l>
<l>tac chṛutvā sā jarad-yoṣit sa-śraddhā tam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.94' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>vedmy eva dhātrī tasyāsmi sthāpitā tena cādhunā /</l>
<l>padmāvatyāḥ svaduhituḥ pārśve jyeṣṭhatarety aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.94'>
<lg>
<l>vedmy eva dhātrī tasya asmi sthāpitā tena ca adhunā /</l>
<l>padmāvatyāḥ sva-duhituḥ pārśve jyeṣṭhatara īty aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.95' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>kiṃ tv ahaṃ na sadā tatra gacchāmy upahatāmbarā /</l>
<l>kuputraḥ kitavo vastraṃ dṛṣṭvā hi harate mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.95'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ tv ahaṃ na sadā tatra gacchāmy upahata-ambarā /</l>
<l>kuputraḥ kitavo vastraṃ dṛṣṭvā hi harate mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.96' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ prītaḥ svottarīyādidānataḥ /</l>
<l>saṃtoṣya so 'tra vṛddhāṃ tāṃ mantriputro 'bravīt punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.96'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ prītaḥ sva-uttarīya-ādi-dānataḥ /</l>
<l>saṃtoṣya so 'tra vṛddhāṃ tāṃ mantri-putro 'bravīt punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.97' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>mātā tvaṃ tad vadāmas te guptaṃ yat tat kuruṣva naḥ /</l>
<l>dantaghāṭasutām etāṃ gatvā padmāvatīṃ vada //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.97'>
<lg>
<l>mātā tvaṃ tad vadāmas te guptaṃ yat tat kuruṣva naḥ /</l>
<l>dantaghāṭa-sutām etāṃ gatvā padmāvatīṃ vada //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.98' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>so 'trāgato rājaputro dṛṣṭo yaḥ sarasi tvayā /</l>
<l>tena ceha tad ākhyātuṃ preṣitā praṇayād aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.98'>
<lg>
<l>so 'trā agato rāja-putro dṛṣṭo yaḥ sarasi tvayā /</l>
<l>tena ca iha tad ākhyātuṃ preṣitā praṇayād aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.99' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tac chṛutvā sā tathety uktvā vṛddhā dānavaśīkṛtā /</l>
<l>gatvā padmāvatīpārśvam ājagāma kṣaṇāntare //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.99'>
<lg>
<l>tac chṛutvā sā tatha īty uktvā vṛddhā dāna-vaśī-kṛtā /</l>
<l>gatvā padmāvatī-pārśvam ājagāma kṣaṇa-antare //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.100' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pṛṣṭā jagāda tau rājasutamantrisutau ca sā /</l>
<l>yuṣmadāgamanaṃ gatvā guptaṃ tasyā mayoditam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.100'>
<lg>
<l>pṛṣṭā jagāda tau rāja-suta-mantri-sutau ca sā /</l>
<l>yuṣmad-āgamanaṃ gatvā guptaṃ tasyā maya ūditam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.101' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tayā śrutvā ca nirbhartsya pāṇibhyām aham āhatā /</l>
<l>dvābhyāṃ karpūraliptābhyām ubhayor gaṇḍayor mukhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.101'>
<lg>
<l>tayā śrutvā ca nirbhartsya pāṇibhyām aham āhatā /</l>
<l>dvābhyāṃ karpūra-liptābhyām ubhayor gaṇḍayor mukhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.102' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tataḥ paribhavodvignā rudaty aham ihāgatā /</l>
<l>etās tad aṅgulīmudrāḥ putrau me paśyataṃ mukhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.102'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ paribhava udvignā rudaty aham ihā agatā /</l>
<l>etās tad aṅgulī-mudrāḥ putrau me paśyataṃ mukhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.103' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>evaṃ tayokte nairāśyaviṣaṇṇaṃ taṃ nṛpātmajam /</l>
<l>jagāda sa mahāprājño mantriputro janāntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.103'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ taya ūkte nairāśya-viṣaṇṇaṃ taṃ nṛ-pa-ātmajam /</l>
<l>jagāda sa mahā-prājño mantri-putro jana-antikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.104' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>mā gā viṣādaṃ rakṣantyā mantraṃ nirbhartsya yat tayā /</l>
<l>karpūraśubhrā vaktre 'syāḥ svāṅgulyo daśa pātitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.104'>
<lg>
<l>mā gā viṣādaṃ rakṣantyā mantraṃ nirbhartsya yat tayā /</l>
<l>karpūra-śubhrā vaktre 'syāḥ sva-aṅgulyo daśa pātitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.105' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tad etad uktaṃ pakṣe 'smiñ śukle candravatīr imāḥ /</l>
<l>rātrīr daśa pratīkṣadhvaṃ saṃgamānucitā iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.105'>
<lg>
<l>tad etad uktaṃ pakṣe 'smiñ śukle candravatīr imāḥ /</l>
<l>rātrīr daśa pratīkṣadhvaṃ saṃgama-anucitā iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.106' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity āśvāsya sa taṃ rājasutaṃ mantrisutas tataḥ /</l>
<l>vikrīya guptaṃ hastasthaṃ kāñcanaṃ kimcid āpaṇe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.106'>
<lg>
<l>ity āśvāsya sa taṃ rāja-sutaṃ mantri-sutas tataḥ /</l>
<l>vikrīya guptaṃ hasta-sthaṃ kāñcanaṃ kim-cid āpaṇe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.107' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>vṛddhayā sādhayāmāsa mahārhaṃ bhojanaṃ tayā /</l>
<l>tatas tau bubhujāte dvau tat tayā saha vṛddhayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.107'>
<lg>
<l>vṛddhayā sādhayāmāsa mahā-arhaṃ bhojanaṃ tayā /</l>
<l>tatas tau bubhujāte dvau tat tayā saha vṛddhayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.108' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>evaṃ nītvā daśāhāni jijñāsārthaṃ punaḥ sa tām /</l>
<l>padmāvatyantikaṃ vṛddhāṃ mantriputro visṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.108'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ nītvā daśa-ahāni jijñāsā-arthaṃ punaḥ sa tām /</l>
<l>padmāvaty-antikaṃ vṛddhāṃ mantri-putro visṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.109' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sāpi mṛṣṭānnapānādilubdhā tad anurodhataḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā vāsagṛhaṃ tasyā bhūyo 'bhyetya jagāda tau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.109'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi mṛṣṭa-anna-pāna-ādi-lubdhā tad anurodhataḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā vāsa-gṛhaṃ tasyā bhūyo 'bhyetya jagāda tau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.110' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ito gatvādya tūṣṇīm apy ahaṃ tatra sthitā tayā /</l>
<l>yuṣmatkathāparādhaṃ tam udgirantyā svayaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.110'>
<lg>
<l>ito gatva ādya tūṣṇīm apy ahaṃ tatra sthitā tayā /</l>
<l>yuṣmat-kathā-aparādhaṃ tam udgirantyā svayaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.111' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sā laktakābhis tisṛbhiḥ karāṅgulibhir āhatā /</l>
<l>urasy asminn athaiṣāham ihāyātā tad antikāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.111'>
<lg>
<l>sā laktakābhis tisṛbhiḥ kara-aṅgulibhir āhatā /</l>
<l>urasy asminn atha eṣa āham ihā ayātā tad antikāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.112' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tac chrutvā rājaputraṃ taṃ svairaṃ mantrisuto 'bravīt /</l>
<l>mā kārṣīr anyathā śaṅkām asyā hi hṛdaye tayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.112'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā rāja-putraṃ taṃ svairaṃ mantri-suto 'bravīt /</l>
<l>mā kārṣīr anyathā śaṅkām asyā hi hṛdaye tayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.113' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sā laktakāṅgulīmudrātrayaṃ vinyasya yuktitaḥ /</l>
<l>rajasvalā niśās tisraḥ sthitāham iti sūcitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.113'>
<lg>
<l>sā laktaka-aṅgulī-mudrā-trayaṃ vinyasya yuktitaḥ /</l>
<l>rajas-valā niśās tisraḥ sthita āham iti sūcitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.114' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>evam uktvā nṛpasutaṃ mantriputras tryahe gate /</l>
<l>padmāvatyai punas tasyai vṛddhāṃ tāṃ prajighāya saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.114'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktvā nṛ-pa-sutaṃ mantri-putras try-ahe gate /</l>
<l>padmāvatyai punas tasyai vṛddhāṃ tāṃ prajighāya saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.115' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sā gatā mandiraṃ tasyās tayā saṃmānya bhojitā /</l>
<l>prītyā pānādilīlābhir dinaṃ cātra vinoditā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.115'>
<lg>
<l>sā gatā mandiraṃ tasyās tayā saṃmānya bhojitā /</l>
<l>prītyā pāna-ādi-līlābhir dinaṃ ca atra vinoditā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.116' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sāyaṃ ca yāvat sā vṛddhā gṛham āgantum icchati /</l>
<l>udabhūd bhayakṛt tāvat tatra kolāhalo bahiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.116'>
<lg>
<l>sāyaṃ ca yāvat sā vṛddhā gṛham āgantum icchati /</l>
<l>udabhūd bhaya-kṛt tāvat tatra kolāhalo bahiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.117' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>hā hā bhraṣṭo 'yam ālānāj janān mathnan pradhāvati /</l>
<l>mattahastīti lokasya tatrākrando 'tha śuśruve //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.117'>
<lg>
<l>hā hā bhraṣṭo 'yam ālānāj janān mathnan pradhāvati /</l>
<l>matta-hasti īti lokasya tatrā akrando 'tha śuśruve //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.118' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tataḥ padmāvatī sā tāṃ vṛddhām evam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>spaṣṭena hastiruddhena gantuṃ yuktaṃ na te pathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.118'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ padmāvatī sā tāṃ vṛddhām evam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>spaṣṭena hasti-ruddhena gantuṃ yuktaṃ na te pathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.119' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tat pīṭhikāṃ samāropya baddhālambanarajjukām /</l>
<l>bṛhadgavākṣeṇānena tvām atra prakṣipāmahe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.119'>
<lg>
<l>tat pīṭhikāṃ samāropya baddha-ālambana-rajjukām /</l>
<l>bṛhad-gavākṣeṇa anena tvām atra prakṣipāmahe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.120' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>gṛhodyāne tato vṛkṣam āruhyāmuṃ vilaṅghya ca /</l>
<l>prākāram avaruhyānyavṛkṣeṇa svagṛhaṃ vraja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.120'>
<lg>
<l>gṛha-udyāne tato vṛkṣam āruhya amuṃ vilaṅghya ca /</l>
<l>prākāram avaruhya anya-vṛkṣeṇa sva-gṛhaṃ vraja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.121' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktvā sā gavākṣeṇa kṣepayāmāsa tatra tām /</l>
<l>vṛddhāṃ ceṭībhir udyāne rajjupīṭhikayā tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.121'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā sā gavākṣeṇa kṣepayāmāsa tatra tām /</l>
<l>vṛddhāṃ ceṭībhir udyāne rajju-pīṭhikayā tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.122' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sātha gatvā yathoktena pathā sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa tat /</l>
<l>yathāvad rājaputrāya tasmai mantrisutāya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.122'>
<lg>
<l>sa ātha gatvā yathā-uktena pathā sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa tat /</l>
<l>yathāvad rāja-putrāya tasmai mantri-sutāya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.123' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tataḥ sa mantriputras taṃ rājaputram abhāṣata /</l>
<l>siddhaṃ taveṣṭaṃ mārgo hi yuktyā te darśitas tayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.123'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa mantri-putras taṃ rāja-putram abhāṣata /</l>
<l>siddhaṃ tava iṣṭaṃ mārgo hi yuktyā te darśitas tayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.124' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tad gacchādyaiva tatra tvaṃ pradoṣe 'smin nṛpāgate /</l>
<l>etenaiva pathā tasyāḥ priyāyā mandiraṃ viśa //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.124'>
<lg>
<l>tad gaccha adya eva tatra tvaṃ pradoṣe 'smin nṛ-pā agate /</l>
<l>etena eva pathā tasyāḥ priyāyā mandiraṃ viśa //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.125' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktas tena tadyukto rājaputro yayau sa tat /</l>
<l>udyānaṃ vṛddhayoktena tena prākāravartmanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.125'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktas tena tad-yukto rāja-putro yayau sa tat /</l>
<l>udyānaṃ vṛddhaya ūktena tena prākāra-vartmanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.126' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatrāpaśyac ca rajjuṃ tāṃ lambamānāṃ sapīṭhikām /</l>
<l>mārgonmukhābhiś ceṭībhir upariṣṭād adhiṣṭhitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.126'>
<lg>
<l>tatra apaśyac ca rajjuṃ tāṃ lambamānāṃ sa-pīṭhikām /</l>
<l>mārga-unmukhābhiś ceṭībhir upariṣṭād adhiṣṭhitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.127' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ārūḍhas tāṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva dāsībhis tābhir āśu saḥ /</l>
<l>rajjūtkṣipto gavākṣeṇa praviveśa priyāntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.127'>
<lg>
<l>ārūḍhas tāṃ ca dṛṣṭva aiva dāsībhis tābhir āśu saḥ /</l>
<l>rajju-utkṣipto gavākṣeṇa praviveśa priyā-antikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.128' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tasmin praviṣṭe sa yayau mantriputraḥ svam āspadam /</l>
<l>rājaputras tu tāṃ padmāvatīṃ tatra dadarśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.128'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin praviṣṭe sa yayau mantri-putraḥ svam āspadam /</l>
<l>rāja-putras tu tāṃ padmāvatīṃ tatra dadarśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.129' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pūrṇāmṛtāmśuvadanāṃ prasaratkānticandrakām /</l>
<l>kṛṣṇapakṣabhayād guptasthitāṃ rākāniśām iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.129'>
<lg>
<l>pūrṇa-amṛta-amśu-vadanāṃ prasarat-kānti-candrakām /</l>
<l>kṛṣṇa-pakṣa-bhayād gupta-sthitāṃ rākā-niśām iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.130' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sāpi dṛṣṭvā tam utthāya cirautsukyocitais tataḥ /</l>
<l>kaṇṭhagrahādibhis tais tair upacārair amānayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.130'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi dṛṣṭvā tam utthāya cira-autsukya-ucitais tataḥ /</l>
<l>kaṇṭha-graha-ādibhis tais tair upacārair amānayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.131' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatas tayā sa gāndharvavidhinodūḍhayā saha /</l>
<l>guptaṃ rājasutas tasthau pūrṇecchas tatra kāntayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.131'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tayā sa gāndharva-vidhina udūḍhayā saha /</l>
<l>guptaṃ rāja-sutas tasthau pūrṇa-icchas tatra kāntayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.132' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sthitvā cāhāni katicid rātrau tām avadat priyām /</l>
<l>sakhā mama sahāyāto mantriputra iti sthitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.132'>
<lg>
<l>sthitvā ca ahāni kati-cid rātrau tām avadat priyām /</l>
<l>sakhā mama sahāyāto mantri-putra iti sthitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.133' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sa cātra tiṣṭhaty ekākī tvajjyeṣṭhatarikāgṛhe /</l>
<l>gatvā saṃbhāvya taṃ tanvi puna eṣyāmi te 'ntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.133'>
<lg>
<l>sa ca atra tiṣṭhaty ekākī tvaj-jyeṣṭha-tarikā-gṛhe /</l>
<l>gatvā saṃbhāvya taṃ tanvi puna eṣyāmi te 'ntikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.134' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tac chṛutvā tam avocat sā dhūrtā padmāvatī priyam /</l>
<l>hantāryaputra pṛcchāmi tāḥ saṃjñā matkṛtās tvayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.134'>
<lg>
<l>tac chṛutvā tam avocat sā dhūrtā padmāvatī priyam /</l>
<l>hantā arya-putra pṛcchāmi tāḥ saṃjñā mat-kṛtās tvayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.135' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>jñātā kiṃ kim uvā tena sakhyā mantrisutena te /</l>
<l>evam uktavatīm etāṃ rājaputro jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.135'>
<lg>
<l>jñātā kiṃ kim uvā tena sakhyā mantri-sutena te /</l>
<l>evam uktavatīm etāṃ rāja-putro jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.136' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>na jñātaṃ tan mayā kimcij jñātvā sarvaṃ ca tena me /</l>
<l>ākhyātaṃ mantriputreṇa divyaprajñānaśālinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.136'>
<lg>
<l>na jñātaṃ tan mayā kim-cij jñātvā sarvaṃ ca tena me /</l>
<l>ākhyātaṃ mantri-putreṇa divya-prajñāna-śālinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.137' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>etac chṛutvā vicintyaiva bhāminī sā jagāda tam /</l>
<l>tarhy ayuktaṃ kṛtaṃ yan me cirāt sa kathitas tvayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.137'>
<lg>
<l>etac chṛutvā vicintya eva bhāminī sā jagāda tam /</l>
<l>tarhy a-yuktaṃ kṛtaṃ yan me cirāt sa kathitas tvayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.138' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>sa me bhrātā sakhā yas te tasya ca prathamaṃ mayā /</l>
<l>tāmbūlādisamācāraḥ kartavyo hi sadā bhavet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.138'>
<lg>
<l>sa me bhrātā sakhā yas te tasya ca prathamaṃ mayā /</l>
<l>tāmbūla-ādi-samācāraḥ kartavyo hi sadā bhavet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.139' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktavatyānumatas tayā pūrvapathena saḥ /</l>
<l>rajāputro 'ntikaṃ tasya sakhyur āgāt tato niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.139'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavatya ānumatas tayā pūrva-pathena saḥ /</l>
<l>rajā-putro 'ntikaṃ tasya sakhyur āgāt tato niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.140' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>śaśaṃsa ca kathāmadhye tat tasmai yat tadāśrayam /</l>
<l>saṃjñāvijñānakathanaṃ kṛtaṃ tena priyāntike //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.140'>
<lg>
<l>śaśaṃsa ca kathā-madhye tat tasmai yat tad-āśrayam /</l>
<l>saṃjñā-vijñāna-kathanaṃ kṛtaṃ tena priyā-antike //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.141' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>mantriputras tu so 'yuktam iti na śraddadhe 'sya tat /</l>
<l>tāvac ca sā tayos tatra vibhātābhūd vibhāvarī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.141'>
<lg>
<l>mantri-putras tu so '-yuktam iti na śraddadhe 'sya tat /</l>
<l>tāvac ca sā tayos tatra vibhāta ābhūd vibhāvarī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.142' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>athaitayor vidhau sāṃdhye nivṛtte kurvatoḥ kathāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.142'>
<lg>
<l>atha etayor vidhau sāṃdhye nivṛtte kurvatoḥ kathāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.143' corresp='Vet_1'>
  <l>āgāt pakvānnatāmbūlahastā padmāvatīsakhī /</l>
<l>sā mantriputraṃ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā dattopacārikā /</l>
<l>niṣeddhuṃ rajāputrasya bhojanaṃ tatra yuktitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.143'>
<lg>
  <l>āgāt pakva-anna-tāmbūla-hastā padmāvatī-sakhī /</l>
<l>sā mantri-putraṃ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā datta-upacārikā /</l>
<l>niṣeddhuṃ rajā-putrasya bhojanaṃ tatra yuktitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.144' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>kathāntare svāminīṃ svāṃ bhojanādau tadāgamam /</l>
<l>pratīkṣamāṇām āvedya kṣaṇād guptaṃ tato yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.144'>
<lg>
<l>kathā-antare svāminīṃ svāṃ bhojana-ādau tad-āgamam /</l>
<l>pratīkṣamāṇām āvedya kṣaṇād guptaṃ tato yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.145' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatas taṃ mantriputraḥ sa rājaputram abhāṣata /</l>
<l>kautukaṃ paśya devaikaṃ darśayāmy adhunā tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.145'>
<lg>
<l>tatas taṃ mantri-putraḥ sa rāja-putram abhāṣata /</l>
<l>kautukaṃ paśya deva ekaṃ darśayāmy adhunā tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.146' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktvā bhakṣyam ekaṃ sa pakvānnaṃ dattavāṃs tataḥ /</l>
<l>sārameyāya sa ca tat khāditvaiva vyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.146'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā bhakṣyam ekaṃ sa pakva-annaṃ dattavāṃs tataḥ /</l>
<l>sārameyāya sa ca tat khāditva aiva vyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.147' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā kim idaṃ citram iti rājasuto 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>papraccha mantriputraṃ taṃ sa caitaṃ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.147'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā kim idaṃ citram iti rāja-suto 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>papraccha mantri-putraṃ taṃ sa ca etaṃ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.148' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>saṃjñājñānena dhūrtaṃ māṃ viditvā hantukāmayā /</l>
<l>tayā viṣānnaṃ prahitaṃ mama tvadanuraktayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.148'>
<lg>
<l>saṃjñā-jñānena dhūrtaṃ māṃ viditvā hantu-kāmayā /</l>
<l>tayā viṣa-annaṃ prahitaṃ mama tvad-anuraktayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.149' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>nāsmin sati madekāgro rājaputro bhaved ayam /</l>
<l>etadvaśaś ca muktvā māṃ nagarīṃ svāṃ vrajed iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.149'>
<lg>
<l>na asmin sati mad-eka-agro rāja-putro bhaved ayam /</l>
<l>etad-vaśaś ca muktvā māṃ nagarīṃ svāṃ vrajed iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.150' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tan muñca manyum etasyāṃ bandhutyāgān mahātmanaḥ /</l>
<l>kuryās tvaṃ haraṇe yuktiṃ vakṣyāmy ālocya yām aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.150'>
<lg>
<l>tan muñca manyum etasyāṃ bandhu-tyāgān mahā-ātmanaḥ /</l>
<l>kuryās tvaṃ haraṇe yuktiṃ vakṣyāmy ālocya yām aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.151' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ taṃ mantrisuto rājasuto 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>satyaṃ buddhiśarīras tvam iti yāvat praśaṃsati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.151'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ taṃ mantri-suto rāja-suto 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>satyaṃ buddhiśarīras tvam iti yāvat praśaṃsati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.152' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>aśaṅkitaṃ bahis tāvad duḥkhākulajanāravaḥ /</l>
<l>hā dhig rājñaḥ suto bālo vipanna iti śuśruve //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.152'>
<lg>
<l>aśaṅkitaṃ bahis tāvad duḥkha-ākula-jana-āravaḥ /</l>
<l>hā dhig rājñaḥ suto bālo vipanna iti śuśruve //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.153' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tadākarṇanahṛṣṭo 'tha mantriputro nṛpātmajam /</l>
<l>jagāda hanta gacchādya padmāvatyā gṛhaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.153'>
<lg>
<l>tad-ākarṇana-hṛṣṭo 'tha mantri-putro nṛ-pa-ātmajam /</l>
<l>jagāda hanta gaccha adya padmāvatyā gṛhaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.154' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatra tāṃ pāyayes tāvad yāvat pānamadena sā /</l>
<l>niḥsaṃjñā naṣṭaceṣṭā ca gatajīveva jāyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.154'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tāṃ pāyayes tāvad yāvat pāna-madena sā /</l>
<l>niḥ-saṃjñā naṣṭa-ceṣṭā ca gata-jīva iva jāyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.155' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatas tasyāḥ sanidrāyāḥ śūlenāṅkaṃ kaṭītaṭe /</l>
<l>dattvāgnitaptenādāya tadābharaṇasaṃcayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.155'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tasyāḥ sa-nidrāyāḥ śūlena aṅkaṃ kaṭī-taṭe /</l>
<l>dattva āgni-taptenā adāya tad-ābharaṇa-saṃcayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.156' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>āgacches tvaṃ gavākṣeṇa rajjulambavinirgataḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ paraṃ yathā bhadraṃ bhavej jñāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.156'>
<lg>
<l>āgacches tvaṃ gavākṣeṇa rajju-lamba-vinirgataḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ paraṃ yathā bhadraṃ bhavej jñāsyāmy ahaṃ tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.157' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktvā kārayitvā ca kroḍavālanibhāśrikam /</l>
<l>mantriputro dadau tasmai triśūlaṃ rājasūnave //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.157'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā kārayitvā ca kroḍa-vāla-nibha-āśrikam /</l>
<l>mantri-putro dadau tasmai tri-śūlaṃ rāja-sūnave //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.158' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>rājaputraḥ sa haste tat kṛtvā kuṭilakarkaśam /</l>
<l>kālāyasa dṛḍhaṃ cittam iva kāntāvayasyayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.158'>
<lg>
<l>rāja-putraḥ sa haste tat kṛtvā kuṭila-karkaśam /</l>
<l>kāla-ayasa dṛḍhaṃ cittam iva kāntā-vayasyayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.159' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatheti pūrvavad rātrāv agāt padmāvatīgṛham /</l>
<l>avicāryaṃ prabhūṇāṃ hi śucer vākyaṃ svamantriṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.159'>
<lg>
<l>tatha īti pūrvavad rātrāv agāt padmāvatī-gṛham /</l>
<l>avicāryaṃ prabhūṇāṃ hi śucer vākyaṃ sva-mantriṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.160' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tatra tāṃ madyaniḥceṣṭāṃ śūlena jaghane 'ṅkitām /</l>
<l>hṛtālaṃkaraṇāṃ kṛtvā tasyāgāt sakhyur antikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.160'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tāṃ madya-niḥ-ceṣṭāṃ śūlena jaghane 'ṅkitām /</l>
<l>hṛta-alaṃkaraṇāṃ kṛtvā tasya agāt sakhyur antikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.161' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>darśitābharaṇas tasmai śaśaṃsa ca yathākṛtam /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa mantriputro 'pi siddhaṃ mene manīṣitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.161'>
<lg>
<l>darśita-ābharaṇas tasmai śaśaṃsa ca yathā-kṛtam /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa mantri-putro 'pi siddhaṃ mene manīṣitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.162' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>prātar gatvā śmaśānaṃ ca so 'bhūt tāpasaveṣabhṛt /</l>
<l>svairaṃ rājasutaṃ taṃ ca vidadhe śiṣyarūpiṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.162'>
<lg>
<l>prātar gatvā śmaśānaṃ ca so 'bhūt tāpasa-veṣa-bhṛt /</l>
<l>svairaṃ rāja-sutaṃ taṃ ca vidadhe śiṣya-rūpiṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.163' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>abravīt taṃ ca gacchaikam ito 'laṃkaraṇād imām /</l>
<l>muktāvalīṃ samādāya tvaṃ vikretum ivāpaṇe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.163'>
<lg>
<l>abravīt taṃ ca gaccha ekam ito 'laṃkaraṇād imām /</l>
<l>muktā-āvalīṃ samādāya tvaṃ vikretum ivā apaṇe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.164' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>bahumūlyaṃ vadeś cāsyā yenaitāṃ naiva kaś cane /</l>
<l>gṛhṇīyād bhrāmyamāṇāṃ ca sarvaḥ ko 'pi vilokayet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.164'>
<lg>
<l>bahu-mūlyaṃ vadeś ca asyā yena etāṃ na eva kaś cane /</l>
<l>gṛhṇīyād bhrāmyamāṇāṃ ca sarvaḥ ko 'pi vilokayet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.165' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>guruṇā mama vikretum iyaṃ dattety anākulaḥ /</l>
<l>brūyāś ca yadi gṛhṇīyur atra tvāṃ purarakṣiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.165'>
<lg>
<l>guruṇā mama vikretum iyaṃ datta īty anākulaḥ /</l>
<l>brūyāś ca yadi gṛhṇīyur atra tvāṃ pura-rakṣiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.166' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>iti sa preṣitas tena gatvā rājasutas tadā /</l>
<l>atiṣṭhad āpaṇe bhrāmyan vyaktaṃ muktāvalīṃ dadhat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.166'>
<lg>
<l>iti sa preṣitas tena gatvā rāja-sutas tadā /</l>
<l>atiṣṭhad āpaṇe bhrāmyan vyaktaṃ muktā-āvalīṃ dadhat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.167' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tathābhūtaś ca jagṛhe sa dṛṣṭvā purarakṣibhiḥ /</l>
<l>dantaghāṭasutāmoṣajñapteś cauregaveṣibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.167'>
<lg>
<l>tatha ābhūtaś ca jagṛhe sa dṛṣṭvā pura-rakṣibhiḥ /</l>
<l>danta-ghāṭa-sutā-moṣa-jñapteś caure-gaveṣibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.168' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ninye ca nagarādhyakṣanikaṭaṃ taiḥ sa tatkṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>sa ca taṃ tāpasākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha sāntvataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.168'>
<lg>
<l>ninye ca nagara-adhyakṣa-nikaṭaṃ taiḥ sa tat-kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>sa ca taṃ tāpasa-ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā papraccha sāntvataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.169' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>kuto muktāvalīyaṃ te bhagavann iha hāritā /</l>
<l>dantaghāṭakakanyāyā hṛtaṃ hy ābharaṇaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.169'>
<lg>
<l>kuto muktā-āvali īyaṃ te bhagavann iha hāritā /</l>
<l>danta-ghāṭaka-kanyāyā hṛtaṃ hy ābharaṇaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.170' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tac chṛutvā rājaputras taṃ so 'vādīt tāpasākṛtiḥ /</l>
<l>guruṇā mama datteyam etyāsau pṛcchyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.170'>
<lg>
<l>tac chṛutvā rāja-putras taṃ so 'vādīt tāpasa-ākṛtiḥ /</l>
<l>guruṇā mama datta īyam etya asau pṛcchyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.171' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tataś copetya taṃ natvā papraccha nagarādhipaḥ /</l>
<l>muktāvalīyaṃ bhagavan kutas te śiṣyahastagā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.171'>
<lg>
<l>tataś ca upetya taṃ natvā papraccha nagara-adhipaḥ /</l>
<l>muktā-āvali īyaṃ bhagavan kutas te śiṣya-hasta-gā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.172' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>śṛutvaitad vijanaṃ kṛtvā sa dhūrtas tam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tapasvī bhrāmyāmi sadāraṇyeṣv itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.172'>
<lg>
<l>śṛutva aitad vijanaṃ kṛtvā sa dhūrtas tam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tapasvī bhrāmyāmi sada āraṇyeṣv itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.173' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>so 'haṃ daivād iha prāptaḥ śmaśāne 'tra sthito niśi /</l>
<l>apaśyaṃ yoginīcakraṃ samāgatam itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.173'>
<lg>
<l>so 'haṃ daivād iha prāptaḥ śmaśāne 'tra sthito niśi /</l>
<l>apaśyaṃ yoginī-cakraṃ samāgatam itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.174' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>tanmadhye caikayānīya yoginyā rājaputrakaḥ /</l>
<l>udghāṭitahṛdambhojo bhairavāya niveditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.174'>
<lg>
<l>tan-madhye ca ekayā ānīya yoginyā rāja-putrakaḥ /</l>
<l>udghāṭita-hṛd-ambhojo bhairavāya niveditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.175' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pānamattā ca sā hartuṃ japato me 'kṣamālikām /</l>
<l>prāvartata mahāmāyā vikārān kurvatī mukhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.175'>
<lg>
<l>pāna-mattā ca sā hartuṃ japato me 'kṣa-mālikām /</l>
<l>prāvartata mahā-māyā vikārān kurvatī mukhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.176' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>atipravṛttā ca mayā kruddhena jaghanasthale /</l>
<l>aṅkitā sā triśūlena mantraprajvālitāśriṇā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.176'>
<lg>
<l>atipravṛttā ca mayā kruddhena jaghana-sthale /</l>
<l>aṅkitā sā tri-śūlena mantra-prajvālita-aśriṇā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.177' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>hṛtā muktāvalī ceyaṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhān mayā tadā /</l>
<l>saiṣādya tāpasānarhā vikreyā mama vartate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.177'>
<lg>
<l>hṛtā muktā-āvalī ca iyaṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhān mayā tadā /</l>
<l>sa aiṣa ādya tāpasa-anarhā vikreyā mama vartate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.178' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>etac chṛutvā purādhyakṣo gatvā bhūpaṃ vyajijñapat /</l>
<l>bhūpo 'py ākarṇya tat tāṃ ca buddhvā tanmauktikāvalīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.178'>
<lg>
<l>etac chṛutvā pura-adhyakṣo gatvā bhū-paṃ vyajijñapat /</l>
<l>bhū-po 'py ākarṇya tat tāṃ ca buddhvā tan-mauktika-āvalīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.179' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>prekṣaṇapreṣitāyātavṛddhāptavanitāmukhāt /</l>
<l>śrutvā ca dṛśyaśūlāṅkāṃ jaghane satyam eva tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.179'>
<lg>
<l>prekṣaṇa-preṣita-āyāta-vṛddha-āpta-vanitā-mukhāt /</l>
<l>śrutvā ca dṛśya-śūla-aṅkāṃ jaghane satyam eva tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.180' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>grastaḥ suto me ḍakinyā tayety utpannaniścayaḥ /</l>
<l>svayaṃ tasyāntikaṃ gatvā mantriputratapasvinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.180'>
<lg>
<l>grastaḥ suto me ḍakinyā taya īty utpanna-niścayaḥ /</l>
<l>svayaṃ tasya antikaṃ gatvā mantri-putra-tapasvinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.181' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>pṛṣṭvā ca nigrahaṃ tasyāḥ padmāvatyāḥ sa tadgirā /</l>
<l>pitṛbhyāṃ śocyamānāyāḥ purān niḥvāsanaṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.181'>
<lg>
<l>pṛṣṭvā ca nigrahaṃ tasyāḥ padmāvatyāḥ sa tad-girā /</l>
<l>pitṛbhyāṃ śocyamānāyāḥ purān niḥ-vāsanaṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.182' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>nirvāsitāṭavīsthā sā vignāpi na jahau tanum /</l>
<l>upāyaṃ mantriputreṇa taṃ saṃbhāvya tathā kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.182'>
<lg>
<l>nirvāsitā-aṭavī-sthā sā vigna āpi na jahau tanum /</l>
<l>upāyaṃ mantri-putreṇa taṃ saṃbhāvya tathā kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.183' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>dinānte tāṃ ca śocantīm aśvārūḍhāv upeyatuḥ /</l>
<l>tyaktatāpasaveṣau tau mantriputranṛpātmajau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.183'>
<lg>
<l>dina-ante tāṃ ca śocantīm aśva-ārūḍhāv upeyatuḥ /</l>
<l>tyakta-tāpasa-veṣau tau mantri-putra-nṛ-pa-ātma-jau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.184' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>āśvāsyāropya turage svarāṣṭraṃ ninyatuś ca tām /</l>
<l>tatra tasthau tayā sākaṃ rājaputraḥ sa nirvṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.184'>
<lg>
<l>āśvāsyā aropya turage sva-rāṣṭraṃ ninyatuś ca tām /</l>
<l>tatra tasthau tayā sākaṃ rāja-putraḥ sa nirvṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.185' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>dantaghāṭas tv araṇye tāṃ kravyādair bhakṣitāṃ sutām /</l>
<l>matvā vyapādi śokena bhāryā cānujagāma tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.185'>
<lg>
<l>dantaghāṭas tv araṇye tāṃ kravyādair bhakṣitāṃ sutām /</l>
<l>matvā vyapādi śokena bhāryā ca anujagāma tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.186' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity ākhyāya sa bhūyas taṃ vetālo nṛpam abravīt /</l>
<l>tan me 'tra saṃśayaṃ chinddhi daṃpatyor etayor vadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.186'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākhyāya sa bhūyas taṃ vetālo nṛ-pam abravīt /</l>
<l>tan me 'tra saṃśayaṃ chinddhi daṃpatyor etayor vadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.187' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>mantriputrasya kiṃ pāpaṃ rājaputrasya kiṃ nu vā /</l>
<l>padmāvatyāḥ kim atha vā tvaṃ hi buddhimatāṃ varaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.187'>
<lg>
<l>mantri-putrasya kiṃ pāpaṃ rāja-putrasya kiṃ nu vā /</l>
<l>padmāvatyāḥ kim atha vā tvaṃ hi buddhimatāṃ varaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.188' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>jānānaś ca na ced rājan mama tattvaṃ vadiṣyasi /</l>
<l>tad eṣa śatadhā mūrdhā niḥcitaṃ te sphuṭiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.188'>
<lg>
<l>jānānaś ca na ced rājan mama tattvaṃ vadiṣyasi /</l>
<l>tad eṣa śatadhā mūrdhā niḥ-citaṃ te sphuṭiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.189' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ vijānañ śāpabhītitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam evaṃ pratyabravīn nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.189'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ vijānañ śāpa-bhītitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam evaṃ pratyabravīn nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.190' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>yogeśvara kim ajñeyam etan naiṣāṃ hi pātakam /</l>
<l>trayāṇām api rājñas tu pāpaṃ karṇotpalasya tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.190'>
<lg>
<l>yoga-īśvara kim ajñeyam etan na eṣāṃ hi pātakam /</l>
<l>trayāṇām api rājñas tu pāpaṃ karṇotpalasya tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.191' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>vetālo 'py āha rājñaḥ kiṃ te hi tatkāriṇas trayaḥ /</l>
<l>kākāḥ kim aparādhyanti haṃsair jagdheṣu śāliṣu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.191'>
<lg>
<l>vetālo 'py āha rājñaḥ kiṃ te hi tat-kāriṇas trayaḥ /</l>
<l>kākāḥ kim aparādhyanti haṃsair jagdheṣu śāliṣu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.192' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>rājā tato 'bravīc cainaṃ na duṣyanti trayo 'pi te /</l>
<l>mantrisūnor hi tat tāvat prabhukāryam apātakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.192'>
<lg>
<l>rājā tato 'bravīc ca enaṃ na duṣyanti trayo 'pi te /</l>
<l>mantri-sūnor hi tat tāvat prabhu-kāryam apātakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.193' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>padmāvatīrājaputrau tau hi kāmaśarāgninā /</l>
<l>saṃtaptāv avicārārhāv adoṣau svārtham udyatau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.193'>
<lg>
<l>padmāvatī-rāja-putrau tau hi kāma-śara-agninā /</l>
<l>saṃtaptāv avicāra-arhāv adoṣau sva-artham udyatau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.194' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>karṇotpalas tu rājā sa nītiśāstreṣv aśikṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>caraiḥ prajāsv ananviṣyaṃs tattvaśuddhiṃ nijāsv api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.194'>
<lg>
<l>karṇotpalas tu rājā sa nīti-śāstreṣv aśikṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>caraiḥ prajāsv ananviṣyaṃs tattva-śuddhiṃ nijāsv api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.195' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ajānan dhūrtacaritānīṅgitādyavicakṣaṇaḥ /</l>
<l>tathā tan niḥvicāraṃ yac cakre tena sa pāpabhāk //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.195'>
<lg>
<l>ajānan dhūrta-caritāni iṅgita-ādy-avicakṣaṇaḥ /</l>
<l>tathā tan niḥ-vicāraṃ yac cakre tena sa pāpa-bhāk //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.8.196' corresp='Vet_1'>
<l>ity ākarṇya vimuktamaunam udite samyaṅ nṛpeṇottare <lb/>skandhāt tasya sa dārḍhyam ākalayituṃ māyābalāt tatkṣaṇam /</l>
<l>vetālo nṛkalevarāntaragataḥ kvāpy apratarkyo yayau <lb/>niḥkampaḥ sa ca bhūpatiḥ punar amuṃ prāptuṃ vyadhān niḥcayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.8.196'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākarṇya vimukta-maunam udite samyaṅ nṛ-peṇa uttare <lb/>skandhāt tasya sa dārḍhyam ākalayituṃ māyā-balāt tat-kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>vetālo nṛ-kalevara-antara-gataḥ kva apy apratarkyo yayau <lb/>niḥ-kampaḥ sa ca bhū-patiḥ punar amuṃ prāptuṃ vyadhān niḥ-cayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.1' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tato 'tra puna ānetuṃ taṃ vetālam agān nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tac chiṃśapāpādapāntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'tra puna ānetuṃ taṃ vetālam agān nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tac chiṃśapā-pāda-pa-antikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.2' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>prāpto 'tra vīkṣate yāvac citālokavaśān niśi /</l>
<l>tāvad dadarśa taṃ bhūmau kūjantaṃ patitaṃ śavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.2'>
<lg>
<l>prāpto 'tra vīkṣate yāvac citā-āloka-vaśān niśi /</l>
<l>tāvad dadarśa taṃ bhūmau kūjantaṃ patitaṃ śavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.3' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>atha taṃ mṛtadehasthaṃ vetālaṃ sa mahīpatiḥ /</l>
<l>āropya skandham ānetuṃ tūṣṇīṃ pravavṛte javāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.3'>
<lg>
<l>atha taṃ mṛta-deha-sthaṃ vetālaṃ sa mahī-patiḥ /</l>
<l>āropya skandham ānetuṃ tūṣṇīṃ pravavṛte javāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.4' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tataḥ skandhāt sa vetālo bhūyas taṃ nṛpam abravīt /</l>
<l>rājan mahaty anucite kleśe 'smin patito bhavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.4'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ skandhāt sa vetālo bhūyas taṃ nṛ-pam abravīt /</l>
<l>rājan mahaty anucite kleśe 'smin patito bhavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.5' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>atas tava vinodāya khatayāmi khatāṃ śṛṇu /</l>
<l>asty agrahāraḥ kālindīkūle brahmasthalābhidhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.5'>
<lg>
<l>atas tava vinodāya khatayāmi khatāṃ śṛṇu /</l>
<l>asty agra-hāraḥ kālindī-kūle brahma-sthala-abhidhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.6' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>agnisvāmīti tatrāsīd brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyātirūpā mandāravatīty ajani kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.6'>
<lg>
<l>agnisvāmi īti tatrā asīd brāhmaṇo veda-pāragaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya ati-rūpā mandāravati īty ajani kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.7' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>yāṃ niḥmāya navānarghalāvaṇyāṃ niyataṃ vidhiḥ /</l>
<l>svargastrīpūrvanirmāṇaṃ nijam evājugupsata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.7'>
<lg>
<l>yāṃ niḥ-māya nava-anargha-lāvaṇyāṃ niyataṃ vidhiḥ /</l>
<l>svarga-strī-pūrva-nir-māṇaṃ nijam eva ajugupsata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.8' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tasyāṃ ca yauvanasthāyām āyayuḥ kānyakubjataḥ /</l>
<l>samasarvaguṇās tatra trayo brāhmaṇaputrakāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.8'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ ca yauvana-sthāyām āyayuḥ kānyakubjataḥ /</l>
<l>sama-sarva-guṇās tatra trayo brāhmaṇa-putrakāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.9' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>teṣāṃ cātmārtham ekaikas tatpitus tām ayācata /</l>
<l>anicchan dānam anyasmai tasyāḥ prānavyayād api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.9'>
<lg>
<l>teṣāṃ cā atma-artham ekaikas tat-pitus tām ayācata /</l>
<l>anicchan dānam anyasmai tasyāḥ prāna-vyayād api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.10' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tatpitā sa tu tanmadhyān naikasmā api tāṃ dadau /</l>
<l>bhīto 'nyayor vadhāt tena tasthau kanyaiva sā tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.10'>
<lg>
<l>tat-pitā sa tu tan-madhyān na ekasmā api tāṃ dadau /</l>
<l>bhīto 'nyayor vadhāt tena tasthau kanya aiva sā tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.11' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>te ca trayo 'pi tadvaktracandraikāsakta dṛṣṭhayaḥ /</l>
<l>cakoravratam ālambya tatraivāsan divāniśam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.11'>
<lg>
<l>te ca trayo 'pi tad-vaktra-candra-eka-āsakta dṛṣṭhayaḥ /</l>
<l>cakora-vratam ālambya tatra evā asan divā-niśam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.12' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>athākasmātsamutpanna dāhajvaravaśena sā /</l>
<l>jagāma mandāravatī kumārī kila pañcatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.12'>
<lg>
<l>atha akasmāt-samutpanna dāha-jvara-vaśena sā /</l>
<l>jagāma mandāravatī kumārī kila pañcatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.13' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tatas tāṃ vipraputrās te parāsuṃ śokaviklavāḥ /</l>
<l>kṛtaprasādhanāṃ nītvā śmaśānaṃ cakrur agnisāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.13'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tāṃ vipra-putrās te para-asuṃ śoka-viklavāḥ /</l>
<l>kṛta-prasādhanāṃ nītvā śmaśānaṃ cakrur agnisāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.14' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>ekaś ca teṣāṃ tatraiva vidhāya maṭhikāṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>kṛtatadbhasmaśayyaḥ sann āstāyācitabhaikṣabhuk //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.14'>
<lg>
<l>ekaś ca teṣāṃ tatra eva vidhāya maṭhikāṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>kṛta-tad-bhasma-śayyaḥ sann āstā ayācita-bhaikṣa-bhuk //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.15' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>dvitīyo 'sthīny upādāya tasyā bhāgīrathīṃ yayau /</l>
<l>tṛtīyas tāpaso bhūtvā bhrāntuṃ deśāntarāṇy agāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.15'>
<lg>
<l>dvitīyo 'sthīny upādāya tasyā bhāgīrathīṃ yayau /</l>
<l>tṛtīyas tāpaso bhūtvā bhrāntuṃ deśa-antarāṇy agāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.16' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>sa bhrāmyaṃs tāpasaḥ prāpa grāmaṃ vakrolakābhidham /</l>
<l>tatrātithiḥ san kasyāpi viprasya prāviśad gṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.16'>
<lg>
<l>sa bhrāmyaṃs tāpasaḥ prāpa grāmaṃ vakrolaka-abhidham /</l>
<l>tatra atithiḥ san kasya api viprasya prāviśad gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.17' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tatpūjitaḥ sa yāvac ca bhoktuṃ tatra pracakrame /</l>
<l>tāvad ekaḥ śiśus tatra pravṛtto 'bhūt praroditum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.17'>
<lg>
<l>tat-pūjitaḥ sa yāvac ca bhoktuṃ tatra pracakrame /</l>
<l>tāvad ekaḥ śiśus tatra pravṛtto 'bhūt praroditum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.18' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>sa sāntvyamāno 'pi yadā na vyaramsīt tadā krudhā /</l>
<l>bāhav ādāya gṛhiṇī jvalaty agnau tam akṣipat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.18'>
<lg>
<l>sa sāntvyamāno 'pi yadā na vyaramsīt tadā krudhā /</l>
<l>bāhav ādāya gṛhiṇī jvalaty agnau tam akṣipat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.19' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>kṣipta mātraḥ sa mṛdvaṅgo bhasmībhāvam avāptavān /</l>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā jātaromāñcaḥ so 'bravīt tāpaso 'tithiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.19'>
<lg>
<l>kṣipta mātraḥ sa mṛdv-aṅgo bhasmī-bhāvam avāptavān /</l>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā jāta-roma-añcaḥ so 'bravīt tāpaso 'tithiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.20' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>hā dhikkaṣṭaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi brahmarākṣasaveśmani /</l>
<l>tanmūrtaṃ kilbiṣam idaṃ na bhokṣye 'nnam ihādhunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.20'>
<lg>
<l>hā dhikkaṣṭaṃ praviṣṭo 'smi brahma-rākṣasa-veśmani /</l>
<l>tan-mūrtaṃ kilbiṣam idaṃ na bhokṣye 'nnam iha adhunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.21' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>evaṃ vadantaṃ taṃ so 'tra gṛhasthaḥ prāha paśya me /</l>
<l>śaktiṃ paṭhitasiddhasya mantrasya mṛtajīvanīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.21'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ vadantaṃ taṃ so 'tra gṛhasthaḥ prāha paśya me /</l>
<l>śaktiṃ paṭhita-siddhasya mantrasya mṛta-jīvanīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.22' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>ity uktvādāya tan mantrapustikām anuvācya ca /</l>
<l>tatra bhasmani cikṣepa sa dhūlim abhimantritām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.22'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktva ādāya tan mantra-pustikām anuvācya ca /</l>
<l>tatra bhasmani cikṣepa sa dhūlim abhimantritām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.23' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tenodatiṣṭhat tadrūpa eva jīvan sa bālakaḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa nirvṛtas tatra bhuktavān vipratāpasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.23'>
<lg>
<l>tena udatiṣṭhat tad-rūpa eva jīvan sa bālakaḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa nirvṛtas tatra bhuktavān vipra-tāpasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.24' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>gṛhastho 'pi sa tāṃ nāgadante 'vasthāpya pustikām /</l>
<l>bhukvā ca śayanaṃ bheje rātrau tatraiva tadyutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.24'>
<lg>
<l>gṛhastho 'pi sa tāṃ nāga-dante 'vasthāpya pustikām /</l>
<l>bhukvā ca śayanaṃ bheje rātrau tatra eva tad-yutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.25' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>supte gṛhapatau tasmin svairam utthāya śaṅkitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa priyājīvitārthī tāṃ pustikāṃ tāpaso 'grahīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.25'>
<lg>
<l>supte gṛha-patau tasmin svairam utthāya śaṅkitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa priyā-jīvita-arthī tāṃ pustikāṃ tāpaso 'grahīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.26' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>gṛhītvaiva ca nirgatya tato rātridinaṃ vrajan /</l>
<l>kramāc chmaśānaṃ tat prāpa yatra dagdhāsya sā priyā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.26'>
<lg>
<l>gṛhītva aiva ca nirgatya tato rātri-dinaṃ vrajan /</l>
<l>kramāc chmaśānaṃ tat prāpa yatra dagdha āsya sā priyā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.27' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>dadarśa cātra tatkālaṃ taṃ dvitīyam upāgatam /</l>
<l>yaḥ sa gaṅgāmbhasi kṣeptuṃ tadasthīni gato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.27'>
<lg>
<l>dadarśa ca atra tat-kālaṃ taṃ dvitīyam upāgatam /</l>
<l>yaḥ sa gaṅgā-ambhasi kṣeptuṃ tad-asthīni gato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.28' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tatas taṃ ca tam ādyaṃ ca tasyā bhasmani śāyinam /</l>
<l>nibaddhamaṭhikaṃ tatra dvāv apy etau jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.28'>
<lg>
<l>tatas taṃ ca tam ādyaṃ ca tasyā bhasmani śāyinam /</l>
<l>nibaddha-maṭhikaṃ tatra dvāv apy etau jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.29' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>maṭhikāpāsyatām eṣā yāvad utthāpayāmi tām /</l>
<l>jīvantīṃ bhasmataḥ kāntāṃ mantraśaktyā kayāpy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.29'>
<lg>
<l>maṭhika āpāsyatām eṣā yāvad utthāpayāmi tām /</l>
<l>jīvantīṃ bhasmataḥ kāntāṃ mantra-śaktyā kaya āpy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.30' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>iti tau prerya nirbandhān nirloṭhya maṭhikāṃ ca saḥ /</l>
<l>udghāṭya tāpaso vipraḥ pustikāṃ tām avācayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.30'>
<lg>
<l>iti tau prerya nirbandhān nirloṭhya maṭhikāṃ ca saḥ /</l>
<l>udghāṭya tāpaso vipraḥ pustikāṃ tām avācayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.31' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>abhimantrya ca mantreṇa dhūliṃ bhasmany avākṣipat /</l>
<l>udatiṣṭhac ca jīvantī sā mandāravatī tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.31'>
<lg>
<l>abhimantrya ca mantreṇa dhūliṃ bhasmany avākṣipat /</l>
<l>udatiṣṭhac ca jīvantī sā mandāravatī tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.32' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>vahniṃ praviśya niṣkrāntaṃ vapuḥ pūrvādhikadyuti /</l>
<l>tadā babhāra sā kanyā kañcaneneva niḥmitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.32'>
<lg>
<l>vahniṃ praviśya niṣkrāntaṃ vapuḥ pūrva-adhika-dyuti /</l>
<l>tadā babhāra sā kanyā kañcanena iva niḥ-mitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.33' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>tādṛśīṃ tāṃ punar jātāṃ te dṛṣṭvaiva smarāturāḥ /</l>
<l>prāptukāmās trayo 'py evam anyo'nyaṃ kalahaṃ vyadhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.33'>
<lg>
<l>tādṛśīṃ tāṃ punar jātāṃ te dṛṣṭva aiva smara-āturāḥ /</l>
<l>prāptu-kāmās trayo 'py evam anyo'nyaṃ kalahaṃ vyadhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.34' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>eko 'bravīd iyaṃ bhāryā mama mantrabalārjitā /</l>
<l>tīrthaprabhāvajā bhāryā mameyam iti cāparaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.34'>
<lg>
<l>eko 'bravīd iyaṃ bhāryā mama mantra-bala-arjitā /</l>
<l>tīrtha-prabhāva-jā bhāryā mama iyam iti cāparaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.35' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>rakṣitvā bhasma tapasā jīviteyaṃ mayeha yat /</l>
<l>tad eṣā mama bhāryeti tṛtīyo 'tra jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.35'>
<lg>
<l>rakṣitvā bhasma tapasā jīvita īyaṃ maya īha yat /</l>
<l>tad eṣā mama bhārya īti tṛtīyo 'tra jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.36' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>vivādanirṇaye teṣāṃ tvaṃ tāvan me mahīpate /</l>
<l>niścayaṃ brūhi kasyaiṣā kanyā bhāryopapadyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.36'>
<lg>
<l>vivāda-nirṇaye teṣāṃ tvaṃ tāvan me mahī-pate /</l>
<l>niścayaṃ brūhi kasya eṣā kanyā bhārya ūpapadyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.37' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>vidaliṣyati mūrdhā te yadi jānan na vakṣyasi /</l>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā taṃ sa rājaivam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.37'>
<lg>
<l>vidaliṣyati mūrdhā te yadi jānan na vakṣyasi /</l>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā taṃ sa rāja aivam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.38' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>yaḥ kleśam anubhūyāpi mantreṇaitām ajīvayat /</l>
<l>pitā sa tasyās tatkāryakaraṇān na punaḥ patīḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.38'>
<lg>
<l>yaḥ kleśam anubhūya api mantreṇa etām ajīvayat /</l>
<l>pitā sa tasyās tat-kārya-karaṇān na punaḥ patīḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.39' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>yaś cāstīni nināyāsya gaṅgāyāṃ sa suto mataḥ /</l>
<l>yas tu tad bhasmaśayyaṃ tām āśliṣyāsīt tapaś caran //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.39'>
<lg>
<l>yaś ca astīni nināya asya gaṅgāyāṃ sa suto mataḥ /</l>
<l>yas tu tad bhasma-śayyaṃ tām āśliṣyā asīt tapaś caran //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.40' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>śmaśāna eva tat prītyā bhartā tasyāḥ sa ucyate /</l>
<l>kṛtaṃ tad anurūpam iha tena gāḍḥānurāgiṇa //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.40'>
<lg>
<l>śmaśāna eva tat prītyā bhartā tasyāḥ sa ucyate /</l>
<l>kṛtaṃ tad anurūpam iha tena gāḍḥa-anurāgiṇa //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.41' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>evaṃ nṛpāt trivikramasenāc chṛutvaiva muktamaunāt saḥ /</l>
<l>tasya skandhād agamad vetālo 'tarkitaḥ svapadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.41'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ nṛ-pāt trivikramasenāc chṛutva aiva mukta-maunāt saḥ /</l>
<l>tasya skandhād agamad vetālo 'tarkitaḥ sva-padam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.9.42' corresp='Vet_2'>
<l>rājātha bhikṣvarthasamudyatas taṃ prāptuṃ sa bhūyo 'pi mano babandha /</l>
<l>prāṇātyaye 'pi pratipannam arthaṃ tiṣṭhanty anirvāhya na dhīrasattvāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.9.42'>
<lg>
<l>rāja ātha bhikṣv-artha-samudyatas taṃ prāptuṃ sa bhūyo 'pi mano babandha /</l>
<l>prāṇa atyaye 'pi pratipannam arthaṃ tiṣṭhanty anirvāhya na dhīra-sattvāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.1' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>atha bhūyo 'pi vetālam ānetuṃ nṛpasattamaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam upāgāc chiṃśampātarum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.1'>
<lg>
<l>atha bhūyo 'pi vetālam ānetuṃ nṛ-pa-sattamaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam upāgāc chiṃśampā-tarum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.2' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>tatrastham etaṃ saṃprāpya mṛtadehagataṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>skandhe gṛhītvaivāgantuṃ tūṣṇīṃ pravavṛte tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.2'>
<lg>
<l>tatra-stham etaṃ saṃprāpya mṛta-deha-gataṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>skandhe gṛhītva aivā agantuṃ tūṣṇīṃ pravavṛte tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.3' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>prayāntaṃ ca tam āha sma sa vetālo 'sya pṛṣṭhagaḥ /</l>
<l>citraṃ nodvijase rājan niśi kurvan gamāgamam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.3'>
<lg>
<l>prayāntaṃ ca tam āha sma sa vetālo 'sya pṛṣṭha-gaḥ /</l>
<l>citraṃ na udvijase rājan niśi kurvan gama-āgamam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.4' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>tad akhedāya bhūyas te varṇayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu /</l>
<l>asti pāṭaliputrākhyaṃ khyātaṃ bhūmaṇḍale puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.4'>
<lg>
<l>tad akhedāya bhūyas te varṇayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu /</l>
<l>asti pāṭaliputra-ākhyaṃ khyātaṃ bhū-maṇḍale puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.5' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>tatrāsīn nṛpatiḥ pūrvaṃ nāmnā vikramakesarī /</l>
<l>guṇānām iva ratnānām āśrayaṃ yaṃ vyadhād vidhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.5'>
<lg>
<l>tatrā asīn nṛ-patiḥ pūrvaṃ nāmnā vikramakesarī /</l>
<l>guṇānām iva ratnānām āśrayaṃ yaṃ vyadhād vidhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.6' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>tatra śāpāvatīrṇo 'bhūd divyavijñānavāñ śukaḥ /</l>
<l>vidagdhacūdamaṇir ity ākhyayā sarvaśāstravit //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.6'>
<lg>
<l>tatra śāpa-avatīrṇo 'bhūd divya-vijñānavāñ śukaḥ /</l>
<l>vidagdhacūdamaṇir ity ākhyayā sarva-śāstra-vit //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.7' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>tenopadiṣṭāṃ sadṛśīṃ rājaputrīṃ nṛpātmajaḥ /</l>
<l>māgadhīm upayeme sa bhāryāṃ candraprabhābhidhām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.7'>
<lg>
<l>tena upadiṣṭāṃ sadṛśīṃ rāja-putrīṃ nṛ-pa-ātmajaḥ /</l>
<l>māgadhīm upayeme sa bhāryāṃ candraprabhā-abhidhām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.8' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>tasyā api tathābhūtā sarvavijñānaśālinī /</l>
<l>śārikā somikā nāma rājaputryāḥ kilābhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.8'>
<lg>
<l>tasyā api tathā-bhūtā sarva-vijñāna-śālinī /</l>
<l>śārikā somikā nāma rāja-putryāḥ kila abhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.9' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>te caikapañjarasthe dve tatrāstāṃ śukaśārīke /</l>
<l>sevamāne svaviñjānair daṃpatī tau nijaprabhū //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.9'>
<lg>
<l>te ca eka-pañjara-sthe dve tatrā astāṃ śuka-śārīke /</l>
<l>sevamāne sva-viñjānair daṃpatī tau nija-prabhū //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.10' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>ekadā sābhilāṣas tāṃ śārikāṃ so 'bravīc chukaḥ /</l>
<l>ekaśayyāsanāhāraṃ subhage bhaja mām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.10'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā sa-abhilāṣas tāṃ śārikāṃ so 'bravīc chukaḥ /</l>
<l>eka-śayyā-asana-āhāraṃ su-bhage bhaja mām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.11' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>nāhaṃ puruṣasaṃsargam icchāmi puruṣā yataḥ /</l>
<l>duṣṭāḥ kṛtaghnā iti sā sārikā pratyuvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.11'>
<lg>
<l>na ahaṃ puruṣa-saṃsargam icchāmi puruṣā yataḥ /</l>
<l>duṣṭāḥ kṛta-ghnā iti sā sārikā pratyuvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.12' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>na duṣṭāḥ puruṣā duṣṭā nṛśaṃsahṛdayāḥ striyaḥ /</l>
<l>iti bhūyaḥ śukenokte vivādo 'trālagat tayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.12'>
<lg>
<l>na duṣṭāḥ puruṣā duṣṭā nṛ-śaṃsa-hṛdayāḥ striyaḥ /</l>
<l>iti bhūyaḥ śukena ukte vivādo 'trā alagat tayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.10.13' corresp='Vet_3'>
<l>kṛtadāsatvabhāryātvapaṇau tau śakunī mithaḥ /</l>
<l>niścayāyāthe sabhyaṃ taṃ rājaputram upeyatuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.10.13'>
<lg>
