<l>dākṣiṇātyasya nṛpater yatrāyātaḥ sa kāryataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.17'>
<lg>
<l>ānināya ca tuṣṭaṃ taṃ tatra eva kaṭakaṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>dākṣiṇātyasya nṛ-pater yatrā ayātaḥ sa kāryataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.18' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tataḥ so 'smai harisvāmī pratiśuśrāva tāṃ sutām /</l>
<l>vijñānine vivāhaṃ ca niścikāyāhni saptame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.18'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ so 'smai harisvāmī pratiśuśrāva tāṃ sutām /</l>
<l>vijñānine vivāhaṃ ca niścikāya ahni saptame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.19' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tatkālam ujjayinyām apy anyenaitya dvijanmanā /</l>
<l>devasvāmī sa tatputraḥ svasāraṃ tām ayācyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.19'>
<lg>
<l>tat-kālam ujjayinyām apy anyena etya dvijanmanā /</l>
<l>devasvāmī sa tat-putraḥ svasāraṃ tām ayācyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.20' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>jñānivijñnāniśūrebhyo nānyam icchati sā patim /</l>
<l>iti tenāpi so 'py uktaḥ śūram ātmānam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.20'>
<lg>
<l>jñāni-vijñnāni-śūrebhyo na anyam icchati sā patim /</l>
<l>iti tena api so 'py uktaḥ śūram ātmānam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.21' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tato darśitaśastrāstraśriye tasmai dvijo 'nujām /</l>
<l>devasvāmī sa śūrāya dātuṃ tāṃ pratyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.21'>
<lg>
<l>tato darśita-śastra-astra-śriye tasmai dvijo 'nujām /</l>
<l>devasvāmī sa śūrāya dātuṃ tāṃ pratyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.22' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>saptame 'hni ca tatraiva vivāhaṃ gaṇakoktitaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāpi so 'bhyadhān mātuḥ parokṣaṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.22'>
<lg>
<l>saptame 'hni ca tatra eva vivāhaṃ gaṇaka-uktitaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya api so 'bhyadhān mātuḥ parokṣaṃ kṛta-niścayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.23' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tanmātāpi ḥarisvāmibhāryā tatkalam eva sā /</l>
<l>kenāpy etya tṛtīyena sutāṃ tāṃ yācitā pṛthak //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.23'>
<lg>
<l>tan-māta āpi ḥarisvāmi-bhāryā tat-kalam eva sā /</l>
<l>kena apy etya tṛtīyena sutāṃ tāṃ yācitā pṛthak //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.24' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>jñānī śūro 'tha vijñanī bhartāsmad duhitur mataḥ /</l>
<l>ity uktaś ca tayā mātar ahaṃ jñanīti so 'bhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.24'>
<lg>
<l>jñānī śūro 'tha vijñanī bharta āsmad duhitur mataḥ /</l>
<l>ity uktaś ca tayā mātar ahaṃ jñani īti so 'bhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.25' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>pṛṣṭvā bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca tasmai tāṃ jñānine sutām /</l>
<l>pratijajñe pradātuṃ sāpy ahni tatraiva saptame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.25'>
<lg>
<l>pṛṣṭvā bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca tasmai tāṃ jñānine sutām /</l>
<l>pratijajñe pradātuṃ sa āpy ahni tatra eva saptame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.26' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>anyedyuś cāgataḥ so 'tra harisvāmī yathā kṛtam /</l>
<l>patnyaiḥ putrāya cācakhyau taṃ kanyādānaniścayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.26'>
<lg>
<l>anye-dyuś cā agataḥ so 'tra harisvāmī yathā kṛtam /</l>
<l>patnyaiḥ putrāya cā acakhyau taṃ kanyā-dāna-niścayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.27' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tau ca taṃ svakṛtaṃ tasmai bhinnaṃ bhinnam evocatām /</l>
<l>so 'pi tenākulo jajñe varatrayanimantraṇāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.27'>
<lg>
<l>tau ca taṃ sva-kṛtaṃ tasmai bhinnaṃ bhinnam eva ucatām /</l>
<l>so 'pi tenā akulo jajñe vara-traya-nimantraṇāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.28' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>athodvāhadine tasmin harisvāmigṛhe varāḥ /</l>
<l>āyayur jñānivijñāniśūrās tatra trayo 'pi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.28'>
<lg>
<l>atha udvāha-dine tasmin harisvāmi-gṛhe varāḥ /</l>
<l>āyayur jñāni-vijñāni-śūrās tatra trayo 'pi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.29' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tatkālaṃ cātra sā citraṃ kanyā somaprabhā vadhuḥ /</l>
<l>aśaṅkitaṃ gatā kvāpi na vicityāpy alabhyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.29'>
<lg>
<l>tat-kālaṃ ca atra sā citraṃ kanyā somaprabhā vadhuḥ /</l>
<l>aśaṅkitaṃ gatā kva api na vicitya apy alabhyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.30' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tato 'bravīd dharisvāmī jñāninaṃ taṃ sasaṃbhramaḥ /</l>
<l>jñāninn idānīṃ brūhy āśu duhitā me kva sā gatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.30'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'bravīd dharisvāmī jñāninaṃ taṃ sa-saṃbhramaḥ /</l>
<l>jñāninn idānīṃ brūhy āśu duhitā me kva sā gatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.31' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'vadaj jñānī rākṣasenāpahṛtya sā /</l>
<l>nītā vindhyāṭavīṃ dhūmaśikhena vasatiṃ nijām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.31'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'vadaj jñānī rākṣasena apahṛtya sā /</l>
<l>nītā vindhya-aṭavīṃ dhūmaśikhena vasatiṃ nijām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.32' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>ity ukto jñāninā bhīto harisvāmī jagāda saḥ /</l>
<l>hā dhik kathaṃ sā prapyeta vivāhaś cāpi hā katham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.32'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto jñāninā bhīto harisvāmī jagāda saḥ /</l>
<l>hā dhik kathaṃ sā prapyeta vivāhaś ca api hā katham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.33' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>śrutvaitat prāha vijñānī dhīro bhava nayāmi vaḥ /</l>
<l>tatrādhunaiva yatraiṣo jñānī vadati tāṃ sthitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.33'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitat prāha vijñānī dhīro bhava nayāmi vaḥ /</l>
<l>tatra adhuna aiva yatra eṣo jñānī vadati tāṃ sthitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.34' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>ity uktvā tatkṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā rathaṃ sarvāstrasaṃyutam /</l>
<l>tatrāropya harisvāmijñāniśūrān khagāmini //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.34'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā tat-kṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā rathaṃ sarva-astra-saṃyutam /</l>
<l>tatrā aropya harisvāmi-jñāni-śūrān kha-gāmini //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.35' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tān sa saṃprāpayāmāsa kṣaṇād vindhyāṭavībhuvi /</l>
<l>jñāninā tāṃ samākhyātāṃ vasatiṃ tatra rakṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.35'>
<lg>
<l>tān sa saṃprāpayāmāsa kṣaṇād vindhya-aṭavī-bhuvi /</l>
<l>jñāninā tāṃ samākhyātāṃ vasatiṃ tatra rakṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.36' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tatra taṃ rākṣasaṃ kruddhaṃ jñātavṛttāntanirgatam /</l>
<l>śūro 'tha yodhayāmāsa harisvāmipuraskṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.36'>
<lg>
<l>tatra taṃ rākṣasaṃ kruddhaṃ jñāta-vṛttānta-nirgatam /</l>
<l>śūro 'tha yodhayāmāsa harisvāmi-puraskṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.37' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tadāścaryam abhūd yuddhaṃ tayor mānuṣarakṣasoḥ /</l>
<l>citrāstrayodhinoḥ stryarthaṃ rāmarāvaṇayor iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.37'>
<lg>
<l>tadā āścaryam abhūd yuddhaṃ tayor mānuṣa-rakṣasoḥ /</l>
<l>citra-astra-yodhinoḥ stry-arthaṃ rāma-rāvaṇayor iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.38' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>kṣaṇena ca sa saṅgrāmaduḥmadasyāpi rakṣasaḥ /</l>
<l>ardhacandreṇa bāṇena śūras tasyācchinac chiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.38'>
<lg>
<l>kṣaṇena ca sa saṅgrāma-duḥ-madasya api rakṣasaḥ /</l>
<l>ardha-candreṇa bāṇena śūras tasya acchinac chiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.39' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>hate rakṣasi tāṃ somaprabhām āptāṃ tadāspadāt /</l>
<l>ādāya vijñānirathenājagmus te tato 'khilāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.39'>
<lg>
<l>hate rakṣasi tāṃ somaprabhām āptāṃ tad-āspadāt /</l>
<l>ādāya vijñāni-rathenā ajagmus te tato 'khilāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.40' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>harisvāmigṛhaṃ prāpya teṣāṃ lagne 'py upasthite /</l>
<l>jñānivijñāniśūrāṇāṃ vivāda udabhūn mahān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.40'>
<lg>
<l>harisvāmi-gṛhaṃ prāpya teṣāṃ lagne 'py upasthite /</l>
<l>jñāni-vijñāni-śūrāṇāṃ vivāda udabhūn mahān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.41' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>jñānī jagāda nāhaṃ cej jānīyāṃ tad iyaṃ katham /</l>
<l>prāpyeta kanyā gūḍhasthā deyā mahyam asāv itaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.41'>
<lg>
<l>jñānī jagāda na ahaṃ cej jānīyāṃ tad iyaṃ katham /</l>
<l>prāpyeta kanyā gūḍha-sthā deyā mahyam asāv itaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.42' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>vijñānī tv avadan nāhaṃ kuryāṃ ced vyomagaṃ ratham /</l>
<l>gamāgamau kathaṃ syātāṃ devānām iva vaḥ kṣaṇāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.42'>
<lg>
<l>vijñānī tv avadan na ahaṃ kuryāṃ ced vyoma-gaṃ ratham /</l>
<l>gama-āgamau kathaṃ syātāṃ devānām iva vaḥ kṣaṇāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.43' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>kathaṃ syāc cārathaṃ yuddhaṃ rathinā rakṣasā saha /</l>
<l>tasmān mahyam iyaṃ deyā lagno hy eṣa mayājitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.43'>
<lg>
<l>kathaṃ syāc ca arathaṃ yuddhaṃ rathinā rakṣasā saha /</l>
<l>tasmān mahyam iyaṃ deyā lagno hy eṣa maya ājitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.44' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>śūro 'py uvāca hanyāṃ cen nāhaṃ taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe /</l>
<l>tad yuvābhyāṃ kṛte yatne 'py etāṃ kanyāṃ ka ānayet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.44'>
<lg>
<l>śūro 'py uvāca hanyāṃ cen na ahaṃ taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe /</l>
<l>tad yuvābhyāṃ kṛte yatne 'py etāṃ kanyāṃ ka ānayet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.45' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tan mahyam eṣā dātavyety evaṃ teṣu vivādiṣu /</l>
<l>harisvāmī kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīm āsīd udbhrāntamānasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.45'>
<lg>
<l>tan mahyam eṣā dātavya īty evaṃ teṣu vivādiṣu /</l>
<l>harisvāmī kṣaṇaṃ tūṣṇīm āsīd udbhrānta-mānasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.46' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>tat kasmai sātra deyeti rājan vadatu me bhavān /</l>
<l>na vadiṣyasi jānaṃś cet tat te mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.46'>
<lg>
<l>tat kasmai sa ātra deya īti rājan vadatu me bhavān /</l>
<l>na vadiṣyasi jānaṃś cet tat te mūrdhā sphuṭiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.47' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>iti vetālatas tasmāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya ca /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam uvācaivaṃ mahīpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.47'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālatas tasmāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya ca /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam uvāca evaṃ mahī-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.48' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>śūrāya sā pradātavyā yena prāṇapaṇodyamāt /</l>
<l>arjitā bahuvīryeṇa hatvā taṃ yudhi rākṣasam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.48'>
<lg>
<l>śūrāya sā pradātavyā yena prāṇa-paṇa-udyamāt /</l>
<l>arjitā bahu-vīryeṇa hatvā taṃ yudhi rākṣasam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.49' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>jñānivijñāninau tv asya dhātrā karmakarau kṛtau /</l>
<l>sadā gaṇakatakṣaṇau paropakaraṇe na kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.49'>
<lg>
<l>jñāni-vijñāninau tv asya dhātrā karma-karau kṛtau /</l>
<l>sadā gaṇaka-takṣaṇau para-upakaraṇe na kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.12.50' corresp='Vet_5'>
<l>ity uktaṃ manujapater niśamya tasya skandhāgrāt sapadi sa pūrvavaj jagāma /</l>
<l>vetālo nijapadam eva so 'pi rājānudvegas taṃ prati pratasthe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.12.50'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktaṃ manuja-pater niśamya tasya skandha-agrāt sa-padi sa pūrvavaj jagāma /</l>
<l>vetālo nijapadam eva so 'pi rāja ānudvegas taṃ prati pratasthe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.1' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tato gatvā punas tasmāt prāpya taṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>vetālaṃ prāgvad ādāya skandhe maunena bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punas tasmāt prāpya taṃ śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>vetālaṃ prāgvad ādāya skandhe maunena bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.2' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tra yāvad āgacchati drutam /</l>
<l>tāvat pathi sa vetālo bhūyo 'py evam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.2'>
<lg>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tra yāvad āgacchati drutam /</l>
<l>tāvat pathi sa vetālo bhūyo 'py evam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.3' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>rājan sudhīḥ susattvaś ca bhavāṃs tena priyo 'si me /</l>
<l>ato vinodinīṃ vacmi kathāṃ praśnaṃ ca me śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.3'>
<lg>
<l>rājan su-dhīḥ su-sattvaś ca bhavāṃs tena priyo 'si me /</l>
<l>ato vinodinīṃ vacmi kathāṃ praśnaṃ ca me śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.4' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>āsīd rājā yaśaḥketur iti khyāto mahītale /</l>
<l>tasya śobhāvatī nāma rājadhāny abhavat purī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.4'>
<lg>
<l>āsīd rājā yaśaḥketur iti khyāto mahī-tale /</l>
<l>tasya śobhāvatī nāma rāja-dhāny abhavat purī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.5' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tasyām abhūn nagaryāṃ ca gauryāyatanam uttamam /</l>
<l>tasya dakṣiṇataś cāsīd gaurītīrthābhidhaṃ saraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasyām abhūn nagaryāṃ ca gaury-āyatanam uttamam /</l>
<l>tasya dakṣiṇataś cā asīd gaurī-tīrtha-abhidhaṃ saraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.6' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tasyāṣāḍhacaturdaśyāṃ śuklāyāṃ prativatsaram /</l>
<l>yātrāyāṃ snātum eti sma nānādigbhyo mahājanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.6'>
<lg>
<l>tasyā aṣāḍha-caturdaśyāṃ śuklāyāṃ prativatsaram /</l>
<l>yātrāyāṃ snātum eti sma nānā-digbhyo mahā-janaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.7' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ekadā ca tithau tasyāṃ snātum atrāyayau yuvā /</l>
<l>rajako dhavalo nāma grāmād brahmasthalābhidhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.7'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca tithau tasyāṃ snātum atrā ayayau yuvā /</l>
<l>rajako dhavalo nāma grāmād brahmasthala-abhidhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.8' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>so 'paśyad rajakasyātra tīrthe snānāgatāṃ sutām /</l>
<l>kanyāṃ śuddhapaṭākhyasya nāmnā madanasundarīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.8'>
<lg>
<l>so 'paśyad rajakasya atra tīrthe snāna-āgatāṃ sutām /</l>
<l>kanyāṃ śuddhapaṭa-ākhyasya nāmnā madanasundarīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.9' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>indor lāvaṇyahāriṇyā tayā sa hṛtamānasaḥ /</l>
<l>anviṣya tannāmakule kāmārto 'tha gṛhaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.9'>
<lg>
<l>indor lāvaṇya-hāriṇyā tayā sa hṛta-mānasaḥ /</l>
<l>anviṣya tan-nāma-kule kāma-ārto 'tha gṛhaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.10' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tatrānavasthitas tiṣṭhan nirāhāras tayā vinā /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭho mātrārtayā tasyai tac chaśaṃsa manaḥgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.10'>
<lg>
<l>tatra anavasthitas tiṣṭhan nir-āhāras tayā vinā /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭho mātrā ārtayā tasyai tac chaśaṃsa manaḥ-gatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.11' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>sā gatvā vimalākhyāya tat svabhartre nyavedayat /</l>
<l>so 'py āgatya tathāvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.11'>
<lg>
<l>sā gatvā vimala-ākhyāya tat sva-bhartre nyavedayat /</l>
<l>so 'py āgatya tatha āvasthaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sutam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.12' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>kiṃ viṣīdasi putraivam aduṣprāpye 'pi vāñchite /</l>
<l>sa hi madyācitaḥ śuddhapaṭo dāsyati te sutām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.12'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ viṣīdasi putra evam aduṣprāpye 'pi vāñchite /</l>
<l>sa hi mad-yācitaḥ śuddhapaṭo dāsyati te sutām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.13' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>anyūnā hi vayaṃ tasmāt kulenārthena karmaṇā /</l>
<l>taṃ vedmy ahaṃ sa māṃ vetti tenaitan me na duḥkaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.13'>
<lg>
<l>anyūnā hi vayaṃ tasmāt kulena arthena karmaṇā /</l>
<l>taṃ vedmy ahaṃ sa māṃ vetti tena etan me na duḥ-karam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.14' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ity āśvāsya sa taṃ putram āhārādau pravartya ca /</l>
<l>tad yukto vimalo 'nyedyur yayau sa śuddhapaṭāspadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.14'>
<lg>
<l>ity āśvāsya sa taṃ putram āhāra-ādau pravartya ca /</l>
<l>tad yukto vimalo 'nye-dyur yayau sa śuddhapaṭa-āspadam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.15' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>yayāce cātra putrasya tasyārthe dhavalasya saḥ /</l>
<l>kanyāṃ tasmāt sa cāsmai tāṃ pratiśuśrāva sādaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.15'>
<lg>
<l>yayāce ca atra putrasya tasya arthe dhavalasya saḥ /</l>
<l>kanyāṃ tasmāt sa ca asmai tāṃ pratiśuśrāva sa-ādaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.16' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>lagnaṃ niścitya cānyedyus tāṃ sa śuddhapaṭaḥ sutām /</l>
<l>dhavalāya dadau tasmai tulyāṃ madanasundarīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.16'>
<lg>
<l>lagnaṃ niścitya ca anye-dyus tāṃ sa śuddhapaṭaḥ sutām /</l>
<l>dhavalāya dadau tasmai tulyāṃ madanasundarīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.17' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>kṛtodvāhaś ca sa tayā sākaṃ darśanasaktayā /</l>
<l>bhāryayā svapitur gehaṃ jagāma dhavalaḥ kṛtī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.17'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-udvāhaś ca sa tayā sākaṃ darśana-saktayā /</l>
<l>bhāryayā sva-pitur gehaṃ jagāma dhavalaḥ kṛtī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.18' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>sukhasthitasya tasyātha kadācic chvaśurātmajaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyā madanasundaryā bhrātā tatrāgato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.18'>
<lg>
<l>sukha-sthitasya tasya atha kadācic chvaśura-ātma-jaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyā madanasundaryā bhrātā tatrā agato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.19' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>sa kṛtapraśrayaḥ sarvaiḥ svasrāśliṣyābhinanditaḥ /</l>
<l>saṃbandhipṛṣṭakuśalo viśrāntaś ca jagāda tān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.19'>
<lg>
<l>sa kṛta-praśrayaḥ sarvaiḥ svasrā āśliṣya abhinanditaḥ /</l>
<l>saṃbandhi-pṛṣṭa-kuśalo viśrāntaś ca jagāda tān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.20' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ahaṃ madanasundaryā jāmātuś ca nimantraṇe /</l>
<l>tātena preṣito yasmād devīpūjotsavo 'sti naḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.20'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ madanasundaryā jāmātuś ca ni-mantraṇe /</l>
<l>tātena preṣito yasmād devī-pūjā-utsavo 'sti naḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.21' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>śraddhāya caitat tadvākyaṃ yathārhaiḥ pānabhojanaiḥ /</l>
<l>te saṃbandhyādayaḥ sarve tad ahas tam upācaran //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.21'>
<lg>
<l>śraddhāya ca etat tad-vākyaṃ yathā-arhaiḥ pāna-bhojanaiḥ /</l>
<l>te saṃbandhy-ādayaḥ sarve tad ahas tam upācaran //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.22' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>prātar madanasundaryā svaśuryeṇa ca tena saḥ /</l>
<l>sahito dhavalaḥ prāyād gṛhaṃ tac chvāśuraṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.22'>
<lg>
<l>prātar madanasundaryā svaśuryeṇa ca tena saḥ /</l>
<l>sahito dhavalaḥ prāyād gṛhaṃ tac chvāśuraṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.23' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>prāpya śobhāvatīṃ tāṃ ca purīm ātmatṛtīyakaḥ /</l>
<l>dadarśa nikaṭaṃ prāpya sa gauryāyatanaṃ mahat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.23'>
<lg>
<l>prāpya śobhāvatīṃ tāṃ ca purīm ātma-tṛtīyakaḥ /</l>
<l>dadarśa nikaṭaṃ prāpya sa gaury-āyatanaṃ mahat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.24' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>nijagāda ca tau bhāryāśvaśuryau śraddhayā tataḥ /</l>
<l>etam etāṃ bhagavatīṃ paśyāmo devatām iha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.24'>
<lg>
<l>nijagāda ca tau bhāryā-śvaśuryau śraddhayā tataḥ /</l>
<l>etam etāṃ bhagavatīṃ paśyāmo devatām iha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.25' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa śvaśuryas taṃ niṣedhaṃ pratyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>iyanto riktahastāḥ kiṃ paśyāmo devatām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.25'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa śvaśuryas taṃ ni-ṣedhaṃ pratyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>iyanto rikta-hastāḥ kiṃ paśyāmo devatām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.26' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ahaṃ tāvad vrajāmy eko yuvām atraiva tiṣṭhatam /</l>
<l>ity uktvā dhavalo draṣṭuṃ devīṃ tāṃ sa tato yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.26'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ tāvad vrajāmy eko yuvām atra eva tiṣṭhatam /</l>
<l>ity uktvā dhavalo draṣṭuṃ devīṃ tāṃ sa tato yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.27' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>praviśyāyatanaṃ tasyāḥ praṇamya ca vibhāvya ca /</l>
<l>tām aṣṭādaśadoḥdaṇḍakhaṇḍitoccaṇḍadānavām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.27'>
<lg>
<l>praviśyā ayatanaṃ tasyāḥ praṇamya ca vibhāvya ca /</l>
<l>tām aṣṭādaśa-doḥ-daṇḍa-khaṇḍita-uccaṇḍa-dānavām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.28' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>pādapadmatalākṣiptamahiṣāsuramardinīm /</l>
<l>sa vidhipreraṇotpannabuddhir evam acintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.28'>
<lg>
<l>pāda-padma-tala-ākṣipta-mahiṣa-asura-mardinīm /</l>
<l>sa vidhi-preraṇa-utpanna-buddhir evam acintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.29' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>jīvopahārair vividhair imāṃ devīṃ jano 'rcati /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tu siddhyai kiṃ naitāṃ prīṇāmy ātmopahārataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.29'>
<lg>
<l>jīva-upahārair vividhair imāṃ devīṃ jano 'rcati /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tu siddhyai kiṃ na etāṃ prīṇāmy ātma-upahārataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.30' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>iti dhyātvaiva tadgarbhagṛhād ādāya niḥjanāt /</l>
<l>khaḍgaṃ sāṃyātrikaiḥ kaiḥcid devyāḥ prāk prābhṛtīkṛtam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.30'>
<lg>
<l>iti dhyātva aiva tad-garbha-gṛhād ādāya niḥ-janāt /</l>
<l>khaḍgaṃ sāṃyātrikaiḥ kaiḥ-cid devyāḥ prāk prābhṛtī-kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.31' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>baddhvā śiraḥruhair ghaṇṭāśṛṅkhalāyāṃ nijaṃ śiram /</l>
<l>cicchedaitena khaḍgena tac chinnaṃ cāpatad bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.31'>
<lg>
<l>baddhvā śiraḥ-ruhair ghaṇṭā-śṛṅkhalāyāṃ nijaṃ śiram /</l>
<l>ciccheda etena khaḍgena tac chinnaṃ ca apatad bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.32' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ciraṃ yāvat sa nāyāti tāvad gatvā tam īkṣitum /</l>
<l>tatraiva devībhavane tacchvaśuryo viveśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.32'>
<lg>
<l>ciraṃ yāvat sa nā ayāti tāvad gatvā tam īkṣitum /</l>
<l>tatra eva devī-bhavane tac-chvaśuryo viveśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.33' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>so 'pi dṛṣṭvā tam utkṛttamūrdhānaṃ bhaginīpatim /</l>
<l>vyāmohitas tathaiva svaṃ śiras tenāsinācchinat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.33'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi dṛṣṭvā tam utkṛtta-mūrdhānaṃ bhaginī-patim /</l>
<l>vyāmohitas tatha aiva svaṃ śiras tena asina ācchinat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.34' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>so 'pi yāvac ca nāyāti tāvad udbhrāntamānasā /</l>
<l>taddevībhavanaṃ sāpi yayau madanasundarī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.34'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi yāvac ca nā ayāti tāvad udbhrānta-mānasā /</l>
<l>tad-devī-bhavanaṃ sa āpi yayau madanasundarī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.35' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>praviśya dṛṣṭvaiva patiṃ bhrātaraṃ ca tathāgatau /</l>
<l>hā kim etad dhatāsmīti vilapanty apatad bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.35'>
<lg>
<l>praviśya dṛṣṭva aiva patiṃ bhrātaraṃ ca tathā-gatau /</l>
<l>hā kim etad dhata-āsmi iti vilapanty apatad bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.36' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>kṣaṇāc cotthāya śocantī tāv akāṇḍahatāv ubhau /</l>
<l>kiṃ mamāpy adhunānena jīvitenety acintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.36'>
<lg>
<l>kṣaṇāc ca utthāya śocantī tāv a-kāṇḍa-hatāv ubhau /</l>
<l>kiṃ mama apy adhuna ānena jīvitena ity acintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.37' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>vyajijñapac ca devīṃ tāṃ dehatyāgonmukhī satī /</l>
<l>devi saubhāgyacāritravidhānaikādhidevate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.37'>
<lg>
<l>vyajijñapac ca devīṃ tāṃ deha-tyāga-unmukhī satī /</l>
<l>devi saubhāgya-cāritra-vidhāna-eka-adhidevate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.38' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>adhyāsitaśarīrārdhe bhartur māraripor api /</l>
<l>aśeṣalalanālokaśaraṇye duḥkhahāriṇi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.38'>
<lg>
<l>adhyāsita-śarīra-ardhe bhartur māra-ripor api /</l>
<l>aśeṣa-lalanā-loka-śaraṇye duḥkha-hāriṇi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.39' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>hṛtāv ekapade kasmād bhartā bhrātā ca me tvayā /</l>
<l>na yuktam etan mayi te nityabhaktā hy ahaṃ tvayi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.39'>
<lg>
<l>hṛtāv eka-pade kasmād bhartā bhrātā ca me tvayā /</l>
<l>na yuktam etan mayi te nitya-bhaktā hy ahaṃ tvayi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.40' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tan me śritāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ śṛṇv ekaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vacaḥ /</l>
<l>etāṃ tāvat tyajāmy atra daurbhāgyopahatāṃ tanum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.40'>
<lg>
<l>tan me śritāyāḥ śaraṇaṃ śṛṇv ekaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ vacaḥ /</l>
<l>etāṃ tāvat tyajāmy atra daurbhāgya-upahatāṃ tanum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.41' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>janiṣye devi bhūyas tu yatra kutrāpi janmani /</l>
<l>tatraitāv eva bhūyāstāṃ dvau bhartṛbhrātarau mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.41'>
<lg>
<l>janiṣye devi bhūyas tu yatra kutra api janmani /</l>
<l>tatra etāv eva bhūyāstāṃ dvau bhartṛ-bhrātarau mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.42' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>iti saṃstutya vijñapya devīṃ natvā ca tāṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>pāśaṃ viracayāmāsa latayāśokapādape //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.42'>
<lg>
<l>iti saṃstutya vijñapya devīṃ natvā ca tāṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>pāśaṃ viracayāmāsa lataya āśoka-pāda-pe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.43' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tatrārpayati yāvac ca pāśe kaṇṭhaṃ vitatya sā /</l>
<l>tāvat tatroccacāraivaṃ bhāratī gaganāṅgaṇāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.43'>
<lg>
<l>tatra arpayati yāvac ca pāśe kaṇṭhaṃ vitatya sā /</l>
<l>tāvat tatra uccacāra evaṃ bhāratī gagana-aṅgaṇāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.44' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ putri bālāyā api te 'munā /</l>
<l>sattvotkarṣeṇa tuṣṭāsmi pāśam etaṃ parityaja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.44'>
<lg>
<l>mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ putri bālāyā api te 'munā /</l>
<l>sattva-utkarṣeṇa tuṣṭa āsmi pāśam etaṃ parityaja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.45' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>saṃśleṣaya śiraḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhartṛbhrātṛkabandhayoḥ /</l>
<l>uttiṣṭhatāṃ te jīvantāv etau dvāv api madvarāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.45'>
<lg>
<l>saṃśleṣaya śiraḥ svaṃ svaṃ bhartṛ-bhrātṛ-kabandhayoḥ /</l>
<l>uttiṣṭhatāṃ te jīvantāv etau dvāv api mad-varāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.46' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>etac chrutvaiva saṃtyajya pāśaṃ harṣād upetya sā /</l>
<l>avibhāvyātirabhasād bhrāntā madanasundarī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.46'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutva aiva saṃtyajya pāśaṃ harṣād upetya sā /</l>
<l>avibhāvya atirabhasād bhrāntā madanasundarī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.47' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>bālā bhartṛśiro bhrātṛdehena samayojayat /</l>
<l>bhartṛdehena ca bhrātṛśiro vidhiniyogataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.47'>
<lg>
<l>bālā bhartṛ-śiro bhrātṛ-dehena samayojayat /</l>
<l>bhartṛ-dehena ca bhrātṛ-śiro vidhi-niyogataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.48' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tato 'kṣatāṅgau jīvantāv ubhāv uttasthatuś ca tau /</l>
<l>śiraḥvinimayāj jātasaṃkarau kāyayor mithaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.48'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'kṣata-aṅgau jīvantāv ubhāv uttasthatuś ca tau /</l>
<l>śiraḥ-vinimayāj jāta-saṃkarau kāyayor mithaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.49' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>athānyonyoditasvasvayathāvṛttāntatoṣiṇaḥ /</l>
<l>praṇamya devīṃ śarvanīṃ yatheṣṭaṃ te yayus trayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.49'>
<lg>
<l>atha anyonya-udita-sva-sva-yathā-vṛttānta-toṣiṇaḥ /</l>
<l>praṇamya devīṃ śarvanīṃ yathā-iṣṭaṃ te yayus trayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.50' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>yāntī ca dṛṣṭvā svakṛtaṃ śiraḥvinimayaṃ tayoḥ /</l>
<l>vignā kimkāryatāmūḍhā sābhūn madanasundarī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.50'>
<lg>
<l>yāntī ca dṛṣṭvā sva-kṛtaṃ śiraḥ-vinimayaṃ tayoḥ /</l>
<l>vignā kim-kāryatā-mūḍhā sa ābhūn madanasundarī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.51' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>tad brūhi rājan ko bhartā tasyāḥ saṃkīrṇayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>purvoktaḥ syāt sa śāpas te jānāno na bravīṣi cet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.51'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūhi rājan ko bhartā tasyāḥ saṃkīrṇayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>purva-uktaḥ syāt sa śāpas te jānāno na bravīṣi cet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.52' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ity ākarṇya kathāpraśnaṃ rājā vetālatas tataḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tra tam evaṃ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.52'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākarṇya kathā-praśnaṃ rājā vetālatas tataḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tra tam evaṃ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.53' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>yat saṃsthaṃ tatpatiśiraḥ saiṣa tasyāḥ patis tayoḥ /</l>
<l>pradhānaṃ ca śiro 'ṅgeṣu pratyabhijñā ca tadgatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.53'>
<lg>
<l>yat saṃsthaṃ tat-pati-śiraḥ saiṣa tasyāḥ patis tayoḥ /</l>
<l>pradhānaṃ ca śiro 'ṅgeṣu pratyabhijñā ca tad-gatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.13.54' corresp='Vet_6'>
<l>ity uktavato nṛpates tasyāṃsāt punar atarkitaḥ sa yayau /</l>
<l>vetālaḥ sa ca rājā jagāma bhuyas tam ānetum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.13.54'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavato nṛ-pates tasyā aṃsāt punar atarkitaḥ sa yayau /</l>
<l>vetālaḥ sa ca rājā jagāma bhuyas tam ānetum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.1' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe jagrāha bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe jagrāha bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.2' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>gṛhītvā prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālaḥ so 'bravīt pathi /</l>
<l>rājañ śramavinodārthaṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.2'>
<lg>
<l>gṛhītvā prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālaḥ so 'bravīt pathi /</l>
<l>rājañ śrama-vinoda-arthaṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.3' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>astīha tāmraliptīti purī pūrvāmbudhes taṭe /</l>
<l>caṇḍasenābhidhānaś ca rājā tasyām abhūt puri //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.3'>
<lg>
<l>asti iha tāmralipti īti purī pūrva-ambudhes taṭe /</l>
<l>caṇḍasena-abhidhānaś ca rājā tasyām abhūt puri //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.4' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>parāṅmukhaḥ parastrīṣu yo na saṅgrāmabhūmiṣu /</l>
<l>hartā ca śatrulakṣmīṇāṃ na paradravyasaṃpadām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.4'>
<lg>
<l>parāṅ-mukhaḥ para-strīṣu yo na saṅgrāma-bhūmiṣu /</l>
<l>hartā ca śatru-lakṣmīṇāṃ na para-dravya-saṃpadām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.5' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tasyaikadā dākṣiṇātyo rājaputro janapriyaḥ /</l>
<l>āyayau sattvaśīlākhyaḥ siṃhadvāre 'tra bhūpateḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasya ekadā dākṣiṇātyo rāja-putro jana-priyaḥ /</l>
<l>āyayau sattvaśīla-ākhyaḥ siṃha-dvāre 'tra bhū-pateḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.6' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatra cātmānam āvedya nairdhanyāttaṃ nṛpaṃ prati /</l>
<l>kapaṭaṃ pāṭayāmāsa rājaputraiḥ sahāparaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.6'>
<lg>
<l>tatra cā atmānam āvedya nairdhanya-āttaṃ nṛ-paṃ prati /</l>
<l>kapaṭaṃ pāṭayāmāsa rāja-putraiḥ saha-aparaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.7' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataḥ kārpaṭiko bhūtvā bahūny abdāni tatra saḥ /</l>
<l>tasthau kurvan sadā sevān naiva prāpa phalaṃ nṛpāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.7'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kārpaṭiko bhūtvā bahūny abdāni tatra saḥ /</l>
<l>tasthau kurvan sadā sevān na eva prāpa phalaṃ nṛ-pāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.8' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>yadi rājānvaye janma niḥdhanatvaṃ kim īdṛśam /</l>
<l>niḥdhanatve 'pi kiṃ dhātrā kṛteyaṃ me mahecchatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.8'>
<lg>
<l>yadi rāja-anvaye janma niḥ-dhanatvaṃ kim īdṛśam /</l>
<l>niḥ-dhanatve 'pi kiṃ dhātrā kṛta īyaṃ me mahā-icchatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.9' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ayaṃ hi sevamānaṃ mām evaṃ kliṣṭaparicchadam /</l>
<l>ciraṃ kṣudhāvasīdantaṃ rājā nādyāpi vīkṣate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.9'>
<lg>
<l>ayaṃ hi sevamānaṃ mām evaṃ kliṣṭa-paricchadam /</l>
<l>ciraṃ kṣudhā-avasīdantaṃ rājā na adya api vīkṣate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.10' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iti yāvac ca sa dhyāyaty atra kārpaṭikas tataḥ /</l>
<l>tāvad ākheṭakārthaṃ sa niragād ekadā nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.10'>
<lg>
<l>iti yāvac ca sa dhyāyaty atra kārpaṭikas tataḥ /</l>
<l>tāvad ākheṭaka-arthaṃ sa niragād ekadā nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.11' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tasmin kārpaṭike dhāvaty agre laguḍavāhini /</l>
<l>jagāma cāśvapādātayutaḥ so 'tha mṛgāṭavīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.11'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin kārpaṭike dhāvaty agre laguḍa-vāhini /</l>
<l>jagāma ca aśva-pādāta-yutaḥ so 'tha mṛga-aṭavīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.12' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>kṛtākheṭaś ca tatrārān mahāntaṃ mattasūkaram /</l>
<l>anudhāvan kṣaṇāt prāpad atidūraṃ vanāntaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.12'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-ākheṭaś ca tatrā arān mahāntaṃ matta-sūkaram /</l>
<l>anudhāvan kṣaṇāt prāpad atidūraṃ vana-antaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.13' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatra parṇatṛṇachannamārge hāritasūkaraḥ /</l>
<l>śrānto mahāvane so 'tha rājā diṅmoham āyayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.13'>
<lg>
<l>tatra parṇa-tṛṇa-channa-mārge hārita-sūkaraḥ /</l>
<l>śrānto mahā-vane so 'tha rājā diṅ-moham āyayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.14' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ekaḥ kārpaṭikaś cātha sa taṃ vātāśvapṛṣṭhagam /</l>
<l>prānānapekṣo 'nuyayau padātiḥ kṣuttṛṣārditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.14'>
<lg>
<l>ekaḥ kārpaṭikaś ca atha sa taṃ vāta-aśva-pṛṣṭhagam /</l>
<l>prāna-anapekṣo 'nuyayau padātiḥ kṣut-tṛṣā-arditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.15' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tathābhūtam anvāyātaṃ sa bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>sasneham avadat kaccid vetsi mārgaṃ yathāgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.15'>
<lg>
<l>taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tathā-bhūtam anvāyātaṃ sa bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>sa-sneham avadat kaccid vetsi mārgaṃ yathā-āgatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.16' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tadākarṇyāñjaliṃ baddhvā sa taṃ kārpaṭiko 'bhyadhāt /</l>
<l>vedmi kiṃ ca kṣaṇaṃ tāvad iha viśrāmyatu prabhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.16'>
<lg>
<l>tadā ākarṇya añjaliṃ baddhvā sa taṃ kārpaṭiko 'bhyadhāt /</l>
<l>vedmi kiṃ ca kṣaṇaṃ tāvad iha viśrāmyatu prabhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.17' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>dyuvadhūmekhalāmadhyamaṇir eṣa hi saṃprati /</l>
<l>dedīpyate sphuradraśmiśikhājālo 'bjinīpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.17'>
<lg>
<l>dyu-vadhū-mekhalā-madhya-maṇir eṣa hi saṃprati /</l>
<l>dedīpyate sphurad-raśmi-śikhā-jālo 'bjinī-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.18' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ soparodham abhāṣata /</l>
<l>tarhi kvāpīha pānīyaṃ bhavatā prekṣyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.18'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ sa-uparodham abhāṣata /</l>
<l>tarhi kva api iha pānīyaṃ bhavatā prekṣyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.19' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tathety āruhya sa tatas tuṅgaṃ kārpaṭikas tarum /</l>
<l>nadīṃ dṛṣṭvāvaruhyātha nṛpaṃ tatra nināya tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.19'>
<lg>
<l>tatha īty āruhya sa tatas tuṅgaṃ kārpaṭikas tarum /</l>
<l>nadīṃ dṛṣṭva āvaruhya atha nṛ-paṃ tatra nināya tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.20' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tad vāhaṃ ca viparyānīkṛtaṃ kṛtavivartanam /</l>
<l>dattāmbuśaṣpakavalaṃ vidadhe vigataśramam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.20'>
<lg>
<l>tad vāhaṃ ca viparyānī-kṛtaṃ kṛta-vivartanam /</l>
<l>datta-ambu-śaṣpa-kavalaṃ vidadhe vigata-śramam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.21' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>kṛtasnānāya rājñe ca pronmucya vasanāñcalāt /</l>
<l>prakṣālyopānayat tasmai hṛdyāny āmalakāni saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.21'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-snānāya rājñe ca pronmucya vasana-añcalāt /</l>
<l>prakṣālya upānayat tasmai hṛdyāny āmalakāni saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.22' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>etāni kuta ity etaṃ pṛcchantaṃ sa ca bhūpatim /</l>
<l>evaṃ vyajijñapaj jānusthitaḥ sāmalakāñjaliḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.22'>
<lg>
<l>etāni kuta ity etaṃ pṛcchantaṃ sa ca bhū-patim /</l>
<l>evaṃ vyajijñapaj jānu-sthitaḥ sa-āmalaka-añjaliḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.23' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>etadvṛttir ahaṃ nityaṃ vyatītadaśavatsaraḥ /</l>
<l>carāmy ārādhayan devam anekāntamunivratam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.23'>
<lg>
<l>etad-vṛttir ahaṃ nityaṃ vyatīta-daśa-vatsaraḥ /</l>
<l>carāmy ārādhayan devam anekānta-muni-vratam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.24' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tac chrutvā satyanāmā tvaṃ sattvaśīlaḥ kim ucyate /</l>
<l>ity uktvā sa kṛpākrānto hrītaś cācintayan nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.24'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā satya-nāmā tvaṃ sattvaśīlaḥ kim ucyate /</l>
<l>ity uktvā sa kṛpā-ākrānto hrītaś ca acintayan nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.25' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>dhiṅ nṛpān kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ ye bhṛtyeṣa na jānate /</l>
<l>dhik ca taṃ parivāraṃ yo na jñāpayati tāṃs tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.25'>
<lg>
<l>dhiṅ nṛ-pān kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ ye bhṛtyeṣa na jānate /</l>
<l>dhik ca taṃ parivāraṃ yo na jñāpayati tāṃs tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.26' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iti saṃcintya jagrāha sa rājāmalakadvayam /</l>
<l>hastāt kārpaṭikasyātha kathamcid anubadhnataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.26'>
<lg>
<l>iti saṃcintya jagrāha sa rājā āmalaka-dvayam /</l>
<l>hastāt kārpaṭikasya atha katham-cid anubadhnataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.27' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>bhuktvā ca tan nipīyāmbu viśaśrāmātra sa kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>jagdhāmalakasaṃpītajalakārpaṭikānvitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.27'>
<lg>
<l>bhuktvā ca tan nipīya ambu viśaśrāma atra sa kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>jagdha-āmalaka-saṃpīta-jala-kārpaṭika-anvitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.28' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataḥ sajjīkṛtaṃ tena vāhaṃ kārpaṭikena saḥ /</l>
<l>āruhyāgresare tasminn eva mārgapradarśini //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.28'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sajjī-kṛtaṃ tena vāhaṃ kārpaṭikena saḥ /</l>
<l>āruhya agre-sare tasminn eva mārga-pradarśini //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.29' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>paścādbhāgam anārūḍhe hayasyābhyarthite 'py alam /</l>
<l>yayau sa rājā svapūriṃ pathi prāptātmasainikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.29'>
<lg>
<l>paścād-bhāgam anārūḍhe hayasya abhyarthite 'py alam /</l>
<l>yayau sa rājā sva-pūriṃ pathi prāpta-ātma-sainikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.30' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatra prakhyāpya tadbhaktiṃ vasubhir viṣayaiś ca tam /</l>
<l>apūrayat kārpaṭikaṃ na cāmanyata niṣkṛtim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.30'>
<lg>
<l>tatra prakhyāpya tad-bhaktiṃ vasubhir viṣayaiś ca tam /</l>
<l>apūrayat kārpaṭikaṃ na ca amanyata niṣkṛtim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.31' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataḥ kṛtārthaḥ pārśve 'sya caṇḍasiṃhasya bhūpateḥ /</l>
<l>muktakārpaṭikācāraḥ sattvaśīlaḥ sa tasthivān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.31'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kṛta-arthaḥ pārśve 'sya caṇḍasiṃhasya bhū-pateḥ /</l>
<l>mukta-kārpaṭika-ācāraḥ sattvaśīlaḥ sa tasthivān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.32' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ekadā tena rājñā ca sa siṃhalapateḥ sutām /</l>
<l>yācituṃ siṃhaladvīpam ātmārthaṃ preṣito 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.32'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā tena rājñā ca sa siṃhala-pateḥ sutām /</l>
<l>yācituṃ siṃhala-dvīpam ātma-arthaṃ preṣito 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.33' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatrābdhivartmanā gacchann arcitābhīṣṭadevataḥ /</l>
<l>āruroha pravahaṇaṃ rājādiṣṭaiḥ saha dvijaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.33'>
<lg>
<l>tatra ab-dhi-vartmanā gacchann arcita-abhīṣṭa-devataḥ /</l>
<l>āruroha pravahaṇaṃ rāja-ādiṣṭaiḥ saha dvijaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.34' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>gate tasmin pravahaṇe madhyabhāgam aśaṅkitam /</l>
<l>uttasthau jaladhes tasmād dhvajo janitavismayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.34'>
<lg>
<l>gate tasmin pravahaṇe madhya-bhāgam aśaṅkitam /</l>
<l>uttasthau jala-dhes tasmād dhvajo janita-vismayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.35' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>abhramlihāgraḥ sumahāñ jāmbūnadavinirmitaḥ /</l>
<l>vicitravarṇavicaladvaijayantīvirājitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.35'>
<lg>
<l>abhram-liha-agraḥ su-mahāñ jāmbūnada-vinirmitaḥ /</l>
<l>vicitra-varṇa-vicalad-vaijayantī-virājitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.36' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatkālaṃ cātra sahasā samunnamya ghanāvalī /</l>
<l>bhṛśaṃ varṣitum ārebhe vavau tīvraś ca mārutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.36'>
<lg>
<l>tat-kālaṃ ca atra sahasā samunnamya ghana-āvalī /</l>
<l>bhṛśaṃ varṣitum ārebhe vavau tīvraś ca mārutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.37' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tair varṣavātaiḥ sa balād ākṛṣyādhoranair iva /</l>
<l>āsajyata dhvajastambhe tasmin pravahaṇadvipaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.37'>
<lg>
<l>tair varṣa-vātaiḥ sa balād ākṛṣyā adhoranair iva /</l>
<l>āsajyata dhvaja-stambhe tasmin pravahaṇa-dvipaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.38' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tāvac ca sa dhvajas tasmin vāridhau vīciviplute /</l>
<l>vahanena samaṃ tena prāvartata nimajjitum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.38'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca sa dhvajas tasmin vāri-dhau vīci-viplute /</l>
<l>vahanena samaṃ tena prāvartata nimajjitum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.39' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tato dvijās te tatrasthāś caṇḍasiṃhaṃ svabhūpatim /</l>
<l>uddiśyodghoṣayāmāsur abhrahmaṇyaṃ bhayākulāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.39'>
<lg>
<l>tato dvijās te tatra-sthāś caṇḍasiṃhaṃ sva-bhū-patim /</l>
<l>uddiśya udghoṣayāmāsur a-bhrahmaṇyaṃ bhaya-ākulāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.40' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tad ākarṇyāsahiṣṇuś ca svāmibhakter anudhvajam /</l>
<l>sa sattvaśīlo niḥtriṃśahasto baddhottarīyakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.40'>
<lg>
<l>tad ākarṇya asahiṣṇuś ca svāmi-bhakter anudhvajam /</l>
<l>sa sattvaśīlo niḥ-triṃśa-hasto baddha-uttarīyakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.41' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ātmānam akṣipat tatra niḥapekṣo mahodadhau /</l>
<l>udadheḥ kāraṇāśaṅkī vīraḥ pratividhitsayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.41'>
<lg>
<l>ātmānam akṣipat tatra niḥ-apekṣo mahā-uda-dhau /</l>
<l>udadheḥ kāraṇa-āśaṅkī vīraḥ pratividhitsayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.42' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>magne ca tasmin vātormidūrotkṣiptam abhajyata /</l>
<l>vahanaṃ tac ca tatstāś ca nipetur yādasāṃ mukhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.42'>
<lg>
<l>magne ca tasmin vāta-ūrmi-dūra-utkṣiptam abhajyata /</l>
<l>vahanaṃ tac ca tat-stāś ca nipetur yādasāṃ mukhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.43' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>sa ca magno 'mbudhau tatra sattvaśīlo nirīkṣate /</l>
<l>yāvat tāvad dadarśātra purīṃ divyāṃ na vāridhim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.43'>
<lg>
<l>sa ca magno 'mbu-dhau tatra sattvaśīlo nirīkṣate /</l>
<l>yāvat tāvad dadarśa atra purīṃ divyāṃ na vāri-dhim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.44' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tasmin maṇimayasthambhair bhāsvare hemamandire /</l>
<l>sadratnabaddhasopānavāpīkodyānaśobhini //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.44'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin maṇi-maya-sthambhair bhāsvare hema-mandire /</l>
<l>sad-ratna-baddha-sopāna-vāpīka-udyāna-śobhini //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.45' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>nānāmaṇiśilābhittiratnacitrocchritadhvajam /</l>
<l>kātyāyanīdevagṛhaṃ merupronnatam aikṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.45'>
<lg>
<l>nānā-maṇi-śilā-bhitti-ratna-citra-ucchrita-dhvajam /</l>
<l>kātyāyanī-deva-gṛhaṃ meru-pronnatam aikṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.46' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatra praṇamya devīṃ tāṃ stutyābhyarcya tadagrataḥ /</l>
<l>indrajālaṃ kim etat syād ity āścaryād upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.46'>
<lg>
<l>tatra praṇamya devīṃ tāṃ stutya ābhyarcya tad-agrataḥ /</l>
<l>indra-jālaṃ kim etat syād ity āścaryād upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.47' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tāvac ca devyagragataprabhāmaṇḍalakāntarāt /</l>
<l>akasmān niragāt kanyā divyodghāṭya kavāṭakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.47'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca devy-agra-gata-prabhā-maṇḍalaka-antarāt /</l>
<l>akasmān niragāt kanyā divya ūdghāṭya kavāṭakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.48' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>indī varākṣī phullābjavadanā kusumasmitā /</l>
<l>mṛṇālanālamṛdvaṅgī jaṅgameva sarojinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.48'>
<lg>
<l>indī vara-akṣī phulla-ab-ja-vadanā kusuma-smitā /</l>
<l>mṛṇāla-nāla-mṛdv-aṅgī jaṅgama īva sarojinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.49' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>strīsahasraparīvārā devīgarbhagṛhaṃ ca sā /</l>
<l>viveśa sattvaśīlasya hṛdayaṃ ca tataḥ samam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.49'>
<lg>
<l>strī-sahasra-parīvārā devī-garbha-gṛhaṃ ca sā /</l>
<l>viveśa sattvaśīlasya hṛdayaṃ ca tataḥ samam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.50' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>niragāt kṛtapūjā ca devīgarbhagṛhāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>na punaḥ sattvaśīlasya hṛdayāt sā kathaṃ cana //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.50'>
<lg>
<l>niragāt kṛta-pūjā ca devī-garbha-gṛhāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>na punaḥ sattvaśīlasya hṛdayāt sā kathaṃ cana //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.51' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>prāviśat sā ca tatraiva prabhāmaṇḍalakāntare /</l>
<l>sattvaśīlo 'py asau tasyāḥ paścāt tatra praviṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.51'>
<lg>
<l>prāviśat sā ca tatra eva prabhā-maṇḍalaka-antare /</l>
<l>sattvaśīlo 'py asau tasyāḥ paścāt tatra praviṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.52' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>praviśya ca dadarśāntar anyad evottamaṃ puram /</l>
<l>saṃketodyānam iva yat sarvāsāṃ bhogasaṃpadām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.52'>
<lg>
<l>praviśya ca dadarśa antar anyad eva uttamaṃ puram /</l>
<l>saṃketa-udyānam iva yat sarvāsāṃ bhoga-saṃpadām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.53' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatrāntaḥmaṇiparyaṅkaniṣaṇṇāṃ tāṃ vilokya saḥ /</l>
<l>kanyām upetya tatpārśve sattvaśīla upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.53'>
<lg>
<l>tatra antaḥ-maṇi-paryaṅka-niṣaṇṇāṃ tāṃ vilokya saḥ /</l>
<l>kanyām upetya tat-pārśve sattvaśīla upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.54' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>āsīc ca tanmukhāsaktalocano likhito yathā /</l>
<l>aṅgaiḥ sotkampapulakair vadann āliṅganotkatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.54'>
<lg>
<l>āsīc ca tan-mukha-āsakta-locano likhito yathā /</l>
<l>aṅgaiḥ sa-utkampa-pulakair vadann āliṅgana-utkatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.55' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ smarāviṣṭaṃ ceṭīnām atra sā mukham /</l>
<l>adrākṣīt tāś ca tatkālam iṅgitajñās tam abruvan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.55'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ smara-āviṣṭaṃ ceṭīnām atra sā mukham /</l>
<l>adrākṣīt tāś ca tat-kālam iṅgita-jñās tam abruvan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.56' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>atithis tvam iha prāptas tad asmatsvāminīkṛtam /</l>
<l>bhajasvātithyam uttiṣṭha snāhi bhuṅksva tataḥ param //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.56'>
<lg>
<l>atithis tvam iha prāptas tad asmat-svāminī-kṛtam /</l>
<l>bhajasvā atithyam uttiṣṭha snāhi bhuṅksva tataḥ param //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.57' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'valambyāśāṃ khatam apy utthitas tataḥ /</l>
<l>yayau pradarśitāṃ tābhir ekām udyānavāpikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.57'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'valambyā aśāṃ khatam apy utthitas tataḥ /</l>
<l>yayau pradarśitāṃ tābhir ekām udyāna-vāpikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.58' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tasyāṃ nimagnaś cottasthau tāmraliptyāṃ sa tatkṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>caṇḍasiṃhanṛpodyānavāpīmadhyāt sasaṃbhramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.58'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ nimagnaś ca uttasthau tāmraliptyāṃ sa tat-kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>caṇḍasiṃha-nṛ-pa-udyāna-vāpī-madhyāt sa-saṃbhramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.59' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatra prāptam akasmāc ca vikṣyātmānam acintayat /</l>
<l>aho kim etat kvodyānam idaṃ divyaṃ kva tat puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.59'>
<lg>
<l>tatra prāptam akasmāc ca vikṣyā atmānam acintayat /</l>
<l>aho kim etat kva udyānam idaṃ divyaṃ kva tat puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.60' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatrāmṛtāsārasamaṃ kva tat tasyāś ca darśanam /</l>
<l>kva cānantaram evedaṃ tadviśleṣamahāviṣam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.60'>
<lg>
<l>tatra amṛta-āsāra-samaṃ kva tat tasyāś ca darśanam /</l>
<l>kva ca anantaram eva idaṃ tad-viśleṣa-mahā-viṣam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.61' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>svapnaś ca nāyaṃ suspaṣṭo vinidro 'nubhavo hi me /</l>
<l>dhruvaṃ pātālakanyābhis tābhir mūḍho 'smi vañcitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.61'>
<lg>
<l>svapnaś ca na ayaṃ su-spaṣṭo vinidro 'nubhavo hi me /</l>
<l>dhruvaṃ pātāla-kanyābhis tābhir mūḍho 'smi vañcitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.62' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iti dhyāyan vinā tāṃ sa kanyām unmādavān iva /</l>
<l>udyāne tatra babhrāma kāmārto vilalāpa ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.62'>
<lg>
<l>iti dhyāyan vinā tāṃ sa kanyām unmādavān iva /</l>
<l>udyāne tatra babhrāma kāma-ārto vilalāpa ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.63' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tadavasthaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā piśaṅgaiḥ puṣpareṇubhiḥ /</l>
<l>vātoddhūtaiḥ parītāṅgaṃ viprayogānalair iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.63'>
<lg>
<l>tad-avasthaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā piśaṅgaiḥ puṣpa-reṇubhiḥ /</l>
<l>vāta-uddhūtaiḥ parīta-aṅgaṃ viprayoga-analair iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.64' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>udyānapālā gatvaiva caṇḍasiṃhamahībhṛtam /</l>
<l>vyajijñapan sa codbhrāntaḥ svayam etya dadarśa tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.64'>
<lg>
<l>udyāna-pālā gatva aiva caṇḍasiṃha-mahī-bhṛtam /</l>
<l>vyajijñapan sa ca udbhrāntaḥ svayam etya dadarśa tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.65' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>sāntvayitvā ca papraccha kim idaṃ brūhi naḥ sakhe /</l>
<l>kva prasthitas tvaṃ kva prāptaḥ kvāstaḥ kva patitaḥ śaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.65'>
<lg>
<l>sāntvayitvā ca papraccha kim idaṃ brūhi naḥ sakhe /</l>
<l>kva prasthitas tvaṃ kva prāptaḥ kva astaḥ kva patitaḥ śaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.66' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa svavṛttāntaṃ tasmai sarva śaśaṃsa tam /</l>
<l>sattvaśīlo nṛpataye so 'py athaivam acintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.66'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa sva-vṛtta-antaṃ tasmai sarva śaśaṃsa tam /</l>
<l>sattvaśīlo nṛ-pataye so 'py atha evam acintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.67' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>hanta vīro 'pi matpuṇyaiḥ kāmenaiṣo viḍambitaḥ /</l>
<l>ānṛṇyaṃ gantum etasya labdho hy avasaro mayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.67'>
<lg>
<l>hanta vīro 'pi mat-puṇyaiḥ kāmena eṣo viḍambitaḥ /</l>
<l>ānṛṇyaṃ gantum etasya labdho hy avasaro mayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.68' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ity antaś cintayitvā sa vīro rājā jagāda tam /</l>
<l>tahri muñca mudhā śokam ahaṃ tvāṃ prāpayāmi tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.68'>
<lg>
<l>ity antaś cintayitvā sa vīro rājā jagāda tam /</l>
<l>tahri muñca mudhā śokam ahaṃ tvāṃ prāpayāmi tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.69' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>nītvā tenaiva mārgeṇa priyām asurakanyakām /</l>
<l>iti cāśvāsayāmāsa taṃ sa snānādinā nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.69'>
<lg>
<l>nītvā tena eva mārgeṇa priyām asura-kanyakām /</l>
<l>iti ca aśvāsayāmāsa taṃ sa snāna-ādinā nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.70' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>anyedyur mantrivinyastarājyas tena samaṃ ca saḥ /</l>
<l>prāyāt pravahaṇārūḍhas taddarśitapatho 'mbudhim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.70'>
<lg>
<l>anye-dyur mantri-vinyasta-rājyas tena samaṃ ca saḥ /</l>
<l>prāyāt pravahaṇa-ārūḍhas tad-darśita-patho 'mbu-dhim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.71' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>prāpya tanmadhyabhāgaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ prāgvad utthitam /</l>
<l>sapatākaṃ dhvajaṃ sattvaśīlas taṃ nṛpam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.71'>
<lg>
<l>prāpya tan-madhya-bhāgaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ prāgvad utthitam /</l>
<l>sa-patākaṃ dhvajaṃ sattvaśīlas taṃ nṛ-pam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.72' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>so 'yam abhyutthito divyaprabhāvo 'tra mahādhvajaḥ /</l>
<l>mayi magne 'tra maṅktavyaṃ devenaitam anu dhvajam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.72'>
<lg>
<l>so 'yam abhyutthito divya-prabhāvo 'tra mahā-dhvajaḥ /</l>
<l>mayi magne 'tra maṅktavyaṃ devena etam anu dhvajam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.73' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ity uktvā nikaṭaṃ prāpya dhvajasyāsya nimajjataḥ /</l>
<l>mārge sa sattvaśīlo 'sau pūrvam ātmānam akṣipat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.73'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā nikaṭaṃ prāpya dhvajasya asya nimajjataḥ /</l>
<l>mārge sa sattvaśīlo 'sau pūrvam ātmānam akṣipat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.74' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tato rājāpi cikṣepa tatrātmānaṃ tathaiva saḥ /</l>
<l>anto magnau ca tau kṣipraṃ tad divyaṃ prāpatuḥ puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.74'>
<lg>
<l>tato rāja āpi cikṣepa tatrā atmānaṃ tatha aiva saḥ /</l>
<l>anto magnau ca tau kṣipraṃ tad divyaṃ prāpatuḥ puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.75' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvā sa sāścaryo rājā devīṃ praṇamya tām /</l>
<l>pārvatīṃ sattvaśīlena sahitaḥ samupāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.75'>
<lg>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvā sa sa-āścaryo rājā devīṃ praṇamya tām /</l>
<l>pārvatīṃ sattvaśīlena sahitaḥ samupāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.76' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tāvac ca niragāt tatra sā sakhījanasaṃgatā /</l>
<l>rūpinīva prabhā kanyā prabhāmaṇḍalakāt tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.76'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca niragāt tatra sā sakhī-jana-saṃgatā /</l>
<l>rūpini īva prabhā kanyā prabhā-maṇḍalakāt tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.77' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iyaṃ sā sumukhīty ukte sattvaśīlena tāṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā yuktam abhiṣvaṅgaṃ tasya tasyām amanyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.77'>
<lg>
<l>iyaṃ sā su-mukhi īty ukte sattvaśīlena tāṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā yuktam abhiṣvaṅgaṃ tasya tasyām amanyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.78' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>sāpi taṃ vīkṣya rājānaṃ śubhaśārīralakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>puruṣātiśayo 'pūrvaḥ ko 'yaṃ syād ity acintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.78'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi taṃ vīkṣya rājānaṃ śubha-śārīra-lakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>puruṣa-atiśayo '-pūrvaḥ ko 'yaṃ syād ity acintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.79' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>viveśa cāmbikādhāma pūjāyai sā nṛpo 'pi saḥ /</l>
<l>jagāmodyānam ādāya sattvaśīlam avajñayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.79'>
<lg>
<l>viveśa ca ambikā-dhāma pūjāyai sā nṛ-po 'pi saḥ /</l>
<l>jagāma udyānam ādāya sattvaśīlam avajñayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.80' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>kṣaṇāc ca kṛtapūjā sā niragād daityakanyakā /</l>
<l>yācitvā satpatiprāptiṃ devyā garbhagṛhāntarāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.80'>
<lg>
<l>kṣaṇāc ca kṛta-pūjā sā niragād daitya-kanyakā /</l>
<l>yācitvā sat-pati-prāptiṃ devyā garbha-gṛha-antarāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.81' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>nirgatya sā jagādaikāṃ sakhīṃ sakhi gaveṣyatām /</l>
<l>yo 'sāv iha mayā dṛṣṭo mahātmā kva sa tiṣṭhati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.81'>
<lg>
<l>nirgatya sā jagāda ekāṃ sakhīṃ sakhi gaveṣyatām /</l>
<l>yo 'sāv iha mayā dṛṣṭo mahā-ātmā kva sa tiṣṭhati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.82' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ātithyaṃ gṛhyatām etya prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ tvayā /</l>
<l>iti caiṣo 'rthyatāṃ pūjyaḥ pumān ko 'py uttamo hy asau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.82'>
<lg>
<l>ātithyaṃ gṛhyatām etya prasādaḥ kriyatāṃ tvayā /</l>
<l>iti ca eṣo 'rthyatāṃ pūjyaḥ pumān ko 'py uttamo hy asau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.83' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>evaṃ sakhī tayoktā sā vicityodyānavartine /</l>
<l>svasvāminīnideśaṃ taṃ prahvā tasmai nyavedayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.83'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ sakhī taya ūktā sā vicitya udyāna-vartine /</l>
<l>sva-svāminī-nideśaṃ taṃ prahvā tasmai nyavedayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.84' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa nṛpo vīraḥ sāvahelam uvāca tām /</l>
<l>eṣaivātithyam asmākam anyat kim upayujyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.84'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa nṛ-po vīraḥ sa-avahelam uvāca tām /</l>
<l>eṣaivā atithyam asmākam anyat kim upayujyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.85' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>etac chrutvā tayā gatvā sakhyā sā śrāvitā tadā /</l>
<l>mene mānyam udāraṃ taṃ sarvathā daityakanyakā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.85'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutvā tayā gatvā sakhyā sā śrāvitā tadā /</l>
<l>mene mānyam udāraṃ taṃ sarvathā daitya-kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.86' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataś cākṛṣyamāneva dhairyapāśena tena sā /</l>
<l>nṛpeṇa mānuṣāyogye 'py ātithye niḥspṛhātmanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.86'>
<lg>
<l>tataś cā akṛṣyamāna īva dhairya-pāśena tena sā /</l>
<l>nṛ-peṇa mānuṣa-ayogye 'py ātithye niḥ-spṛhā-ātmanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.87' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>patyarthaṃ pārvatīsevāparipākasamarpitam /</l>
<l>matvā tat svayam udyānaṃ viveśāsuraputrikā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.87'>
<lg>
<l>paty-arthaṃ pārvatī-sevā-paripāka-samarpitam /</l>
<l>matvā tat svayam udyānaṃ viveśa asura-putrikā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.88' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>vicitraśakunālāpair vātāñcitalatābhujaiḥ /</l>
<l>vikīrṇakusumair ārān nandyamāneva pādapaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.88'>
<lg>
<l>vicitra-śakuna-ālāpair vāta-añcita-latā-bhujaiḥ /</l>
<l>vikīrṇa-kusumair ārān nandyamāna īva pāda-paiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.89' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>upagamya ca sā tatra yathāvat praśrayānatā /</l>
<l>ātithyagrahaṇārthaṃ taṃ prārthayāmāsa pārthivam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.89'>
<lg>
<l>upagamya ca sā tatra yathāvat praśraya-ānatā /</l>
<l>ātithya-grahaṇa-arthaṃ taṃ prārthayāmāsa pārthivam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.90' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataḥ sa sattvaśīlaṃ tam uddiśyovāca tāṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>anena kathitāṃ devīm ihāhaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.90'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa sattvaśīlaṃ tam uddiśya uvāca tāṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>anena kathitāṃ devīm iha ahaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.91' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>gaurīṃ dhvajapathaprāpyaparamādbhutaketanām /</l>
<l>sā dṛṣṭā tadanu tvaṃ ca kānyātithyārthitātra naḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.91'>
<lg>
<l>gaurīṃ dhvaja-patha-prāpya-parama-adbhuta-ketanām /</l>
<l>sā dṛṣṭā tad-anu tvaṃ ca ka ānyā ātithya-arthita ātra naḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.92' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tac chrutvā sābravīt kanyā kautukāt tarhi vīkṣitum /</l>
<l>āgamyatāṃ dvitīyaṃ me puraṃ trijagadadbhutām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.92'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa ābravīt kanyā kautukāt tarhi vīkṣitum /</l>
<l>āgamyatāṃ dvitīyaṃ me puraṃ tri-jagad-adbhutām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.93' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca sa vihasya nṛpo 'bravīt /</l>
<l>tad apy anenaivoktaṃ me yatra sā snānavāpikā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.93'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ ca sa vihasya nṛ-po 'bravīt /</l>
<l>tad apy anena eva uktaṃ me yatra sā snāna-vāpikā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.94' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataḥ sā kanyakāvādīd deva mā smaivam ādiśa /</l>
<l>na viḍambanaśīlāhaṃ kā vā pūjye viḍambanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.94'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sā kanyaka āvādīd deva mā sma evam ādiśa /</l>
<l>na viḍambana-śīla āhaṃ kā vā pūjye viḍambanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.95' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ahaṃ hi sattvotkarṣeṇa yuṣmākaṃ kimkarīkṛtā /</l>
<l>tanmama prārthanābhaṅgaṃ naivaivaṃ kartum arhatha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.95'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ hi sattva-utkarṣeṇa yuṣmākaṃ kim-karī-kṛtā /</l>
<l>tanmama prārthanā-bhaṅgaṃ na eva evaṃ kartum arhatha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.96' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>etac chrutvā tathety uktvā sattvaśīlasakhaḥ sa tat /</l>
<l>prabhāmaṇḍalakopāntaṃ yayau rājā tayā saha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.96'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutvā tatha īty uktvā sattvaśīla-sakhaḥ sa tat /</l>
<l>prabhā-maṇḍalaka-upāntaṃ yayau rājā tayā saha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.97' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>apāvṛtakavāṭe ca tasminn antas tathaiva saḥ /</l>
<l>praveśito dadarśāsyās tad divyam aparaṃ puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.97'>
<lg>
<l>apāvṛta-kavāṭe ca tasminn antas tatha aiva saḥ /</l>
<l>praveśito dadarśa asyās tad divyam aparaṃ puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.98' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>nitya saṃnaddhasarvaṛtu sadāpuṣpaphaladrumam /</l>
<l>merupṛṣṭham ivāśeṣaṃ nirmitaṃ ratnakāñcanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.98'>
<lg>
<l>nitya saṃnaddha-sarva-ṛtu sadā-puṣpa-phala-drumam /</l>
<l>meru-pṛṣṭham iva aśeṣaṃ nirmitaṃ ratna-kāñcanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.99' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>ratnāsane mahārhe taṃ rājānam upaveśya sā /</l>
<l>yathocitopanītārghyā daityarājasutābravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.99'>
<lg>
<l>ratna-āsane mahā-arhe taṃ rājānam upaveśya sā /</l>
<l>yathā-ucita upanīta-arghyā daitya-rāja-suta ābravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.100' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>kanyāham asurendrasya kālanemer mahātmanaḥ /</l>
<l>cakrāyudhena ca sa me svaḥgatiṃ prāpitaḥ pitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.100'>
<lg>
<l>kanya āham asura-indrasya kālanemer mahā-ātmanaḥ /</l>
<l>cakrāyudhena ca sa me svaḥ-gatiṃ prāpitaḥ pitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.101' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>viśvakarmakṛtaṃ cedaṃ paitṛkaṃ me puradvayam /</l>
<l>na jarātra na mṛtyuś ca bādhate sarvakāmade //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.101'>
<lg>
<l>viśvakarma-kṛtaṃ ca idaṃ paitṛkaṃ me pura-dvayam /</l>
<l>na jara ātra na mṛtyuś ca bādhate sarva-kāma-de //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.102' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>idānīṃ ca pitā tvaṃ me sapurāhaṃ vaśe tava /</l>
<l>ity arpitātmasarvasvāṃ tām uvāca sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.102'>
<lg>
<l>idānīṃ ca pitā tvaṃ me sa-pura āhaṃ vaśe tava /</l>
<l>ity arpita-ātma-sarva-svāṃ tām uvāca sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.103' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>yady evaṃ tat sute hy asmai mayā dattāsy anindite /</l>
<l>sattvaśīlāya vīrāya suhṛde bāndhavāya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.103'>
<lg>
<l>yady evaṃ tat sute hy asmai mayā datta āsy anindite /</l>
<l>sattvaśīlāya vīrāya su-hṛde bāndhavāya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.104' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>evaṃ devīprasādena mūrteneva nṛpeṇa sā /</l>
<l>uktā guṇajñā vinatā tat tathety anvamanyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.104'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ devī-prasādena mūrtena iva nṛ-peṇa sā /</l>
<l>uktā guṇa-jñā vinatā tat tatha īty anvamanyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.105' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tataḥ kṛtārthaṃ taṃ tasyāḥ kṛtapāṇigrahaṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>dattāsurapuraiśvaryaṃ sattvaśīlam uvāca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.105'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kṛta-arthaṃ taṃ tasyāḥ kṛta-pāṇi-grahaṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>datta-asura-pura-aiśvaryaṃ sattvaśīlam uvāca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.106' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>buktayor āmalakayos tayor ekaṃ mayā tava /</l>
<l>saṃśodhitam asaṃśuddhād ṛṇī te 'haṃ dvitīyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.106'>
<lg>
<l>buktayor āmalakayos tayor ekaṃ mayā tava /</l>
<l>saṃśodhitam asaṃśuddhād ṛṇī te 'haṃ dvitīyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.107' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iti praṇatam uktvā taṃ daityaputrīṃ jagāda tām /</l>
<l>mārgo me darśyatāṃ yena svapurīṃ prāpnuyām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.107'>
<lg>
<l>iti praṇatam uktvā taṃ daitya-putrīṃ jagāda tām /</l>
<l>mārgo me darśyatāṃ yena sva-purīṃ prāpnuyām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.108' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tato 'parājitaṃ nāma khaḍgaṃ bhakṣyaṃ phalaṃ ca sā /</l>
<l>ekaṃ jarāmṛtyuharaṃ tasmai daityasutā dadau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.108'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'parājitaṃ nāma khaḍgaṃ bhakṣyaṃ phalaṃ ca sā /</l>
<l>ekaṃ jarā-mṛtyu-haraṃ tasmai daitya-sutā dadau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.109' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>tābhyāṃ yuktas tayoktāyāṃ vāpyaṃ magnaḥ svadeśataḥ /</l>
<l>utthāya sarvasaṃsiddhakāmo 'bhūt sa kramān nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.109'>
<lg>
<l>tābhyāṃ yuktas taya ūktāyāṃ vāpyaṃ magnaḥ sva-deśataḥ /</l>
<l>utthāya sarva-saṃsiddha-kāmo 'bhūt sa kramān nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.110' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>sattvaśīlo 'pi daityastrīpurarājyaṃ śaśāsa saḥ /</l>
<l>tad brūhi ko 'bdhipatane dvayoḥ sattvādhiko 'nayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.110'>
<lg>
<l>sattvaśīlo 'pi daitya-strī-pura-rājyaṃ śaśāsa saḥ /</l>
<l>tad brūhi ko 'b-dhi-patane dvayoḥ sattva-adhiko 'nayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.111' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iti śrutvā tathā praśnaṃ vetālāc chapabhītitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ bhūpatiḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.111'>
<lg>
<l>iti śrutvā tathā praśnaṃ vetālāc chapa-bhītitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ bhū-patiḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.112' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>etayoḥ sattvaśīlo 'tra sa me sattvādhiko mataḥ /</l>
<l>sa hy avijñātatattvārtho nirāsthaḥ patito 'mbudhau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.112'>
<lg>
<l>etayoḥ sattvaśīlo 'tra sa me sattva-adhiko mataḥ /</l>
<l>sa hy avijñāta-tattva-artho nir-āsthaḥ patito 'mbu-dhau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.113' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>rājā tu tattvaṃ vijñāya viveśāmbhaḥdhim āsthayā /</l>
<l>daityakanyāṃ ca nāvañchad asādhyā spṛhayeti saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.113'>
<lg>
<l>rājā tu tattvaṃ vijñāya viveśa ambhaḥ-dhim āsthayā /</l>
<l>daitya-kanyāṃ ca na avañchad asādhyā spṛhaya īti saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.114' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>iti tasyākarṇya vaco nirastamaunasya bhūpateḥ skandhāt /</l>
<l>sa jagāma pūrvavat taṃ vetālaḥ śiṃśapātaruṃ svapadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.114'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasyā akarṇya vaco nirasta-maunasya bhū-pateḥ skandhāt /</l>
<l>sa jagāma pūrvavat taṃ vetālaḥ śiṃśapā-taruṃ sva-padam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.14.115' corresp='Vet_7'>
<l>rājāpi tathaiva sa taṃ punar apy ānetum anujagāma javāt /</l>
<l>prārabdhe hy asamāpte kārye śithilībhavanti kiṃ sudhiyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.14.115'>
<lg>
<l>rāja āpi tatha aiva sa taṃ punar apy ānetum anujagāma javāt /</l>
<l>prārabdhe hy asamāpte kārye śithilī-bhavanti kiṃ su-dhiyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.1' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>gatvā tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ bhūyo vetālaṃ prāpya bhūmipaḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramaseno 'tra skandhe kṛtvoccacāla saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.1'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ bhūyo vetālaṃ prāpya bhūmi-paḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramaseno 'tra skandhe kṛtva ūccacāla saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.2' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>prayāntaṃ sa punas taṃ ca vetālaḥ skandhato 'bravīt /</l>
<l>śramavismṛtaye rājan mattaḥ praśnam imaṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.2'>
<lg>
<l>prayāntaṃ sa punas taṃ ca vetālaḥ skandhato 'bravīt /</l>
<l>śrama-vismṛtaye rājan mattaḥ praśnam imaṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.3' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>aṅgadeśe 'grahāro 'sti mahān vṛkṣaghaṭābhidhaḥ /</l>
<l>viṣṇusvāmīti tatrāsīd dvijo yajvā mahādhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.3'>
<lg>
<l>aṅga-deśe 'gra-hāro 'sti mahān vṛkṣaghaṭa-abhidhaḥ /</l>
<l>viṣṇusvāmi īti tatrā asīd dvi-jo yajvā mahā-dhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.4' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tasya ca svānurūpāyāṃ patnyāṃ jātāḥ kramāt trayaḥ /</l>
<l>babhūvus taruṇāḥ putrā divyavaidagdhyaśālinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.4'>
<lg>
<l>tasya ca sva-anurūpāyāṃ patnyāṃ jātāḥ kramāt trayaḥ /</l>
<l>babhūvus taruṇāḥ putrā divya-vaidagdhya-śālinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.5' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>te pitrā preṣitās tena kūrmahetoḥ kadācana /</l>
<l>prārabdhayajñena yayus te trayo bhrātaro 'mbudhim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.5'>
<lg>
<l>te pitrā preṣitās tena kūrma-hetoḥ kadā-cana /</l>
<l>prārabdha-yajñena yayus te trayo bhrātaro 'mbu-dhim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.6' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>prāpya kūrmaṃ tato jyāyān kaniṣṭhau tāv abhāṣata /</l>
<l>gṛhṇātu yuvayor ekaḥ kūrmaṃ kratukṛte pituḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.6'>
<lg>
<l>prāpya kūrmaṃ tato jyāyān kaniṣṭhau tāv abhāṣata /</l>
<l>gṛhṇātu yuvayor ekaḥ kūrmaṃ kratu-kṛte pituḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.7' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>aham etaṃ na śaknomi grahītuṃ visrapicchalam /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ taṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhau tāv avocatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.7'>
<lg>
<l>aham etaṃ na śaknomi grahītuṃ visra-picchalam /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ taṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kaniṣṭhau tāv avocatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.8' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tavātra vicikitsā cen nāvayor api sā katham /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīj jyeṣṭho gṛhṇītaṃ gacchataṃ yuvām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.8'>
<lg>
<l>tava atra vicikitsā cen nā avayor api sā katham /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīj jyeṣṭho gṛhṇītaṃ gacchataṃ yuvām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.9' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>pitur yajñakriyālopo bhaved yuṣmatkṛto 'nyathā /</l>
<l>tato narakapātaḥ syād yuvayos tasya ca dhruvam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.9'>
<lg>
<l>pitur yajña-kriyā-lopo bhaved yuṣmat-kṛto 'nyathā /</l>
<l>tato naraka-pātaḥ syād yuvayos tasya ca dhruvam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.10' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>ity uktāv anujau tena tau vihasya tam ūcatuḥ /</l>
<l>dharmaṃ vetsy āvayor eva samānam api nātmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.10'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktāv anujau tena tau vihasya tam ūcatuḥ /</l>
<l>dharmaṃ vetsy āvayor eva samānam api nā atmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.11' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tato jyeṣṭho 'bravīt kiṃ me jānītho naiva caṅgatām /</l>
<l>ahaṃ bhojanacaṅgo 'smi nārhaḥ spraṣṭuṃ jugupsitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.11'>
<lg>
<l>tato jyeṣṭho 'bravīt kiṃ me jānītho na eva caṅgatām /</l>
<l>ahaṃ bhojana-caṅgo 'smi na arhaḥ spraṣṭuṃ jugupsitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.12' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>etat tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātaraṃ madhyamo 'bravīt /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tarhy adhikaś caṅgo nārīcaṅgo vicakṣaṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.12'>
<lg>
<l>etat tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātaraṃ madhyamo 'bravīt /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tarhy adhikaś caṅgo nārī-caṅgo vicakṣaṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.13' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>madhyamenaivam ukte tu jyāyān puna uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>kūrmaṃ gṛhṇātu tarhy eṣa kanīyān āvayor iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.13'>
<lg>
<l>madhyamena evam ukte tu jyāyān puna uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>kūrmaṃ gṛhṇātu tarhy eṣa kanīyān āvayor iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.14' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tataḥ sa bhrukuṭiṃ kṛtvā kanīyān apy uvāca tau /</l>
<l>he mūrkhau tūlikācaṅgaś caṅgo 'haṃ hi viśeṣataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.14'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa bhru-kuṭiṃ kṛtvā kanīyān apy uvāca tau /</l>
<l>he mūrkhau tūlikā-caṅgaś caṅgo 'haṃ hi viśeṣataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.15' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>evaṃ te kalahāsaktās trayo 'pi bhrātaro mithaḥ /</l>
<l>nirṇayāyābhimānaikagrastāḥ kūrmaṃ vihāya tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.15'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ te kalaha-āsaktās trayo 'pi bhrātaro mithaḥ /</l>
<l>nirṇayāya abhimāna eka-grastāḥ kūrmaṃ vihāya tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.16' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>rājñaḥ prasenajinnāmnas tatpradeśabhuvo 'ntikam /</l>
<l>nagaraṃ sahasā jagmur viṭaṅkapuranāmakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.16'>
<lg>
<l>rājñaḥ prasenajin-nāmnas tat-pradeśa-bhuvo 'ntikam /</l>
<l>nagaraṃ sahasā jagmur viṭaṅkapura-nāmakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.17' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tatra pratīhāramukhenāvedyāntaḥ praviśya ca /</l>
<l>nṛpaṃ vijñāpayāmāsuḥ svavṛttāntaṃ tathaiva te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.17'>
<lg>
<l>tatra pratīhāra-mukhenā avedya antaḥ praviśya ca /</l>
<l>nṛ-paṃ vijñāpayāmāsuḥ sva-vṛtta-antaṃ tatha aiva te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.18' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tiṣṭhatehaiva yāvad vaḥ parīkṣiṣye kramād aham /</l>
<l>ity uktas tena rājñā ca tasthus tatra tatheti te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.18'>
<lg>
<l>tiṣṭhata iha eva yāvad vaḥ parīkṣiṣye kramād aham /</l>
<l>ity uktas tena rājñā ca tasthus tatra tatha īti te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.19' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>svāhārakāle cānāyya tebhyaḥ so 'grāsanaṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>rājārhaṃ dāpayāmāsa ṣaḍrasaṃ svādubhojanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.19'>
<lg>
<l>sva-āhāra-kāle cā anāyya tebhyaḥ so 'gra-āsanaṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>rāja-arhaṃ dāpayāmāsa ṣaḍ-rasaṃ svādu-bhojanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.20' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>bhuñjāneṣu ca sarveṣu tadaiko bubhuje na saḥ /</l>
<l>vipro bhojanacaṅgo 'tra jugupsākūṇitānanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.20'>
<lg>
<l>bhuñjāneṣu ca sarveṣu tada aiko bubhuje na saḥ /</l>
<l>vipro bhojana-caṅgo 'tra jugupsā-kūṇita-ānanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.21' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>kathaṃ na bhojanaṃ bhuṅkte brahman svādu sugandhy api /</l>
<l>iti rajñā svayaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śanair vipro jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.21'>
<lg>
<l>kathaṃ na bhojanaṃ bhuṅkte brahman svādu su-gandhy api /</l>
<l>iti rajñā svayaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ śanair vipro jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.22' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>śavadhūmaduḥāmodaḥ śālibhakte 'tra vidyate /</l>
<l>tena nāham idaṃ bhoktum utsahe svādv api prabho //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.22'>
<lg>
<l>śava-dhūma-duḥ-āmodaḥ śāli-bhakte 'tra vidyate /</l>
<l>tena na aham idaṃ bhoktum utsahe svādv api prabho //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.23' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>ity ukte tena sarve 'pi tatrāghrāya nṛpājñayā /</l>
<l>ūcuḥ kalamaśālyannam adoṣaṃ tat sugandhi ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.23'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte tena sarve 'pi tatrā aghrāya nṛ-pa-ājñayā /</l>
<l>ūcuḥ kalama-śāly-annam adoṣaṃ tat su-gandhi ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.24' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>sa tu bhojanacaṅgas tan nāśnāt pihitanāsikaḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa rājā saṃcintya yāvad anviṣyati kramāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.24'>
<lg>
<l>sa tu bhojana-caṅgas tan nā aśnāt pihita-nāsikaḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa rājā saṃcintya yāvad anviṣyati kramāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.25' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tāvan niyogijanatas tad annaṃ bubudhe tathā /</l>
<l>grāmaśmaśānanikaṭakṣetrasaṃbhavaśālijam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.25'>
<lg>
<l>tāvan niyogi-janatas tad annaṃ bubudhe tathā /</l>
<l>grāma-śmaśāna-nikaṭa-kṣetra-saṃbhava-śāli-jam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.26' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tato 'tivismitas tuṣṭaḥ sa rājā tam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>satyaṃ bhojanacaṅgas tvaṃ tadanyadbhujyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.26'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'tivismitas tuṣṭaḥ sa rājā tam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>satyaṃ bhojana-caṅgas tvaṃ tad-anyadbhujyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.27' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>kṛtāhāraś ca sa nṛpo viprān vāsagṛheṣu tān /</l>
<l>visṛjyānāyayāmāsa svam ekāṃ gaṇikottamām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.27'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-āhāraś ca sa nṛ-po viprān vāsa-gṛheṣu tān /</l>
<l>visṛjya-ānāyayāmāsa svam ekāṃ gaṇikā-uttamām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.28' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tāṃ ca tasmai dvitīyasmai prāhiṇot kṛtamaṇḍanām /</l>
<l>viprāya nāricaṅgāya sāyaṃ sarvāṅgasundarīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.28'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ ca tasmai dvitīyasmai prāhiṇot kṛta-maṇḍanām /</l>
<l>viprāya nāri-caṅgāya sāyaṃ sarva-aṅga-sundarīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.29' corresp='Vet_8'>
