<l>sā ca vāsagṛhaṃ tasya rājabhṛtyānvitā yayau /</l>
<l>rākāniśeva purṇendumukhī kamdarpadīpinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.29'>
<lg>
<l>sā ca vāsa-gṛhaṃ tasya rāja-bhṛtya-anvitā yayau /</l>
<l>rākā-niśa īva purṇa-indu-mukhī kamdarpa-dīpinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.30' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>praviṣṭāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sa prabhābhāsitaveśmani /</l>
<l>utpannamūrcchaḥ saṃruddhanāsāgro vāmapāṇinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.30'>
<lg>
<l>praviṣṭāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sa prabhā-bhāsita-veśmani /</l>
<l>utpanna-mūrcchaḥ saṃruddha-nāsā-agro vāma-pāṇinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.31' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>nārīcaṅgo 'bravīd rājabhṛtyān niṣkāsyatām iti /</l>
<l>na cen mṛto 'haṃ niryāti gandho 'syāś chāgalo yataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.31'>
<lg>
<l>nārī-caṅgo 'bravīd rāja-bhṛtyān niṣkāsyatām iti /</l>
<l>na cen mṛto 'haṃ niryāti gandho 'syāś chāgalo yataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.32' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>ity uktās tena ninyus te vignāṃ tāṃ rājapūruṣāḥ /</l>
<l>rājño 'ntikaṃ vāravadhūṃ vṛttāntaṃ jagaduś ca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.32'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktās tena ninyus te vignāṃ tāṃ rāja-pūruṣāḥ /</l>
<l>rājño 'ntikaṃ vāra-vadhūṃ vṛtta-antaṃ jagaduś ca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.33' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>rājāpy ānāyya tatkālaṃ nārīcaṅgam uvāca tam /</l>
<l>yeyaṃ śrīkhaṇḍakarpūrakālā-gurumadottamaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.33'>
<lg>
<l>rāja āpy ānāyya tat-kālaṃ nārī-caṅgam uvāca tam /</l>
<l>ya īyaṃ śrī-khaṇḍa-karpūra-kāla-a-guru-mada-uttamaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.34' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>kṛtaprasādhanā dikṣu prasaraccārusaurabhā /</l>
<l>tasyā vāravilāsinyā gandhaḥ syāc chāgalaḥ kutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.34'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-prasādhanā dikṣu prasarac-cāru-saurabhā /</l>
<l>tasyā vāra-vilāsinyā gandhaḥ syāc chāgalaḥ kutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.35' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>ity ukto 'pi sa rājñā tan nārīcaṅgas tadā na yat /</l>
<l>pratipede tadā rājā vicārapatito 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.35'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto 'pi sa rājñā tan nārī-caṅgas tadā na yat /</l>
<l>pratipede tadā rājā vicāra-patito 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.36' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>pṛcchaṃś ca yuktyā bubudhe tām ajakṣīravardhitām /</l>
<l>tanmukhād eva bālatve mātṛdhātrīviyogataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.36'>
<lg>
<l>pṛcchaṃś ca yuktyā bubudhe tām aja-kṣīra-vardhitām /</l>
<l>tan-mukhād eva bālatve mātṛ-dhātrī-viyogataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.37' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tato 'tivismitas tasya nārīcaṅgasya caṅgatām /</l>
<l>praśaṃsan nṛpatis tasmai tṛtīyāya dvijanmane //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.37'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'tivismitas tasya nārī-caṅgasya caṅgatām /</l>
<l>praśaṃsan nṛ-patis tasmai tṛtīyāya dvi-janmane //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.38' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tadrasāt tūlikācaṅgāyāśu śayyām adāpayat /</l>
<l>paryaṅkopari vinyastasaptasaṃkhyākatūlikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.38'>
<lg>
<l>tad-rasāt tūlikā-caṅgāyā aśu śayyām adāpayat /</l>
<l>paryaṅka-upari vinyasta-sapta-saṃkhyāka-tūlikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.39' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tasyāṃ ca tūlikācaṅgo mahārhe vāsavesmani /</l>
<l>suṣvāpa dhautasuślakṣṇapaṭapracchadavāsasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.39'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ ca tūlikā-caṅgo mahā-arhe vāsa-vesmani /</l>
<l>suṣvāpa dhauta-su-ślakṣṇa-paṭa-pracchada-vāsasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.40' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>yāmārdha eva ca gate sa rātrau śayanāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>uttasthau pāṇyavaṣṭabdhapārśvaḥ krandan vyathārditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.40'>
<lg>
<l>yāma-ardha eva ca gate sa rātrau śayanāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>uttasthau pāṇy-avaṣṭabdha-pārśvaḥ krandan vyathā-arditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.41' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>dadṛśe tasya pārśve ca tatra tyaī rājapūruṣaiḥ /</l>
<l>gāḍhalagnasya bālasya mudreva kuṭilāruṇā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.41'>
<lg>
<l>dadṛśe tasya pārśve ca tatra tyaī rāja-pūruṣaiḥ /</l>
<l>gāḍha-lagnasya bālasya mudra īva kuṭila-aruṇā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.42' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>gatvā ca tais tadākhyātaṃ rājñe rājāpy uvāca tān /</l>
<l>tūlikānāṃ tale kimcin mā syāt tad vīkṣyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.42'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā ca tais tadā ākhyātaṃ rājñe rāja āpy uvāca tān /</l>
<l>tūlikānāṃ tale kim-cin mā syāt tad vīkṣyatām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.43' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>gatveKṣante ca te yāvad ekaikaṃ tūlikātalam /</l>
<l>tāvat sarvatalād āpur vālaṃ paryaṅkapṛṣṭataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.43'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā īKṣante ca te yāvad eka-ekaṃ tūlikā-talam /</l>
<l>tāvat sarva-talād āpur vālaṃ paryaṅka-pṛṣṭataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.44' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>nītvā cādarśayan rājñe so 'py ānītasya vīkṣya tat /</l>
<l>tadrūpaṃ tūlikācaṅgasyāṅgaṃ rājā visismiye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.44'>
<lg>
<l>nītvā ca adarśayan rājñe so 'py ānītasya vīkṣya tat /</l>
<l>tad-rūpaṃ tūlikā-caṅgasya aṅgaṃ rājā visismiye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.45' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>saptabhyas tūlikābhyo 'sya vālo lagnas tanau khatam /</l>
<l>iti citrīyamāṇas tāṃ rājā rātriṃ nināya saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.45'>
<lg>
<l>saptabhyas tūlikābhyo 'sya vālo lagnas tanau khatam /</l>
<l>iti citrīyamāṇas tāṃ rājā rātriṃ nināya saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.46' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>prātaś cādbhutavaidagdhyasaukumāryā amī iti /</l>
<l>tebhyas tribhyo 'pi caṅgebhyo hemalakṣatrayaṃ dadau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.46'>
<lg>
<l>prātaś ca adbhuta-vaidagdhya-saukumāryā amī iti /</l>
<l>tebhyas tribhyo 'pi caṅgebhyo hema-lakṣa-trayaṃ dadau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.47' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tatas te sukhitās tatra tasthur vismṛtakacchapāḥ /</l>
<l>pitur vighnitayajñārthaphalopārjitapātakāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.47'>
<lg>
<l>tatas te sukhitās tatra tasthur vismṛta-kacchapāḥ /</l>
<l>pitur vighnita-yajña-artha-phala-upārjita-pātakāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.48' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathādbhutam aṃsaniṣaṇṇaḥ punaḥ sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>papraccha taṃ trivikramasenaṃ pṛthvīpatiṃ praśnam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.48'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathā-adbhutam aṃsa-niṣaṇṇaḥ punaḥ sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>papraccha taṃ trivikramasenaṃ pṛthvī-patiṃ praśnam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.49' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>rājan vicintya śāpaṃ pūrvoktaṃ brūhi me tvam eteṣām /</l>
<l>bhojananārīśayyācaṅgānāṃ ko 'dhikaś caṅgaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.49'>
<lg>
<l>rājan vicintya śāpaṃ pūrva uktaṃ brūhi me tvam eteṣām /</l>
<l>bhojana-nārī-śayyā-caṅgānāṃ ko 'dhikaś caṅgaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.50' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>tac chrutvaiva sa dhīmān vetālaṃ pratyuvāca taṃ nṛpatiḥ /</l>
<l>aham eṣāṃ niḥkaitavam adhikaṃ jānāmi tūlikācaṅgam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.50'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutva aiva sa dhīmān vetālaṃ pratyuvāca taṃ nṛ-patiḥ /</l>
<l>aham eṣāṃ niḥ-kaitavam adhikaṃ jānāmi tūlikā-caṅgam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.51' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>yasyāṅge pratyakṣaṃ vālapratibimbam udgataṃ dṛṣṭam /</l>
<l>itarābhyāṃ hi bhavet tat pūrvaṃ jātv anyato 'vagatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.51'>
<lg>
<l>yasya aṅge pratyakṣaṃ vāla-pratibimbam udgataṃ dṛṣṭam /</l>
<l>itarābhyāṃ hi bhavet tat pūrvaṃ jātv anyato 'vagatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.15.52' corresp='Vet_8'>
<l>iti tasyoktavato 'ṃsād vetālo bhūpater yayau prāgvat /</l>
<l>so 'pi tathaiva ca rājā tam anvayāsīd anirviṇṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.15.52'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasya uktavato 'ṃsād vetālo bhū-pater yayau prāgvat /</l>
<l>so 'pi tatha aiva ca rājā tam anvayā asīd anirviṇṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.1' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tato gatvā punas tasmāc chiṃśapāpādapān nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe vetālam agrahīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punas tasmāc chiṃśapā-pāda-pān nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe vetālam agrahīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.2' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>prasthitaś ca tatas tena vetālenābhyadhāyi saḥ /</l>
<l>rājan kva rājyaṃ kvaitasmiñ śmaśāne bhramaṇaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.2'>
<lg>
<l>prasthitaś ca tatas tena vetālena abhyadhāyi saḥ /</l>
<l>rājan kva rājyaṃ kva etasmiñ śmaśāne bhramaṇaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.3' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>kim etan nekṣase bhūtasaṃkulaṃ rātribhīṣaṇam /</l>
<l>citādhūmair iva dhvāntair niruddhaṃ pitṛkānanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.3'>
<lg>
<l>kim etan nā ikṣase bhūta-saṃkulaṃ rātri-bhīṣaṇam /</l>
<l>citā-dhūmair iva dhvāntair niruddhaṃ pitṛ-kānanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.4' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ kīdṛg graho 'yaṃ te bhikṣos tasyānurodhataḥ /</l>
<l>tad idaṃ śṛṇu tāvan me praśnaṃ mārgavinodanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.4'>
<lg>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ kīdṛg graho 'yaṃ te bhikṣos tasya anurodhataḥ /</l>
<l>tad idaṃ śṛṇu tāvan me praśnaṃ mārga-vinodanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.5' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>avantiṣv asti nagarī yugādau devanirmitā /</l>
<l>śaivī tanur ivoddāmabhogibhūtivibhūṣitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.5'>
<lg>
<l>avantiṣv asti nagarī yuga-ādau deva-nirmitā /</l>
<l>śaivī tanur iva uddāma-bhogi-bhūti-vibhūṣitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.6' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>padmāvatī bhogavatī yā hiraṇyavatīti ca /</l>
<l>kṛtādiṣu triṣu khyātā kalāv ujjayinīti ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.6'>
<lg>
<l>padmāvatī bhogavatī yā hiraṇyavati īti ca /</l>
<l>kṛta-ādiṣu triṣu khyātā kalāv ujjayini īti ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.7' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tasyāṃ ca vīradevākhyo rājābhūd bhūbhṛtāṃ varaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya padmaratir nāma mahādevī babhūva ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.7'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ ca vīradeva-ākhyo rāja ābhūd bhū-bhṛtāṃ varaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya padmaratir nāma mahā-devī babhūva ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.8' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>so 'tha rājā tayā sākaṃ gatvā mandākinītaṭe /</l>
<l>haram ārādhayāmāsa tapasā putrakāmyayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.8'>
<lg>
<l>so 'tha rājā tayā sākaṃ gatvā mandākinī-taṭe /</l>
<l>haram ārādhayāmāsa tapasā putra-kāmyayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.9' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>ciraṃ tapaḥsthitaś cātra parituṣṭeśvaroditām /</l>
<l>kṛtasnānārcanavidhiḥ śuśrāvemāṃ giraṃ divaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.9'>
<lg>
<l>ciraṃ tapaḥ-sthitaś ca atra parituṣṭa-īśvara-uditām /</l>
<l>kṛta-snāna-arcana-vidhiḥ śuśrāva imāṃ giraṃ divaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.10' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>rājann utpatsyate putraḥ śūras tava kulodbhavaḥ /</l>
<l>Kanyā cānanyasāmānyalāvaṇyanyakkṛtāpsarāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.10'>
<lg>
<l>rājann utpatsyate putraḥ śūras tava kula-udbhavaḥ /</l>
<l>Kanyā ca an-anya-sāmānya-lāvaṇya-nyak-kṛta-apsarāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.11' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>śrutvaitāṃ nābhasīṃ vāṇīṃ siddhābhīṣṭaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>vīradevaḥ svanagarīm āyayau mahiṣīsakhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.11'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitāṃ nābhasīṃ vāṇīṃ siddha-abhīṣṭaḥ sa bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>vīradevaḥ sva-nagarīm āyayau mahiṣī-sakhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.12' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tatrāsya śūradevākhye jāte prathamam ātmaje /</l>
<l>tasyāṃ padmaratau devyāṃ kramād ajani kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.12'>
<lg>
<l>tatra asya śūradeva-ākhye jāte prathamam ātma-je /</l>
<l>tasyāṃ padmaratau devyāṃ kramād ajani kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.13' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>anaṅgasyāpi rūpeṇa ratim utpādayed iyam /</l>
<l>ity anaṅgaratir nāmnā pitrā tena vyadhāyi sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.13'>
<lg>
<l>anaṅgasya api rūpeṇa ratim utpādayed iyam /</l>
<l>ity anaṅgaratir nāmnā pitrā tena vyadhāyi sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.14' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>vṛddhiṃ gatāyās tasyāś ca sa pitā sadṛśaṃ varam /</l>
<l>prepsur ānāyayat pṛthvyāṃ paṭeṣu likhithān nṛpān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.14'>
<lg>
<l>vṛddhiṃ gatāyās tasyāś ca sa pitā sadṛśaṃ varam /</l>
<l>prepsur ānāyayat pṛthvyāṃ paṭeṣu likhithān nṛ-pān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.15' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>teṣv eko 'pi na yat tasya tattulyaḥ pratyabhāsata /</l>
<l>tena rājā sa vātsalyāt tāṃ sutāṃ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.15'>
<lg>
<l>teṣv eko 'pi na yat tasya tat-tulyaḥ pratyabhāsata /</l>
<l>tena rājā sa vātsalyāt tāṃ sutāṃ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.16' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>ahaṃ tāvan na paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ putri te varam /</l>
<l>tat kuruṣva nṛpān sarvān melayitvā svayamvaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.16'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ tāvan na paśyāmi sadṛśaṃ putri te varam /</l>
<l>tat kuruṣva nṛ-pān sarvān melayitvā svayam-varam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.17' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>etat pitṛvacaḥ śrutvā rājaputrī jagāda sā /</l>
<l>tāta svayamvaraṃ kartuṃ hrepaṇān nāham utsahe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.17'>
<lg>
<l>etat pitṛ-vacaḥ śrutvā rāja-putrī jagāda sā /</l>
<l>tāta svayam-varaṃ kartuṃ hrepaṇān na aham utsahe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.18' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>kiṃ tv ekaṃ vetti yo 'pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ svākṛtir yuvā /</l>
<l>tasmai tvayāhaṃ dātavyā nārtho 'nyenādhikena me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.18'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ tv ekaṃ vetti yo '-pūrvaṃ vijñānaṃ svākṛtir yuvā /</l>
<l>tasmai tvaya āhaṃ dātavyā na artho 'nyena adhikena me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.19' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>ity anaṅgarates tasyāḥ śrutvā svaduhitur vacaḥ /</l>
<l>tādṛśaṃ tadvaraṃ yāvad anviṣyati sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.19'>
<lg>
<l>ity anaṅgarates tasyāḥ śrutvā sva-duhitur vacaḥ /</l>
<l>tādṛśaṃ tad-varaṃ yāvad anviṣyati sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.20' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tāvat tallokato buddhvā catvāras tam upāyayuḥ /</l>
<l>vīrā vijñānino bhavyāḥ puruṣā dakṣiṇāpathāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.20'>
<lg>
<l>tāvat tal-lokato buddhvā catvāras tam upāyayuḥ /</l>
<l>vīrā vijñānino bhavyāḥ puruṣā dakṣiṇā-pathāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.21' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>te rājñā pūjitās tasmai svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam ekaśaḥ /</l>
<l>śaśaṃsuḥ saṃnidhau tasyā rājaputryās tadarthinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.21'>
<lg>
<l>te rājñā pūjitās tasmai svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam ekaśaḥ /</l>
<l>śaśaṃsuḥ saṃnidhau tasyā rāja-putryās tad-arthinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.22' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>eko jagāda śūdro 'ham ākhyayā pañcapaṭṭikaḥ /</l>
<l>pañcāgryavastrayugmāni karomy eko 'ham anvaham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.22'>
<lg>
<l>eko jagāda śūdro 'ham ākhyayā pañcapaṭṭikaḥ /</l>
<l>pañca-agrya-vastra-yugmāni karomy eko 'ham anvaham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.23' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tebhya ekaṃ prayacchāmi devāyaikaṃ dvijanmane /</l>
<l>ekaṃ ca parigṛhṇāmi vāsasor ātmanaḥ kṛte //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.23'>
<lg>
<l>tebhya ekaṃ prayacchāmi devāya ekaṃ dvijanmane /</l>
<l>ekaṃ ca parigṛhṇāmi vāsasor ātmanaḥ kṛte //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.24' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>ekaṃ dadāmi bhāryāyai yadi sā bhavatīha me /</l>
<l>ekaṃ vikrīya cāhārapānādi vidadhāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.24'>
<lg>
<l>ekaṃ dadāmi bhāryāyai yadi sā bhavati iha me /</l>
<l>ekaṃ vikrīya cā ahāra-pāna-ādi vidadhāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.25' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>evaṃ vijñānine 'naṅgaratir me dīyatām iti /</l>
<l>ity ekenodite tena dvitīyaḥ puruṣo 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.25'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ vijñānine 'naṅgaratir me dīyatām iti /</l>
<l>ity ekena udite tena dvitīyaḥ puruṣo 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.26' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>bhāṣājño nāma vaiśyo 'haṃ sarveṣāṃ mṛgapakṣiṇām /</l>
<l>rutaṃ vedmi tad eṣā me rājaputrī pradīyatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.26'>
<lg>
<l>bhāṣājño nāma vaiśyo 'haṃ sarveṣāṃ mṛga-pakṣiṇām /</l>
<l>rutaṃ vedmi tad eṣā me rāja-putrī pradīyatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.27' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>evam ukte dvitīyena tṛtīyaḥ proktavāṃs tataḥ /</l>
<l>ahaṃ khaḍgadharo nāma doḥśālī kṣatriyo nṛpa //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.27'>
<lg>
<l>evam ukte dvitīyena tṛtīyaḥ proktavāṃs tataḥ /</l>
<l>ahaṃ khaḍgadharo nāma doḥ-śālī kṣatriyo nṛ-pa //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.28' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>na khaḍgavidyāvijñāne pratimallo 'sti me kṣitau /</l>
<l>tad eṣā tanayā rājaṃs tvayā mahyaṃ vitīryatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.28'>
<lg>
<l>na khaḍga-vidyā-vijñāne pratimallo 'sti me kṣitau /</l>
<l>tad eṣā tanayā rājaṃs tvayā mahyaṃ vitīryatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.29' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>ity ukte tu tṛtīyena caturtha idam abhyadhāt /</l>
<l>vipro 'haṃ jīvadattākhyo vijñānaṃ ca mamedṛśam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.29'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte tu tṛtīyena caturtha idam abhyadhāt /</l>
<l>vipro 'haṃ jīvadatta-ākhyo vijñānaṃ ca mamā idṛśam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.30' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>jantūṃ mṛtān apy ānīya darśayāmy āśu jīvataḥ /</l>
<l>tadvīracaryāsiddhaṃ māṃ patim eṣā prapadyatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.30'>
<lg>
<l>jantūṃ mṛtān apy ānīya darśayāmy āśu jīvataḥ /</l>
<l>tad-vīra-caryā-siddhaṃ māṃ patim eṣā prapadyatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.31' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>evaṃ vaktṝn sa tān paśyan divyaveṣākṛtīn nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>vīradevaḥ sutāyukto dolārūḍha ivābhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.31'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ vaktṝn sa tān paśyan divya-veṣa-ākṛtīn nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>vīradevaḥ sutā-yukto dolā-ārūḍha iva abhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.32' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathām etāṃ vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān nṛpam /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ dattapūrvoktaśāpabhīḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.32'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathām etāṃ vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ datta-pūrva-ukta-śāpa-bhīḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.33' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tad bhavān vaktu tāvan me kasmai deyā viśāmpate /</l>
<l>teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ madhyāt sā kanyānaṅgaratir bhavet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.33'>
<lg>
<l>tad bhavān vaktu tāvan me kasmai deyā viśām-pate /</l>
<l>teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ madhyāt sā kanya ānaṅgaratir bhavet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.34' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ vetālaṃ pratyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>maunaṃ tyājayati prāyaḥ kālakṣepāya māṃ bhavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.34'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutvā sa rājā taṃ vetālaṃ pratyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>maunaṃ tyājayati prāyaḥ kāla-kṣepāya māṃ bhavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.35' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>anyathā gahanaḥ ko 'yaṃ praśno yogeśvarocyatām /</l>
<l>śūdrāya hi kuvindāya kṣatriyā dīyate katham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.35'>
<lg>
<l>anyathā gahanaḥ ko 'yaṃ praśno yoga-īśvara ucyatām /</l>
<l>śūdrāya hi kuvindāya kṣatriyā dīyate katham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.36' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>vaiśyāyāpi kathaṃ deyā kṣatriyā yac ca tad gatam /</l>
<l>mṛgādibhāṣāvijñānaṃ kārye tat kvopayujyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.36'>
<lg>
<l>vaiśyāya api kathaṃ deyā kṣatriyā yac ca tad gatam /</l>
<l>mṛga-ādi-bhāṣā-vijñānaṃ kārye tat kva upayujyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.37' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>yo 'pi vipras tṛtīyo 'tra tenāpi patitena kim /</l>
<l>svakarmapracyutenendrajālinā vīramāninā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.37'>
<lg>
<l>yo 'pi vipras tṛtīyo 'tra tena api patitena kim /</l>
<l>sva-karma-pracyutena indra-jālinā vīra-māninā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.38' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>tasmāt tasmai kṣatriyāya caturthāya samāya sā /</l>
<l>deyā khaḍgadharāyaiva svavidyāvīryaśāline //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.38'>
<lg>
<l>tasmāt tasmai kṣatriyāya caturthāya samāya sā /</l>
<l>deyā khaḍgadharāya eva sva-vidyā-vīrya-śāline //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.16.39' corresp='Vet_9'>
<l>etat tasya vaco niśamya nṛpater aṃsasthalāt pūrvavat <lb/>vetālaḥ sa jagāma yogabalataḥ svasthānam evāśu tat /</l>
<l>bhūpālo 'pi sa taṃ tathaiva punar apy ānetum anvag yayau <lb/>utsāhaikaghane hi vīrahṛdaye nāpnoti khedo 'ntaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.16.39'>
<lg>
<l>etat tasya vaco niśamya nṛ-pater aṃsa-sthalāt pūrvavat <lb/>vetālaḥ sa jagāma yoga-balataḥ sva-sthānam evā aśu tat /</l>
<l>bhū-pālo 'pi sa taṃ tatha aiva punar apy ānetum anvag yayau <lb/>utsāha-eka-ghane hi vīra-hṛdaye nā apnoti khedo 'ntaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.1' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha gatvā taṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>rājā jagrāha vetālaṃ punar aṃse cacāla ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.1'>
<lg>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha gatvā taṃ śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>rājā jagrāha vetālaṃ punar aṃse cacāla ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.2' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>prayāntaṃ ca tam āha sma vetālaḥ so 'ṃsapṛṣṭhagaḥ /</l>
<l>śrānto 'si rājaṃs tad imāṃ śṛṇu śramaharāṃ kathām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.2'>
<lg>
<l>prayāntaṃ ca tam āha sma vetālaḥ so 'ṃsa-pṛṣṭha-gaḥ /</l>
<l>śrānto 'si rājaṃs tad imāṃ śṛṇu śrama-harāṃ kathām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.3' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>abhūt sakalabhūpālamastakanyastaśāsanaḥ /</l>
<l>vīrabāhur iti khyāto nāmnā pārthivasattamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.3'>
<lg>
<l>abhūt sakala-bhū-pāla-mastaka-nyasta-śāsanaḥ /</l>
<l>vīrabāhur iti khyāto nāmnā pārthiva-sattamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.4' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tasyānaṅgapuraṃ nāma babhūva nagarottamam /</l>
<l>tatrāsīd arthadattākhyaḥ sārthavāho mahādhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.4'>
<lg>
<l>tasya anaṅgapuraṃ nāma babhūva nagara-uttamam /</l>
<l>tatrā asīd arthadatta-ākhyaḥ sārtha-vāho mahā-dhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.5' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tasyāsīd dhanadattākhyajyeṣṭhaputrakanīyasī /</l>
<l>sutā madanaseneti kanyāratnaṃ vaṇikpateḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasyā asīd dhanadatta-ākhya-jyeṣṭha-putra-kanīyasī /</l>
<l>sutā madanasena īti kanyā-ratnaṃ vaṇik-pateḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.6' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tām ekadā nijodyāne krīḍantīṃ sasakhījanām /</l>
<l>dadarśa dharmadattākhyo bhrātṛmitraṃ vaṇiksutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.6'>
<lg>
<l>tām ekadā nija-udyāne krīḍantīṃ sa-sakhī-janām /</l>
<l>dadarśa dharmadatta-ākhyo bhrātṛ-mitraṃ vaṇik-sutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.7' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>sa tām ālokya lāvaṇyarasaniḥbharaniḥjharām /</l>
<l>ālakṣya kucakumbhāgrāṃ valitrayataraṅgitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.7'>
<lg>
<l>sa tām ālokya lāvaṇya-rasa-niḥ-bhara-niḥ-jharām /</l>
<l>ālakṣya kuca-kumbha-agrāṃ vali-traya-taraṅgitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.8' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>yauvanadviradasyeva krīḍāmajjanavāpikām /</l>
<l>sadyo 'bhūt smarabāṇaughasaṃtāpahṛtacetanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.8'>
<lg>
<l>yauvana-dviradasya iva krīḍā-majjana-vāpikām /</l>
<l>sadyo 'bhūt smara-bāṇa-ogha-saṃtāpa-hṛta-cetanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.9' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>aho dhārādhirūḍhena rūpeṇa dyotitāmunā /</l>
<l>iyaṃ me mānasaṃ bhettuṃ bhallī māreṇa nirmitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.9'>
<lg>
<l>aho dhārā-adhirūḍhena rūpeṇa dyotita āmunā /</l>
<l>iyaṃ me mānasaṃ bhettuṃ bhallī māreṇa nirmitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.10' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>ity ādi yāvad dhyāyan sa nirvarṇayati tāṃ ciram /</l>
<l>tāvat tasyāticakrāma cakrāhvasyeva vāsaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.10'>
<lg>
<l>ity ādi yāvad dhyāyan sa nirvarṇayati tāṃ ciram /</l>
<l>tāvat tasya aticakrāma cakrāhvasya iva vāsaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.11' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tato madanasenā sā viveśa svagṛhāntaram /</l>
<l>cittaṃ ca dharmadattasya tadanālokanavyathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.11'>
<lg>
<l>tato madanasenā sā viveśa sva-gṛha-antaram /</l>
<l>cittaṃ ca dharmadattasya tad-anālokana-vyathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.12' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tada-darśanaduḥkhāgnisaṃtāpeneva ca jvalan /</l>
<l>lohito nipapātāśu bhāsvān apy aparāmbudhau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.12'>
<lg>
<l>tad-a-darśana-duḥkha-agni-saṃtāpena iva ca jvalan /</l>
<l>lohito nipapātā aśu bhāsvān apy apara-ambudhau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.13' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tāṃ vijñāyaiva sumukhīṃ naktam abhyantare gatām /</l>
<l>udiyāya śanaiś candras tanmukhābjavinirjitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.13'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ vijñāya eva su-mukhīṃ naktam abhyantare gatām /</l>
<l>udiyāya śanaiś candras tan-mukha-abja-vinirjitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.14' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tāvad gatvā gṛhaṃ tāṃ sa dharmadatto 'nucintayan /</l>
<l>tasthau nipatya śayane candrapādāhato luṭhan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.14'>
<lg>
<l>tāvad gatvā gṛhaṃ tāṃ sa dharmadatto 'nucintayan /</l>
<l>tasthau nipatya śayane candra-pāda-āhato luṭhan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.15' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>yatnena pṛcchyamāno 'pi sakhibhir bandhubhis tathā /</l>
<l>na kimcit kathayāmāsa smaragrahavimohitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.15'>
<lg>
<l>yatnena pṛcchyamāno 'pi sakhibhir bandhubhis tathā /</l>
<l>na kimcit kathayāmāsa smara-graha-vimohitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.16' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>niśi kṛcchrāc ca saṃprāptanidraḥ svapne tathaiva tām /</l>
<l>paśyann anunayan kāntāṃ kiṃ kiṃ cakre na sotsukaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.16'>
<lg>
<l>niśi kṛcchrāc ca saṃprāpta-nidraḥ svapne tatha aiva tām /</l>
<l>paśyann anunayan kāntāṃ kiṃ kiṃ cakre na sotsukaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.17' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>prātaḥ prabuddho gatvā ca dadarśaikākinīṃ rahaḥ /</l>
<l>sakhīṃ pratīkṣamānāṃ tāṃ tatrodyānasthitāṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.17'>
<lg>
<l>prātaḥ prabuddho gatvā ca dadarśa ekākinīṃ rahaḥ /</l>
<l>sakhīṃ pratīkṣamānāṃ tāṃ tatra udyāna-sthitāṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.18' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>upetya ca pariṣvaṅgalālasaḥ premapeśalaiḥ /</l>
<l>tām upacchandayāmāsa vacobhiś caraṇānataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.18'>
<lg>
<l>upetya ca pariṣvaṅga-lālasaḥ prema-peśalaiḥ /</l>
<l>tām upacchandayāmāsa vacobhiś caraṇa-ānataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.19' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>kanyāhaṃ paradārāś ca na tavāsmīha saṃpratam /</l>
<l>pitrā samudradattāya dattāhaṃ vaṇije yataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.19'>
<lg>
<l>kanya āhaṃ paradārāś ca na tava asmi iha saṃpratam /</l>
<l>pitrā samudradattāya datta āhaṃ vaṇije yataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.20' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>dinaiḥ katipayair eva vivāho bhavitā ca me /</l>
<l>tad gaccha tūṣṇīṃ mā kaścit paśyed doṣo bhavet tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.20'>
<lg>
<l>dinaiḥ katipayair eva vivāho bhavitā ca me /</l>
<l>tad gaccha tūṣṇīṃ mā kaścit paśyed doṣo bhavet tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.21' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>ity uktaḥ sa tayāty arthaṃ dharmadatto jagāda tām /</l>
<l>yad astu me na jīveyaṃ vinā hi bhavatīm aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.21'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktaḥ sa taya āty arthaṃ dharmadatto jagāda tām /</l>
<l>yad astu me na jīveyaṃ vinā hi bhavatīm aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.22' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tac chrutvā sā vāṇikkanyā balātkārabhayākulā /</l>
<l>tam uvāca vivāho me tāvat saṃpadyatām iha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.22'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sā vāṇik-kanyā balāt-kāra-bhaya-ākulā /</l>
<l>tam uvāca vivāho me tāvat saṃpadyatām iha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.23' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>kanyādānaphalaṃ tātaḥ prāpnotu cirakāṅkṣitam /</l>
<l>tato 'haṃ tvām upaiṣyāmi niḥcitaṃ praṇayārjitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.23'>
<lg>
<l>kanyā-dāna-phalaṃ tātaḥ prāpnotu cira-kāṅkṣitam /</l>
<l>tato 'haṃ tvām upaiṣyāmi niḥ-citaṃ praṇaya-arjitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.24' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>śrutvaitat so 'bravīn neṣṭā hy anyapūrvā mama priyā /</l>
<l>parabhukte hi kamale kim aler jāyate ratiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.24'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitat so 'bravīn na iṣṭā hy anya-pūrvā mama priyā /</l>
<l>para-bhukte hi kamale kim aler jāyate ratiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.25' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>ity uktā tena sāvādīt kṛtodvāhaiva tarhy aham /</l>
<l>pūrvaṃ tvām upayāsyāmi tato 'bhyeṣyāmi taṃ patim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.25'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktā tena sa āvādīt kṛta-udvāha aiva tarhy aham /</l>
<l>pūrvaṃ tvām upayāsyāmi tato 'bhyeṣyāmi taṃ patim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.26' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ tasmin nojjhati pratyayaṃ vinā /</l>
<l>vaṇikputre saśapathaṃ satyavācaṃ babandha sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.26'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ tasmin na ujjhati pratyayaṃ vinā /</l>
<l>vaṇik-putre sa-śapathaṃ satya-vācaṃ babandha sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.27' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tatas tenojjhatā vignā sā viveśa svamandiram /</l>
<l>prāpte ca lagnadivase niḥvṛttodvāhamaṅgalā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.27'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tena ujjhatā vignā sā viveśa sva-mandiram /</l>
<l>prāpte ca lagna-divase niḥ-vṛtta-udvāha-maṅgalā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.28' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>gatvā patigṛhaṃ nītvā sotsavena ca taddinam /</l>
<l>sā patyā samam adhyāsta śayanīyagṛhaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.28'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā pati-gṛhaṃ nītvā sotsavena ca tad-dinam /</l>
<l>sā patyā samam adhyāsta śayanīya-gṛhaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.29' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tatra śayyāniṣaṇṇāpi na tasya pratyapadyata /</l>
<l>patyuḥ samudradattasya pariṣvaṅgam asaṃmukhī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.29'>
<lg>
<l>tatra śayyā-niṣaṇṇa āpi na tasya pratyapadyata /</l>
<l>patyuḥ samudradattasya pariṣvaṅgam asaṃmukhī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.30' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tenānunīyamānāpi yad udaśrur babhūva sā /</l>
<l>tat sa nābhimato 'smy asyā nūnam ity akarod dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.30'>
<lg>
<l>tena anunīyamāna āpi yad udaśrur babhūva sā /</l>
<l>tat sa na abhimato 'smy asyā nūnam ity akarod dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.31' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>jagāda cānabhimato yady ahaṃ tava sundari /</l>
<l>tan me nārthas tvayā gaccha yaḥ priyas tava taṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.31'>
<lg>
<l>jagāda ca anabhimato yady ahaṃ tava sundari /</l>
<l>tan me na arthas tvayā gaccha yaḥ priyas tava taṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.32' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tac chrutvā sā natamukhī śanair evam uvāca tam /</l>
<l>tvaṃ me prāṇādhikaḥ preyān vijñaptiṃ kiṃ tu me śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.32'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sā nata-mukhī śanair evam uvāca tam /</l>
<l>tvaṃ me prāṇa-adhikaḥ preyān vijñaptiṃ kiṃ tu me śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.33' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>anutiṣṭha saharṣaṃ ca prayaccha ca mamābhayam /</l>
<l>kuruṣva śapathaṃ yāvad āryaputra vadāmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.33'>
<lg>
<l>anutiṣṭha saharṣaṃ ca prayaccha ca mama abhayam /</l>
<l>kuruṣva śapathaṃ yāvad ārya-putra vadāmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.34' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>evam uktavatī kṛcchrāt tathā tena kṛte punaḥ /</l>
<l>salajjaṃ saviṣādaṃ ca sabhayaṃ ca jagāda sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.34'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatī kṛcchrāt tathā tena kṛte punaḥ /</l>
<l>sa-lajjaṃ sa-viṣādaṃ ca sabhayaṃ ca jagāda sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.35' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>ekākinīṃ gṛhodyāne dṛṣṭvā mām ekadā yuvā /</l>
<l>aruṇad dharmadattākhyaḥ sakhā bhrātuḥ smarāturaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.35'>
<lg>
<l>ekākinīṃ gṛha-udyāne dṛṣṭvā mām ekadā yuvā /</l>
<l>aruṇad dharmadatta-ākhyaḥ sakhā bhrātuḥ smara-āturaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.36' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>rakṣantyā saparīvādaṃ kanyādānaphalaṃ pituḥ /</l>
<l>mayā haṭhapravṛttasya tasya vāksaṃyamaḥ kṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.36'>
<lg>
<l>rakṣantyā sa-parīvādaṃ kanyā-dāna-phalaṃ pituḥ /</l>
<l>mayā haṭha-pravṛttasya tasya vāk-saṃyamaḥ kṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.37' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>pūrvaṃ kṛtavivāhā tvām upaiṣyāmi tataḥ priyam /</l>
<l>tan me satyavacaḥ pālyam anumanyasva tat prabho //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.37'>
<lg>
<l>pūrvaṃ kṛta-vivāhā tvām upaiṣyāmi tataḥ priyam /</l>
<l>tan me satya-vacaḥ pālyam anumanyasva tat prabho //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.38' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>yāvat tan nikaṭaṃ gatvā kṣaṇenopaimi te 'ntikam /</l>
<l>na hi śaknomy atikrāntuṃ satyam ābālya sevitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.38'>
<lg>
<l>yāvat tan nikaṭaṃ gatvā kṣaṇena upaimi te 'ntikam /</l>
<l>na hi śaknomy atikrāntuṃ satyam ā-bālya sevitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.39' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>iti tasyā vacaḥvajrapātena sahasā hataḥ /</l>
<l>samudradattaḥ satyena baddhaḥ kṣaṇam acintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.39'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasyā vacaḥ-vajra-pātena sahasā hataḥ /</l>
<l>samudradattaḥ satyena baddhaḥ kṣaṇam acintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.40' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>aho dhig anyarakteyaṃ gantavyaṃ dhruvam etayā /</l>
<l>tatsatyaṃ hanmi kiṃ yātu ko 'syāḥ pariṇayagrahaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.40'>
<lg>
<l>aho dhig anya-rakta īyaṃ gantavyaṃ dhruvam etayā /</l>
<l>tat-satyaṃ hanmi kiṃ yātu ko 'syāḥ pariṇaya-grahaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.41' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>ity ālocyānumene tāṃ yatheṣṭagamanāya saḥ /</l>
<l>sāpy utthāya tatas tasmān niryayau pativeśmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.41'>
<lg>
<l>ity ālocya anumene tāṃ yathā-iṣṭa-gamanāya saḥ /</l>
<l>sa āpy utthāya tatas tasmān niryayau pati-veśmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.42' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tāvad atrodayādrīndraharmyāgraṃ himadīdhitiḥ /</l>
<l>āruroha karākrāntahasatpūrvadigaṅganaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.42'>
<lg>
<l>tāvad atra udaya-adri-indra-harmya-agraṃ hima-dīdhitiḥ /</l>
<l>āruroha kara-ākrānta-hasat-pūrva-dig-aṅganaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.43' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tatas tamaḥsv apy āśliṣya sthiteṣv adridarī priyāḥ /</l>
<l>sevamāneṣu bhṛṅgeṣv apy aparaṃ kumudākaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.43'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tamaḥsv apy āśliṣya sthiteṣv adridarī priyāḥ /</l>
<l>sevamāneṣu bhṛṅgeṣv apy aparaṃ kumuda-ākaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.44' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>yāntī madanasenā sā mārge dṛṣṭvaikakā niśi /</l>
<l>caureṇādhāvya kenāpi rurudhe vasanāñcale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.44'>
<lg>
<l>yāntī madanasenā sā mārge dṛṣṭva aikakā niśi /</l>
<l>caureṇā adhāvya kena api rurudhe vasana-añcale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.45' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>kā tvaṃ brūhi kva yāsīti tenoktā bibhyatī ca sā /</l>
<l>uvāca kiṃ tavānena muñca kāryam ihāsti me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.45'>
<lg>
<l>kā tvaṃ brūhi kva yāsi iti tena uktā bibhyatī ca sā /</l>
<l>uvāca kiṃ tava anena muñca kāryam iha asti me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.46' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tataś cauro 'bravīn mattaś caurāt tvaṃ mucyase katham /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā sāvadat taṃ ca gṛhāṇābharaṇāni me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.46'>
<lg>
<l>tataś cauro 'bravīn mattaś caurāt tvaṃ mucyase katham /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā sa āvadat taṃ ca gṛhāṇā abharaṇāni me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.47' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>atha cauro 'bhyadhān mugdhe kim ebhir upalair mama /</l>
<l>candrakāntānanāṃ tārkṣyaratnāsitaśiraḥruhām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.47'>
<lg>
<l>atha cauro 'bhyadhān mugdhe kim ebhir upalair mama /</l>
<l>candra-kānta-ānanāṃ tārkṣya-ratna-asita-śiraḥ-ruhām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.48' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>vajramadhyāṃ suvarṇāṅgīṃ padmarāgāṅghrihāriṇīm /</l>
<l>jagadābharaṇaṃ naiva mokṣyāmi bhavatīm aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.48'>
<lg>
<l>vajra-madhyāṃ su-varṇa-aṅgīṃ padma-rāga-aṅghri-hāriṇīm /</l>
<l>jagad-ābharaṇaṃ na eva mokṣyāmi bhavatīm aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.49' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>ity uktā tena caureṇa vivaśā sā vaṇiksutā /</l>
<l>ākhyāya nijavṛttāntam evaṃ prārthayate sma tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.49'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktā tena caureṇa vivaśā sā vaṇik-sutā /</l>
<l>ākhyāya nija-vṛttāntam evaṃ prārthayate sma tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.50' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>kṣamasva me kṣaṇaṃ yāvat kṛtvā satyānupālanam /</l>
<l>ihasthasyaiva te pārśvam āgamiṣyāmi satvaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.50'>
<lg>
<l>kṣamasva me kṣaṇaṃ yāvat kṛtvā satya-anupālanam /</l>
<l>iha-sthasya eva te pārśvam āgamiṣyāmi satvaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.51' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>nāham ullaṅghayiṣyāmi bhadra satyām imāṃ giram /</l>
<l>śrutvaitat satyasaṃdhāṃ tāṃ matvā cauro mumoca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.51'>
<lg>
<l>na aham ullaṅghayiṣyāmi bhadra satyām imāṃ giram /</l>
<l>śrutva aitat satya-saṃdhāṃ tāṃ matvā cauro mumoca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.52' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tasthau pratīkṣamānaś ca tatraiva sa tadāgamam /</l>
<l>sāpi tasyāntikaṃ dharmadattasya vaṇijo yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.52'>
<lg>
<l>tasthau pratīkṣamānaś ca tatra eva sa tad-āgamam /</l>
<l>sa āpi tasya antikaṃ dharmadattasya vaṇijo yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.53' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>sa cābhīṣṭām api prāptāṃ tathā tāṃ vijane sthitām /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā yathāvṛttaṃ vicintya kṣaṇam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.53'>
<lg>
<l>sa ca abhīṣṭām api prāptāṃ tathā tāṃ vijane sthitām /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭvā yathā-vṛttaṃ vicintya kṣaṇam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.54' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>satyena tava tuṣṭo 'smi kiṃ tvayā me parastriyā /</l>
<l>yāvat tvāṃ nekṣate kaścit tāvad gaccha yathāgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.54'>
<lg>
<l>satyena tava tuṣṭo 'smi kiṃ tvayā me parastriyā /</l>
<l>yāvat tvāṃ nā ikṣate kaś-cit tāvad gaccha yathā-āgatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.55' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>iti tena parityaktā sā tathety āyayau tataḥ /</l>
<l>caurasya nikaṭaṃ tasya pratipālayataḥ pathi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.55'>
<lg>
<l>iti tena parityaktā sā tatha īty āyayau tataḥ /</l>
<l>caurasya nikaṭaṃ tasya pratipālayataḥ pathi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.56' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>brūhi kas te 'tra vṛttānto gatāyā iti pṛcchate /</l>
<l>tasmai sā tena vaṇijā yathā muktā tathābravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.56'>
<lg>
<l>brūhi kas te 'tra vṛttānto gatāyā iti pṛcchate /</l>
<l>tasmai sā tena vaṇijā yathā muktā tatha ābravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.57' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tataḥ sa cauro 'vādīt tāṃ yady evaṃ tan mayāpy asi /</l>
<l>vimuktā satyatuṣṭena gṛhaṃ sābharaṇā vraja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.57'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa cauro 'vādīt tāṃ yady evaṃ tan maya āpy asi /</l>
<l>vimuktā satya-tuṣṭena gṛhaṃ sābharaṇā vraja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.58' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>evaṃ tenāpi sā tyaktā rakṣitā cānuyāyinā /</l>
<l>aluptaśīlā muditā patyur evāyayau gṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.58'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ tena api sā tyaktā rakṣitā ca anuyāyinā /</l>
<l>a-lupta-śīlā muditā patyur evā ayayau gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.59' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tatra guptaṃ praviṣṭā sā prahṛṣṭopāgatā satī /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavate tasmai patye sarvam avarṇayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.59'>
<lg>
<l>tatra guptaṃ praviṣṭā sā prahṛṣṭa ūpāgatā satī /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā pṛṣṭavate tasmai patye sarvam avarṇayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.60' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>so 'py aluptamukhachāyāṃ tām asaṃbhogalakṣaṇām /</l>
<l>saṃbhāvyābhagnacāritrāṃ satyalābharatāṃ satīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.60'>
<lg>
<l>so 'py a-lupta-mukha-chāyāṃ tām asaṃbhoga-lakṣaṇām /</l>
<l>saṃbhāvya abhagna-cāritrāṃ satya-lābha-ratāṃ satīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.61' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>adṛṣṭamanasaṃ bhāryām abhinandya kulocitam /</l>
<l>tasthau samudradatto 'tha tayā saha yathāsukham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.61'>
<lg>
<l>a-dṛṣṭa-manasaṃ bhāryām abhinandya kula-ucitam /</l>
<l>tasthau samudradatto 'tha tayā saha yathā-sukham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.62' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>iti tatra kathām uktvā pitṛvanabhūmau tadā sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>vadati sma taṃ trivikramasenaṃ vasudhādhipaṃ bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.62'>
<lg>
<l>iti tatra kathām uktvā pitṛ-vana-bhūmau tadā sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>vadati sma taṃ trivikramasenaṃ vasu-dhā-adhipaṃ bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.63' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tad brūhi cauravaṇijām eṣāṃ madhyān narendra kas tyāgī /</l>
<l>jānan yadi na vadiṣyasi vidaliṣyati te śiraḥ śatadhā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.63'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūhi caura-vaṇijām eṣāṃ madhyān nara-indra kas tyāgī /</l>
<l>jānan yadi na vadiṣyasi vidaliṣyati te śiraḥ śatadhā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.64' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa mahīpatir ujjhitamaunas tam āha vetālam /</l>
<l>eṣāṃ cauras tyāgī na punar vaṇijāv ubhāv api tau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.64'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa mahī-patir ujjhita-maunas tam āha vetālam /</l>
<l>eṣāṃ cauras tyāgī na punar vaṇijāv ubhāv api tau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.65' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>yo hi patis tām ajahād atyājyāṃ tādṛśīṃ vivāhy api /</l>
<l>kulajaḥ so 'nyāsaktāṃ bhāryāṃ jānan kathaṃ vahatu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.65'>
<lg>
<l>yo hi patis tām ajahād atyājyāṃ tādṛśīṃ vivāhy api /</l>
<l>kulajaḥ so 'nya-āsaktāṃ bhāryāṃ jānan kathaṃ vahatu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.66' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>yo 'py aparaḥ sa bhayāt tām atyākṣīt kālajīrṇasaṃvegaḥ /</l>
<l>viditārtho bhartāsyāḥ prātar brūyān nṛpāyeti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.66'>
<lg>
<l>yo 'py aparaḥ sa bhayāt tām atyākṣīt kāla-jīrṇa-saṃvegaḥ /</l>
<l>vidita-artho bharta āsyāḥ prātar brūyān nṛ-pāya iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.67' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>cauras tu guptacārī nirapekṣaḥ pāpakarmakṛt prāptam /</l>
<l>strīratnaṃ yad amuñcat sābharaṇaṃ tena sa tyāgī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.67'>
<lg>
<l>cauras tu gupta-cārī nirapekṣaḥ pāpa-karma-kṛt prāptam /</l>
<l>strī-ratnaṃ yad amuñcat sābharaṇaṃ tena sa tyāgī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.17.68' corresp='Vet_10'>
<l>etac chrutvaivāṃsatas tasya rājño vetālo 'gāt pūrvavat svaṃ padaṃ saḥ /</l>
<l>rājā bhūyo 'py atra saṃprāptum etat prāyād evā-khanḍitoddāmadhairyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.17.68'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutva aiva aṃsatas tasya rājño vetālo 'gāt pūrvavat svaṃ padaṃ saḥ /</l>
<l>rājā bhūyo 'py atra saṃprāptum etat prāyād eva a-khanḍita-uddāma-dhairyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.1' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapāto 'grahīn nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'ṃse vetālaṃ taṃ cacāla ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapāto 'grahīn nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'ṃse vetālaṃ taṃ cacāla ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.2' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>āyāntaṃ ca tam aṃsastho vetālaḥ so 'bravīn nṛpam /</l>
<l>rājan vicitrām ekāṃ te varṇayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.2'>
<lg>
<l>āyāntaṃ ca tam aṃsa-stho vetālaḥ so 'bravīn nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>rājan vicitrām ekāṃ te varṇayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.3' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>ujjayinyām abhūt pūrvaṃ nāmnā dharmadhvajo nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>tisras tasyābhavan bhāryā rājaputryo 'tivallabhāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.3'>
<lg>
<l>ujjayinyām abhūt pūrvaṃ nāmnā dharmadhvajo nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>tisras tasyā abhavan bhāryā rāja-putryo 'tivallabhāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.4' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>ekā tāsv indulekheti tārāvaly aparā tathā /</l>
<l>nāmnā mṛgāṅkavaty anyā niḥsāmānyavapuḥguṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.4'>
<lg>
<l>ekā tāsv indulekha īti tārāvaly aparā tathā /</l>
<l>nāmnā mṛgāṅkavaty anyā niḥ-sāmānya-vapuḥ-guṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.5' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tābhiḥ sa viharan rājā rājñībhis tisṛbhiḥ saha /</l>
<l>āsāṃcakre kṛtī tatra jitāśeṣaripuḥ sukham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.5'>
<lg>
<l>tābhiḥ sa viharan rājā rājñībhis tisṛbhiḥ saha /</l>
<l>āsāṃcakre kṛtī tatra jita-aśeṣa-ripuḥ sukham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.6' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>ekadā tatra saṃprāpte vasantasamayotsave /</l>
<l>priyābhiḥ sahitas tābhir udyānaṃ krīḍituṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.6'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā tatra saṃprāpte vasanta-samaya-utsave /</l>
<l>priyābhiḥ sahitas tābhir udyānaṃ krīḍituṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.7' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tatrālimālāmaurvīkāḥ paśyan puṣpānatā latāḥ /</l>
<l>cāpayaṣṭīr anaṅgasya madhunā sajjitā iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.7'>
<lg>
<l>tatra ali-mālā-maurvīkāḥ paśyan puṣpa-ānatā latāḥ /</l>
<l>cāpa-yaṣṭīr anaṅgasya madhunā sajjitā iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.8' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>śṛṇvaṃś ca taddrumāgrasthakokilodīritāṃ giram /</l>
<l>sambhogaikarasasyājñām iva mānasajanmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.8'>
<lg>
<l>śṛṇvaṃś ca tad-druma-agra-stha-kokila-udīritāṃ giram /</l>
<l>sam-bhoga-eka-rasasyā ajñām iva mānasa-janmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.9' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>siṣeve 'ntaḥpuraiḥ sākaṃ sa rājā vāsavopamaḥ /</l>
<l>pānaṃ madasya kaṃdarpajīvitasyāpi jīvitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.9'>
<lg>
<l>siṣeve 'ntaḥ-puraiḥ sākaṃ sa rājā vāsava-upamaḥ /</l>
<l>pānaṃ madasya kaṃdarpa-jīvitasya api jīvitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.10' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tanniḥśvāsasugandhīni tadbimbauṣṭharucīni ca /</l>
<l>priyāpītāvaśeṣāṇi piban reme madhūni saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.10'>
<lg>
<l>tan-niḥ-śvāsa-su-gandhīni tad-bimba-oṣṭha-rucīni ca /</l>
<l>priyā-pīta-avaśeṣāṇi piban reme madhūni saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.11' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tatra tasyendulekhāyā rājñaḥ kelikacagrahāt /</l>
<l>tasyāḥ papāta karṇāgrād utsaṅge tvaṅgad utpalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.11'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tasya indulekhāyā rājñaḥ keli-kaca-grahāt /</l>
<l>tasyāḥ papāta karṇa-agrād utsaṅge tvaṅgad utpalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.12' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tenorupṛṣṭhe sahasā kṣate jāte 'bhighātaje /</l>
<l>abhijātā mahādevī hā hety uktvā mumūrccha sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.12'>
<lg>
<l>tenā uru-pṛṣṭhe sahasā kṣate jāte 'bhighāta-je /</l>
<l>abhijātā mahā-devī hā ha īty uktvā mumūrccha sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.13' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā vihvalenārtyā rājñā parijanena ca /</l>
<l>samāśvāsyata rājñī sā śanaiḥ śītāmbumārutaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.13'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā vihvalenā artyā rājñā parijanena ca /</l>
<l>samāśvāsyata rājñī sā śanaiḥ śīta-ambu-mārutaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.14' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tato nītvā sa rājā tāṃ rājadhānīṃ bhiṣakkṛtaiḥ /</l>
<l>priyām upācarad divyair āmuktavraṇapaṭṭikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.14'>
<lg>
<l>tato nītvā sa rājā tāṃ rāja-dhānīṃ bhiṣak-kṛtaiḥ /</l>
<l>priyām upācarad divyair āmukta-vraṇa-paṭṭikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.15' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>rātrau ca susthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sa rājā dvitīyayā /</l>
<l>tārāvalyā sahārohac candraprāsādam īśvaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.15'>
<lg>
<l>rātrau ca susthitāṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ sa rājā dvitīyayā /</l>
<l>tārāvalyā sahā arohac candra-prāsādam īśvaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.16' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tatra tasyāṅkasuptāyā rājñas tasyā himatviṣaḥ /</l>
<l>karā jālapathaiḥ petur aṅge calitavāsasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.16'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tasya aṅka-suptāyā rājñas tasyā hima-tviṣaḥ /</l>
<l>karā jāla-pathaiḥ petur aṅge calita-vāsasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.17' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tataḥ kṣaṇāt prabuddhā sā hā dagdhāsmīti vādinī /</l>
<l>śayanāt sahasottasthau tadaṅgaparimarśinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.17'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kṣaṇāt prabuddhā sā hā dagdhā-asmi iti vādinī /</l>
<l>śayanāt sahasa ūttasthau tad-aṅga-parimarśinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.18' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>kim etad iti saṃbhrāntaḥ prabuddho 'tha dadarśa saḥ /</l>
<l>utthāya rājā visphoṭān aṅge tasyā vinirgatān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.18'>
<lg>
<l>kim etad iti saṃbhrāntaḥ prabuddho 'tha dadarśa saḥ /</l>
<l>utthāya rājā visphoṭān aṅge tasyā vinirgatān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.19' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>pṛcchantaṃ sā ca taṃ prāha rājñī tārāvalī tadā /</l>
<l>nagnāṅge patitair indoḥ karair etat kṛtaṃ mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.19'>
<lg>
<l>pṛcchantaṃ sā ca taṃ prāha rājñī tārāvalī tadā /</l>
<l>nagna-aṅge patitair indoḥ karair etat kṛtaṃ mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.20' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>ity uktavatyāḥ krandantyāḥ sārtir āhvayati sma saḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāḥ parijanaṃ rājā vihvalākuladhāvitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.20'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavatyāḥ krandantyāḥ sa-ārtir āhvayati sma saḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāḥ parijanaṃ rājā vihvala-ākula-dhāvitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.21' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tenāsyāḥ kārayāmāsa sajalair nalinīdalaiḥ /</l>
<l>śayyām adāpayac cāṅge śrīkhaṇḍārdravilepanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.21'>
<lg>
<l>tena asyāḥ kārayāmāsa sa-jalair nalinī-dalaiḥ /</l>
<l>śayyām adāpayac ca aṅge śrī-khaṇḍa-ārdra-vilepanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.22' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tāvad buddhvā tṛtīyāsya sā mṛgāṅkavatī priyā /</l>
<l>tatpārśvam āgantumanā niryayau nijamandirāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.22'>
<lg>
<l>tāvad buddhvā tṛtīya āsya sā mṛgāṅkavatī priyā /</l>
<l>tat-pārśvam āgantu-manā niryayau nija-mandirāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.23' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>nirgatā sāśṛṇot kvāpi gṛhe dhānyāvaghātajam /</l>
<l>niḥśabdāyāṃ niśi vyaktaṃ vidūre musaladhvanim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.23'>
<lg>
<l>nirgatā sā āśṛṇot kva api gṛhe dhānya-avaghātajam /</l>
<l>niḥ-śabdāyāṃ niśi vyaktaṃ vidūre musala-dhvanim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.24' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>śrutvaiva hā mṛtāsmīti bruvāṇā dhunvatī karau /</l>
<l>upāviśad vyathākrāntā mārge sā mṛgalocanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.24'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aiva hā mṛtā-asmi iti bruvāṇā dhunvatī karau /</l>
<l>upāviśad vyathā-ākrāntā mārge sā mṛga-locanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.25' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tataḥ pratinivṛtyaiva nītvā parijanena sā /</l>
<l>svam evāntaḥpuraṃ bālā rudatī śayane 'patat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.25'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ pratinivṛtya eva nītvā parijanena sā /</l>
<l>svam eva antaḥ-puraṃ bālā rudatī śayane 'patat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.26' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>dadarśa tatra tasyāś ca cinvan sāśruḥ paricchadaḥ /</l>
<l>ālīnabhramarau padmāv iva hastau kiṇāṅkitau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.26'>
<lg>
<l>dadarśa tatra tasyāś ca cinvan sa-aśruḥ paricchadaḥ /</l>
<l>ālīna-bhramarau padmāv iva hastau kiṇa-aṅkitau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.27' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>gatvā ca so 'bravīd rājñe rājāpy āgatya vihvalaḥ /</l>
<l>kim etad iti papraccha so 'tha dharmadhvajaḥ priyām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.27'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā ca so 'bravīd rājñe rāja āpy āgatya vihvalaḥ /</l>
<l>kim etad iti papraccha so 'tha dharmadhvajaḥ priyām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.28' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>sāpi pradarśya hastau tam ity uvāca rujānvitā /</l>
<l>śrute musalaśabde me jatāv etau kiṇāṅkitau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.28'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi pradarśya hastau tam ity uvāca rujā-anvitā /</l>
<l>śrute musala-śabde me jatāv etau kiṇa-aṅkitau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.29' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tataḥ sa dāhaśamanaṃ dāpayāmāsa hastayoḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāś candanalepādi rājādbhutaviṣādavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.29'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa dāha-śamanaṃ dāpayāmāsa hastayoḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāś candana-lepa-ādi rāja ādbhuta-viṣādavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.30' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>ekasyā utpalenāpi patatā kṣatam āhitam /</l>
<l>dvitīyasyāḥ punar dagdham aṅgaṃ śaśikarair api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.30'>
<lg>
<l>ekasyā utpalena api patatā kṣatam āhitam /</l>
<l>dvitīyasyāḥ punar dagdham aṅgaṃ śaśi-karair api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.31' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>ekasyās tu tṛtīyasyāḥ śrutenāpi vinirgatāḥ /</l>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ musalaśabdena hastayor īdṛśāḥ kiṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.31'>
<lg>
<l>ekasyās tu tṛtīyasyāḥ śrutena api vinirgatāḥ /</l>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ musala-śabdena hastayor īdṛśāḥ kiṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.32' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>aho yugapad etāsāṃ preyasīnāṃ mamādhunā /</l>
<l>guṇo 'py atyabhijātatvaṃ jāto doṣāya daivataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.32'>
<lg>
<l>aho yugapad etāsāṃ preyasīnāṃ mama adhunā /</l>
<l>guṇo 'py atyabhijātatvaṃ jāto doṣāya daivataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.33' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>iti cintayatas tasya bhramato 'ntaḥpureṣu ca /</l>
<l>triyāmā śatayāmeva kṛcchrāt sā nṛpater yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.33'>
<lg>
<l>iti cintayatas tasya bhramato 'ntaḥ-pureṣu ca /</l>
<l>tri-yāmā śata-yāma iva kṛcchrāt sā nṛ-pater yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.34' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>prātaś ca sa bhiṣakśalyahartṛbhiḥ saha saṃvyadhāt /</l>
<l>tathā yathābhūd acirāt svasthāntaḥpuranirvṛttaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.34'>
<lg>
<l>prātaś ca sa bhiṣak-śalya-hartṛbhiḥ saha saṃvyadhāt /</l>
<l>tathā yatha ābhūd acirāt sva-stha-antaḥ-pura-nirvṛttaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.35' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>evam etāṃ kathām uktvā vetālo 'tyadbhutāṃ tadā /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ papracchāṃsasthito nṛpam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.35'>
<lg>
<l>evam etāṃ kathām uktvā vetālo 'tyadbhutāṃ tadā /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ papraccha aṃsa-sthito nṛ-pam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.36' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>abhijātataraitāsu rājan rājñīṣu kā vada /</l>
<l>pūrvoktaḥ so 'stu śāpas te jānan yadi na jalpasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.36'>
<lg>
<l>abhijātatara aitāsu rājan rājñīṣu kā vada /</l>
<l>pūrva-uktaḥ so 'stu śāpas te jānan yadi na jalpasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.37' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīd rājā sukumāratarātra sā /</l>
<l>aspṛṣṭe musale yasyāḥ śabdenaivodgatāḥ kiṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.37'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīd rājā su-kumāratara ātra sā /</l>
<l>aspṛṣṭe musale yasyāḥ śabdena eva udgatāḥ kiṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.38' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>utpalendukaraiḥ sparśe vṛtte tv itarayor dvayoḥ /</l>
<l>saṃjātā vraṇavisphoṭās tena tasyā na te same //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.38'>
<lg>
<l>utpala-indu-karaiḥ sparśe vṛtte tv itarayor dvayoḥ /</l>
<l>saṃjātā vraṇa-visphoṭās tena tasyā na te same //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.18.39' corresp='Vet_11'>
<l>iti tasyoktavato 'ṃsād rājño bhūyo jagāma sa svapadam /</l>
<l>vetālaḥ sa ca rājā tathaiva taṃ sudṛḍhaniścayo 'nuyayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.18.39'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasya uktavato 'ṃsād rājño bhūyo jagāma sa sva-padam /</l>
<l>vetālaḥ sa ca rājā tatha aiva taṃ su-dṛḍha-niścayo 'nuyayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.1' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha punas taṃ śiṃśapātarum /</l>
<l>gatvā prāpya ca vetālaṃ rājā skandhe cakāra tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.1'>
<lg>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha punas taṃ śiṃśapā-tarum /</l>
<l>gatvā prāpya ca vetālaṃ rājā skandhe cakāra tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.2' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>pratasthe ca tam ādāya tūṣṇīm eva sa pūrvavat /</l>
<l>tato bhūyas tam āha sma vetālaḥ so 'ṃsapṛṣṭhataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.2'>
<lg>
<l>pratasthe ca tam ādāya tūṣṇīm eva sa pūrvavat /</l>
<l>tato bhūyas tam āha sma vetālaḥ so 'ṃsa-pṛṣṭhataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.3' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>rājann evam anudvignaḥ paryāptam asi me priyaḥ /</l>
<l>tad etāṃ śṛṇv akhedāya hṛdyām ākhyāmi te kathām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.3'>
<lg>
<l>rājann evam anudvignaḥ paryāptam asi me priyaḥ /</l>
<l>tad etāṃ śṛṇv akhedāya hṛdyām ākhyāmi te kathām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.4' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>aṅgadeśe yaśaḥketur iti rājābhavat purā /</l>
<l>kṣmām āśrito 'ṅgaguptyartham adagdho 'nya iva smaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.4'>
<lg>
<l>aṅga-deśe yaśaḥketur iti rāja ābhavat purā /</l>
<l>kṣmām āśrito 'ṅga-gupty-artham a-dagdho 'nya iva smaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.5' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>bāhuvīryajitāśeṣavairivargasya tasya ca /</l>
<l>dīrghadarśīty abhūn mantrī śakrasyeva bṛhaspatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.5'>
<lg>
<l>bāhu-vīrya-jita-aśeṣa-vairi-vargasya tasya ca /</l>
<l>dīrghadarśi īty abhūn mantrī śakrasya iva bṛhaspatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.6' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tasmin mantriṇi vinyasya rājyaṃ sa hatakaṇṭakam /</l>
<l>śanaiḥ sukhaikasakto 'bhūd vayaḥrūpamadān nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.6'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin mantriṇi vinyasya rājyaṃ sa hata-kaṇṭakam /</l>
<l>śanaiḥ sukha-eka-sakto 'bhūd vayaḥ-rūpa-madān nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.7' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tasthāv antaḥpure śaśvan nāsthāne pramadāspade /</l>
<l>śuśrāva raktimad gītaṃ vacanaṃ na hitaiṣiṇām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.7'>
<lg>
<l>tasthāv antaḥ-pure śaśvan nā asthāne pramadā-āspade /</l>
<l>śuśrāva raktimad gītaṃ vacanaṃ na hita-eṣiṇām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.8' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>rajyati sma ca niḥcinto jālavātāyaneṣu saḥ /</l>
<l>na punā rājakāryeṣu bahuchidreṣu jātv api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.8'>
<lg>
<l>rajyati sma ca niḥ-cinto jāla-vāta-ayaneṣu saḥ /</l>
<l>na punā rāja-kāryeṣu bahu-chidreṣu jātv api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.9' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>dīrghadarśī tu tad rājyacintābhāraṃ samudvahan /</l>
<l>atiṣṭhat sa mahāmantrī divāniśam atandritaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.9'>
<lg>
<l>dīrghadarśī tu tad rājya-cintā-bhāraṃ samudvahan /</l>
<l>atiṣṭhat sa mahā-mantrī divā-niśam atandritaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.10' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>nāmamātre kṛtadhṛtiṃ prakṣipya vyasane nṛpam /</l>
<l>mantrī rājñaḥ śriyaṃ bhuṇkte dīrghadarśīha sāmpratam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.10'>
<lg>
<l>nāma-mātre kṛta-dhṛtiṃ prakṣipya vyasane nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>mantrī rājñaḥ śriyaṃ bhuṇkte dīrghadarśi īha sāmpratam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.11' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity utpanne mahaty atra janavāde 'tha gehinīm /</l>
<l>svairaṃ medhāvinīṃ nāma dīrghadarśī jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.11'>
<lg>
<l>ity utpanne mahaty atra jana-vāde 'tha gehinīm /</l>
<l>svairaṃ medhāvinīṃ nāma dīrghadarśī jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.12' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>priye rājñi sukhāsakte tadbhāraṃ vahato 'pi me /</l>
<l>rājyaṃ bhakṣitam etenety utpannam ayaśo jane //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.12'>
<lg>
<l>priye rājñi sukha-āsakte tad-bhāraṃ vahato 'pi me /</l>
<l>rājyaṃ bhakṣitam etena ity utpannam a-yaśo jane //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.13' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>lokavādaś ca mithyāpi mahatām iha doṣakṛt /</l>
<l>tatyāja kiṃ na rāmo 'pi janavādena jānakīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.13'>
<lg>
<l>loka-vādaś ca mithya āpi mahatām iha doṣa-kṛt /</l>
<l>tatyāja kiṃ na rāmo 'pi jana-vādena jānakīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.14' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad atra kiṃ mayā kāryam ity ukte tena mantriṇā /</l>
<l>bhāryā medhāvinī dhīrā sānvarthā tam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.14'>
<lg>
<l>tad atra kiṃ mayā kāryam ity ukte tena mantriṇā /</l>
<l>bhāryā medhāvinī dhīrā sa ānvarthā tam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.15' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tīrthayātrāpadeśena yuktyāpṛcchya mahīpatim /</l>
<l>kamcit kālaṃ videśaṃ te gantuṃ yuktaṃ mahāmate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.15'>
<lg>
<l>tīrtha-yātrā-apadeśena yuktyā āpṛcchya mahī-patim /</l>
<l>kam-cit kālaṃ videśaṃ te gantuṃ yuktaṃ mahā-mate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.16' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>evaṃ te niḥspṛhasyaiṣa janavādo nivartsyati /</l>
<l>tvayy asthite tato rājyam udvakṣyati nṛpaḥ svayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.16'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ te niḥ-spṛhasya eṣa jana-vādo nivartsyati /</l>
<l>tvayy a-sthite tato rājyam udvakṣyati nṛ-paḥ svayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.17' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tataś cāsya śanair etad vyasanaṃ hānimeṣyati /</l>
<l>āgatasyātra niḥgarhā bhavitrī mantritā ca te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.17'>
<lg>
<l>tataś ca asya śanair etad vyasanaṃ hānimeṣyati /</l>
<l>āgatasya atra niḥ-garhā bhavitrī mantritā ca te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.18' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity ukto bhāryayā gatvā dīrghadarśī tatheti saḥ /</l>
<l>kathāprasaṅge taṃ bhūpaṃ yaśaḥketuṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.18'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto bhāryayā gatvā dīrghadarśī tatha īti saḥ /</l>
<l>kathā-prasaṅge taṃ bhū-paṃ yaśaḥketuṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.19' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>anujānīhi māṃ rājan divasān kāncid apy aham /</l>
<l>vrajāmi tīrthayātrāyai dharmo hi prepsitaḥ sa me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.19'>
<lg>
<l>anujānīhi māṃ rājan divasān kān-cid apy aham /</l>
<l>vrajāmi tīrtha-yātrāyai dharmo hi prepsitaḥ sa me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.20' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīd rājā maivaṃ tīrthair vinā paraḥ /</l>
<l>dānādiḥ kiṃ na dharmo 'sti svargyas te svagṛheṣv api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.20'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīd rājā ma aivaṃ tīrthair vinā paraḥ /</l>
<l>dāna-ādiḥ kiṃ na dharmo 'sti svargyas te sva-gṛheṣv api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.21' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>athāvocat sa mantrī tam arthaśuddhyādi mṛgyate /</l>
<l>dānādau nityaśuddhāni tīrthāni nṛpate punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.21'>
<lg>
<l>atha avocat sa mantrī tam artha-śuddhy-ādi mṛgyate /</l>
<l>dāna-ādau nitya-śuddhāni tīrthāni nṛ-pate punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.22' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yāvac ca yauvanaṃ rājaṃs tāvad gamyāni dhīmatā /</l>
<l>aviśvāsye śarīre hi saṃgamas taiḥ kuto 'nyadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.22'>
<lg>
<l>yāvac ca yauvanaṃ rājaṃs tāvad gamyāni dhīmatā /</l>
<l>a-viśvāsye śarīre hi saṃgamas taiḥ kuto 'nyadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.23' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>iti tasmin vadaty eva rājñi caivaṃ niṣedhati /</l>
<l>praviśyātra pratīhāro rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.23'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasmin vadaty eva rājñi ca evaṃ niṣedhati /</l>
<l>praviśya atra pratīhāro rājānaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.24' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>deva vyomasaraḥmadhyam aṃśumālī vigāhate /</l>
<l>tad uttiṣṭhata saiṣā vaḥ snānavelātivartate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.24'>
<lg>
<l>deva vyoma-saraḥ-madhyam aṃśu-mālī vigāhate /</l>
<l>tad uttiṣṭhata sa aiṣā vaḥ snāna-vela ātivartate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.25' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>śrutvaitat sahasā snātum udatiṣṭhan mahīpatiḥ /</l>
<l>yātronmukhaḥ sa mantrī ca taṃ praṇamya gṛhaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.25'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitat sahasā snātum udatiṣṭhan mahī-patiḥ /</l>
<l>yātra ūnmukhaḥ sa mantrī ca taṃ praṇamya gṛhaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.26' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatrāvasthāpya bhāryāṃ tām anuyātrānivāritām /</l>
<l>sa pratasthe tato yuktyā svabhṛtyair apy atarkitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.26'>
<lg>
<l>tatra avasthāpya bhāryāṃ tām anuyātrā-nivāritām /</l>
<l>sa pratasthe tato yuktyā sva-bhṛtyair apy atarkitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.27' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ekākī ca bhramaṃs tāṃs tān deśāṃs tīrthāni ca vrajan /</l>
<l>sa prāpa puṇḍraviṣayaṃ dīrghadarśī suniḥcayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.27'>
<lg>
<l>ekākī ca bhramaṃs tāṃs tān deśāṃs tīrthāni ca vrajan /</l>
<l>sa prāpa puṇḍra-viṣayaṃ dīrghadarśī su-niḥ-cayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.28' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatra pattana ekasminn adūre 'bdheḥ praviśya saḥ /</l>
<l>ekaṃ devakulaṃ śaivaṃ tatprāṅgaṇa upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.28'>
<lg>
<l>tatra pattana ekasminn a-dūre 'b-dheḥ praviśya saḥ /</l>
<l>ekaṃ deva-kulaṃ śaivaṃ tat-prāṅgaṇa upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.29' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatrārkakarasaṃtāpaklāntaṃ dūrādhvadhūsaram /</l>
<l>dadarśa nidhidattākhyo vaṇig devārcanāgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.29'>
<lg>
<l>tatra arka-kara-saṃtāpa-klāntaṃ dūra-adhva-dhūsaram /</l>
<l>dadarśa nidhidatta-ākhyo vaṇig deva-arcana-āgataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.30' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sa taṃ tathāvidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sopavītaṃ sulakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>saṃbhāvya cottamaṃ vipram ātitheyo 'nayad gṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.30'>
<lg>
<l>sa taṃ tathā-vidhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sa-upavītaṃ su-lakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>saṃbhāvya ca uttamaṃ vipram ātitheyo 'nayad gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.31' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatra cāpūjayat snānabhojanādyais tam uttamaiḥ /</l>
<l>kaḥ kutas tvaṃ kva yāsīti viśrāntaṃ ca sa pṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.31'>
<lg>
<l>tatra ca apūjayat snāna-bhojana-ādyais tam uttamaiḥ /</l>
<l>kaḥ kutas tvaṃ kva yāsi iti viśrāntaṃ ca sa pṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.32' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>dīrghadarśīti vipro 'ham aṅgadeśād ihāgataḥ /</l>
<l>tīrthayātrārtham ity eva gāmbhīryāt so 'py uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.32'>
<lg>
<l>dīrghadarśi īti vipro 'ham aṅga-deśād ihā agataḥ /</l>
<l>tīrtha-yātrā-artham ity eva gāmbhīryāt so 'py uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.33' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tataḥ sa nidhidatto 'pi taṃ jagāda mahāvaṇik /</l>
<l>suvarṇadvīpagamanāyodyato 'haṃ vaṇijyayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.33'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa nidhidatto 'pi taṃ jagāda mahā-vaṇik /</l>
<l>su-varṇa-dvīpa-gamanāya udyato 'haṃ vaṇijyayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.34' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tat tvaṃ tiṣṭheha madgehe yāvad eṣyāmy ahaṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>tīrthayātrāpariśrānto viśrānto hy atha yāsyasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.34'>
<lg>
<l>tat tvaṃ tiṣṭha iha mad-gehe yāvad eṣyāmy ahaṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>tīrtha-yātrā-pariśrānto viśrānto hy atha yāsyasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.35' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīd dīrghadarśī tarhi mameha kim /</l>
<l>tvayaiva saha yāsyāmi sārthavāha yathāsukham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.35'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'bravīd dīrgha-darśī tarhi mama iha kim /</l>
<l>tvaya aiva saha yāsyāmi sārtha-vāha yathā-sukham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.36' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>evam astv iti tenokte sādhunā so 'tha tadgṛhe /</l>
<l>cirād avāptaśayano niśāṃ mantrī nināya tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.36'>
<lg>
<l>evam astv iti tena ukte sādhunā so 'tha tad-gṛhe /</l>
<l>cirād avāpta-śayano niśāṃ mantrī nināya tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.37' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>anyedyur atha tenaiva vaṇijā saha vāridhim /</l>
<l>gatvāruroha tadbhāṇḍapūrṇaṃ pravahaṇaṃ ca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.37'>
<lg>
<l>anye-dyur atha tena eva vaṇijā saha vāri-dhim /</l>
<l>gatvā āruroha tad-bhāṇḍa-pūrṇaṃ pravahaṇaṃ ca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.38' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tena gacchan pravahaṇenābdhim adbhutabhīṣaṇam /</l>
<l>vilokayan sa saṃprāpa svarṇadvīpaṃ krameṇa tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.38'>
<lg>
<l>tena gacchan pravahaṇena ab-dhim adbhuta-bhīṣaṇam /</l>
<l>vilokayan sa saṃprāpa svarṇa-dvīpaṃ krameṇa tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.39' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kva mantrimukhyatā cāsya kva vādhvollaṅghitāmbudhiḥ /</l>
<l>ayaśaḥbhīravaḥ kiṃ na kurvate bata sādhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.39'>
<lg>
<l>kva mantri-mukhyatā ca asya kva va ādhva-ullaṅghita-ambu-dhiḥ /</l>
<l>a-yaśaḥ-bhīravaḥ kiṃ na kurvate bata sādhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.40' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatra dvīpe samaṃ tena kamcit kālam uvāsa saḥ /</l>
<l>vaṇijā nidhidattena kurvatā krayavikrayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.40'>
<lg>
<l>tatra dvīpe samaṃ tena kam-cit kālam uvāsa saḥ /</l>
<l>vaṇijā nidhidattena kurvatā kraya-vikrayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.41' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>āgacchaṃś ca tato 'kasmāt tadyukto vahanasthitaḥ /</l>
<l>kalpavṛkṣaṃ dadarśābdhaūrmeḥ paścāt samutthitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.41'>
<lg>
<l>āgacchaṃś ca tato 'kasmāt tad-yukto vahana-sthitaḥ /</l>
<l>kalpa-vṛkṣaṃ dadarśa ab-dhaū urmeḥ paścāt samutthitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.42' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>pravālaśākhāsubhagaiḥ skandhair jāmbūnadojjvalaiḥ /</l>
<l>phalair maṇimayaiḥ kāntaiḥ kusumaiś copaśobhitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.42'>
<lg>
<l>pravāla-śākhā-su-bhagaiḥ skandhair jāmbūnada-ujjvalaiḥ /</l>
<l>phalair maṇi-mayaiḥ kāntaiḥ kusumaiś ca upaśobhitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.43' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tasya skandhe ca sadratnaparyaṅkotsaṅgavartinīm /</l>
<l>kanyām atyadbhutākārakamanīyām avaikṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.43'>
<lg>
<l>tasya skandhe ca sad-ratna-paryaṅka-utsaṅga-vartinīm /</l>
<l>kanyām atyadbhuta-ākāra-kamanīyām avaikṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.44' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>aho kim etad ity evaṃ yāvad dhyāyati sa kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>tāvat sā vīṇinī kanyā gātum evaṃ pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.44'>
<lg>
<l>aho kim etad ity evaṃ yāvad dhyāyati sa kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>tāvat sā vīṇinī kanyā gātum evaṃ pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.45' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yat karmabījam uptaṃ yena purā niḥcitaṃ sa tad bhuṅkte /</l>
<l>pūrvakṛtasya hi śakyo vidhināpi na kartum anyathābhāvaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.45'>
<lg>
<l>yat karma-bījam uptaṃ yena purā niḥ-citaṃ sa tad bhuṅkte /</l>
<l>pūrva-kṛtasya hi śakyo vidhina āpi na kartum anyathā-bhāvaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.46' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity udgāya kṣaṇāt tasminn ambhaḥdhau divyakanyakā /</l>
<l>sakalpadrumaparyaṅkaśayyātraiva mamajja sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.46'>
<lg>
<l>ity udgāya kṣaṇāt tasminn ambhaḥ-dhau divya-kanyakā /</l>
<l>sa-kalpa-druma-paryaṅka-śayya ātra eva mamajja sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.47' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kimapy apūrvam adyedaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam ihādbhutam /</l>
<l>kvābdhiḥ kva dṛṣṭanaṣṭo 'tra gāyaddivyāṅganas taruḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.47'>
<lg>
<l>kim-apy a-pūrvam adya idaṃ mayā dṛṣṭam iha adbhutam /</l>
<l>kva ab-dhiḥ kva dṛṣṭa-naṣṭo 'tra gāyad-divya-aṅganas taruḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.48' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yadi vā vandya eṣo 'bdhir ākaraḥ śaśvad īdṛśām /</l>
<l>lakṣmīndupārijātādyā nāsmāt te te kim udgatāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.48'>
<lg>
<l>yadi vā vandya eṣo 'bdhir ākaraḥ śaśvad īdṛśām /</l>
<l>lakṣmī-indu-pārijāta-ādyā na asmāt te te kim udgatāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.49' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>iti taṃ cintayantaṃ ca tatkṣaṇaṃ dīrghadarśinam /</l>
<l>vilokya vismayāviṣṭaṃ karṇadhārādayo 'bruvan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.49'>
<lg>
<l>iti taṃ cintayantaṃ ca tat-kṣaṇaṃ dīrghadarśinam /</l>
<l>vilokya vismaya-āviṣṭaṃ karṇa-dhāra-ādayo 'bruvan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.50' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>evam eṣā sadaiveha dṛśyate varakanyakā /</l>
<l>nimajjati ca tatkālaṃ tavaitad darśanaṃ navam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.50'>
<lg>
<l>evam eṣā sada aiva iha dṛśyate vara-kanyakā /</l>
<l>nimajjati ca tat-kālaṃ tava etad darśanaṃ navam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.51' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity uktas taiḥ samaṃ tena nidhidattena sa kramāt /</l>
<l>mantrī citrīyamāṇo 'bdhes tīraṃ potagato 'bhyagāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.51'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktas taiḥ samaṃ tena nidhidattena sa kramāt /</l>
<l>mantrī citrīyamāṇo 'b-dhes tīraṃ pota-gato 'bhyagāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.52' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatrottāritabhāṇḍena tenaiva vaṇijā saha /</l>
<l>jagāma hṛṣṭabhṛtyena sotsavaṃ so 'tha tadgṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.52'>
<lg>
<l>tatra uttārita-bhāṇḍena tena eva vaṇijā saha /</l>
<l>jagāma hṛṣṭa-bhṛtyena sa-utsavaṃ so 'tha tad-gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.53' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sthitvā nāticiraṃ tatra nidhidattam uvāca tam /</l>
<l>sārthavāha bhavadgehe viśrānto 'haṃ ciraṃ sukham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.53'>
<lg>
<l>sthitvā na aticiraṃ tatra nidhidattam uvāca tam /</l>
<l>sa-artha-vāha bhavad-gehe viśrānto 'haṃ ciraṃ sukham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.54' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>idānīṃ gantum icchāmi svadeśaṃ bhadram astu te /</l>
<l>ity uktvā tam anicchantam apy āmantrya vaṇikpatim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.54'>
<lg>
<l>idānīṃ gantum icchāmi sva-deśaṃ bhadram astu te /</l>
<l>ity uktvā tam anicchantam apy āmantrya vaṇik-patim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.55' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>dīrghadarśī sa sattvaikasahāyaḥ prasthitas tataḥ /</l>
<l>kramollaṅghitadūrādhvā prāpāṅgaviṣayaṃ nijam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.55'>
<lg>
<l>dīrghadarśī sa sattva-eka-sahāyaḥ prasthitas tataḥ /</l>
<l>krama-ullaṅghita-dūra-adhvā prāpa aṅga-viṣayaṃ nijam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.56' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatra taṃ dadṛśuś cārā bahir nagaram āgatam /</l>
<l>ye yaśaḥketunā rājñā prāṅnyastās tadgaveṣaṇe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.56'>
<lg>
<l>tatra taṃ dadṛśuś cārā bahir nagaram āgatam /</l>
<l>ye yaśaḥketunā rājñā prāṅnyastās tad-gaveṣaṇe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.57' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>taiś ca gatvā sa vijñaptaś cāraī rājā tam abhyagāt /</l>
<l>svayaṃ niḥgatya nagarāt tadviśleṣasuduḥkhitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.57'>
<lg>
<l>taiś ca gatvā sa vijñaptaś cāraī rājā tam abhyagāt /</l>
<l>svayaṃ niḥ-gatya nagarāt tad-viśleṣa-su-duḥkhitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.58' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>upetya ca pariṣvaṅgapūrvaṃ tam abhinandya saḥ /</l>
<l>nināyābhyantaraṃ bhūpaś cirādhvakṣāmadhūsaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.58'>
<lg>
<l>upetya ca pariṣvaṅga-pūrvaṃ tam abhinandya saḥ /</l>
<l>nināya abhyantaraṃ bhū-paś cira-adhva-kṣāma-dhūsaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.59' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tyaktvāsmān kiṃ tvayā nītaṃ na paraṃ bata mānasam /</l>
<l>yāvac charīram apy etan niḥsnehaparuṣāṃ daśām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.59'>
<lg>
<l>tyaktva āsmān kiṃ tvayā nītaṃ na paraṃ bata mānasam /</l>
<l>yāvac charīram apy etan niḥ-sneha-paruṣāṃ daśām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.60' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kiṃ vā bhagavato vetti bhavitavyasya ko gatim /</l>
<l>yad akasmāt tavaiṣābhūt tīrthādigamane matiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.60'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ vā bhagavato vetti bhavitavyasya ko gatim /</l>
<l>yad akasmāt tava eṣa ābhūt tīrtha-ādi-gamane matiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.61' corresp='Vet_12'>
