<l>tad brūhi ke tvayā bhrāntā deśā dṛṣṭaṃ ca kiṃ navam /</l>
<l>iti tatra ca taṃ rājā sa jagāda svamantriṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.61'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūhi ke tvayā bhrāntā deśā dṛṣṭaṃ ca kiṃ navam /</l>
<l>iti tatra ca taṃ rājā sa jagāda sva-mantriṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.62' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tataḥ suvarṇadvīpāntaṃ so 'dhvānaṃ varṇayan kramāt /</l>
<l>abdhāv udgaminīṃ tasmai tāṃ dṛṣṭāṃ divyakanyakām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.62'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ su-varṇa-dvīpa-antaṃ so 'dhvānaṃ varṇayan kramāt /</l>
<l>ab-dhāv udgaminīṃ tasmai tāṃ dṛṣṭāṃ divya-kanyakām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.63' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>gāyantīṃ trijagatsārabhūtāṃ kalpatarusthitām /</l>
<l>yathāvat kathayāmāsa dīrghadarśī mahībhṛte //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.63'>
<lg>
<l>gāyantīṃ tri-jagat-sāra-bhūtāṃ kalpa-taru-sthitām /</l>
<l>yathāvat kathayāmāsa dīrghadarśī mahī-bhṛte //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.64' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sa tāṃ śrutvaiva ca nṛpas tathā smaravaśo 'bhavat /</l>
<l>yathā tayā vinā mene niṣphale rājyajīvite //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.64'>
<lg>
<l>sa tāṃ śrutva aiva ca nṛ-pas tathā smara-vaśo 'bhavat /</l>
<l>yathā tayā vinā mene niṣphale rājya-jīvite //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.65' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>jagāda ca tam ekānte nītvā svasacivaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>draṣṭavyāsau mayā-vaśyaṃ jīvitaṃ nāsti me 'nyathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.65'>
<lg>
<l>jagāda ca tam eka-ante nītvā sva-sacivaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>draṣṭavya āsau maya ā-vaśyaṃ jīvitaṃ na asti me 'nyathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.66' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yāmi tvaduktena pathā praṇamya bhavitavyatām /</l>
<l>nivāraṇīyo nāhaṃ te nānugamyaś ca sarvathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.66'>
<lg>
<l>yāmi tvad-uktena pathā praṇamya bhavitavyatām /</l>
<l>nivāraṇīyo na ahaṃ te na anugamyaś ca sarvathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.67' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>guptam eko hi yāsyāmi rājyaṃ rakṣyaṃ tu me tvayā /</l>
<l>madvaco mānyathā kārṣīḥ śāpito 'si mamāsubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.67'>
<lg>
<l>guptam eko hi yāsyāmi rājyaṃ rakṣyaṃ tu me tvayā /</l>
<l>mad-vaco ma ānyathā kārṣīḥ śāpito 'si mama asubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.68' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity uktvā tatprativaco nirasya visasarja tam /</l>
<l>mantriṇaṃ svagṛhaṃ rājā cirotkaṃ svajanaṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.68'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā tat-prativaco nirasya visasarja tam /</l>
<l>mantriṇaṃ sva-gṛhaṃ rājā cira-utkaṃ sva-janaṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.69' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatrānalpotsave 'py āsīd dīrghadarśī suduḥmanāḥ /</l>
<l>svāminy asādhyavyasane sukhaṃ sanmantriṇāṃ kutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.69'>
<lg>
<l>tatra an-alpa-utsave 'py āsīd dīrghadarśī su-duḥ-manāḥ /</l>
<l>svāminy a-sādhya-vyasane sukhaṃ san-mantriṇāṃ kutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.70' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>anyedyuś ca sa taddhastanyastarājyabharo nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>yaśaḥketus tataḥ prāyān niśi tāpasaveṣabhṛt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.70'>
<lg>
<l>anye-dyuś ca sa tad-dhasta-nyasta-rājya-bharo nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>yaśaḥketus tataḥ prāyān niśi tāpasa-veṣa-bhṛt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.71' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>gacchaṃś ca kuśanābhākhyaṃ muniṃ mārge dadarśa saḥ /</l>
<l>so 'tra taṃ tāpasākalpaṃ praṇataṃ munir ādiśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.71'>
<lg>
<l>gacchaṃś ca kuśanābha-ākhyaṃ muniṃ mārge dadarśa saḥ /</l>
<l>so 'tra taṃ tāpasa-ākalpaṃ praṇataṃ munir ādiśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.72' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>lakṣmīdattena vaṇijā saha potena vāridhau /</l>
<l>gatvā prapsyasi tām iṣṭāṃ kanyāṃ vraja niḥākulaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.72'>
<lg>
<l>lakṣmīdattena vaṇijā saha potena vāri-dhau /</l>
<l>gatvā prapsyasi tām iṣṭāṃ kanyāṃ vraja niḥ-ākulaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.73' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>iti tadvacasā prītās taṃ praṇamya sa pārthivaḥ /</l>
<l>gacchan deśān nadīr adrīn krāntvā taṃ prāpad ambudhim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.73'>
<lg>
<l>iti tad-vacasā prītās taṃ praṇamya sa pārthivaḥ /</l>
<l>gacchan deśān nadīr adrīn krāntvā taṃ prāpad ambu-dhim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.74' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sutāraśaṅkhadhavalair vīcibhrūbhir vikasvaraiḥ /</l>
<l>vīkṣamāṇam ivāvartanetrair ātithyasaṃbhramāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.74'>
<lg>
<l>sutāra-śaṅkha-dhavalair vīci-bhrūbhir vikasvaraiḥ /</l>
<l>vīkṣamāṇam ivā avarta-netrair ātithya-saṃbhramāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.75' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tattīre vaṇijā tena muniproktena saṃgatiḥ /</l>
<l>lakṣmīdattena jajñe 'sya svarṇadvīpaṃ yiyāsunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.75'>
<lg>
<l>tat-tīre vaṇijā tena muni-proktena saṃgatiḥ /</l>
<l>lakṣmīdattena jajñe 'sya svarṇa-dvīpaṃ yiyāsunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.76' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tenaiva saha cakrāṅkapādamudrādi darśanāt /</l>
<l>prahveṇāruhya vahanaṃ pratasthe so 'mbudhau nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.76'>
<lg>
<l>tena eva saha cakra-aṅka-pāda-mudrā-ādi darśanāt /</l>
<l>prahveṇā aruhya vahanaṃ pratasthe so 'mbu-dhau nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.77' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>madhyam abdheś ca saṃprāpte vahane vārimadhyataḥ /</l>
<l>udagāt kalpaviṭapiskandhasthā sātra kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.77'>
<lg>
<l>madhyam ab-dheś ca saṃprāpte vahane vāri-madhyataḥ /</l>
<l>udagāt kalpa-viṭapi-skandha-sthā sa ātra kanyakā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.78' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yāvat paśyati tāṃ rājā cakora iva candrikām /</l>
<l>tāvat sā gāyati smaivaṃ vallakīvādyasundaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.78'>
<lg>
<l>yāvat paśyati tāṃ rājā cakora iva candrikām /</l>
<l>tāvat sā gāyati sma evaṃ vallakī-vādya-sundaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.79' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yat karmabījam uptaṃ yena purā niḥcitaṃ sa tad bhuṅkte /</l>
<l>pūrvakṛtasya hi śakyo vidhināpi na kartum anyathābhāvaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.79'>
<lg>
<l>yat karma-bījam uptaṃ yena purā niḥ-citaṃ sa tad bhuṅkte /</l>
<l>pūrva-kṛtasya hi śakyo vidhina āpi na kartum anyathā-bhāvaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.80' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tasmād yatra yathā yad bhavitavyaṃ yasya daivayogena /</l>
<l>tatra tathā tatprāptyai vivaśo 'sau nīyate 'tra na bhrāntiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.80'>
<lg>
<l>tasmād yatra yathā yad bhavitavyaṃ yasya daiva-yogena /</l>
<l>tatra tathā tat-prāptyai vivaśo 'sau nīyate 'tra na bhrāntiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.81' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>iti sūcitabhavyārthāṃ gāyantīṃ tāṃ vibhāvayan /</l>
<l>niḥspandaḥ sa kṣaṇaṃ tasthau rājā smaraśarāhataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.81'>
<lg>
<l>iti sūcita-bhavya-arthāṃ gāyantīṃ tāṃ vibhāvayan /</l>
<l>niḥ-spandaḥ sa kṣaṇaṃ tasthau rājā smara-śara-āhataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.82' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ratnākara namaḥ satyam agādhahṛdayāya te /</l>
<l>yena tvayaitāṃ pracchādya vipralabdho hariḥ śriyā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.82'>
<lg>
<l>ratna-ākara namaḥ satyam a-gādha-hṛdayāya te /</l>
<l>yena tvaya aitāṃ pracchādya vipralabdho hariḥ śriyā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.83' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tat surair apy alabhyāntaṃ sapakṣakṣmābhṛdāśrayam /</l>
<l>śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapanno 'ham iṣṭasiddhiṃ vidhatsva me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.83'>
<lg>
<l>tat surair apy a-labhya-antaṃ sa-pakṣa-kṣmā-bhṛd-āśrayam /</l>
<l>śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ prapanno 'ham iṣṭa-siddhiṃ vidhatsva me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.84' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>evaṃ yāvat samudraṃ taṃ sa nataḥ stauti bhūmipaḥ /</l>
<l>tāvat sā kanyakā tatra nimamajja sapādapā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.84'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ yāvat samudraṃ taṃ sa nataḥ stauti bhūmi-paḥ /</l>
<l>tāvat sā kanyakā tatra nimamajja sa-pāda-pā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.85' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvaivānumārge 'syāḥ sa rājātmānam akṣipat /</l>
<l>vāridhāv atra kāmāgnisaṃtāpasyeva śāntaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.85'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭva aiva anumārge 'syāḥ sa rājā ātmānam akṣipat /</l>
<l>vāri-dhāv atra kāma-agni-saṃtāpasya iva śāntaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.86' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad vīkṣyā-śaṅkitaṃ matvā vinaṣṭaṃ taṃ sa sajjanaḥ /</l>
<l>lakṣmīdatto vaṇig duḥkhād dehatyāgodyato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.86'>
<lg>
<l>tad vīkṣya a-śaṅkitaṃ matvā vinaṣṭaṃ taṃ sa saj-janaḥ /</l>
<l>lakṣmīdatto vaṇig duḥkhād deha-tyāga-udyato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.87' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>mā kārṣīḥ sāhasaṃ nāsti magnasyāsyāmbhudhau bhayam /</l>
<l>eṣo rājā yaśaḥketur nāmnā tāpasaveṣabhṛt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.87'>
<lg>
<l>mā kārṣīḥ sāhasaṃ na asti magnasya asya ambhu-dhau bhayam /</l>
<l>eṣo rājā yaśaḥketur nāmnā tāpasa-veṣa-bhṛt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.88' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>etat kanyārtham āyātaḥ pūrvabhāryeyam asya ca /</l>
<l>etāṃ prāpya punaś cāsāv aṅgarājyaṃ sameṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.88'>
<lg>
<l>etat kanyā-artham āyātaḥ pūrva-bhārya īyam asya ca /</l>
<l>etāṃ prāpya punaś ca asāv aṅga-rājyaṃ sameṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.89' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity athāśvāsito vācā tatkālaṃ gaganotthayā /</l>
<l>sārthavāho yathākāmaṃ sa jagāmeṣṭasiddhaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.89'>
<lg>
<l>ity athā aśvāsito vācā tat-kālaṃ gagana-utthayā /</l>
<l>sa-artha-vāho yathā-kāmaṃ sa jagāma iṣṭa-siddhaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.90' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sa rājāpi yaśaḥketur nimagno 'nto mahodadhau /</l>
<l>akasmān nagaraṃ divyam apaśyaj jātavismayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.90'>
<lg>
<l>sa rāja āpi yaśaḥketur nimagno 'nto mahā-uda-dhau /</l>
<l>akasmān nagaraṃ divyam apaśyaj jāta-vismayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.91' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>bhāsvanmaṇimayastambhaiḥ kāñcanojjvalabhittibhiḥ /</l>
<l>virājamānaṃ prāsādair muktājālagavākṣakaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.91'>
<lg>
<l>bhāsvan-maṇimaya-stambhaiḥ kāñcana-ujjvala-bhittibhiḥ /</l>
<l>virājamānaṃ prāsādair muktā-jāla-gava-akṣakaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.92' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>nānāratnaśilāpaṭṭabaddhasopānavāpikaiḥ /</l>
<l>kāmadaiḥ kalpavṛkṣāḍhyair udyānair upaśobhitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.92'>
<lg>
<l>nānā-ratna-śilā-paṭṭa-baddha-sopāna-vāpikaiḥ /</l>
<l>kāma-daiḥ kalpa-vṛkṣa-āḍhyair udyānair upaśobhitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.93' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>samṛddhe 'pi pure tatra niḥjane 'tha gṛhaṃ gṛham /</l>
<l>anupraviśya na yadā tāṃ dadarśa priyāṃ kvacit //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.93'>
<lg>
<l>samṛddhe 'pi pure tatra niḥ-jane 'tha gṛhaṃ gṛham /</l>
<l>anupraviśya na yadā tāṃ dadarśa priyāṃ kva-cit //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.94' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tadā vicinvan dṛṣṭvaikam uttuṅgaṃ maṇimandiram /</l>
<l>āruhya dvāram udghāṭya praviveśa sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.94'>
<lg>
<l>tadā vicinvan dṛṣṭva aikam uttuṅgaṃ maṇi-mandiram /</l>
<l>āruhya dvāram udghāṭya praviveśa sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.95' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>praviśya cāntaḥ sadratnaparyaṅkasthitam ekakam /</l>
<l>vastrācchāditasarvāṅgaṃ śayānaṃ kamcid aikṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.95'>
<lg>
<l>praviśya ca antaḥ sad-ratna-paryaṅka-sthitam ekakam /</l>
<l>vastra-ācchādita-sarva-aṅgaṃ śayānaṃ kam-cid aikṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.96' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kiṃ syāt saiveti sotkaṇṭham udghāṭayati tanmukham /</l>
<l>yāvat tāvad apaśyat tāṃ svepsitām eva so 'ṅganām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.96'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ syāt sa aiva iti sa-utkaṇṭham udghāṭayati tan-mukham /</l>
<l>yāvat tāvad apaśyat tāṃ sva-īpsitām eva so 'ṅganām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.97' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>srastanīlāṃśukadhvāntahasanmukhaśaśiśriyam /</l>
<l>jyotsnāvadātāṃ pātālagatām iva divā niśām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.97'>
<lg>
<l>srasta-nīla-aṃśuka-dhvānta-hasan-mukha-śaśi-śriyam /</l>
<l>jyotsnā-avadātāṃ pātāla-gatām iva divā niśām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.98' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>taddarśanena cāsyābhūd avasthā kāpi sā tadā /</l>
<l>grīṣmaṛtau marupānthasya saritsaṃdarśanena yā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.98'>
<lg>
<l>tad-darśanena ca asya abhūd avasthā kā-api sā tadā /</l>
<l>grīṣma-ṛtau maru-pānthasya sarit-saṃdarśanena yā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.99' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sāpy unmīlitacakṣus taṃ kalyāṇākṛtilakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>vīkṣyākasmāt tathāprāptaṃ saṃbhramāc chayanaṃ jahau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.99'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpy unmīlita-cakṣus taṃ kalyāṇa-ākṛti-lakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>vīkṣya akasmāt tathā-prāptaṃ saṃbhramāc chayanaṃ jahau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.100' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kṛtātithyā natamukhī pūjayantīva pādayoḥ /</l>
<l>phullekṣaṇotpalanyāsaiḥ śanair etam uvāca ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.100'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-ātithyā nata-mukhī pūjayanti īva pādayoḥ /</l>
<l>phulla-īkṣaṇa-utpala-nyāsaiḥ śanair etam uvāca ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.101' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ko bhavān kim agamyaṃ ca praviṣṭho 'si rasātalam /</l>
<l>rājacihnāṅkitatanoḥ kiṃ ca te tāpasavratam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.101'>
<lg>
<l>ko bhavān kim agamyaṃ ca praviṣṭho 'si rasā-talam /</l>
<l>rāja-cihna-aṅkita-tanoḥ kiṃ ca te tāpasa-vratam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.102' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity ādiśa mahābhāga prasādo yadi te mayi /</l>
<l>evaṃ tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā pratyuvāca tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.102'>
<lg>
<l>ity ādiśa mahā-bhāga prasādo yadi te mayi /</l>
<l>evaṃ tasyā vacaḥ śrutvā sa rājā pratyuvāca tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.103' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>aṅgarājo yaśaḥketur iti nāmnāsmi sundari /</l>
<l>āptād anvahadṛśyāṃ ca tvām aśrauṣam ihāmbudhau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.103'>
<lg>
<l>aṅga-rājo yaśaḥketur iti nāmna āsmi sundari /</l>
<l>āptād anvaha-dṛśyāṃ ca tvām aśrauṣam iha ambu-dhau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.104' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatas tvadarthaṃ kṛtvemaṃ veṣaṃ rājyaṃ vimucya ca /</l>
<l>āgatyaiṣa praviṣṭo 'ham anumārgeṇa te 'mbudhim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.104'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tvad-arthaṃ kṛtva īmaṃ veṣaṃ rājyaṃ vimucya ca /</l>
<l>āgatya eṣa praviṣṭo 'ham anumārgeṇa te 'mbu-dhim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.105' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tan me kathaya kāsi tvam ity ukte tena cātha sā /</l>
<l>salajjā sānurāgā ca sānandā caivam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.105'>
<lg>
<l>tan me kathaya ka āsi tvam ity ukte tena ca atha sā /</l>
<l>sa-lajjā sa-anurāgā ca sa-ānandā ca evam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.106' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>mṛgāṅkasena ity asti śrīmān vidyādharādhipaḥ /</l>
<l>māṃ mṛgāṅkavatīṃ nāmnā viddhi tasya sutām imām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.106'>
<lg>
<l>mṛgāṅkasena ity asti śrīmān vidyādhara-adhipaḥ /</l>
<l>māṃ mṛgāṅkavatīṃ nāmnā viddhi tasya sutām imām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.107' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sa mām asmin svanagare vimucyaikākinīṃ pitā /</l>
<l>na jāne hetunā kena gataḥ kvāpi sapaurakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.107'>
<lg>
<l>sa mām asmin sva-nagare vimucya ekākinīṃ pitā /</l>
<l>na jāne hetunā kena gataḥ kva api sa-paurakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.108' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tenāhaṃ śūnyavasater nirviṇṇonmajjya vāridheḥ /</l>
<l>yantrakalpadrumārūḍhā gāyāmi bhavitavyatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.108'>
<lg>
<l>tena ahaṃ śūnya-vasater nirviṇṇa ūnmajjya vāri-dheḥ /</l>
<l>yantra-kalpa-druma-ārūḍhā gāyāmi bhavitavyatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.109' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>evam uktavatī tena smaratā tan muner vacaḥ /</l>
<l>tathārajyata sā rājñā vacobhiḥ premapeśalaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.109'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatī tena smaratā tan muner vacaḥ /</l>
<l>tatha ārajyata sā rājñā vacobhiḥ prema-peśalaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.110' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yathānurāgavivaśā bhāryātvaṃ tasya tatkṣaṇam /</l>
<l>aṅgīcakāra vīrasya samayaṃ tv ekam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.110'>
<lg>
<l>yatha ānurāga-vivaśā bhāryātvaṃ tasya tat-kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>aṅgī-cakāra vīrasya samayaṃ tv ekam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.111' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>śuklakṛṣṇacaturdaśyām aṣṭamyāṃ cāryaputra te /</l>
<l>pratimāsam anāyattā caturo divasān aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.111'>
<lg>
<l>śukla-kṛṣṇa-caturdaśyām aṣṭamyāṃ cā arya-putra te /</l>
<l>prati-māsam anāyattā caturo divasān aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.112' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yatra kvāpi dineṣv eṣu gacchantī cāsmi na tvayā /</l>
<l>praṣṭavyā na niṣeddhavyā kāraṇaṃ hy atra vidyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.112'>
<lg>
<l>yatra kva-api dineṣv eṣu gacchantī ca asmi na tvayā /</l>
<l>praṣṭavyā na niṣeddhavyā kāraṇaṃ hy atra vidyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.113' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>evaṃ tām uktasamayāṃ sa rājā divyakanyakām /</l>
<l>tathety uktvaiva gāndharvavidhinā pariṇītavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.113'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ tām ukta-samayāṃ sa rājā divya-kanyakām /</l>
<l>tatha īty uktva aiva gāndharva-vidhinā pariṇītavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.114' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>bheje tataś ca saṃbhogasukhaṃ tatra tayā saha /</l>
<l>yathābhūd anya evāsyā mānmatho maṇḍanakramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.114'>
<lg>
<l>bheje tataś ca saṃbhoga-sukhaṃ tatra tayā saha /</l>
<l>yatha ābhūd anya eva asyā mānmatho maṇḍana-kramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.115' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>keśeṣu srastamālyeṣu kacagrahanakhāvalī /</l>
<l>bimbādhare 'tha niṣpītanīrāge daśanakṣatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.115'>
<lg>
<l>keśeṣu srasta-mālyeṣu kaca-graha-nakha-āvalī /</l>
<l>bimba-adhare 'tha niṣpīta-nīrāge daśana-kṣatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.116' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kucayoḥ karajaśreṇir bhinnamāṇikyamālayoḥ /</l>
<l>luptāṅgarāgeṣv aṅgeṣu gāḍhāliṅganarāgitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.116'>
<lg>
<l>kucayoḥ kara-ja-śreṇir bhinna-māṇikya-mālayoḥ /</l>
<l>lupta-aṅga-rāgeṣv aṅgeṣu gāḍha-āliṅgana-rāgitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.117' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>iti taddivyasaṃbhogasukhāvasthitam atra tam /</l>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī bhāryā bhūpaṃ prāhedam ekadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.117'>
<lg>
<l>iti tad-divya-saṃbhoga-sukha-avasthitam atra tam /</l>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī bhāryā bhū-paṃ prāha idam ekadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.118' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tvam ihaiva pratīkṣethāḥ kāryārthaṃ kvāpi yāmy aham /</l>
<l>adya saiṣā hi saṃprāptā mama kṛṣṇacaturdaśī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.118'>
<lg>
<l>tvam iha eva pratīkṣethāḥ kārya-arthaṃ kva-api yāmy aham /</l>
<l>adya sa aiṣā hi saṃprāptā mama kṛṣṇa-caturdaśī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.119' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>iha sthas tv āryaputrāmuṃ mā sma gāḥ sphāṭikaṃ gṛham /</l>
<l>mātra vāpyāṃ nipatito bhūlokaṃ tvaṃ gamiṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.119'>
<lg>
<l>iha sthas tv ārya-putra amuṃ mā sma gāḥ sphāṭikaṃ gṛham /</l>
<l>ma ātra vāpyāṃ nipatito bhū-lokaṃ tvaṃ gamiṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.120' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity uktvā sā tam āmantrya yayau tasmāt purād bahiḥ /</l>
<l>rājāpi prāptakhaḍgas tāṃ channo jijñāsur anvagāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.120'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā sā tam āmantrya yayau tasmāt purād bahiḥ /</l>
<l>rāja āpi prāpta-khaḍgas tāṃ channo jijñāsur anvagāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.121' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatrāpaśyat tamaḥśyāmaṃ vyāttavakrabilaṃ ca saḥ /</l>
<l>sākāram iva pātālam āyāntaṃ rākṣasaṃ nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.121'>
<lg>
<l>tatra apaśyat tamaḥ-śyāmaṃ vyātta-vakra-bilaṃ ca saḥ /</l>
<l>sa-ākāram iva pātālam āyāntaṃ rākṣasaṃ nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.122' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sa rākṣaso nipatyaiva muktaghoraravas tadā /</l>
<l>tāṃ mṛgāṅkavatīṃ vaktre nikṣipyaiva nigīrṇavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.122'>
<lg>
<l>sa rākṣaso nipatya eva mukta-ghora-ravas tadā /</l>
<l>tāṃ mṛgāṅkavatīṃ vaktre nikṣipya eva nigīrṇavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.123' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvaivātikopena sahasā sa jvalann iva /</l>
<l>niḥmokamuktabhujagaśyāmalena mahāsinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.123'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭva aiva ati-kopena sahasā sa jvalann iva /</l>
<l>niḥ-moka-mukta-bhujaga-śyāmalena mahā-asinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.124' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>koṣākṛṣṭena dhāvitvā rājasiṃho 'bhidhāvataḥ /</l>
<l>ciccheda rakṣasas tasya saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭaṃ śiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.124'>
<lg>
<l>koṣa-ākṛṣṭena dhāvitvā rāja-siṃho 'bhidhāvataḥ /</l>
<l>ciccheda rakṣasas tasya saṃdaṣṭa-oṣṭha-puṭaṃ śiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.125' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>rakṣaḥkabandhavāntena rājñas tasyāsravāriṇā /</l>
<l>krodhajo 'tha śaśāmāgnir na tu kāntāviyogajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.125'>
<lg>
<l>rakṣaḥ-kabandha-vāntena rājñas tasya asra-vāriṇā /</l>
<l>krodha-jo 'tha śaśāma agnir na tu kāntā-viyoga-jaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.126' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tato mohaniśāndhe 'smin vinaṣṭagatike nṛpe /</l>
<l>akasmān meghamalinasyāṅgaṃ bhittveva rakṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.126'>
<lg>
<l>tato moha-niśā-andhe 'smin vinaṣṭa-gatike nṛ-pe /</l>
<l>akasmān megha-malinasya aṅgaṃ bhittva īva rakṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.127' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tasyoddyotitadikcakrā candramūrtir ivā-malā /</l>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī jīvanty akṣatāṅgī viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.127'>
<lg>
<l>tasya uddyotita-dik-cakrā candra-mūrtir iva a-malā /</l>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī jīvanty a-kṣata-aṅgī viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.128' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tāṃ tathā saṃkaṭottīrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kāntāṃ sasaṃbhramam /</l>
<l>ehy ehīti vadan rājā pradhāvyaivāliliṅga saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.128'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ tathā saṃkaṭa-uttīrṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā kāntāṃ sa-saṃbhramam /</l>
<l>ehy ehi iti vadan rājā pradhāvya evā aliliṅga saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.129' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>priye kim etat svapno 'yam uta māyeti tena sā /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭā nṛpeṇa saṃsmṛtya vidyādhary evam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.129'>
<lg>
<l>priye kim etat svapno 'yam uta māya īti tena sā /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭā nṛ-peṇa saṃsmṛtya vidyādhary evam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.130' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>śṛṇv āryaputra na svapno na māyeyam ayaṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>vidhyādharendrāt svapituḥ śāpo 'bhūd īdṛśo mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.130'>
<lg>
<l>śṛṇv ārya-putra na svapno na māya īyam ayaṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>vidhyādhara-indrāt sva-pituḥ śāpo 'bhūd īdṛśo mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.131' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>bahuputro 'pi sa hi me pitā pūrvaṃ vasann iha /</l>
<l>mayā vinātivātsalyān nāharam akarot sadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.131'>
<lg>
<l>bahu-putro 'pi sa hi me pitā pūrvaṃ vasann iha /</l>
<l>mayā vina āti-vātsalyān nā aharam akarot sadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.132' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ahaṃ ca sarvadā śarvapūjāsakteha niḥjane /</l>
<l>caturdaśyor athāṣṭamyor āgacchaṃ pakṣayor dvayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.132'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ ca sarvadā śarva-pūjā-āsakta īha niḥ-jane /</l>
<l>caturdaśyor atha aṣṭamyor āgacchaṃ pakṣayor dvayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.133' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ekadā ca caturdaśyām ihāgatya rasān mama /</l>
<l>ciraṃ gaurīṃ samarcantyā daivād avasitaṃ dinam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.133'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca caturdaśyām ihā agatya rasān mama /</l>
<l>ciraṃ gaurīṃ samarcantyā daivād avasitaṃ dinam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.134' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad ahar matpratīkṣaḥ san kṣudhito 'pi sa matpitā /</l>
<l>nābhuṅkta nāpibat kimcid āsīt kruddhas tu māṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.134'>
<lg>
<l>tad ahar mat-pratīkṣaḥ san kṣudhito 'pi sa mat-pitā /</l>
<l>na abhuṅkta na apibat kim-cid āsīt kruddhas tu māṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.135' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tato rātrāv upetāṃ māṃ sāparādhām adhaḥmukhīm /</l>
<l>bhavitavyabalagrastamatsnehaḥ śapati sma saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.135'>
<lg>
<l>tato rātrāv upetāṃ māṃ sa-aparādhām adhaḥ-mukhīm /</l>
<l>bhavitavya-bala-grasta-mat-snehaḥ śapati sma saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.136' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yathā tvadavalepena grasto 'dyāham ayaṃ kṣudhā /</l>
<l>māsi māsi tathāṣṭamyoś caturdaśyoś ca kevalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.136'>
<lg>
<l>yathā tvad-avalepena grasto 'dya aham ayaṃ kṣudhā /</l>
<l>māsi māsi tatha āṣṭamyoś caturdaśyoś ca kevalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.137' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>harārcanarasād yantīm atraiva tvāṃ bahiḥ pure /</l>
<l>nāmnā kṛtāntasaṃtrāso rākṣaso nigariṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.137'>
<lg>
<l>hara-arcana-rasād yantīm atra eva tvāṃ bahiḥ pure /</l>
<l>nāmnā kṛtāntasaṃtrāso rākṣaso nigariṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.138' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>bhittvā bhittvāsya hṛdayaṃ jīvantī ca nireṣyasi /</l>
<l>na smariṣyasi śāpaṃ ca na tāṃ nigaraṇavyathām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.138'>
<lg>
<l>bhittvā bhittva āsya hṛdayaṃ jīvantī ca nireṣyasi /</l>
<l>na smariṣyasi śāpaṃ ca na tāṃ nigaraṇa-vyathām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.139' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sthāsyasy ekākinī cātrety uktaśāpavacāḥ śanaiḥ /</l>
<l>so 'nunīto mayā dhyātvā śāpāntaṃ me 'bravīt pitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.139'>
<lg>
<l>sthāsyasy ekākinī ca atra ity ukta-śāpa-vacāḥ śanaiḥ /</l>
<l>so 'nunīto mayā dhyātvā śāpa-antaṃ me 'bravīt pitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.140' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>bhartā bhūtvā yaśaḥketunāmāṅganṛpatir yadā /</l>
<l>rākṣasena nigīrṇāṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nihaniṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.140'>
<lg>
<l>bhartā bhūtvā yaśaḥketu-nāma-aṅga-nṛ-patir yadā /</l>
<l>rākṣasena nigīrṇāṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ nihaniṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.141' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tadā tvaṃ mokṣyase śāpād dhṛdayāt tasya niḥgatā /</l>
<l>saṃsmariṣyasi śāpādi vidyāḥ sarvās tathā nijāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.141'>
<lg>
<l>tadā tvaṃ mokṣyase śāpād dhṛdayāt tasya niḥ-gatā /</l>
<l>saṃsmariṣyasi śāpa-ādi vidyāḥ sarvās tathā nijāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.142' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity ādiśya sa śāpāntaṃ tyaktvā mām ekakām iha /</l>
<l>niṣadhādriṃ gatas tāto bhūlokaṃ saparicchadaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.142'>
<lg>
<l>ity ādiśya sa śāpa-antaṃ tyaktvā mām ekakām iha /</l>
<l>niṣadha-adriṃ gatas tāto bhū-lokaṃ sa-paricchadaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.143' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ahaṃ tathā carantī ca śāpamohād ihāvasam /</l>
<l>kṣīṇaś caiṣa sa śāpo me jātā sarvatra ca smṛtiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.143'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ tathā carantī ca śāpa-mohād iha avasam /</l>
<l>kṣīṇaś ca eṣa sa śāpo me jātā sarvatra ca smṛtiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.144' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tat tātapārśvam adhunā niṣadhādriṃ vrajāmy aham /</l>
<l>śāpānte svāṃ gatiṃ yāma ity eṣa samayo hi naḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.144'>
<lg>
<l>tat tāta-pārśvam adhunā niṣadha-adriṃ vrajāmy aham /</l>
<l>śāpa-ante svāṃ gatiṃ yāma ity eṣa samayo hi naḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.145' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tvam ihāsva svarāṣṭraṃ vā vraja svātantryam atra te /</l>
<l>evaṃ tayokte sa nṛpo duḥkhito 'rthayate sma tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.145'>
<lg>
<l>tvam ihā asva sva-rāṣṭraṃ vā vraja svātantryam atra te /</l>
<l>evaṃ taya ūkte sa nṛ-po duḥkhito 'rthayate sma tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.146' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>saptāhāni na gantavyaṃ prasīda sumukhi tvayā /</l>
<l>kṣipāva tāvad autsukyam udyāne krīḍanair iha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.146'>
<lg>
<l>sapta-ahāni na gantavyaṃ prasīda su-mukhi tvayā /</l>
<l>kṣipāva tāvad autsukyam udyāne krīḍanair iha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.147' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tvaṃ gacchātha pituḥ sthānaṃ yāsyāmy aham api svakam /</l>
<l>etat tadvacanaṃ mugdhā tathety aṅgīcakāra sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.147'>
<lg>
<l>tvaṃ gaccha atha pituḥ sthānaṃ yāsyāmy aham api svakam /</l>
<l>etat tad-vacanaṃ mugdhā tatha īty aṅgī-cakāra sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.148' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tato 'tra reme sa tayā sahodyāneṣu kāntayā /</l>
<l>sajalotpalanetrāsu vāpīṣu ṣaḍahaṃ nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.148'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'tra reme sa tayā saha udyāneṣu kāntayā /</l>
<l>sa-jala-utpala-netrāsu vāpīṣu ṣaḍ-ahaṃ nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.149' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>mā sma yātaṃ vihāyāsmān iti pūt kurvatīṣv iva /</l>
<l>utkṣiptavīcihastāsu haṃsasārasaniḥsvanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.149'>
<lg>
<l>mā sma yātaṃ vihāya asmān iti pūt kurvatīṣv iva /</l>
<l>utkṣipta-vīci-hastāsu haṃsa-sārasa-niḥ-svanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.150' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>saptame 'hni sa yuktyā tāṃ priyāṃ tatrānayad gṛhe /</l>
<l>bhūlokaprāpiṇī yatra sā yantradvāravāpikā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.150'>
<lg>
<l>saptame 'hni sa yuktyā tāṃ priyāṃ tatrā anayad gṛhe /</l>
<l>bhū-loka-prāpiṇī yatra sā yantra-dvāra-vāpikā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.151' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatra kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā tāṃ tasyāṃ vāpyāṃ nipatya saḥ /</l>
<l>uttasthau svapurodyānavāpīmadhyāt tayā saha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.151'>
<lg>
<l>tatra kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā tāṃ tasyāṃ vāpyāṃ nipatya saḥ /</l>
<l>uttasthau sva-pura-udyāna-vāpī-madhyāt tayā saha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.152' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tatra kāntāsakhaṃ prāptaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvodyānapālakāḥ /</l>
<l>hṛṣṭās tan mantriṇe gatvā jagadur dīrghadarśine //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.152'>
<lg>
<l>tatra kāntā-sakhaṃ prāptaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭva ūdyāna-pālakāḥ /</l>
<l>hṛṣṭās tan mantriṇe gatvā jagadur dīrghadarśine //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.153' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>so 'py etya pādapatitas tam ānītepsitāṅganam /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā prāveśayan mantrī sapauro 'bhyantaraṃ nṛpam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.153'>
<lg>
<l>so 'py etya pāda-patitas tam ānīta-īpsita-aṅganam /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā prāveśayan mantrī sa-pauro 'bhyantaraṃ nṛ-pam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.154' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>aho saiṣā kathaṃ prāptā rājñā divyāṅganāmunā /</l>
<l>vyomnīva vidyud iva yā kṣaṇadṛśyā mayekṣitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.154'>
<lg>
<l>aho sa aiṣā kathaṃ prāptā rājñā divya-aṅgana āmunā /</l>
<l>vyomni iva vidyud iva yā kṣaṇa-dṛśyā mayā īkṣitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.155' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>yad yasya likhitaṃ dhātrā lalāṭā-kṣarapaṅktiṣu /</l>
<l>tad avaśyam asaṃbhāvyam api tasyopatiṣṭhate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.155'>
<lg>
<l>yad yasya likhitaṃ dhātrā lalāṭa-a-kṣara-paṅktiṣu /</l>
<l>tad a-vaśyam asaṃbhāvyam api tasya upatiṣṭhate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.156' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity atra mantrimukhye 'smin dhyāyaty anyajane 'pi ca /</l>
<l>divyastrīprāptisāścaryaṃ rājāgamanasotsave //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.156'>
<lg>
<l>ity atra mantri-mukhye 'smin dhyāyaty anya-jane 'pi ca /</l>
<l>divya-strī-prāpti-sa-aścaryaṃ rāja-agamana-sa-utsave //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.157' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī dṛṣṭvā taṃ svadeśagataṃ nṛpam /</l>
<l>iyeṣa pūrṇasaptāhā yātuṃ vaidyādharīṃ gatim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.157'>
<lg>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī dṛṣṭvā taṃ sva-deśa-gataṃ nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>iyeṣa pūrṇa-sapta-ahā yātuṃ vaidyādharīṃ gatim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.158' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>nāvirāsīc ca vidyāsyāḥ smṛtāpy utpatanī tadā /</l>
<l>tataḥ sā muṣitevātra viṣādam agamat param //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.158'>
<lg>
<l>nā avirāsīc ca vidya āsyāḥ smṛta āpy utpatanī tadā /</l>
<l>tataḥ sā muṣita īva atra viṣādam agamat param //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.159' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kim akasmād viṣaṇṇeva dṛśyase vada me priye /</l>
<l>ity uktā tena rājñā sā vidhyādary evam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.159'>
<lg>
<l>kim akasmād viṣaṇṇa īva dṛśyase vada me priye /</l>
<l>ity uktā tena rājñā sā vidhyādary evam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.160' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>sthitāhaṃ śāpamuktāpi tvatsnehād yad iyac ciram /</l>
<l>tena vidyā mama bhraṣṭā naṣṭā divyā ca sā gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.160'>
<lg>
<l>sthita āhaṃ śāpa-mukta āpi tvat-snehād yad iyac ciram /</l>
<l>tena vidyā mama bhraṣṭā naṣṭā divyā ca sā gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.161' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tac chrutvā hanta siddheyaṃ mama vidyādharīti saḥ /</l>
<l>rājā tato yaśaḥketuḥ pūrṇaṃ cakre mahotsavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.161'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā hanta siddha īyaṃ mama vidyādhari īti saḥ /</l>
<l>rājā tato yaśaḥketuḥ pūrṇaṃ cakre mahā-utsavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.162' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā dīrghadarśī sa mantrī gatvā gṛhaṃ niśi /</l>
<l>śayanīyagato 'kasmād dhṛtsphoṭena vyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.162'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā dīrghadarśī sa mantrī gatvā gṛhaṃ niśi /</l>
<l>śayanīya-gato 'kasmād dhṛt-sphoṭena vyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.163' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tato 'nubhūya tacchokaṃ dhṛtarājyabharaḥ svayam /</l>
<l>yaśaḥketuś ciraṃ tasthau sa mṛgāṅkavatīyutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.163'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'nubhūya tac-chokaṃ dhṛta-rājya-bharaḥ svayam /</l>
<l>yaśaḥketuś ciraṃ tasthau sa mṛgāṅkavatī-yutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.164' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity etāṃ kathayitvā mārge tasmai kathāṃ sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>avadat punas trivikramasenaṃ nṛpatiṃ tam aṃsagataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.164'>
<lg>
<l>ity etāṃ kathayitvā mārge tasmai kathāṃ sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>avadat punas trivikramasenaṃ nṛ-patiṃ tam aṃsa-gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.165' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tad brūhi bhūpate te saṃpanne svāminas tathābhyudaye /</l>
<l>hṛdayaṃ sapadi sphuṭitaṃ tasya mahāmantriṇaḥ kim iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.165'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūhi bhū-pate te saṃpanne svāminas tatha ābhyudaye /</l>
<l>hṛdayaṃ sa-padi sphuṭitaṃ tasya mahā-mantriṇaḥ kim iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.166' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>divyastrī na mayā kiṃ prāpteti śucāsphuṭad dhṛdayam /</l>
<l>kiṃ vā rājyam abhīpsor rājāgamajena duḥkhena //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.166'>
<lg>
<l>divya-strī na mayā kiṃ prāpta īti śuca āsphuṭad dhṛdayam /</l>
<l>kiṃ vā rājyam abhīpsor rāja-āgama-jena duḥkhena //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.167' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>etac ca yadi na vakṣyasi mahyaṃ jānann apīha tad rājan /</l>
<l>dharmaś ca tava vinaṅkṣyati yāsyati dalaśaś ca jhaṭiti śiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.167'>
<lg>
<l>etac ca yadi na vakṣyasi mahyaṃ jānann api iha tad rājan /</l>
<l>dharmaś ca tava vinaṅkṣyati yāsyati dalaśaś ca jhaṭiti śiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.168' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>śrutveti tu trivikramaseno rājā jagāda vetālam /</l>
<l>naitat tasmin dvayam api śubhacarite yujyate hi mantrivare //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.168'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva īti tu trivikramaseno rājā jagāda vetālam /</l>
<l>na etat tasmin dvayam api śubha-carite yujyate hi mantri-vare //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.169' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>kiṃ tu strīmātrarasād upekṣitaṃ yena bhūbhujā rājyam /</l>
<l>tasyādhunā tu divyastrīraktasyātra kā vārtā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.169'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ tu strī-mātra-rasād upekṣitaṃ yena bhū-bhujā rājyam /</l>
<l>tasya adhunā tu divya-strī-raktasya atra kā vārtā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.170' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>tan me kaṣṭe 'pi kṛte pratyuta doṣo batādhikībhūtaḥ /</l>
<l>iti tasya vibhāvayato hṛdayaṃ tanmantriṇaḥ sphuṭitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.170'>
<lg>
<l>tan me kaṣṭe 'pi kṛte pratyuta doṣo bata adhikībhūtaḥ /</l>
<l>iti tasya vibhāvayato hṛdayaṃ tan-mantriṇaḥ sphuṭitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.19.171' corresp='Vet_12'>
<l>ity ukte narapatinā punaḥ sa māyī vetālo nijapadam eva taj jagāma /</l>
<l>rājāpi prasabham avāptum anvadhāvad bhūyo 'pi drutam atha taṃ sa dhīracetāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.19.171'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte nara-patinā punaḥ sa māyī vetālo nija-padam eva taj jagāma /</l>
<l>rāja āpi prasabham avāptum anvadhāvad bhūyo 'pi drutam atha taṃ sa dhīra-cetāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.1' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapātas tato nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe vetālam ādade //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.1'>
<lg>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapātas tato nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ skandhe vetālam ādade //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.2' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>āyāntaṃ ca sa vetālo bhūyas taṃ nṛpam abravīt /</l>
<l>rājañ śṛṇu kathām ekāṃ saṃkṣiptāṃ varṇayāmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.2'>
<lg>
<l>āyāntaṃ ca sa vetālo bhūyas taṃ nṛ-pam abravīt /</l>
<l>rājañ śṛṇu kathām ekāṃ saṃkṣiptāṃ varṇayāmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.3' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>asti vārāṇasī nāma purī haranivāsabhūḥ /</l>
<l>devasvāmīti tatrāsīn mānyo narapater dvijaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.3'>
<lg>
<l>asti vārāṇasī nāma purī hara-nivāsa-bhūḥ /</l>
<l>devasvāmi īti tatrā asīn mānyo nara-pater dvi-jaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.4' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>mahādhanasya tasyaiko harisvāmīty abhūt sutaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya bhāryā ca lāvaṇyavatīty atyuttamābhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.4'>
<lg>
<l>mahā-dhanasya tasya eko harisvāmi īty abhūt sutaḥ /</l>
<l>tasya bhāryā ca lāvaṇyavati īty atyuttama ābhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.5' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tilottamādinākastrīniḥmāṇe prāptakauśalaḥ /</l>
<l>anargharūpalāvaṇyāṃ manye yāṃ nirmame vidhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.5'>
<lg>
<l>tilottamā-ādi-nāka-strī-niḥ-māṇe prāpta-kauśalaḥ /</l>
<l>anargha-rūpa-lāvaṇyāṃ manye yāṃ nirmame vidhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.6' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tayā sa kāntayā sākaṃ harisvāmī kadācana /</l>
<l>ratiśrānto yayau nidrāṃ harmye candrāṃśuśītale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.6'>
<lg>
<l>tayā sa kāntayā sākaṃ harisvāmī kadā-cana /</l>
<l>rati-śrānto yayau nidrāṃ harmye candra-aṃśu-śītale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.7' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tat kālaṃ tena mārgeṇa kāmacārī vihāyasā /</l>
<l>āgān madanavegākhyo vidyādharakumārakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.7'>
<lg>
<l>tat kālaṃ tena mārgeṇa kāma-cārī vihāyasā /</l>
<l>āgān madanavega-ākhyo vidyādhara-kumārakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.8' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>sa tatra lāvaṇyavatīṃ patyuḥ pārśve dadarśa tām /</l>
<l>suptāṃ ratiklamasrastavastravyaktāṅgasauṣṭhavām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.8'>
<lg>
<l>sa tatra lāvaṇyavatīṃ patyuḥ pārśve dadarśa tām /</l>
<l>suptāṃ rati-klama-srasta-vastra-vyakta-aṅga-sauṣṭhavām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.9' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tadrūpahṛtacittaḥ san madanāndhaḥ sa tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>suptām eva nipatyaitāṃ gṛhītvā nabhasā yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.9'>
<lg>
<l>tad-rūpa-hṛta-cittaḥ san madana-andhaḥ sa tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>suptām eva nipatya etāṃ gṛhītvā nabhasā yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.10' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>kṣaṇāt prabuddho 'tha yuvā harisvāmī sa tatpatiḥ /</l>
<l>prāṇeśvarīm apaśyaṃs tām udatiṣṭhat sasaṃbhramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.10'>
<lg>
<l>kṣaṇāt prabuddho 'tha yuvā harisvāmī sa tat-patiḥ /</l>
<l>prāṇa-īśvarīm apaśyaṃs tām udatiṣṭhat sa-saṃbhramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.11' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>aho kim etat kva gatā kupitā sā nu kiṃ mayi /</l>
<l>channā jijñāsituṃ kiṃ me cittaṃ parihasaty uta //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.11'>
<lg>
<l>aho kim etat kva gatā kupitā sā nu kiṃ mayi /</l>
<l>channā jijñāsituṃ kiṃ me cittaṃ parihasaty uta //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.12' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>ity anekavikalpaughavyākulas tām itas tataḥ /</l>
<l>harmyaprāsādavalabhīṣv anviṣyan so 'bhraman niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.12'>
<lg>
<l>ity an-eka-vikalpa-ogha-vyākulas tām itas tataḥ /</l>
<l>harmya-prāsāda-valabhīṣv anviṣyan so 'bhraman niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.13' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>agṛhodyānataś cinvan yan na prāpa kuto 'pi tām /</l>
<l>tat sa śokāgnisaṃtapto vilalāpāśrugadgadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.13'>
<lg>
<l>a-gṛha-udyānataś cinvan yan na prāpa kuto 'pi tām /</l>
<l>tat sa śoka-agni-saṃtapto vilalāpa aśru-gadgadam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.14' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>hā candrabimbavadane hā jyotsnāgaurī hā priye /</l>
<l>rātryā tulyaguṇadveṣāt kiṃ nu soḍhāsi nānayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.14'>
<lg>
<l>hā candra-bimba-vadane hā jyotsnā-gaurī hā priye /</l>
<l>rātryā tulya-guṇa-dveṣāt kiṃ nu soḍha āsi na anayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.15' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tvayā kāntyā jito bibhyad iva candanaśītalaiḥ /</l>
<l>karair asukhayad yo māṃ so 'yam indus tvayā vinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.15'>
<lg>
<l>tvayā kāntyā jito bibhyad iva candana-śītalaiḥ /</l>
<l>karair asukhayad yo māṃ so 'yam indus tvayā vinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.16' corresp='Vet_13'>
  <l>labdhāntara ivedānīṃ tair eva tudati priye /</l>
  <l>prajvaladbhir ivāṅgārair viṣadigdhair ivāśugaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.16'>
<lg>
  <l>labdha-antara iva idānīṃ tair eva tudati priye /</l>
  <l>prajvaladbhir iva aṅgārair viṣa-digdhair ivā aśu-gaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.17' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>ity ādi krandatas tasya sā harisvāminas tadā /</l>
<l>kṛcchrād vyatīyāya niśā na punar virahavyathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.17'>
<lg>
<l>ity ādi krandatas tasya sā harisvāminas tadā /</l>
<l>kṛcchrād vyatīyāya niśā na punar viraha-vyathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.18' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>prātar bibheda viśvasya karaiḥ saṃtamasaṃ raviḥ /</l>
<l>bhettuṃ na cakṣame tasya mohāndhatamasaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.18'>
<lg>
<l>prātar bibheda viśvasya karaiḥ saṃtamasaṃ raviḥ /</l>
<l>bhettuṃ na cakṣame tasya moha-andha-tamasaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.19' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>vilabdha iva cakrāhvais tasya tīrṇaniśais tadā /</l>
<l>bheje śatagunībhāvaṃ karuṇākranditadhvaniḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.19'>
<lg>
<l>vilabdha iva cakra-āhvais tasya tīrṇa-niśais tadā /</l>
<l>bheje śata-gunī-bhāvaṃ karuṇā-krandita-dhvaniḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.20' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>svajanaiḥ sāntvyamāno 'pi viyogānaladīpitaḥ /</l>
<l>na ca lebhe dvijayuvā dhṛtiṃ tāṃ preyasīṃ vinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.20'>
<lg>
<l>sva-janaiḥ sāntvyamāno 'pi viyoga-anala-dīpitaḥ /</l>
<l>na ca lebhe dvi-ja-yuvā dhṛtiṃ tāṃ preyasīṃ vinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.21' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>iha sthitam iha snātaṃ kṛtam atra prasādhanam /</l>
<l>vihṛtaṃ ca tayātreti yayau tv ita ito rudan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.21'>
<lg>
<l>iha sthitam iha snātaṃ kṛtam atra prasādhanam /</l>
<l>vihṛtaṃ ca taya ātra iti yayau tv ita ito rudan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.22' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>mṛtā tāvan na sā tat kim ātmaivaṃ hanyate tvayā /</l>
<l>avaśyaṃ tām avāptāsi jīvañ jātu kutaḥcana //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.22'>
<lg>
<l>mṛtā tāvan na sā tat kim ātma aivaṃ hanyate tvayā /</l>
<l>a-vaśyaṃ tām avāptāsi jīvañ jātu kutaḥ-cana //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.23' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tad dhairyam avalambasva tāṃ gaveṣaya ca priyām /</l>
<l>aprāpyaṃ nāma nehāsti dhīrasya vyavasāyinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.23'>
<lg>
<l>tad dhairyam avalambasva tāṃ gaveṣaya ca priyām /</l>
<l>aprāpyaṃ nāma na iha asti dhīrasya vyavasāyinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.24' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>iti bandhusuhṛdvākyair bodhitaḥ so 'tha kṛcchrataḥ /</l>
<l>dinaiḥ kaiḥcid dharisvāmī babandha dhṛtim āsthayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.24'>
<lg>
<l>iti bandhu-su-hṛd-vākyair bodhitaḥ so 'tha kṛcchrataḥ /</l>
<l>dinaiḥ kaiḥ-cid dharisvāmī babandha dhṛtim āsthayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.25' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>acintayac ca sarvasvaṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇasād aham /</l>
<l>bhramāmi tāvat tīrthāni kṣapayāmy aghasaṃcayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.25'>
<lg>
<l>acintayac ca sarva-svaṃ kṛtvā brāhmaṇa-sād aham /</l>
<l>bhramāmi tāvat tīrthāni kṣapayāmy agha-saṃcayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.26' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>pāpakṣayād dhi tāṃ jātu priyāṃ bhrāmyann avāpnuyām /</l>
<l>ity ālocya yathāvasthaṃ snānādy utthāya so 'karot //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.26'>
<lg>
<l>pāpa-kṣayād dhi tāṃ jātu priyāṃ bhrāmyann avāpnuyām /</l>
<l>ity ālocya yathā-avasthaṃ snāna-ādy utthāya so 'karot //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.27' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>anyedyuś ca vicitrānnapānaṃ sattre dvijanmanām /</l>
<l>cakārāvāritaṃ kiṃ ca dadau dhanam aśeṣataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.27'>
<lg>
<l>anye-dyuś ca vicitra-anna-pānaṃ sattre dvi-janmanām /</l>
<l>cakāra avāritaṃ kiṃ ca dadau dhanam a-śeṣataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.28' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>brāhmaṇyamātravittasya niḥgatyaiva svadeśataḥ /</l>
<l>priyāprāptīcchayā so 'tha tīrthāni bhramituṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.28'>
<lg>
<l>brāhmaṇya-mātra-vittasya niḥ-gatya eva sva-deśataḥ /</l>
<l>priyā-prāpti-icchayā so 'tha tīrthāni bhramituṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.29' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>bhrāmyataś ca jagāmāsya bhīmo grīṣmartukesarī /</l>
<l>pracaṇḍādityavadano dīptatadraśmikesaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.29'>
<lg>
<l>bhrāmyataś ca jagāma asya bhīmo grīṣma-rtu-kesarī /</l>
<l>pracaṇḍa-āditya-vadano dīpta-tad-raśmi-kesaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.30' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>priyāvirahasaṃtaptapānthaniḥśvāsamārutaiḥ /</l>
<l>nyastoṣmāṇa ivātyuṣṇā vānti sma ca samīraṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.30'>
<lg>
<l>priyā-viraha-saṃtapta-pāntha-niḥ-śvāsa-mārutaiḥ /</l>
<l>nyasta-uṣmāṇa iva atyuṣṇā vānti sma ca samīraṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.31' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>śuṣyadvidīrṇapaṅkāś ca hṛdayaiḥ sphuṭitair iva /</l>
<l>jalāśayā dadṛśire gharmaluptāmbusaṃpadaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.31'>
<lg>
<l>śuṣyad-vidīrṇa-paṅkāś ca hṛdayaiḥ sphuṭitair iva /</l>
<l>jala-āśayā dadṛśire gharma-lupta-ambu-saṃpadaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.32' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>cīrīcītkāramukharās tāpamlānadalādharāḥ /</l>
<l>madhuśrīvirahān mārgeṣv arudann iva pādapāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.32'>
<lg>
<l>cīrī-cīt-kāra-mukharās tāpa-mlāna-dala-adharāḥ /</l>
<l>madhu-śrī-virahān mārgeṣv arudann iva pāda-pāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.33' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tasmin kāle 'rkatāpena viyogena kṣudhā tṛṣā /</l>
<l>nityādhvanā ca sa klānto virūkṣakṣāmadhūsaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.33'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin kāle 'rka-tāpena viyogena kṣudhā tṛṣā /</l>
<l>nitya-adhvanā ca sa klānto virūkṣa-kṣāma-dhūsaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.34' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>bhojanārthi harisvāmī prāpa grāmaṃ kvacid bhraman /</l>
<l>padmanābhābhidhānasya gṛhaṃ viprasya sattriṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.34'>
<lg>
<l>bhojana-arthi harisvāmī prāpa grāmaṃ kva-cid bhraman /</l>
<l>padmanābha-abhidhānasya gṛhaṃ viprasya sattriṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.35' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvā sa bhuñjānān viprān abhyantare bahūn /</l>
<l>dvāraśākhāṃ samālambya tasthau niḥśabdaniḥcalaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.35'>
<lg>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvā sa bhuñjānān viprān abhyantare bahūn /</l>
<l>dvāra-śākhāṃ samālambya tasthau niḥ-śabda-niḥ-calaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.36' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tathāsthitaṃ tam ālokya sattriṇas tasya gehinī /</l>
<l>padmanābhasya saṃjātadayā sādhvī vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.36'>
<lg>
<l>tathā-sthitaṃ tam ālokya sattriṇas tasya gehinī /</l>
<l>padmanābhasya saṃjāta-dayā sādhvī vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.37' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>aho kṣun nāma gurvy eṣā na kuryāt kasya lāghavam /</l>
<l>yad evam ayam annārthī ko 'py āste dvāry adhaḥmukhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.37'>
<lg>
<l>aho kṣun nāma gurvy eṣā na kuryāt kasya lāghavam /</l>
<l>yad evam ayam anna-arthī ko 'py āste dvāry adhaḥ-mukhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.38' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>dūrādhvābhyāgataḥ snātas tāvat kṣīṇendriyaḥ kṣudhā /</l>
<l>tad eṣaś cānnadānasya pātram ity avadhārya sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.38'>
<lg>
<l>dūra-adhva-abhyāgataḥ snātas tāvat kṣīṇa-indriyaḥ kṣudhā /</l>
<l>tad eṣaś ca anna-dānasya pātram ity avadhārya sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.39' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>paramānnabhṛtaṃ sādhvī tasmai saghṛtaśarkaram /</l>
<l>pātram utkṣipya pāṇibhyām ānīya praśritā dadau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.39'>
<lg>
<l>parama-anna-bhṛtaṃ sādhvī tasmai sa-ghṛta-śarkaram /</l>
<l>pātram utkṣipya pāṇibhyām ānīya praśritā dadau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.40' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>jagāda caitaṃ bhuṅkṣvaitad gatvā vāpītaṭe kvacit /</l>
<l>idaṃ sthānaṃ samucchiṣṭaṃ bhuñjānair brāhmanair vṛtam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.40'>
<lg>
<l>jagāda ca etaṃ bhuṅkṣva etad gatvā vāpī-taṭe kva-cit /</l>
<l>idaṃ sthānaṃ samucchiṣṭaṃ bhuñjānair brāhmanair vṛtam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.41' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tatheti so 'nnapātraṃ tad gṛhītvā nātidūrataḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā sthāpitavān vāpyās taṭe vaṭataror adhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.41'>
<lg>
<l>tatha īti so 'nna-pātraṃ tad gṛhītvā na atidūrataḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā sthāpitavān vāpyās taṭe vaṭa-taror adhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.42' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>prakṣālya pāṇipādaṃ ca vāpyām ācamya cātra saḥ /</l>
<l>yāvad bhakṣayituṃ tuṣṭaḥ paramānnam upaiti tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.42'>
<lg>
<l>prakṣālya pāṇi-pādaṃ ca vāpyām ācamya ca atra saḥ /</l>
<l>yāvad bhakṣayituṃ tuṣṭaḥ parama-annam upaiti tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.43' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tāvad gṛhītvā kṛṣṇāhiṃ cañcvā pādayugena ca /</l>
<l>śyenaḥ kutaḥcid āgatya tarau tasminn upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.43'>
<lg>
<l>tāvad gṛhītvā kṛṣṇa-ahiṃ cañcvā pāda-yugena ca /</l>
<l>śyenaḥ kutaḥ-cid āgatya tarau tasminn upāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.44' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tena tasyohyamānasya sarpasyākramya pakṣiṇā /</l>
<l>utkrāntajīvitasyāsyād viṣalālā viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.44'>
<lg>
<l>tena tasya uhyamānasya sarpasyā akramya pakṣiṇā /</l>
<l>utkrānta-jīvitasya asyād viṣa-lālā viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.45' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>sā tatrādhaḥsthite tasminn annapātre 'patat tadā /</l>
<l>tac cādṛṣṭvā harisvāmī sa etyānnam abhuṅkta tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.45'>
<lg>
<l>sā tatra adhaḥ-sthite tasminn anna-pātre 'patat tadā /</l>
<l>tac ca adṛṣṭvā harisvāmī sa etya annam abhuṅkta tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.46' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>kṣudhārtasya tadā tasya mṛṣṭānnaṃ tat kṣaṇena tat /</l>
<l>kṛtsnaṃ bhuktavatas tīvrā prodabhūd viṣavedanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.46'>
<lg>
<l>kṣudhā-artasya tadā tasya mṛṣṭa-annaṃ tat kṣaṇena tat /</l>
<l>kṛtsnaṃ bhuktavatas tīvrā prodabhūd viṣa-vedanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.47' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>aho vidhau viparyaste na viparyasyatīha kim /</l>
<l>yad viṣībhūtam annaṃ me sakṣīraghṛṭaśarkaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.47'>
<lg>
<l>aho vidhau viparyaste na viparyasyati iha kim /</l>
<l>yad viṣī-bhūtam annaṃ me sa-kṣīra-ghṛṭa-śarkaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.48' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>iti jalpan viṣārtaḥ sa harisvāmī pariskhalan /</l>
<l>gatvā tāṃ sattriṇas tasya viprasyovāca gehinīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.48'>
<lg>
<l>iti jalpan viṣa-artaḥ sa harisvāmī pariskhalan /</l>
<l>gatvā tāṃ sattriṇas tasya viprasya uvāca gehinīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.49' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tvaddattād viṣam annān me jātaṃ tad viṣamantriṇam /</l>
<l>kamcin mamānaya kṣipraṃ brahmahatyānyathāsti te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.49'>
<lg>
<l>tvad-dattād viṣam annān me jātaṃ tad viṣa-mantriṇam /</l>
<l>kam-cin mamā anaya kṣipraṃ brahma-hatya ānyatha āsti te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.50' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>ity uktvaiva sa tāṃ sādhvīṃ kim etad iti vihvalām /</l>
<l>harisvāmī parāvṛttanetraḥ prāṇair vyayujyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.50'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktva aiva sa tāṃ sādhvīṃ kim etad iti vihvalām /</l>
<l>harisvāmī parāvṛtta-netraḥ prāṇair vyayujyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.51' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tataḥ sā tena niḥdoṣāpy ātitheyy api sattriṇā /</l>
<l>bhāryā niṣkāsitā gehān mithyātithivadhakrudhā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.51'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sā tena niḥ-doṣa āpy ātitheyy api sattriṇā /</l>
<l>bhāryā niṣkāsitā gehān mithyā-ātithi-vadha-krudhā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.52' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>sāpy utpannamṛṣāvadyā suśubhād api karmaṇaḥ /</l>
<l>jātāvamānā tapase sādhvī tīrtham aśiśṛiyat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.52'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpy utpanna-mṛṣā-vadyā su-śubhād api karmaṇaḥ /</l>
<l>jāta-avamānā tapase sādhvī tīrtham aśiśṛiyat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.53' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>kasya vipravadhaḥ so 'stu sarpaśyenānnadeśv iti /</l>
<l>tad abhūd dharmarājāgre vādo nāsīt tu niḥṇayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.53'>
<lg>
<l>kasya vipra-vadhaḥ so 'stu sarpa-śyena-anna-deśv iti /</l>
<l>tad abhūd dharma-rāja-agre vādo nā asīt tu niḥ-ṇayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.54' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tat trivikramasena tvaṃ rajan brūhi mamādhunā /</l>
<l>kasya sā brahmahatyeti pūrvaḥ śāpaḥ sa te 'nyathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.54'>
<lg>
<l>tat trivikramasena tvaṃ rajan brūhi mama adhunā /</l>
<l>kasya sā brahma-hatya īti pūrvaḥ śāpaḥ sa te 'nyathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.55' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>iti vetālato rājā śrutvā śāpaniyantritaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ muktamauno 'bravīd idam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.55'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālato rājā śrutvā śāpa-niyantritaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ mukta-mauno 'bravīd idam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.56' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tasya tat pātakaṃ tāvat sarpasya yadi vāsya kaḥ /</l>
<l>vivaśasyāparādho 'sti bhakṣyamāṇasya śatruṇā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.56'>
<lg>
<l>tasya tat pātakaṃ tāvat sarpasya yadi va āsya kaḥ /</l>
<l>vivaśasya aparādho 'sti bhakṣyamāṇasya śatruṇā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.57' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>atha syenasya tenāpi kiṃ duṣṭaṃ kṣudhitātmanā /</l>
<l>akasmāt prāptam ānīya bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣayatā nijam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.57'>
<lg>
<l>atha syenasya tena api kiṃ duṣṭaṃ kṣudhita-ātmanā /</l>
<l>akasmāt prāptam ānīya bhakṣyaṃ bhakṣayatā nijam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.58' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>daṃpatyor annadātror vā tayor ekasya vā kutaḥ /</l>
<l>abhāvyadoṣau dharmaikapravṛttau tāv ubhau yataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.58'>
<lg>
<l>daṃ-patyor anna-dātror vā tayor ekasya vā kutaḥ /</l>
<l>abhāvya-doṣau dharma-eka-pravṛttau tāv ubhau yataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.59' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>tad ahaṃ tasya manye sā brahmahatyā jaḍātmanaḥ /</l>
<l>avicāryaiva yo brūyād eṣām ekatamasya tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.59'>
<lg>
<l>tad ahaṃ tasya manye sā brahma-hatyā jaḍa-ātmanaḥ /</l>
<l>avicārya eva yo brūyād eṣām eka-tamasya tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.20.60' corresp='Vet_13'>
<l>ity uktavato 'sya nṛpasyāṃsād bhūyo 'py agāt sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>nijapadam eva nṛpo 'pi sa punar api dhīras tam anvagād eva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.20.60'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavato 'sya nṛ-pasya aṃsād bhūyo 'py agāt sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>nija-padam eva nṛ-po 'pi sa punar api dhīras tam anvagād eva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.1' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha gatvā taṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>bhūyo 'py āsādya vetālaṃ skandhe jagrāha bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.1'>
<lg>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tha gatvā taṃ śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>bhūyo 'py āsādya vetālaṃ skandhe jagrāha bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.2' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>prasthitaṃ ca tam urvīśaṃ sa vetālo 'bhyadhāt punaḥ /</l>
<l>rājañ śrānto 'si tac citrāṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.2'>
<lg>
<l>prasthitaṃ ca tam urvī-īśaṃ sa vetālo 'bhyadhāt punaḥ /</l>
<l>rājañ śrānto 'si tac citrāṃ kathām ākhyāmi te śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.3' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>asty ayodhyeti nagarī rājadhānī babhūva yā /</l>
<l>rakṣaḥkulakṛtāntasya rāmarūpasya śārṅgiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.3'>
<lg>
<l>asty ayodhya īti nagarī rāja-dhānī babhūva yā /</l>
<l>rakṣaḥ-kula-kṛta-antasya rāma-rūpasya śārṅgiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.4' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tasyāṃ rājābhavad vīraketur nāma rarakṣa yaḥ /</l>
<l>kṣoṇīm imāṃ mahābāhuḥ prākāro nagarīm iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.4'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ rāja ābhavad vīraketur nāma rarakṣa yaḥ /</l>
<l>kṣoṇīm imāṃ mahā-bāhuḥ prākāro nagarīm iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.5' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tasmin mahīpatāv asyāṃ puryām eko mahāvaṇik /</l>
<l>ratnadattābhidhāno 'bhūd vaṇiṅnīvahanāyakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin mahī-patāv asyāṃ puryām eko mahā-vaṇik /</l>
<l>ratnadatta-abhidhāno 'bhūd vaṇiṅ-nīvaha-nāyakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.6' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>nandayantyabhidhānāyāṃ patnyāṃ tasyodapadyata /</l>
<l>sutā ratnavatī nāma devatārādhanārjitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.6'>
<lg>
<l>nandayanty-abhidhānāyāṃ patnyāṃ tasya udapadyata /</l>
<l>sutā ratnavatī nāma devatā-ārādhana-arjitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.7' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>sā ca tasya pitur veśmany avardhata manasvinī /</l>
<l>rūpalāvaṇyavinayaiḥ sahaiva sahajair guṇaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.7'>
<lg>
<l>sā ca tasya pitur veśmany avardhata manasvinī /</l>
<l>rūpa-lāvaṇya-vinayaiḥ saha eva saha-jair guṇaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.8' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>yauvanasthāṃ ca tāṃ tasmād ratnadattān na kevalam /</l>
<l>mahānto vaṇijo yāvad rājāno 'pi yayācire //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.8'>
<lg>
<l>yauvana-sthāṃ ca tāṃ tasmād ratnadattān na kevalam /</l>
<l>mahānto vaṇijo yāvad rājāno 'pi yayācire //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.9' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>sā tu pumdveṣiṇī naicchad bhartāram api vāsavam /</l>
<l>prāṇatyāgodyatā sehe na vivāhakathām api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.9'>
<lg>
<l>sā tu pum-dveṣiṇī nā ecchad bhartāram api vāsavam /</l>
<l>prāṇa-tyāga-udyatā sehe na vivāha-kathām api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.10' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tena tasyāḥ pitā tūṣṇīṃ tasthau vātsalyaduḥsthitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa ca pravādo 'yodyāyāṃ tasyāṃ sarvatra paprathe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.10'>
<lg>
<l>tena tasyāḥ pitā tūṣṇīṃ tasthau vātsalya-duḥ-sthitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa ca pravādo 'yodyāyāṃ tasyāṃ sarvatra paprathe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.11' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>atrāntare sadā caurair muṣyamāṇāḥ kilākhilāḥ /</l>
<l>saṃbhūyātra nṛpaṃ paurā vīraketuṃ vyajijñapan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.11'>
<lg>
<l>atra antare sadā caurair muṣyamāṇāḥ kilā akhilāḥ /</l>
<l>saṃbhūya atra nṛ-paṃ paurā vīraketuṃ vyajijñapan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.12' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>nityaṃ muṣyāmahe cauraī rātrau rātrāv iha prabho /</l>
<l>lakṣyante te ca nāsmābhis tad devo vettu yat param //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.12'>
<lg>
<l>nityaṃ muṣyāmahe cauraī rātrau rātrāv iha prabho /</l>
<l>lakṣyante te ca na asmābhis tad devo vettu yat param //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.13' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>iti pauraiḥ sa vijñapto rājā tām abhitaḥ purīm /</l>
<l>taskarānveṣaṇe channān ādiśad ratrirakṣakān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.13'>
<lg>
<l>iti pauraiḥ sa vijñapto rājā tām abhitaḥ purīm /</l>
<l>taskara-anveṣaṇe channān ādiśad ratri-rakṣakān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.14' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>te 'pi prāpur na yac caurān purī sāmuṣyataiva ca /</l>
<l>tadaikadā svayaṃ rājā niśi svairaṃ viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.14'>
<lg>
<l>te 'pi prāpur na yac caurān purī sa āmuṣyata eva ca /</l>
<l>tada aikadā svayaṃ rājā niśi svairaṃ viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.15' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>ekākī cāttaśastro 'tra bhraman so 'paśyad ekataḥ /</l>
<l>ekaṃ prākārapṛṣṭena yāntaṃ kam api pūruṣam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.15'>
<lg>
<l>ekākī cā atta-śastro 'tra bhraman so 'paśyad ekataḥ /</l>
<l>ekaṃ prākāra-pṛṣṭena yāntaṃ kam api pūruṣam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.16' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>niḥśabdapadavinyāsavicitragatikauśalam /</l>
<l>saśaṅkalolanayanaṃ paśyantaṃ pṛṣṭato muhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.16'>
<lg>
<l>niḥ-śabda-pada-vinyāsa-vicitra-gati-kauśalam /</l>
<l>sa-śaṅka-lola-nayanaṃ paśyantaṃ pṛṣṭato muhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.17' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>ayaṃ sa nūnaṃ cauro me muṣṇāty ekacaraḥ purīm /</l>
<l>iti matvaiva nikaṭaṃ sa tasyopayayau nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.17'>
<lg>
<l>ayaṃ sa nūnaṃ cauro me muṣṇāty eka-caraḥ purīm /</l>
<l>iti matva aiva nikaṭaṃ sa tasya upayayau nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.18' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tataḥ sa cauro dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛpaṃ ko 'sīty abhāṣata /</l>
<l>cauro 'ham iti rājā taṃ cauraṃ pratyabravīt sa tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.18'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa cauro dṛṣṭvā taṃ nṛ-paṃ ko 'si ity abhāṣata /</l>
<l>cauro 'ham iti rājā taṃ cauraṃ pratyabravīt sa tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.19' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>so 'tha cauro 'bhyadhād dṛṣṭvā tarhi tulyo 'si me suhṛt /</l>
<l>tad ehi madgṛhaṃ tāvan mitrācāraṃ karomi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.19'>
<lg>
<l>so 'tha cauro 'bhyadhād dṛṣṭvā tarhi tulyo 'si me su-hṛt /</l>
<l>tad ehi mad-gṛhaṃ tāvan mitra-ācāraṃ karomi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.20' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā tenaiva saha bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>yayau vanāntaḥdharaṇīkhātāntaḥvarti tadgṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.20'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa tatha īty uktvā tena eva saha bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>yayau vana-antaḥ-dharaṇī-khāta-antaḥ-varti tad-gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.21' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>aśeṣabhogabhogāḍhyaṃ bhāsvaddīpaprakāśitam /</l>
<l>navīnam iva pātālaṃ balirājānadhiṣṭhitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.21'>
<lg>
<l>aśeṣa-bhoga-bhoga-āḍhyaṃ bhāsvad-dīpa-prakāśitam /</l>
<l>navīnam iva pātālaṃ bali-rāja-anadhiṣṭhitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.22' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tatra praviṣṭe tasmiṃś ca kṛtāsanaparigrahe /</l>
<l>rājñi so 'bhyantaragṛhaṃ praviveśātha taskaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.22'>
<lg>
<l>tatra praviṣṭe tasmiṃś ca kṛta-āsana-parigrahe /</l>
<l>rājñi so 'bhyantara-gṛhaṃ praviveśa atha taskaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.23' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ ca tam etyaikā dāsī tatrāvadan nṛpam /</l>
<l>mahābhāga praviṣṭas tvam iha mṛtyumukhe katham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.23'>
<lg>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ ca tam etya ekā dāsī tatra avadan nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>mahā-bhāga praviṣṭas tvam iha mṛtyu-mukhe katham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.24' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>ekacauro hy asau pāpaṃ niḥgatyātaḥ kariṣyati /</l>
<l>dhruvaṃ visvāsaghātīti tad itas tvaritaṃ vraja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.24'>
<lg>
<l>eka-cauro hy asau pāpaṃ niḥ-gatya ataḥ kariṣyati /</l>
<l>dhruvaṃ visvāsa-ghāti īti tad itas tvaritaṃ vraja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.25' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>ity uktaḥ sa tayā rājā niḥgatyaiva tato drutam /</l>
<l>gatvā svarājadhānīṃ ca niśi sainyāny asajjayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.25'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktaḥ sa tayā rājā niḥ-gatya eva tato drutam /</l>
<l>gatvā sva-rāja-dhānīṃ ca niśi sainyāny asajjayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.26' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>saṃnaddhasainyaś cāgatya dasyos tasya rurodha tat /</l>
<l>bhūgṛhadvāravivaraṃ rasattūryā-kulair balaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.26'>
<lg>
<l>saṃnaddha-sainyaś cā agatya dasyos tasya rurodha tat /</l>
<l>bhū-gṛha-dvāra-vivaraṃ rasat-tūrya-a-kulair balaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.27' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tato ruddhe gṛhe vṛttaṃ pratibhedam avetya saḥ /</l>
<l>maraṇe niḥcitaś cauraḥ śūro yuddhāya niryayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.27'>
<lg>
<l>tato ruddhe gṛhe vṛttaṃ pratibhedam avetya saḥ /</l>
<l>maraṇe niḥ-citaś cauraḥ śūro yuddhāya niryayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.28' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>niḥgataś ca raṇe cakre parākramam amānuṣam /</l>
<l>karāṃś cakarta kariṇāṃ jaṅghāś ciccheda vājinām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.28'>
<lg>
<l>niḥ-gataś ca raṇe cakre parākramam a-mānuṣam /</l>
<l>karāṃś cakarta kariṇāṃ jaṅghāś ciccheda vājinām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.29' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>jahāra ca śirāṃsy eko bhaṭānāṃ khaḍgacarmabhṛt /</l>
<l>tatas taṃ kṣapitānīkam abhyadhāvat svayaṃ nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.29'>
<lg>
<l>jahāra ca śirāṃsy eko bhaṭānāṃ khaḍga-carma-bhṛt /</l>
<l>tatas taṃ kṣapita-anīkam abhyadhāvat svayaṃ nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.30' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>sa tasya khaḍgavidyājño rājā karaṇayuktitaḥ /</l>
<l>hastāj jahāra niḥtriṃśam atha tāṃ kṣurikām api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.30'>
<lg>
<l>sa tasya khaḍga-vidyā-jño rājā karaṇa-yuktitaḥ /</l>
<l>hastāj jahāra niḥ-triṃśam atha tāṃ kṣurikām api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.31' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>aśastraṃ muktaśastro 'tha bāhuyuddhena taṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>cauraṃ nihatya dharaṇau sajīvagrāham agrahīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.31'>
<lg>
<l>a-śastraṃ mukta-śastro 'tha bāhu-yuddhena taṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>cauraṃ nihatya dharaṇau sa-jīva-grāham agrahīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.32' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>nināya taṃ ca saṃyamya sadhanaṃ nagarīṃ nijām /</l>
<l>prātaś cājñāpayat tasya śūlāropaṇanigraham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.32'>
<lg>
<l>nināya taṃ ca saṃyamya sa-dhanaṃ nagarīṃ nijām /</l>
<l>prātaś ca ajñāpayat tasya śūla-āropaṇa-nigraham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.33' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>nīyamānaṃ ca taṃ vadhyabhūmiṃ cauraṃ saḍiṇḍimam /</l>
<l>dadarśa sā ratnavatī vaṇikkanyātra harmyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.33'>
<lg>
<l>nīyamānaṃ ca taṃ vadhya-bhūmiṃ cauraṃ sa-ḍiṇḍimam /</l>
<l>dadarśa sā ratnavatī vaṇik-kanya ātra harmyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.34' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>vraṇitaṃ dhūliliptāṅgam apy etaṃ māramohitā /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvaiva gatvā pitaraṃ ratnadattam uvāca sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.34'>
<lg>
<l>vraṇitaṃ dhūli-lipta-aṅgam apy etaṃ māra-mohitā /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭva aiva gatvā pitaraṃ ratnadattam uvāca sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.35' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>vadhāya nīyate yo 'yam eṣa bhartā vṛto mayā /</l>
<l>tan nṛpād rakṣa tātainaṃ na ced enam anu mriye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.35'>
<lg>
<l>vadhāya nīyate yo 'yam eṣa bhartā vṛto mayā /</l>
<l>tan nṛ-pād rakṣa tāta enaṃ na ced enam anu mriye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.36' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tac chrutvā tāṃ pitāvādīt kim idaṃ putri bhāṣase /</l>
<l>yā tvaṃ necchasi bhūpālām api bhartṝn abhīpsataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.36'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā tāṃ pita āvādīt kim idaṃ putri bhāṣase /</l>
<l>yā tvaṃ na icchasi bhū-pālām api bhartṝn abhīpsataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.37' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>sā pāpaṃ taskaram imaṃ vāñchasy āpadgataṃ katham /</l>
<l>ity ādi pitrā proktāpi niḥcayān na cacāla sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.37'>
<lg>
<l>sā pāpaṃ taskaram imaṃ vāñchasy āpad-gataṃ katham /</l>
<l>ity ādi pitrā prokta āpi niḥ-cayān na cacāla sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.38' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tataḥ sa tatpitā gatvā tasya caurasya satvaram /</l>
<l>sarvasvenāpi rājānaṃ vadhān mokṣam ayācata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.38'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa tat-pitā gatvā tasya caurasya sa-tvaram /</l>
<l>sarva-svena api rājānaṃ vadhān mokṣam ayācata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.39' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>rājā tu taṃ na tatyāja hemakoṭiśatair api /</l>
<l>svaśarīrapaṇānītaṃ cauraṃ sarvāpahāriṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.39'>
<lg>
<l>rājā tu taṃ na tatyāja hema-koṭi-śatair api /</l>
<l>sva-śarīra-paṇa-ānītaṃ cauraṃ sarva-apahāriṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.40' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tataḥ pitary upāyāte vimukhe sā vaṇiksutā /</l>
<l>anumartuṃ kṛtasnānā vāryamāṇāpi bandhubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.40'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ pitary upāyāte vimukhe sā vaṇik-sutā /</l>
<l>anumartuṃ kṛta-snānā vāryamāṇa āpi bandhubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.41' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>āruhya śibikāṃ tasya dasyor vadhyabhuvaṃ yayau /</l>
<l>anvīyamānā rudatā pitrā mātrā janena ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.41'>
<lg>
<l>āruhya śibikāṃ tasya dasyor vadhya-bhuvaṃ yayau /</l>
<l>anvīyamānā rudatā pitrā mātrā janena ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.42' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tāvac ca vadhakaiḥ so 'tra cauraḥ śūle 'dhiropitaḥ /</l>
<l>tāṃ dadarśa galatprāṇas tathā sajñātim āgatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.42'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca vadhakaiḥ so 'tra cauraḥ śūle 'dhiropitaḥ /</l>
<l>tāṃ dadarśa galat-prāṇas tathā sa-jñātim āgatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.43' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>janāc chrutvā ca vṛttāntam aśru muktvā kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>hasan sa cauraḥ kim api prāṇāñ śūlagato jahau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.43'>
<lg>
<l>janāc chrutvā ca vṛttāntam aśru muktvā kṣaṇaṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>hasan sa cauraḥ kim api prāṇāñ śūla-gato jahau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.44' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tato 'vatāritaṃ śūlāt sā taccaurakalevaram /</l>
<l>ādāya cārurohātra citāṃ sādhvī vaṇiksutā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.44'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'vatāritaṃ śūlāt sā tac-caura-kalevaram /</l>
<l>ādāya cā aruroha atra citāṃ sādhvī vaṇik-sutā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.45' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ ca śmaśāne 'tra bhairavaḥ kṛtasaṃnidhiḥ /</l>
<l>adṛśyo bhagavān evaṃ tām uvācāntarikṣataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.45'>
<lg>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ ca śmaśāne 'tra bhairavaḥ kṛta-saṃnidhiḥ /</l>
<l>a-dṛśyo bhagavān evaṃ tām uvāca antarikṣataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.46' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>asmin svayamvarapatāv evaṃ bhaktyā tavānayā /</l>
<l>tuṣṭo 'smi tad varaṃ mattaḥ prārthayasva pativrate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.46'>
<lg>
<l>asmin svayam-vara-patāv evaṃ bhaktyā tava anayā /</l>
<l>tuṣṭo 'smi tad varaṃ mattaḥ prārthayasva pati-vrate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.47' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tac chrutvaiva varaṃ devād evaṃ vavre praṇamya sā /</l>
<l>nātha putraśataṃ bhūyād aputrasyāpi matpituḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.47'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutva aiva varaṃ devād evaṃ vavre praṇamya sā /</l>
<l>nātha putra-śataṃ bhūyād a-putrasya api mat-pituḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.48' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>yenānanyasuto naiṣaḥ prāṇāñ jahyān mayā vinā /</l>
<l>iti proktavatīm enāṃ sādhvīṃ devo 'bravīt punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.48'>
<lg>
<l>yena an-anya-suto na eṣaḥ prāṇāñ jahyān mayā vinā /</l>
<l>iti proktavatīm enāṃ sādhvīṃ devo 'bravīt punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.49' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>pituḥ putraśataṃ te 'stu varam anyaṃ vṛṇīṣva ca /</l>
<l>tvādṛśī dṛḍhasattvā hi naitāvanmātram arhati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.49'>
<lg>
<l>pituḥ putra-śataṃ te 'stu varam anyaṃ vṛṇīṣva ca /</l>
<l>tvādṛśī dṛḍha-sattvā hi na etāvan-mātram arhati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.50' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tad ākarṇyātha sāvādīt prasanno mayi cet prabhuḥ /</l>
<l>taj jīvatv eṣa bhartā me dhārmikaś ca sadāstv iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.50'>
<lg>
<l>tad ākarṇya atha sa āvādīt prasanno mayi cet prabhuḥ /</l>
<l>taj jīvatv eṣa bhartā me dhārmikaś ca sada āstv iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.51' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>evam astv akṣato jīvann uttiṣṭhatv eṣa te patiḥ /</l>
<l>dhārmikaś cāstu rājāsya vīraketuś ca tuṣyatu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.51'>
<lg>
<l>evam astv a-kṣato jīvann uttiṣṭhatv eṣa te patiḥ /</l>
<l>dhārmikaś ca astu rājāsya vīraketuś ca tuṣyatu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.52' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>ity uktavaty anālakṣyamūrtau śarve nabhaḥsthite /</l>
<l>uttasthāv akṣatāṅgo 'tra cauro jīvaṃs tadaiva saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.52'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavaty an-ālakṣya-mūrtau śarve nabhaḥ-sthite /</l>
<l>uttasthāv a-kṣata-aṅgo 'tra cauro jīvaṃs tada aiva saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.53' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>tato vismitahṛṣṭaḥ san ratnadattaḥ sutāṃ vaṇik /</l>
<l>ādāya tāṃ ratnavatīṃ cauraṃ jāmātaraṃ ca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.53'>
<lg>
<l>tato vismita-hṛṣṭaḥ san ratnadattaḥ sutāṃ vaṇik /</l>
<l>ādāya tāṃ ratnavatīṃ cauraṃ jāmātaraṃ ca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.54' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>prahṛṣṭair bāndhavaiḥ sākaṃ praviśya nijamandiram /</l>
<l>labdhaputravaraś cakre svānandocitam utsavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.54'>
<lg>
<l>prahṛṣṭair bāndhavaiḥ sākaṃ praviśya nija-mandiram /</l>
<l>labdha-putra-varaś cakre sva-ānanda-ucitam utsavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.55' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>jñātavṛttāntatuṣṭaś ca tadaivānāyya taṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>ekavīraṃ vīraketuś cauraṃ senāpatiṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.55'>
<lg>
<l>jñāta-vṛttānta-tuṣṭaś ca tada aivā anāyya taṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>eka-vīraṃ vīraketuś cauraṃ senā-patiṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.56' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>cauryān nivṛtto 'tha sa tāṃ pariṇīya vaṇiksutām /</l>
<l>ekavīraḥ sukhaṃ tasthau mārgastho rājasaṃmataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.56'>
<lg>
<l>cauryān nivṛtto 'tha sa tāṃ pariṇīya vaṇik-sutām /</l>
<l>eka-vīraḥ sukhaṃ tasthau mārga-stho rāja-saṃmataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.57' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>iti kathayitvā sa kathāṃ vetālo dattapūrvaśāpabhayam /</l>
<l>aṃsasthitas trivikramasenaṃ papraccha taṃ kṣitipam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.57'>
<lg>
<l>iti kathayitvā sa kathāṃ vetālo datta-pūrva-śāpa-bhayam /</l>
<l>aṃsa-sthitas trivikramasenaṃ papraccha taṃ kṣiti-pam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.58' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>rājan brūhi sapitṛkām upasthitāṃ tāṃ vaṇiksutāṃ dṛṣṭvā /</l>
<l>caureṇa śūlapṛṣṭe ruditaṃ hasitaṃ ca kiṃ tena //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.58'>
<lg>
<l>rājan brūhi sa-pitṛkām upasthitāṃ tāṃ vaṇik-sutāṃ dṛṣṭvā /</l>
<l>caureṇa śūla-pṛṣṭe ruditaṃ hasitaṃ ca kiṃ tena //</l>
</lg>
