</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.59' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>atha rājā pratyavadad ruditaṃ caureṇa duḥkhatas tena /</l>
<l>nāsyānṛṇyam akāraṇabandhor yāto 'smi vaṇija iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.59'>
<lg>
<l>atha rājā pratyavadad ruditaṃ caureṇa duḥkhatas tena /</l>
<l>na asya an-ṛṇyam a-kāraṇa-bandhor yāto 'smi vaṇija iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.60' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>āścaryataś ca hasitaṃ kim iyaṃ kanyā nṛpān varān hitvā /</l>
<l>mayy asminn anuraktā strīcittam aho vicitram iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.60'>
<lg>
<l>āścaryataś ca hasitaṃ kim iyaṃ kanyā nṛ-pān varān hitvā /</l>
<l>mayy asminn anuraktā strī-cittam aho vicitram iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.21.61' corresp='Vet_14'>
<l>ity uktavākyasya mahībhṛto 'ṃsān māyī svaśaktyaiva tadā jagāma /</l>
<l>svaṃ dhāma vetālavaraḥ sa rājāpy etaṃ punaḥ pūrvavad anvagacchat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.21.61'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukta-vākyasya mahī-bhṛto 'ṃsān māyī sva-śaktya eva tadā jagāma /</l>
<l>svaṃ dhāma vetāla-varaḥ sa rāja āpy etaṃ punaḥ pūrvavad anvagacchat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.1' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam ādāyodacalat punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpya vetālaṃ śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam ādāya udacalat punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.2' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>āyāntaṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ sa vetālo 'ṃsapṛṣṭhagaḥ /</l>
<l>jagāda bhūyo 'py etāṃ te rājan vacmi kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.2'>
<lg>
<l>āyāntaṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ sa vetālo 'ṃsa-pṛṣṭha-gaḥ /</l>
<l>jagāda bhūyo 'py etāṃ te rājan vacmi kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.3' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>abhūn nepālaviṣaye nāmnā śivapuraṃ puram /</l>
<l>yathārthanāmā tatrāsīd yaśaḥketuḥ purā nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.3'>
<lg>
<l>abhūn nepāla-viṣaye nāmnā śivapuraṃ puram /</l>
<l>yathā-artha-nāmā tatrā asīd yaśaḥketuḥ purā nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.4' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>sa mantriṇi nyasya bharaṃ prajñāsāgarasaṃjñake /</l>
<l>candraprabhākhyayā devyā sārdhaṃ bhogān asevata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.4'>
<lg>
<l>sa mantriṇi nyasya bharaṃ prajñāsāgara-saṃjñake /</l>
<l>candraprabhā-ākhyayā devyā sārdhaṃ bhogān asevata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.5' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kālena tasyāṃ devyāṃ ca tasyājāyata kanyakā /</l>
<l>rājñaḥ śaśiprabhā nāma jagannetraśaśiprabhā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.5'>
<lg>
<l>kālena tasyāṃ devyāṃ ca tasyā ajāyata kanyakā /</l>
<l>rājñaḥ śaśiprabhā nāma jagan-netra-śaśi-prabhā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.6' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>krameṇa yauvanasthā sā madhumāse kadācana /</l>
<l>yayau yātrotsavaṃ draṣṭum udyānaṃ saparicchadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.6'>
<lg>
<l>krameṇa yauvana-sthā sā madhu-māse kadā-cana /</l>
<l>yayau yātrā-utsavaṃ draṣṭum udyānaṃ sa-paricchadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.7' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatraikadeśe 'paśyat tāṃ kusumāvacayodyatām /</l>
<l>utkṣiptabāhulatikālakṣitaikapayaḥdharām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.7'>
<lg>
<l>tatra eka-deśe 'paśyat tāṃ kusuma-avacaya-udyatām /</l>
<l>utkṣipta-bāhu-latikā-lakṣita-eka-payaḥ-dharām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.8' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>prasūnavṛntavigalatsaṃdaṃśakaraśobhinīm /</l>
<l>āḍhyaputro manaḥsvāmī nāma yātrāgato dvijaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.8'>
<lg>
<l>prasūna-vṛnta-vigalat-saṃdaṃśa-kara-śobhinīm /</l>
<l>āḍhya-putro manaḥsvāmī nāma yātrā-āgato dvi-jaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.9' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>sa tayā dṛṣṭayā sadyo hṛtasya manaso yuvā /</l>
<l>manaḥsvāmy api naivābhūt svāmī madanamohitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.9'>
<lg>
<l>sa tayā dṛṣṭayā sadyo hṛtasya manaso yuvā /</l>
<l>manaḥsvāmy api na eva abhūt svāmī madana-mohitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.10' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>mārgaṇānāṃ kṛte kiṃ svid ratir eṣā manaḥbhuvaḥ /</l>
<l>vasantasaṃbhṛtānīha puṣpāṇy uccinute svayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.10'>
<lg>
<l>mārgaṇānāṃ kṛte kiṃ svid ratir eṣā manaḥ-bhuvaḥ /</l>
<l>vasanta-saṃbhṛtāni iha puṣpāṇy uccinute svayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.11' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kiṃ vārcayitukāmeyaṃ mādhavaṃ vanadevatā /</l>
<l>iti saṃcintayantaṃ taṃ sāpy apaśyan nṛpātmajā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.11'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ va ārcayitu-kāma īyaṃ mādhavaṃ vana-devatā /</l>
<l>iti saṃcintayantaṃ taṃ sa āpy apaśyan nṛ-pa-ātma-jā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.12' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>dṛṣṭamātre ca sā tasmin sāṅge nava iva smare /</l>
<l>na puṣpāṇi na cāṅgāni sotkā nātmānam asmarat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.12'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭa-mātre ca sā tasmin sa-aṅge nava iva smare /</l>
<l>na puṣpāṇi na ca aṅgāni sa-utkā nā atmānam asmarat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.13' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ity anyo'nyanavapremasarasau yāvad atra tau /</l>
<l>tiṣṭhatas tāvad udabhūd dhāhāheti mahāravaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.13'>
<lg>
<l>ity anyo'nya-nava-prema-sa-rasau yāvad atra tau /</l>
<l>tiṣṭhatas tāvad udabhūd dhāhāha īti mahā-ravaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.14' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kim etad iti cotkṣiptakamdharaṃ paśyatos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>āyād atropalabdhānyagajagandhotthayā ruṣā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.14'>
<lg>
<l>kim etad iti ca utkṣipta-kam-dharaṃ paśyatos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>āyād atra upalabdha-anya-gaja-gandha-utthayā ruṣā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.15' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>bhagnālāno vinirgatya matto mārgadrumān rujan /</l>
<l>patitādhorano dhāvaṃl lambamānāṅkuśaḥ karī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.15'>
<lg>
<l>bhagna-ālāno vinirgatya matto mārga-drumān rujan /</l>
<l>patita-ādhorano dhāvaṃl lambamāna-aṅkuśaḥ karī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.16' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tataḥ parijane trastavidrute tāṃ sasaṃbhramam /</l>
<l>rājaputrīṃ pradhāvyaiva dorbhyām utkṣipya caikakām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.16'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ parijane trasta-vidrute tāṃ sa-saṃbhramam /</l>
<l>rāja-putrīṃ pradhāvya eva dorbhyām utkṣipya ca ekakām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.17' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>aṅgaiḥ kimcit kṛtāśleṣāṃ bhayaprematrapākulām /</l>
<l>nināya sa manaḥsvāmī sudūraṃ gajagocarāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.17'>
<lg>
<l>aṅgaiḥ kim-cit kṛta-āśleṣāṃ bhaya-prema-trapā-ākulām /</l>
<l>nināya sa manaḥsvāmī su-dūraṃ gaja-gocarāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.18' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>athāgataiḥ parijanaiḥ stuvadbhis taṃ dvijottamam /</l>
<l>muhur vivṛtya paśyantī sā ninye nijamandiram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.18'>
<lg>
<l>athā agataiḥ parijanaiḥ stuvadbhis taṃ dvi-ja-uttamam /</l>
<l>muhur vivṛtya paśyantī sā ninye nija-mandiram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.19' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatra tasthau tam evārtā smarantī prāṇadāyinam /</l>
<l>smarāgnipuṭapākena pacyamānā divāniśam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.19'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tasthau tam evā artā smarantī prāṇa-dāyinam /</l>
<l>smara-agni-puṭa-pākena pacyamānā divā-niśam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.20' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>so 'py udyānān manaḥsvāmī tadā tasmād anuvrajan /</l>
<l>svāntaḥpurapraviṣṭāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sotko vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.20'>
<lg>
<l>so 'py udyānān manaḥsvāmī tadā tasmād anuvrajan /</l>
<l>sva-antaḥ-pura-praviṣṭāṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvā sa-utko vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.21' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>naitāṃ vinādhunā sthātuṃ jīvituṃ vāham utsahe /</l>
<l>tan me śrīmūladevo 'tra dhūrthaḥ siddho gurur gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.21'>
<lg>
<l>na etāṃ vina ādhunā sthātuṃ jīvituṃ va āham utsahe /</l>
<l>tan me śrī-mūladevo 'tra dhūrthaḥ siddho gurur gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.22' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>iti saṃcintya katham apy asminn avasite dine /</l>
<l>prato yayau guros tasya mūladevasya so 'ntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.22'>
<lg>
<l>iti saṃcintya katham apy asminn avasite dine /</l>
<l>prato yayau guros tasya mūladevasya so 'ntikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.23' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>dadarśa taṃ ca mitreṇa śaśinā nitya saṃgatam /</l>
<l>siddhamāyādbhutapathaṃ saśarīram ivāmbaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.23'>
<lg>
<l>dadarśa taṃ ca mitreṇa śaśinā nitya saṃgatam /</l>
<l>siddha-māyā-adbhuta-pathaṃ sa-śarīram iva ambaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.24' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>nyavedayac ca tat tasmai praṇamya svamanīṣitam /</l>
<l>so 'pi sādhayituṃ tasya pratipede vihasya tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.24'>
<lg>
<l>nyavedayac ca tat tasmai praṇamya sva-manīṣitam /</l>
<l>so 'pi sādhayituṃ tasya pratipede vihasya tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.25' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tataḥ sa yogagulikāṃ kṣiptvā dhūrtapatir mukhe /</l>
<l>mūladevo vyadhād vṛddhabrāhmaṇākṛtim ātmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.25'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa yoga-gulikāṃ kṣiptvā dhūrta-patir mukhe /</l>
<l>mūladevo vyadhād vṛddha-brāhmaṇa-ākṛtim ātmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.26' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>dvitīyāṃ gulikāṃ dattvā mukhakṣepyāṃ cakāra ca /</l>
<l>sukāntakanyakārūpaṃ taṃ manaḥsvāminaṃ dvijam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.26'>
<lg>
<l>dvitīyāṃ gulikāṃ dattvā mukha-kṣepyāṃ cakāra ca /</l>
<l>su-kānta-kanyakā-rūpaṃ taṃ manaḥsvāminaṃ dvi-jam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.27' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tadrūpaṃ taṃ samādāya gatvā dhūrtādhipo 'tha saḥ /</l>
<l>tatpriyājanakaṃ bhūpam āsthāne taṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.27'>
<lg>
<l>tad-rūpaṃ taṃ samādāya gatvā dhūrta-adhipo 'tha saḥ /</l>
<l>tat-priyā-janakaṃ bhū-pam āsthāne taṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.28' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>rājann eko 'sti me putraḥ kanyā dūrāc ca tatkṛte /</l>
<l>mayaiṣā yācitānītā sa ca kvāpi gato 'dhunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.28'>
<lg>
<l>rājann eko 'sti me putraḥ kanyā dūrāc ca tat-kṛte /</l>
<l>maya aiṣā yācitā ānītā sa ca kva api gato 'dhunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.29' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tam anveṣṭum ahaṃ yāmi tad eṣā rakṣyatāṃ tvayā /</l>
<l>ānayāmi sutaṃ yāvat tvaṃ hi viśvasya rakṣitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.29'>
<lg>
<l>tam anveṣṭum ahaṃ yāmi tad eṣā rakṣyatāṃ tvayā /</l>
<l>ānayāmi sutaṃ yāvat tvaṃ hi viśvasya rakṣitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.30' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tac chrutvā śāpabhītyā ca pratipadya sa bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>sutām ānāyayāmāsa yaśaḥketuḥ śaśiprabhām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.30'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā śāpa-bhītyā ca pratipadya sa bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>sutām ānāyayāmāsa yaśaḥketuḥ śaśiprabhām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.31' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>jagāda caitāṃ putrīmāṃ kanyāṃ rakṣeḥ svamandire /</l>
<l>svapārśva eva cāhāraṃ śayyāṃ cāsyāḥ prakalpayeḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.31'>
<lg>
<l>jagāda ca etāṃ putri īmāṃ kanyāṃ rakṣeḥ sva-mandire /</l>
<l>sva-pārśva eva cā ahāraṃ śayyāṃ ca asyāḥ prakalpayeḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.32' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>iti pitroktayā ninye kanyārūpas tatheti saḥ /</l>
<l>antaḥpuraṃ manaḥsvāmī rājaputryā tayā nijam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.32'>
<lg>
<l>iti pitra ūktayā ninye kanyā-rūpas tatha īti saḥ /</l>
<l>antaḥ-puraṃ manaḥsvāmī rāja-putryā tayā nijam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.33' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>yathāruci tato yāte muladeve dvijākṛtau /</l>
<l>kanyārūpaḥ sa tatrāsīn manaḥsvāmī priyāntike //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.33'>
<lg>
<l>yathā-ruci tato yāte muladeve dvi-ja-ākṛtau /</l>
<l>kanyā-rūpaḥ sa tatrā asīn manaḥsvāmī priyā-antike //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.34' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>dinaiś ca tāṃ sakhīprītivisrambhaṃ samyagāgatām /</l>
<l>ekadā virahakṣāmāṃ śayanīyaluṭhattanum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.34'>
<lg>
<l>dinaiś ca tāṃ sakhī-prīti-visrambhaṃ samyag-āgatām /</l>
<l>ekadā viraha-kṣāmāṃ śayanīya-luṭhat-tanum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.35' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>rātrau raho rājasutām āsannaśayanasthitaḥ /</l>
<l>kanyārūpapraticchanno manaḥsvāmī sa pṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.35'>
<lg>
<l>rātrau raho rāja-sutām āsanna-śayana-sthitaḥ /</l>
<l>kanyā-rūpa-praticchanno manaḥsvāmī sa pṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.36' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>sakhi kiṃ pāṇḍurachāyā kṣīyamāṇā dine dine /</l>
<l>kāntapakṣaviyukteva duḥkhitāsi śaśiprabhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.36'>
<lg>
<l>sakhi kiṃ pāṇḍura-chāyā kṣīyamāṇā dine dine /</l>
<l>kānta-pakṣa-viyukta īva duḥkhita āsi śaśiprabhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.37' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>brūhi me ko hy aviśvāsaḥ snigdhamugdhe sakhijane /</l>
<l>idānīṃ naiva bhokṣye 'haṃ na vadiṣyasi cen mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.37'>
<lg>
<l>brūhi me ko hy a-viśvāsaḥ snigdha-mugdhe sakhi-jane /</l>
<l>idānīṃ na eva bhokṣye 'haṃ na vadiṣyasi cen mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.38' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tac chrutvā sā viniḥśvasya śanaī rājasutābravīt /</l>
<l>kiṃ me tvayy apy aviśvāsaḥ śṛṇu tat sakhi vacmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.38'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sā viniḥśvasya śanaī rāja-suta ābravīt /</l>
<l>kiṃ me tvayy apy a-viśvāsaḥ śṛṇu tat sakhi vacmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.39' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ekadāhaṃ madhūdyānayātrāṃ draṣṭuṃ gatābhavam /</l>
<l>tatrāpaśyaṃ ca subhagaṃ kamcid brāhmaṇaputrakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.39'>
<lg>
<l>ekada āhaṃ madhu-udyāna-yātrāṃ draṣṭuṃ gata ābhavam /</l>
<l>tatra apaśyaṃ ca su-bhagaṃ kam-cid brāhmaṇa-putrakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.40' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>himamuktendusaśrīkaṃ darśanoddīpitasmaram /</l>
<l>madhumāsam ivālokakrīḍālaṃkṛtakānanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.40'>
<lg>
<l>hima-mukta-indu-sa-śrīkaṃ darśana-uddīpita-smaram /</l>
<l>madhu-māsam ivā aloka-krīḍa-alaṃkṛta-kānanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.41' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>cakorāyitum ete ca pravṛtte yāvad unmukhe /</l>
<l>tanmukhendudyutisudhāpāyinī me vilocane //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.41'>
<lg>
<l>cakorāyitum ete ca pravṛtte yāvad unmukhe /</l>
<l>tan-mukha-indu-dyuti-sudhā-pāyinī me vilocane //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.42' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tāvat sravanmadajalas tatrākasmān niḥargalaḥ /</l>
<l>akālakālameghābho garjann āgān mahāgajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.42'>
<lg>
<l>tāvat sravan-mada-jalas tatra akasmān niḥ-argalaḥ /</l>
<l>a-kāla-kāla-megha-ābho garjann āgān mahā-gajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.43' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatsaṃbhramāt parijane naṣṭe 'haṃ bhayavihvalā /</l>
<l>utkṣipya vipraputreṇa nītā tenaiva dūrataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.43'>
<lg>
<l>tat-saṃbhramāt parijane naṣṭe 'haṃ bhaya-vihvalā /</l>
<l>utkṣipya vipra-putreṇa nītā tena eva dūrataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.44' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>śrīkhaṇḍenānulipteva sikteva sudhayā tathā /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tadaṅgasparśena na jāne kāṃ daśām agām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.44'>
<lg>
<l>śrī-khaṇḍena anulipta īva sikta īva sudhayā tathā /</l>
<l>ahaṃ tad-aṅga-sparśena na jāne kāṃ daśām agām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.45' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kṣanāc ca parivāreṇa militenā-vaśā tataḥ /</l>
<l>ihānītāsmi nikṣiptā svargād iva bhuvas tale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.45'>
<lg>
<l>kṣanāc ca parivāreṇa militena a-vaśā tataḥ /</l>
<l>ihā anīta āsmi nikṣiptā svargād iva bhuvas tale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.46' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tadāprabhṛti saṃkalpais tais taiḥ kalpitasaṃgamam /</l>
<l>paśyāmi taṃ prabuddhāpi pārśvasthaṃ prāṇadaṃ patim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.46'>
<lg>
<l>tadā-prabhṛti saṃkalpais tais taiḥ kalpita-saṃgamam /</l>
<l>paśyāmi taṃ prabuddha āpi pārśva-sthaṃ prāṇa-daṃ patim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.47' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>suptā svapne ca kurvāṇaṃ cāṭūny ālokayāmi tam /</l>
<l>tyājayantaṃ haṭhāl lajjāṃ cumbanāliṅganādhibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.47'>
<lg>
<l>suptā svapne ca kurvāṇaṃ cāṭūny ālokayāmi tam /</l>
<l>tyājayantaṃ haṭhāl lajjāṃ cumbana-āliṅgana-ādhibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.48' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>na ca prāpnomy abhavyā tannāmādyajñānamohitā /</l>
<l>tad evaṃ māṃ dahaty eṣa prāṇeśavirahānalaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.48'>
<lg>
<l>na ca prāpnomy abhavyā tan-nāma-ādy-ajñāna-mohitā /</l>
<l>tad evaṃ māṃ dahaty eṣa prāṇa-īśa-viraha-analaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.49' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>iti vāksudhayā tasyāḥ pūrṇasvaśravaṇodaraḥ /</l>
<l>sānandaḥ sa manaḥsvāmī viprakanyāvapuḥdharaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.49'>
<lg>
<l>iti vāk-sudhayā tasyāḥ pūrṇa-sva-śravaṇa-udaraḥ /</l>
<l>sa-ānandaḥ sa manaḥsvāmī vipra-kanyā-vapuḥ-dharaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.50' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kṛtārthamānī matvā taṃ kālam ātmaprakāśane /</l>
<l>svarūpaṃ prakaṭīcakre niṣkṛṣya gulikāṃ mukhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.50'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-artha-mānī matvā taṃ kālam ātma-prakāśane /</l>
<l>sva-rūpaṃ prakaṭī-cakre niṣkṛṣya gulikāṃ mukhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.51' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>jagāda ca vilolākṣi so 'ham evaiṣo yas tvayā /</l>
<l>udyāne darśanakrīto nīto niḥvyājadāsatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.51'>
<lg>
<l>jagāda ca vilola-akṣi so 'ham eva eṣo yas tvayā /</l>
<l>udyāne darśana-krīto nīto niḥ-vyāja-dāsatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.52' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tvat saṃstavakṣaṇabhraṃśāt kleśaṃ taṃ cāptavān aham /</l>
<l>yasyaiṣaḥ pariṇāmo me kanyārūpagraho 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.52'>
<lg>
<l>tvat saṃstava-kṣaṇa-bhraṃśāt kleśaṃ taṃ cā aptavān aham /</l>
<l>yasya eṣaḥ pariṇāmo me kanyā-rūpa-graho 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.53' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tasmāt saphalayaitāṃ me visoḍhāṃ virahavyathām /</l>
<l>ātmanaś ca na tanvaṅgi kṣamate 'taḥ paraṃ smaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.53'>
<lg>
<l>tasmāt saphalaya etāṃ me visoḍhāṃ viraha-vyathām /</l>
<l>ātmanaś ca na tanv-aṅgi kṣamate 'taḥ paraṃ smaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.54' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>evaṃ vadantaṃ sahasā prāṇeśaṃ taṃ vilokya sā /</l>
<l>āsīd rājasutā kṣipraṃ snehāścaryatrapākulā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.54'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ vadantaṃ sahasā prāṇa-īśaṃ taṃ vilokya sā /</l>
<l>āsīd rāja-sutā kṣipraṃ sneha-āścarya-trapā-ākulā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.55' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>athātyautsukyanirvṛttagāndharvodvāhayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>premṇas tasya mato yādṛk tādṛśo 'bhūd ratotsavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.55'>
<lg>
<l>atha atyautsukya-nirvṛtta-gāndharva-udvāhayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>premṇas tasya mato yādṛk tādṛśo 'bhūd rata-utsavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.56' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tataḥ so 'tra manaḥsvāmī kṛtī tasthau dvirūpabhṛt /</l>
<l>divā sagulikāḥ kanyā rātrāv agulikāḥ pumān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.56'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ so 'tra manaḥsvāmī kṛtī tasthau dvi-rūpa-bhṛt /</l>
<l>divā sa-gulikāḥ kanyā rātrāv a-gulikāḥ pumān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.57' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>gateṣv atha dineṣv atra yaśaḥketor mahīpateḥ /</l>
<l>mṛgāṅkadattasaṃjñena svaśuryeṇa nijā sutā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.57'>
<lg>
<l>gateṣv atha dineṣv atra yaśaḥketor mahī-pateḥ /</l>
<l>mṛgāṅkadatta-saṃjñena svaśuryeṇa nijā sutā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.58' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>dattā mṛgāṅkavatyākhyā mahārhavibhavottarā /</l>
<l>dvijātaye mahāmantriprajñāsāgarasūnave //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.58'>
<lg>
<l>dattā mṛgāṅkavaty-ākhyā mahā-arha-vibhava-uttarā /</l>
<l>dvi-jātaye mahā-mantri-prajñāsāgara-sūnave //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.59' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tasmin mātulaputryāḥ sā rājaputrī śaśiprabhā /</l>
<l>vivāhe mātulagṛhaṃ taj jagāma nimantritā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.59'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin mātula-putryāḥ sā rāja-putrī śaśiprabhā /</l>
<l>vivāhe mātula-gṛhaṃ taj jagāma nimantritā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.60' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tayā saha yayau so 'pi kanyakāparivārayā /</l>
<l>vipraputro manaḥsvāmī kāntakanyāsvarūpadhṛt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.60'>
<lg>
<l>tayā saha yayau so 'pi kanyakā-parivārayā /</l>
<l>vipra-putro manaḥsvāmī kānta-kanyā-sva-rūpa-dhṛt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.61' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatra taṃ kanyakārūpadharaṃ mantrisuto 'tha saḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā kila smaravyādhagāḍhabāṇāhato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.61'>
<lg>
<l>tatra taṃ kanyakā-rūpa-dharaṃ mantri-suto 'tha saḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā kila smara-vyādha-gāḍha-bāṇa-āhato 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.62' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tato muṣitacittaḥ saṃs tayā kapaṭakanyayā /</l>
<l>yayau mantrisutaḥ śūnyaṃ svagṛhaṃ svavadhūsakhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.62'>
<lg>
<l>tato muṣita-cittaḥ saṃs tayā kapaṭa-kanyayā /</l>
<l>yayau mantri-sutaḥ śūnyaṃ sva-gṛhaṃ sva-vadhū-sakhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.63' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatra tanmukhalāvanyadhyānāsakto jagāma saḥ /</l>
<l>tīvrarāgamahāvyāladaṣṭo moham aśaṅkitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.63'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tan-mukha-lāvanya-dhyāna-āsakto jagāma saḥ /</l>
<l>tīvra-rāga-mahā-vyāla-daṣṭo moham a-śaṅkitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.64' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kim etad iti saṃbhrānte jane tatrotsavojjhite /</l>
<l>tam upāgād drutaṃ buddhvā sa prajñāsāgaraḥ pitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.64'>
<lg>
<l>kim etad iti saṃbhrānte jane tatra utsava-ujjhite /</l>
<l>tam upāgād drutaṃ buddhvā sa prajñāsāgaraḥ pitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.65' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tena cāśvāsyamāno 'pi pitrā mohāt prabudhya saḥ /</l>
<l>pralapann iva sonmādam ujjagāra manaḥgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.65'>
<lg>
<l>tena cā aśvāsyamāno 'pi pitrā mohāt prabudhya saḥ /</l>
<l>pralapann iva sa-unmādam ujjagāra manaḥ-gatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.66' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>asvādhīnaṃ ca taṃ matvā tat pitary ativihvale /</l>
<l>tasmin rājāpi tad buddhvā tatraiva samupāyayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.66'>
<lg>
<l>a-sva-adhīnaṃ ca taṃ matvā tat pitary ativihvale /</l>
<l>tasmin rāja āpi tad buddhvā tatra eva samupāyayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.67' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā jhaṭity eva gāḍhābhiṣvaṅgato gatam /</l>
<l>saptamīṃ madanāvasthāṃ jagāda prakṛtīr nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.67'>
<lg>
<l>sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā jhaṭity eva gāḍha-abhiṣvaṅgato gatam /</l>
<l>saptamīṃ madana-avasthāṃ jagāda prakṛtīr nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.68' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kathaṃ brāhmaṇanikṣepaḥ kanyā sāsmai pradīyate /</l>
<l>tayā vinā ca niyataṃ paścimām ety asau daśām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.68'>
<lg>
<l>kathaṃ brāhmaṇa-nikṣepaḥ kanyā sa āsmai pradīyate /</l>
<l>tayā vinā ca niyataṃ paścimām ety asau daśām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.69' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>asmin naṣṭe pitāsyaiṣo mama mantrī vinaṅkṣyati /</l>
<l>etannāśe rājyanāśas tad iha brūta kā gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.69'>
<lg>
<l>asmin naṣṭe pita āsya eṣo mama mantrī vinaṅkṣyati /</l>
<l>etan-nāśe rājya-nāśas tad iha brūta kā gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.70' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ity uktās tena rājñā tāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo 'bruvan /</l>
<l>rājño dharmaṃ nijaṃ prāhuḥ prajānāṃ dharmarakṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.70'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktās tena rājñā tāḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayo 'bruvan /</l>
<l>rājño dharmaṃ nijaṃ prāhuḥ prajānāṃ dharma-rakṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.71' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>mūlaṃ tasya vidur mantraṃ sa ca mantriṣv avasthitaḥ /</l>
<l>mantrināśe mūlanāśād rakṣyā dharmakṣatir dhruvam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.71'>
<lg>
<l>mūlaṃ tasya vidur mantraṃ sa ca mantriṣv avasthitaḥ /</l>
<l>mantri-nāśe mūla-nāśād rakṣyā dharma-kṣatir dhruvam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.72' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>pāpaṃ ca syād dvijasyāsya sasūnor mantriṇo vadhāt /</l>
<l>tasmād rakṣyo 'yam āsanno 'vaśyaṃ te dharmaviplavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.72'>
<lg>
<l>pāpaṃ ca syād dvi-jasya asya sa-sūnor mantriṇo vadhāt /</l>
<l>tasmād rakṣyo 'yam āsanno '-vaśyaṃ te dharma-viplavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.73' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>dātavyā mantriputrāya vipranyastā kumārikā /</l>
<l>kālāntarāgate vipre kruddhe pratividhāsyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.73'>
<lg>
<l>dātavyā mantri-putrāya vipra-nyastā kumārikā /</l>
<l>kāla-antara-āgate vipre kruddhe pratividhāsyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.74' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>evam uktaḥ prakṛtibhis tatheti pratyapadyata /</l>
<l>sa rājā mantriputrāya dātuṃ tāṃ kūṭakanyakām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.74'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktaḥ prakṛtibhis tatha īti pratyapadyata /</l>
<l>sa rājā mantri-putrāya dātuṃ tāṃ kūṭa-kanyakām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.75' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ānītaś ca sa niścitya lagnaṃ rājasūtāgṛhāt /</l>
<l>kanyārūpo manaḥsvāmī taṃ jagāda mahīpatim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.75'>
<lg>
<l>ānītaś ca sa niścitya lagnaṃ rāja-sūtā-gṛhāt /</l>
<l>kanyā-rūpo manaḥsvāmī taṃ jagāda mahī-patim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.76' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>anyenānyārtham ānītām anyasmai māṃ dadāsi cet /</l>
<l>kāmaṃ tad astu rājā tvaṃ dharmādharmau tavādya tau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.76'>
<lg>
<l>anyena anya-artham ānītām anyasmai māṃ dadāsi cet /</l>
<l>kāmaṃ tad astu rājā tvaṃ dharma-adharmau tava adya tau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.77' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ahaṃ vivāham icchāmi samayenedṛśena tu /</l>
<l>ekaśayyāṃ na netavyā patyā tāvad ahaṃ haṭhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.77'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ vivāham icchāmi samayenā idṛśena tu /</l>
<l>eka-śayyāṃ na netavyā patyā tāvad ahaṃ haṭhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.78' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>yāvat tīrthāni ṣaṇmāsān paribhramya sa nāgataḥ /</l>
<l>evaṃ na cet kṛttajihvāṃ dantair jānīhi māṃ mṛtām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.78'>
<lg>
<l>yāvat tīrthāni ṣaṇ-māsān paribhramya sa nā agataḥ /</l>
<l>evaṃ na cet kṛtta-jihvāṃ dantair jānīhi māṃ mṛtām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.79' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ity ukte samaye tena yūnā kanyāvapuḥbhṛtā /</l>
<l>rājñā sa bodhitaḥ prāpa niḥvṛttiṃ mantriputrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.79'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte samaye tena yūnā kanyā-vapuḥ-bhṛtā /</l>
<l>rājñā sa bodhitaḥ prāpa niḥ-vṛttiṃ mantri-putrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.80' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatheti pratipadyaitat kṛtvodvāhaṃ kilāśu tam /</l>
<l>ekasmin sthāpayitvā ca vāsake te surakṣite //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.80'>
<lg>
<l>tatha īti pratipadya etat kṛtva ūdvāhaṃ kilā aśu tam /</l>
<l>ekasmin sthāpayitvā ca vāsake te su-rakṣite //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.81' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tāṃ mṛgāṅkavatīm ādyāṃ vadhūṃ kūṭavadhūṃ ca tām /</l>
<l>jagāma tīrthayātrāyai mūḍaḥ kāntāpriyecchayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.81'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ mṛgāṅkavatīm ādyāṃ vadhūṃ kūṭa-vadhūṃ ca tām /</l>
<l>jagāma tīrtha-yātrāyai mūḍaḥ kāntā-priyā-icchayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.82' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>sa covāsa manaḥsvāmī strīrūpo 'tra tayā saha /</l>
<l>mṛgāṅkavatyekagṛhe samānaśayanāsanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.82'>
<lg>
<l>sa ca uvāsa manaḥsvāmī strī-rūpo 'tra tayā saha /</l>
<l>mṛgāṅkavaty-eka-gṛhe samāna-śayana-āsanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.83' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tathā sthitaṃ kadācit taṃ sā mṛgāṅkavatī niśi /</l>
<l>śayyāgṛhe raho 'vādīd bahiḥsupte paricchade //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.83'>
<lg>
<l>tathā sthitaṃ kadā-cit taṃ sā mṛgāṅkavatī niśi /</l>
<l>śayyā-gṛhe raho 'vādīd bahiḥ-supte paricchade //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.84' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>kathāṃ kāmcit tvam ākhyāhi nidrā nāsti hi me sakhi /</l>
<l>tac chrutvākathayat so 'syai strīrūpas tāṃ kathāṃ yuvā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.84'>
<lg>
<l>kathāṃ kām-cit tvam ākhyāhi nidrā na asti hi me sakhi /</l>
<l>tac chrutva ākathayat so 'syai strī-rūpas tāṃ kathāṃ yuvā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.85' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>yatrelākhyasya rājaṛṣeḥ sūryavaṃśabhuvaḥ purā /</l>
<l>prāptasya gaurīśāpena srtītvaṃ viśvaikamohanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.85'>
<lg>
<l>yatra ilā-ākhyasya rāja-ṛṣeḥ sūrya-vaṃśa-bhuvaḥ purā /</l>
<l>prāptasya gaurī-śāpena srtītvaṃ viśva-eka-mohanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.86' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>anyonyadarśanaprītyā devodyānavanāntare /</l>
<l>abhūd budhena saṃyogaḥ samabhūc ca purūravāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.86'>
<lg>
<l>anyonya-darśana-prītyā deva-udyāna-vana-antare /</l>
<l>abhūd budhena saṃyogaḥ samabhūc ca purūravāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.87' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tāṃ kathāṃ kathayitvā ca dhūrtaḥ puna uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>tad evaṃ devatādeśān mantrauṣadhavaśena vā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.87'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ kathāṃ kathayitvā ca dhūrtaḥ puna uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>tad evaṃ devatā-ādeśān mantra-auṣadha-vaśena vā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.88' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>puruṣaḥ strī kadācit syāt strī vā jātu pumān bhavet /</l>
<l>bhavanti caivaṃ saṃyogāḥ kāmajā mahatām api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.88'>
<lg>
<l>puruṣaḥ strī kadā-cit syāt strī vā jātu pumān bhavet /</l>
<l>bhavanti ca evaṃ saṃyogāḥ kāma-jā mahatām api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.89' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>śrutvaitat taruṇī mugdhā vivāhaproṣitānukā /</l>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī smāha viśvastā sahavāsataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.89'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitat taruṇī mugdhā vivāha-proṣita-anukā /</l>
<l>sā mṛgāṅkavatī smā aha viśvastā saha-vāsataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.90' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>śrutvaitāṃ me kathām etad aṅgaṃ simisimāyate /</l>
<l>hṛdayaṃ sīdatīvedaṃ tad etat sakhi kiṃ vada //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.90'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitāṃ me kathām etad aṅgaṃ simisimāyate /</l>
<l>hṛdayaṃ sīdati iva idaṃ tad etat sakhi kiṃ vada //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.91' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'ṅganārūpo vipraḥ puna uvāca tām /</l>
<l>etāni kāmacihnāni nanv apūrvāṇi te sakhi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.91'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'ṅganā-rūpo vipraḥ puna uvāca tām /</l>
<l>etāni kāma-cihnāni nanv a-pūrvāṇi te sakhi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.92' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>mayaitāny anubhūtāni nigūhe na hy ahaṃ tava /</l>
<l>iti tenoditāvādīt sā mṛgāṅkavatī śanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.92'>
<lg>
<l>maya aitāny anubhūtāni nigūhe na hy ahaṃ tava /</l>
<l>iti tena udita āvādīt sā mṛgāṅkavatī śanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.93' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>sakhi prāṇasamā tvaṃ me tat kālajñā na vacmi kim /</l>
<l>api puṃsaḥ praveśaḥ syād upāyena hi kenacit //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.93'>
<lg>
<l>sakhi prāṇa-samā tvaṃ me tat kāla-jñā na vacmi kim /</l>
<l>api puṃsaḥ praveśaḥ syād upāyena hi kena-cit //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.94' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>evam uktavatīm etāṃ sa ca labdhāśayas tadā /</l>
<l>prāha dhūrtapateḥ śiṣyo yady evaṃ tad vadāmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.94'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatīm etāṃ sa ca labdha-āśayas tadā /</l>
<l>prāha dhūrta-pateḥ śiṣyo yady evaṃ tad vadāmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.95' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>vaiṣṇavo 'sti prasādo me yenāhaṃ svecchayā niśi /</l>
<l>puruṣaḥ syāṃ tad eṣa adya bhavāmi tvatkṛte pumān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.95'>
<lg>
<l>vaiṣṇavo 'sti prasādo me yena ahaṃ sva-icchayā niśi /</l>
<l>puruṣaḥ syāṃ tad eṣa adya bhavāmi tvat-kṛte pumān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.96' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ity uktvā sa manaḥsvāmī niṣkṛṣya gulikāṃ mukhāt /</l>
<l>yauvanoddāmam ātmānaṃ tasyai kāntam adarśayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.96'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā sa manaḥsvāmī niṣkṛṣya gulikāṃ mukhāt /</l>
<l>yauvana-uddāmam ātmānaṃ tasyai kāntam adarśayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.97' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tataḥ kathitavisrambhaḥ sarvasvagatayantraṇaḥ /</l>
<l>kālocitarasaḥ ko 'pi tayor āsīd ratotsavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.97'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kathita-visrambhaḥ sarva-sva-gata-yantraṇaḥ /</l>
<l>kāla-ucita-rasaḥ ko 'pi tayor āsīd rata-utsavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.98' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>atha tatra tayā sākaṃ sa mantrisutabhāryayā /</l>
<l>tasthau dvijo divā nārī rātrau ca puruṣo bhavan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.98'>
<lg>
<l>atha tatra tayā sākaṃ sa mantri-suta-bhāryayā /</l>
<l>tasthau dvi-jo divā nārī rātrau ca puruṣo bhavan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.99' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>āsannāgamanaṃ taṃ ca buddhvā mantrisutaṃ dinaiḥ /</l>
<l>tām ādāya niśi svairaṃ palāyya sa yayau tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.99'>
<lg>
<l>āsannā agamanaṃ taṃ ca buddhvā mantri-sutaṃ dinaiḥ /</l>
<l>tām ādāya niśi svairaṃ palāyya sa yayau tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.100' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>etasmiṃś ca kathāsaṃdhau mūladevaḥ sa tadguruḥ /</l>
<l>buddhvā tad akhilaṃ bhūtvā bhūyo vṛddhadvijākṛtiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.100'>
<lg>
<l>etasmiṃś ca kathā-saṃdhau mūladevaḥ sa tad-guruḥ /</l>
<l>buddhvā tad akhilaṃ bhūtvā bhūyo vṛddha-dvi-ja-ākṛtiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.101' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>śaśinānugataḥ sakhyā taruṇadvijarūpiṇā /</l>
<l>āgatya taṃ yaśaḥketuṃ prahvo rājānam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.101'>
<lg>
<l>śaśina ānugataḥ sakhyā taruṇa-dvi-ja-rūpiṇā /</l>
<l>āgatya taṃ yaśaḥketuṃ prahvo rājānam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.102' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ānīto 'yaṃ mayā putro dehi me tāṃ snuṣām iti /</l>
<l>tataḥ saṃmantrya sa nṛpaḥ śāpabhītas tam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.102'>
<lg>
<l>ānīto 'yaṃ mayā putro dehi me tāṃ snuṣām iti /</l>
<l>tataḥ saṃmantrya sa nṛ-paḥ śāpa-bhītas tam abhyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.103' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>brahman na jāne kva gatā sā snuṣā te kṣamasva tat /</l>
<l>aparādhāt sutasyārthe dadāmi svasutāṃ tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.103'>
<lg>
<l>brahman na jāne kva gatā sā snuṣā te kṣamasva tat /</l>
<l>aparādhāt sutasya arthe dadāmi sva-sutāṃ tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.104' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>ity uktvā dhūrtarājaṃ taṃ kṛtakakrodhaniṣṭhuram /</l>
<l>vibruvāṇaṃ jaradviprarūpaṃ prārthya sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.104'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā dhūrta-rājaṃ taṃ kṛtaka-krodha-niṣṭhuram /</l>
<l>vibruvāṇaṃ jarad-vipra-rūpaṃ prārthya sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.105' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatsakhye kṛtatatputravyapadeśāya tāṃ dadau /</l>
<l>tanayāṃ śaśine tasmai yathāvidhi śaśiprabhām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.105'>
<lg>
<l>tat-sakhye kṛta-tat-putra-vyapadeśāya tāṃ dadau /</l>
<l>tanayāṃ śaśine tasmai yathā-vidhi śaśiprabhām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.106' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tataḥ sa mūladevas tau yathābhūtau vadhūvarau /</l>
<l>ādāya svāspadaṃ prāyād rājārtheṣv akṛtaspṛhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.106'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa mūladevas tau yathā-bhūtau vadhū-varau /</l>
<l>ādāya sva-āspadaṃ prāyād rāja-artheṣv a-kṛta-spṛhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.107' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tatra tasmiṃś ca milite manaḥsvāmīny abhūn mahān /</l>
<l>vivādo mūladevāgre śaśinas tasya cobhayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.107'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tasmiṃś ca milite manaḥsvāmīny abhūn mahān /</l>
<l>vivādo mūladeva-agre śaśinas tasya ca ubhayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.108' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>manaḥsvāmy abravīd eṣā dīyatāṃ me śaśiprabhā /</l>
<l>kanyaiva hi mayodūḍā prāg asau gurvanugrahāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.108'>
<lg>
<l>manaḥsvāmy abravīd eṣā dīyatāṃ me śaśiprabhā /</l>
<l>kanya aiva hi maya ūdūḍā prāg asau gurv-anugrahāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.109' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>śaśī jagāda ko 'syās tvaṃ mūrkha dārā iyaṃ mama /</l>
<l>agnisākṣikam eṣā hi pitrā me pratipāditā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.109'>
<lg>
<l>śaśī jagāda ko 'syās tvaṃ mūrkha dārā iyaṃ mama /</l>
<l>agni-sākṣikam eṣā hi pitrā me pratipāditā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.110' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>evaṃ māyābalaprāptarājaputrīnimittataḥ /</l>
<l>vivādāsaktayor nāsīt paricchedas tayor dvayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.110'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ māyā-bala-prāpta-rāja-putrī-nimittataḥ /</l>
<l>vivāda-āsaktayor nā asīt paricchedas tayor dvayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.111' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>tad rājaṃs tvaṃ mama brūhi tāvat kasyopapadyate /</l>
<l>bhāryā sā saṃśayaṃ chindhi pūrvoktaḥ samayo 'sti te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.111'>
<lg>
<l>tad rājaṃs tvaṃ mama brūhi tāvat kasya upapadyate /</l>
<l>bhāryā sā saṃśayaṃ chindhi pūrva-uktaḥ samayo 'sti te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.112' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā tasmāt skandhāgravartinaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ nṛpatiḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.112'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā tasmāt skandha-agra-vartinaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ nṛ-patiḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.113' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>manye śaśina evāsau bhāryā nyāyyā nṛpātmajā /</l>
<l>yasmai pradattā prakaṭaṃ pitrā dharmyeṇa vartmanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.113'>
<lg>
<l>manye śaśina eva asau bhāryā nyāyyā nṛ-pātma-jā /</l>
<l>yasmai pradattā prakaṭaṃ pitrā dharmyeṇa vartmanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.114' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>manaḥsvāmī tu tāṃ bheje cauryād gāndharvadharmataḥ /</l>
<l>caurasya tu parasveṣu svatvaṃ nyāyyaṃ na jātu cit //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.114'>
<lg>
<l>manaḥsvāmī tu tāṃ bheje cauryād gāndharva-dharmataḥ /</l>
<l>caurasya tu para-sveṣu svatvaṃ nyāyyaṃ na jātu cit //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.22.115' corresp='Vet_15'>
<l>iti tasya vaco niśamya rājño vetālaḥ sa yayau punas tad eva /</l>
<l>sahasaiva tad aṃsataḥ svadhāma kṣitipaḥ so 'pi tam anviyāya tūrṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.22.115'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasya vaco niśamya rājño vetālaḥ sa yayau punas tad eva /</l>
<l>sahasa aiva tad aṃsataḥ sva-dhāma kṣiti-paḥ so 'pi tam anviyāya tūrṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.1' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ skandhe vetālaṃ śiṃśapādrumāt /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam ādāyodacalat tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.1'>
<lg>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ skandhe vetālaṃ śiṃśapā-drumāt /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam ādāya udacalat tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.2' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūpaṃ sa vetālo 'bravīt punaḥ /</l>
<l>rājañ śṛṇu kathām ekām udārāṃ kathayāmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.2'>
<lg>
<l>āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhū-paṃ sa vetālo 'bravīt punaḥ /</l>
<l>rājañ śṛṇu kathām ekām udārāṃ kathayāmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.3' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>astīha himavān nāma nagendraḥ sarvaratnabhūḥ /</l>
<l>yo gaurīgaṅgayos tulyaḥ prabhavo harakāntayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.3'>
<lg>
<l>asti iha himavān nāma naga-indraḥ sarva-ratna-bhūḥ /</l>
<l>yo gaurī-gaṅgayos tulyaḥ prabhavo hara-kāntayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.4' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>śūrā-saṃspṛṣṭaspṛṣṭhaś ca yo madhye kulabhūbhṛtām /</l>
<l>abhimānonnataḥ satyaṃ gīyate bhuvanatraye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.4'>
<lg>
<l>śūra-a-saṃspṛṣṭa-spṛṣṭhaś ca yo madhye kula-bhū-bhṛtām /</l>
<l>abhimāna-unnataḥ satyaṃ gīyate bhuvana-traye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.5' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tasyāsti sānuny anvarthaṃ tat kāñcanapuraṃ puram /</l>
<l>nyāsīkṛtam ivārkeṇa raśmivṛndaṃ vibhāti yat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasya asti sānuny anv-arthaṃ tat kāñcanapuraṃ puram /</l>
<l>nyāsī-kṛtam iva arkeṇa raśmi-vṛndaṃ vibhāti yat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.6' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jīmūtaketur ity āsīt tasmin puravare purā /</l>
<l>vidyādhareśvaraḥ śrīmān merāv iva śatakratuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.6'>
<lg>
<l>jīmūtaketur ity āsīt tasmin pura-vare purā /</l>
<l>vidyādhara-īśvaraḥ śrīmān merāv iva śata-kratuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.7' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tasyāsīt svagṛhodyāne kalpavṛkṣo 'nvayāgataḥ /</l>
<l>yathārthanāmā prathito yo manaḥrathadāyakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.7'>
<lg>
<l>tasyā asīt sva-gṛha-udyāne kalpa-vṛkṣo 'nvaya-āgataḥ /</l>
<l>yathā-artha-nāmā prathito yo manaḥ-ratha-dāyakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.8' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>taṃ prārthya devatātmānaṃ sa rājā tat prasādataḥ /</l>
<l>prāpa jātismaraṃ putraṃ bodhisattvāṃśasaṃbhavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.8'>
<lg>
<l>taṃ prārthya devatā-ātmānaṃ sa rājā tat prasādataḥ /</l>
<l>prāpa jāti-smaraṃ putraṃ bodhi-sattva-aṃśa-saṃbhavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.9' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>dānavīraṃ mahāsattvaṃ sarvabhūtānukampinam /</l>
<l>guruśuśrūṣaṇaparaṃ nāmnā jīmūtavāhanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.9'>
<lg>
<l>dāna-vīraṃ mahā-sattvaṃ sarva-bhūta-anukampinam /</l>
<l>guru-śuśrūṣaṇa-paraṃ nāmnā jīmūtavāhanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.10' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>saṃprāptayauvanaṃ taṃ ca yauvarājye 'bhiṣiktavān /</l>
<l>tanayaṃ preritaḥ sadbhis tadguṇaiḥ sacivaiś ca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.10'>
<lg>
<l>saṃprāpta-yauvanaṃ taṃ ca yauvarājye 'bhiṣiktavān /</l>
<l>tanayaṃ preritaḥ sadbhis tad-guṇaiḥ sacivaiś ca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.11' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>yauvarājyasthitaś caiṣo jātu jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>hitaiṣibhir upāgatya jagade pitṛmantribhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.11'>
<lg>
<l>yauvarājya-sthitaś ca eṣo jātu jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>hita-eṣibhir upāgatya jagade pitṛ-mantribhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.12' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>deva kalpatarur yo 'yam asti vaḥ sarvakāmadaḥ /</l>
<l>adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ saiṣa pūjyaḥ sadā tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.12'>
<lg>
<l>deva kalpa-tarur yo 'yam asti vaḥ sarva-kāma-daḥ /</l>
<l>a-dhṛṣyaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ saiṣa pūjyaḥ sadā tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.13' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nāsmin sati hi śakro 'pi bādhetāsmān kuto 'paraḥ /</l>
<l>etac chrutvā sa jīmūtavāhano 'ntaracintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.13'>
<lg>
<l>na asmin sati hi śakro 'pi bādheta asmān kuto 'paraḥ /</l>
<l>etac chrutvā sa jīmūtavāhano 'ntaracintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.14' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>aho batedṛśam imaṃ saṃprāpyā-marapādapam /</l>
<l>nāsāditaṃ kim apy asmāt pūrvair nas tādṛśaṃ phalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.14'>
<lg>
<l>aho batā idṛśam imaṃ saṃprāpya a-mara-pāda-pam /</l>
<l>nā asāditaṃ kim apy asmāt pūrvair nas tādṛśaṃ phalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.15' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>kevalaṃ kaiḥcid apy arthair arthitaiḥ kṛpaṇocitaiḥ /</l>
<l>ātmā caiṣo mahātmā ca nītau dvāv api lāghavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.15'>
<lg>
<l>kevalaṃ kaiḥ-cid apy arthair arthitaiḥ kṛpaṇa-ucitaiḥ /</l>
<l>ātmā ca eṣo mahā-ātmā ca nītau dvāv api lāghavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.16' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad ahaṃ sādhayīṣyāmi kāmam asmān manaḥgatam /</l>
<l>iti niścitya sa yayau mahāsattvo 'ntikaṃ pituḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.16'>
<lg>
<l>tad ahaṃ sādhayīṣyāmi kāmam asmān manaḥ-gatam /</l>
<l>iti niścitya sa yayau mahā-sattvo 'ntikaṃ pituḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.17' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatra saṃvihitā-śeṣaśuśrūṣāparitoṣitam /</l>
<l>sukhāsīnaṃ tam ekānte pitaraṃ sa vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.17'>
<lg>
<l>tatra saṃvihita-a-śeṣa-śuśrūṣā-paritoṣitam /</l>
<l>sukha-āsīnaṃ tam eka-ante pitaraṃ sa vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.18' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tata tvam eva jānāsi yad etasmin bhavāmbudhau /</l>
<l>āśarīram idaṃ sarvaṃ vīcivibhramacañcalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.18'>
<lg>
<l>tata tvam eva jānāsi yad etasmin bhava-ambu-dhau /</l>
<l>ā-śarīram idaṃ sarvaṃ vīci-vibhrama-cañcalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.19' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>viśeṣenā-cirasthāyiprakāśapravilāyinī /</l>
<l>saṃdhyā vidyuc ca lakṣmīś ca dṛṣṭā kutra kadā sthirā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.19'>
<lg>
<l>viśeṣena a-cira-sthāyi-prakāśa-pravilāyinī /</l>
<l>saṃdhyā vidyuc ca lakṣmīś ca dṛṣṭā kutra kadā sthirā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.20' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ekaḥ paropakāras tu saṃsāre 'sminn anaśvaraḥ /</l>
<l>yo dharmayaśasī sūte yugāntaśatasākṣiṇī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.20'>
<lg>
<l>ekaḥ para-upakāras tu saṃsāre 'sminn a-naśvaraḥ /</l>
<l>yo dharma-yaśasī sūte yuga-anta-śata-sākṣiṇī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.21' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tat tāta kṣaṇikeṣv eṣu bhogeṣv asmābhir īdṛśaḥ /</l>
<l>eṣa kalpataruḥ kasya kṛte mogho 'bhirakṣyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.21'>
<lg>
<l>tat tāta kṣaṇikeṣv eṣu bhogeṣv asmābhir īdṛśaḥ /</l>
<l>eṣa kalpa-taruḥ kasya kṛte mogho 'bhirakṣyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.22' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>yair vā mama mamety evam āgrahenaiṣo rakṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>pūrvais te kutra kutrāyaṃ teṣāṃ kaś caiṣaḥ ko 'sya vā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.22'>
<lg>
<l>yair vā mama mama ity evam āgrahena eṣo rakṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>pūrvais te kutra kutra ayaṃ teṣāṃ kaś ca eṣaḥ ko 'sya vā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.23' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tasmāt paropakāraikaphalasiddhyai tvadājñayā /</l>
<l>tātainaṃ viniyuñje 'haṃ kāmadaṃ kalpapādapam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.23'>
<lg>
<l>tasmāt para-upakāra-eka-phala-siddhyai tvad-ājñayā /</l>
<l>tāta enaṃ viniyuñje 'haṃ kāma-daṃ kalpa-pāda-pam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.24' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evam astv iti pitrā ca dattānujño 'tha tena saḥ /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano gatvā kalpadrumam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.24'>
<lg>
<l>evam astv iti pitrā ca datta-anujño 'tha tena saḥ /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano gatvā kalpa-drumam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.25' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>abhīṣṭāḥ pūritāḥ kāmāḥ pūrveṣāṃ deva nas tvayā /</l>
<l>tan mamaikam imaṃ kāmam ananyaṃ paripūraya //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.25'>
<lg>
<l>abhīṣṭāḥ pūritāḥ kāmāḥ pūrveṣāṃ deva nas tvayā /</l>
<l>tan mama ekam imaṃ kāmam an-anyaṃ paripūraya //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.26' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>adaridrāṃ yathā pṛthvīm imāṃ drakṣye tathā kuru /</l>
<l>bhadraṃ te vraja datto 'si lokāyārthārthine mayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.26'>
<lg>
<l>a-daridrāṃ yathā pṛthvīm imāṃ drakṣye tathā kuru /</l>
<l>bhadraṃ te vraja datto 'si lokāya artha-arthine mayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.27' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktavati jīmūtavāhane racitāñjalau /</l>
<l>tyaktas tvayaiṣo jāto 'smīty udabhūd vāk taros tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.27'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavati jīmūta-vāhane racita-añjalau /</l>
<l>tyaktas tvaya aiṣo jāto 'smi ity udabhūd vāk taros tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.28' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>kṣaṇāc cotpatya sa divaṃ kalpavṛkṣas tathā vasu /</l>
<l>vavarṣa bhuvi naivāsīt ko 'py asyāṃ duḥgato yathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.28'>
<lg>
<l>kṣaṇāc ca utpatya sa divaṃ kalpa-vṛkṣas tathā vasu /</l>
<l>vavarṣa bhuvi na evā asīt ko 'py asyāṃ duḥ-gato yathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.29' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatas tasya tayā tīvrasarvasattvānukampayā /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhanasyātra trailokye paprathe yaśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.29'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tasya tayā tīvra-sarva-sattva-anukampayā /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhanasya atra trailokye paprathe yaśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.30' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tena tadgotrajāḥ sarve mātsaryād asahiṣṇavaḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ lokasātkṛtārtighnakalpavṛkṣavinākṛtam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.30'>
<lg>
<l>tena tad-gotra-jāḥ sarve mātsaryād a-sahiṣṇavaḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ lokasāt-kṛta-ārti-ghna-kalpa-vṛkṣa-vinā-kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.31' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jeyaṃ sapitṛkaṃ matvā saṃbhūya kṛtaniścayāḥ /</l>
<l>yuddhāya samanahyanta tad rājyāpajihīrṣayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.31'>
<lg>
<l>jeyaṃ sa-pitṛkaṃ matvā saṃbhūya kṛta-niścayāḥ /</l>
<l>yuddhāya samanahyanta tad rājya-apajihīrṣayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.32' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā prāha pitaraṃ svaṃ sa jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>tāta kasyāparasyāsti śaktis tvayi dhṛtāyudhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.32'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā prāha pitaraṃ svaṃ sa jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>tāta kasya aparasya asti śaktis tvayi dhṛta-āyudhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.33' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>kiṃ tv asya pāpakasyārthe śarīrasya vināśinaḥ /</l>
<l>hatvā bandhūn akṛpano rājyaṃ ko nāma vāñchati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.33'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ tv asya pāpakasya arthe śarīrasya vināśinaḥ /</l>
<l>hatvā bandhūn a-kṛpano rājyaṃ ko nāma vāñchati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.34' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tat kiṃ rājyena naḥ kāryaṃ gatvānyatra kvacid vayam /</l>
<l>dharmam eva cariṣyāmo lokadvayasukhāvaham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.34'>
<lg>
<l>tat kiṃ rājyena naḥ kāryaṃ gatva ānyatra kva-cid vayam /</l>
<l>dharmam eva cariṣyāmo loka-dvaya-sukha-āvaham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.35' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>modantāṃ kṛpaṇā ete dāyādā rājyalolupāḥ /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ jīmūtaketus taṃ sa pitābravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.35'>
<lg>
<l>modantāṃ kṛpaṇā ete dāyādā rājya-lolupāḥ /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ jīmūta-ketus taṃ sa pita ābravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.36' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ahaṃ tvadartham icchāmi rājyaṃ putra tvam eva cet /</l>
<l>taj jahāsi kṛpāviṣṭas tan me vṛddhasya tena kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.36'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ tvad-artham icchāmi rājyaṃ putra tvam eva cet /</l>
<l>taj jahāsi kṛpā-āviṣṭas tan me vṛddhasya tena kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.37' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evaṃ kṛtābhyanujñena pitrā mātrā ca so 'nvitaḥ /</l>
<l>malayādrim agāt tyaktarājyo jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.37'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ kṛta-abhyanujñena pitrā mātrā ca so 'nvitaḥ /</l>
<l>malaya-adrim agāt tyakta-rājyo jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.38' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatra candanasaṃchannavahan niḥjharakandare /</l>
<l>śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pitaraṃ sa tasthau kalpitāśramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.38'>
<lg>
<l>tatra candana-saṃchanna-vahan niḥ-jhara-kandare /</l>
<l>śuśrūṣamāṇaḥ pitaraṃ sa tasthau kalpita-āśramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.39' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>mitraṃ cāsyātra saṃpede mitrāvasur iti śrutaḥ /</l>
<l>viśvāvasoḥ sutaḥ siddharājasyaitannivāsinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.39'>
<lg>
<l>mitraṃ ca asya atra saṃpede mitrāvasur iti śrutaḥ /</l>
<l>viśvāvasoḥ sutaḥ siddha-rājasya etan-nivāsinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.40' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ekadā cātra sa bhrāmyan viveśopavanasthitam /</l>
<l>draṣṭum āyatanaṃ devyā gauryā jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.40'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca atra sa bhrāmyan viveśa upavana-sthitam /</l>
<l>draṣṭum āyatanaṃ devyā gauryā jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.41' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatropavīṇayantīṃ ca dadarśa varakanyakām /</l>
<l>sakhījanānvitāṃ śailatanayārādhanodyatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.41'>
<lg>
<l>tatra upavīṇayantīṃ ca dadarśa vara-kanyakām /</l>
<l>sakhī-jana-anvitāṃ śaila-tanayā-ārādhana-udyatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.42' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ākarṇyamānasaṃgītamañjuvīṇāravāṃ mṛgaiḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭalocanalāvanyalajjitair iva niḥcalaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.42'>
<lg>
<l>ākarṇyamāna-saṃgīta-mañju-vīṇā-ravāṃ mṛgaiḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭa-locana-lāvanya-lajjitair iva niḥ-calaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.43' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>dadhatā tārakaṃ kṛṣṇam arjunena svacakṣuṣā /</l>
<l>pāṇḍavīyām iva camūṃ karṇamūlaṃ vivikṣatīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.43'>
<lg>
<l>dadhatā tārakaṃ kṛṣṇam arjunena sva-cakṣuṣā /</l>
<l>pāṇḍavīyām iva camūṃ karṇa-mūlaṃ vivikṣatīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.44' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>paraḥparavimardena mukhendor iva darśanam /</l>
<l>atṛptāv iva vāñchantau bibhrantīṃ saṃmukhau stanau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.44'>
<lg>
<l>paraḥ-para-vimardena mukha-indor iva darśanam /</l>
<l>a-tṛptāv iva vāñchantau bibhrantīṃ saṃmukhau stanau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.45' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>dhātur ghaṭayato muṣṭigraheṇeva nipīḍite /</l>
<l>valīmagnāṅgulīmudre madhye kṣāmamanaḥramām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.45'>
<lg>
<l>dhātur ghaṭayato muṣṭi-graheṇa iva nipīḍite /</l>
<l>valī-magna-aṅgulī-mudre madhye kṣāma-manaḥ-ramām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.46' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>dṛṣṭayā ca tayā sadyaḥ so 'bhūj jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>tanvyā muṣitacitto 'nto dṛṣṭimārgapraviṣṭayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.46'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭayā ca tayā sadyaḥ so 'bhūj jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>tanvyā muṣita-citto 'nto dṛṣṭi-mārga-praviṣṭayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.47' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sāpi taṃ bhūṣitodyānaṃ dṛṣṭvotkaṇṭhāvikāradam /</l>
<l>kāmāṅgadāhavairāgyād vanaṃ madhum ivāśritam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.47'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi taṃ bhūṣita-udyānaṃ dṛṣṭva ūtkaṇṭhā-vikāra-dam /</l>
<l>kāma-aṅga-dāha-vairāgyād vanaṃ madhum ivā aśritam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.48' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tathānurāgavivaśā bheje kanyā vihastatām /</l>
<l>yathā sakhīva vīṇāsyā vyākulālāpatāṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.48'>
<lg>
<l>tatha ānurāga-vivaśā bheje kanyā vihastatām /</l>
<l>yathā sakhi īva vīṇa āsyā vyākulā ālāpatāṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.49' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tataḥ sa papraccha sakhīṃ tasyā jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>kiṃ dhanyaṃ nāma sakhyās te ko vaṃśo 'laṃkṛto 'nayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.49'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa papraccha sakhīṃ tasyā jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>kiṃ dhanyaṃ nāma sakhyās te ko vaṃśo 'laṃkṛto 'nayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.50' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tac chrutvā sā sakhī prāha nāmnā malayavaty asau /</l>
<l>mitrāvasusvasā siddharājaviśvāvasoḥ sutā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.50'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sā sakhī prāha nāmnā malayavaty asau /</l>
<l>mitrāvasu-svasā siddha-rāja-viśvāvasoḥ sutā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.51' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evam uktvā sahṛdayā sā taṃ jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>nāmānvayau ca pṛṣṭvāsya muniputraṃ sahāgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.51'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktvā sa-hṛdayā sā taṃ jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>nāma-anvayau ca pṛṣṭva āsya muni-putraṃ saha-āgatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.52' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāṃ bravīti sma malayavatīṃ smitamitākṣaram /</l>
<l>sakhi vidyādharendrasya nāsyātithyaṃ karoṣi kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.52'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ bravīti sma malaya-vatīṃ smita-mita-akṣaram /</l>
<l>sakhi vidyādhara-indrasya na asyā atithyaṃ karoṣi kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.53' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jagatpūjyo 'tithir hy eṣa prāpta ity udite tayā /</l>
<l>sābhūd vidyādharasutā tūṣṇīṃ lajjānatānanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.53'>
<lg>
<l>jagat-pūjyo 'tithir hy eṣa prāpta ity udite tayā /</l>
<l>sa ābhūd vidyādhara-sutā tūṣṇīṃ lajjā-ānata-ānanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.54' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>lajjāvatīyaṃ matto 'rcā gṛhyatām iti vādinī /</l>
<l>ekātha tat sakhī tasmai sārghyāṃ mālām upānayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.54'>
<lg>
<l>lajjā-vati īyaṃ matto 'rcā gṛhyatām iti vādinī /</l>
<l>eka ātha tat sakhī tasmai sa-arghyāṃ mālām upānayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.55' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sa cādāyaiva jīmūtavāhanaḥ premaniḥbharaḥ /</l>
<l>kaṇṭhe malayavatyās tāṃ mālāṃ tasyāḥ samarpayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.55'>
<lg>
<l>sa cā adāya eva jīmūta-vāhanaḥ prema-niḥ-bharaḥ /</l>
<l>kaṇṭhe malayavatyās tāṃ mālāṃ tasyāḥ samarpayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.56' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sāpi tiryakprasṛtayā paśyantī snigdhayā dṛśā /</l>
<l>nīlotpalamayīṃ mālām iva tasmin nyaveśayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.56'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi tiryak-prasṛtayā paśyantī snigdhayā dṛśā /</l>
<l>nīla-utpalamayīṃ mālām iva tasmin nyaveśayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.57' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity anyo'nyakṛtā-śabdasvayamvaraviśeṣayoḥ /</l>
<l>tayor etya jagādaikā ceṭī tāṃ siddhakanyakām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.57'>
<lg>
<l>ity anyo'nya-kṛta-a-śabda-svayam-vara-viśeṣayoḥ /</l>
<l>tayor etya jagāda ekā ceṭī tāṃ siddha-kanyakām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.58' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jananī rājaputri tvāṃ smaraty āgaccha māciram /</l>
<l>tac chrutvākṛṣya kāmeṣukīlitām iva kṛcchrataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.58'>
<lg>
<l>jananī rāja-putri tvāṃ smaraty āgaccha mā-ciram /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā ākṛṣya kāma-iṣu-kīlitām iva kṛcchrataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.59' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sotkāṃ priyamukhād dṛṣṭiṃ kathamcit sā yayau gṛham /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano 'py āgāt tan natātmā svamāśramam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.59'>
<lg>
<l>sa-utkāṃ priya-mukhād dṛṣṭiṃ katham-cit sā yayau gṛham /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano 'py āgāt tan nata-ātmā svam-āśramam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.60' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sātha svāṃ jananīṃ dṛṣṭā prāṇeśavirahāturā /</l>
<l>gatvā malayavaty āśu papāta śayanīyake //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.60'>
<lg>
<l>sa ātha svāṃ jananīṃ dṛṣṭā prāṇa-īśa-viraha-āturā /</l>
<l>gatvā malayavaty āśu papāta śayanīyake //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.61' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>athāntargatakāmāgnidhūmenevāvilekṣaṇā /</l>
<l>aśrudhārāṃ pramuñcantī saṃtāpakvathitāṅgakā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.61'>
<lg>
<l>atha antargata-kāma-agni-dhūmena ivā avila-īkṣaṇā /</l>
<l>aśru-dhārāṃ pramuñcantī saṃtāpa-kvathita-aṅgakā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.62' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sakhībhiś candanair liptā vījitā cābjinidalaiḥ /</l>
<l>ratiṃ na bheje śayane nāṅke sakhyā na bhūtale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.62'>
<lg>
<l>sakhībhiś candanair liptā vījitā ca abjini-dalaiḥ /</l>
<l>ratiṃ na bheje śayane na aṅke sakhyā na bhū-tale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.63' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>gate 'tha vāsare kvāpi raktayā saha saṃdhyayā /</l>
<l>hasatprācīmukhaṃ candre samākramya ca cumbati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.63'>
<lg>
<l>gate 'tha vāsare kva-api raktayā saha saṃdhyayā /</l>
<l>hasat-prācī-mukhaṃ candre samākramya ca cumbati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.64' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>smareṇa preryamāṇāpi dūtīsaṃpreṣaṇādi sā /</l>
<l>lajjayā nāśakat kartuṃ jīvitaspṛhayojjhitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.64'>
<lg>
<l>smareṇa preryamāṇa āpi dūtī-saṃpreṣaṇa-ādi sā /</l>
<l>lajjayā na aśakat kartuṃ jīvita-spṛhaya ūjjhitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.65' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nināya ca niśām induviṣamām abjinīva tām /</l>
<l>baddhamohālipaṭale hṛdi saṃkocam etya sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.65'>
<lg>
<l>nināya ca niśām indu-viṣamām abjini īva tām /</l>
<l>baddha-moha-ali-paṭale hṛdi saṃkocam etya sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.66' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāvac ca tadviyogārtaḥ so 'pi jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>śayanastho 'pi patito haste kusumadhanvanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.66'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca tad-viyoga-ārtaḥ so 'pi jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>śayana-stho 'pi patito haste kusuma-dhanvanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.67' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nūtanodbhinnarāgo 'pi pronmiṣatpāṇḍurachaviḥ /</l>
<l>hrīmūko 'pi vadan pīḍāṃ kāmajām anayan niśām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.67'>
<lg>
<l>nūtana-udbhinna-rāgo 'pi pronmiṣat-pāṇḍura-chaviḥ /</l>
<l>hrī-mūko 'pi vadan pīḍāṃ kāma-jām anayan niśām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.68' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>prātaś cātyutsuko bhūyas tad gauryāyatanaṃ yayau /</l>
<l>yatra dṛṣṭābhavat tena sā siddhādhipaputrikā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.68'>
<lg>
<l>prātaś ca atyutsuko bhūyas tad gaury-āyatanaṃ yayau /</l>
<l>yatra dṛṣṭa ābhavat tena sā siddha-adhipa-putrikā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.69' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatra tena sa mitreṇa muniputreṇa pṛṣṭhataḥ /</l>
<l>āgatyāśvāsyate yāvan madanānalavihvalaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.69'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tena sa mitreṇa muni-putreṇa pṛṣṭhataḥ /</l>
<l>āgatyā aśvāsyate yāvan madana-anala-vihvalaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.70' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāvat tatraiva sāpy āgān nirgatyaikaiva niḥjane /</l>
<l>guptaṃ malayavaty ātmatyāgāya virahā-sahā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.70'>
<lg>
<l>tāvat tatra eva sa āpy āgān nirgatya eka aiva niḥ-jane /</l>
<l>guptaṃ malayavaty ātma-tyāgāya viraha-a-sahā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.71' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>alakṣayantī kāntaṃ svaṃ pādapāntaritaṃ ca sā /</l>
<l>udaśrulocanā bālā devīṃ gaurīṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.71'>
<lg>
<l>a-lakṣayantī kāntaṃ svaṃ pāda-pa-antaritaṃ ca sā /</l>
<l>udaśru-locanā bālā devīṃ gaurīṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.72' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tvadbhaktyā devi saṃvṛtto nāsmiñ janmani cen mama /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano bhartā tad bhūyāt so 'nyajanmani //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.72'>
<lg>
<l>tvad-bhaktyā devi saṃvṛtto na asmiñ janmani cen mama /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano bhartā tad bhūyāt so 'nya-janmani //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.73' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktvā racayāmāsa svottarīyeṇa tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>aśokataruśākhāyāṃ pāśaṃ sā girijāgrataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.73'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā racayāmāsa sva-uttarīyeṇa tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>aśoka-taru-śākhāyāṃ pāśaṃ sā giri-jā-agrataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.74' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>hā nātha viśvavikhyātakaruṇenāpi na tvayā /</l>
<l>katham asmi paritrātā deva jīmūtavāhana //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.74'>
<lg>
<l>hā nātha viśva-vikhyāta-karuṇena api na tvayā /</l>
<l>katham asmi paritrātā deva jīmūtavāhana //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.75' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evam uktvā gale yāvat sā taṃ pāśaṃ niyacchati /</l>
<l>uccacāra divas tāvad bhāratī devyudīritā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.75'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktvā gale yāvat sā taṃ pāśaṃ niyacchati /</l>
<l>uccacāra divas tāvad bhāratī devy-udīritā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.76' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>putri mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīś cakravartī patis tava /</l>
<l>vidyādharendro jīmūtavāhano hi bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.76'>
<lg>
<l>putri mā sāhasaṃ kārṣīś cakra-vartī patis tava /</l>
<l>vidyādhara-indro jīmūta-vāhano hi bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.77' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktavatyāṃ devyāṃ sa śrutvaiva savayasyakaḥ /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano hṛṣṭāṃ priyām upajagāma tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.77'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavatyāṃ devyāṃ sa śrutva aiva sa-vayasyakaḥ /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhano hṛṣṭāṃ priyām upajagāma tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.78' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sa eṣa devyā varaḥ paśya vitīrṇaḥ satya eva te /</l>
<l>iti jalpati bālāṃ tāṃ tanmitre muniputrake //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.78'>
<lg>
<l>sa eṣa devyā varaḥ paśya vitīrṇaḥ satya eva te /</l>
<l>iti jalpati bālāṃ tāṃ tan-mitre muni-putrake //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.79' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jīmūtavāhanas tat tad bruvan praṇayapeśalam /</l>
<l>svahastenaiva taṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhāt pāśam apānayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.79'>
<lg>
<l>jīmūtavāhanas tat tad bruvan praṇaya-peśalam /</l>
<l>sva-hastena eva taṃ tasyāḥ kaṇṭhāt pāśam apānayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.80' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tato 'kasmāt sudhāvarṣam iva manvānayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>bhuvaṃ malayavatyāṃ ca likhantyāṃ hrītayā dṛśā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.80'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'kasmāt sudhā-varṣam iva manvānayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>bhuvaṃ malayavatyāṃ ca likhantyāṃ hrītayā dṛśā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.81' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>cinvānāgatya sahasā sakhī hṛṣṭā jagāda tām /</l>
<l>sakhi kalyāṇinī diṣṭyā vardhase 'bhīṣṭasiddhitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.81'>
<lg>
<l>cinvānā āgatya sahasā sakhī hṛṣṭā jagāda tām /</l>
<l>sakhi kalyāṇinī diṣṭyā vardhase 'bhīṣṭa-siddhitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.82' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>adyaiva hi mahārājas tava viśvāvasuḥ pitā /</l>
<l>kumāramitrāvasunā vijñaptaḥ saṃnidhau mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.82'>
<lg>
<l>adya eva hi mahā-rājas tava viśvāvasuḥ pitā /</l>
<l>kumāra-mitrāvasunā vijñaptaḥ saṃnidhau mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.83' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ihāgato jaganmānyas tāta kalpatarupradaḥ /</l>
<l>vidyādharendratanayo yo 'yaṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.83'>
<lg>
<l>ihā agato jagan-mānyas tāta kalpa-taru-pradaḥ /</l>
<l>vidyādhara-indra-tanayo yo 'yaṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.84' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>atithitvāt sa naḥ pūjyo varaś cānyo na tādṛśaḥ /</l>
<l>tasmān malayavatyāsau kanyāratnena pūjyatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.84'>
<lg>
<l>atithitvāt sa naḥ pūjyo varaś ca anyo na tādṛśaḥ /</l>
<l>tasmān malayavatya āsau kanyā-ratnena pūjyatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.85' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatheti śraddhite rājñā bhrātā mitrāvasuḥ sa te /</l>
<l>tādarthyena mahābhāgasyāsyāśramapadaṃ gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.85'>
<lg>
<l>tatha īti śraddhite rājñā bhrātā mitrāvasuḥ sa te /</l>
<l>tādarthyena mahā-bhāgasya asyā aśrama-padaṃ gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.86' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jāne sadyaś ca bhāvī te vivāhas tat svamandiram /</l>
<l>āyāhi yātu caiṣo 'pi mahābhāgaḥ svam āspadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.86'>
<lg>
<l>jāne sadyaś ca bhāvī te vivāhas tat sva-mandiram /</l>
<l>āyāhi yātu ca eṣo 'pi mahā-bhāgaḥ svam āspadam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.87' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktā sā tayā sakhyā rājaputrī śanais tataḥ /</l>
<l>yayuḥ saharṣā sotkā ca muhuḥvalitakaṃdharā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.87'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktā sā tayā sakhyā rāja-putrī śanais tataḥ /</l>
<l>yayuḥ sa-harṣā sa-utkā ca muhuḥ-valita-kaṃdharā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.88' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jīmūtavāhano 'py āśu gatvā svāśramam āgatāt /</l>
<l>mitrāvasor yathābhīṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ śrutvābhinandya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.88'>
<lg>
<l>jīmūtavāhano 'py āśu gatvā sva-āśramam āgatāt /</l>
<l>mitrāvasor yathā-abhīṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ śrutva ābhinandya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.89' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jātismaraḥ samācakhyau tasmai svaṃ pūrvajanma saḥ /</l>
<l>yatra mitraṃ sa tasyāsīt sā ca bhāryaiva tatsvasā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.89'>
<lg>
<l>jāti-smaraḥ samācakhyau tasmai svaṃ pūrva-janma saḥ /</l>
<l>yatra mitraṃ sa tasyā asīt sā ca bhārya aiva tat-svasā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.90' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tato mitrāvasuḥ prītas tatpitroḥ parituṣyatoḥ /</l>
<l>āvedya gatvā pitarau kṛtārthaḥ svāv anandayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.90'>
<lg>
<l>tato mitrāvasuḥ prītas tat-pitroḥ parituṣyatoḥ /</l>
<l>āvedya gatvā pitarau kṛta-arthaḥ svāv anandayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.91' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nināya ca tadaiva svān gṛhāñ jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>cakre cotsavasaṃbhāraṃ svasiddhyucitavaibhavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.91'>
<lg>
<l>nināya ca tada aiva svān gṛhāñ jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>cakre ca utsava-saṃbhāraṃ sva-siddhy-ucita-vaibhavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.92' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tasminn eva ca dhanye 'hni tasya vidyādharaprabhoḥ /</l>
<l>svasur malayavatyāś ca vivāhaṃ samapādayan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.92'>
<lg>
<l>tasminn eva ca dhanye 'hni tasya vidyādhara-prabhoḥ /</l>
<l>svasur malayavatyāś ca vivāhaṃ samapādayan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.93' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tato navoḍhayā sākaṃ tayā jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>tasthau malayavatyā sa tatra siddhamanaḥrathaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.93'>
<lg>
<l>tato nava-ūḍhayā sākaṃ tayā jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>tasthau malayavatyā sa tatra siddha-manaḥ-rathaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.94' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ekadā kautukāc cātra sa mitrāvasunā saha /</l>
<l>malayādrau bhramann abdher velāvanam upeyivān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.94'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā kautukāc ca atra sa mitrāvasunā saha /</l>
<l>malaya-adrau bhramann ab-dher velā-vanam upeyivān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.95' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatrāsthirāśīn subahūn dṛṣṭvā mitrāvasuṃ sa tam /</l>
<l>keṣām ete 'sthisaṃghātāḥ prāṇinām iti pṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.95'>
<lg>
<l>tatra asthi-rāśīn su-bahūn dṛṣṭvā mitrāvasuṃ sa tam /</l>
<l>keṣām ete 'sthi-saṃghātāḥ prāṇinām iti pṛṣṭavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.96' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tato mitrāvasuḥ śyālas taṃ kāruṇikam abravīt /</l>
<l>śṛṇu vṛttāntam atremaṃ saṃkṣepād varṇayāmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.96'>
<lg>
<l>tato mitrāvasuḥ śyālas taṃ kāruṇikam abravīt /</l>
<l>śṛṇu vṛtta-antam atra imaṃ saṃkṣepād varṇayāmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.97' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nāgamātā purā kadrūr vinatāṃ tārkṣyamātaram /</l>
<l>nināya kila dāsatvaṃ savyājapaṇanirjitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.97'>
<lg>
<l>nāga-mātā purā kadrūr vinatāṃ tārkṣya-mātaram /</l>
<l>nināya kila dāsatvaṃ sa-vyāja-paṇa-nirjitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.98' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tena vaireṇa garuḍas tām unmocyāpi mātaram /</l>
<l>balī bhakṣayituṃ nāgān kadrūputrān pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.98'>
<lg>
<l>tena vaireṇa garuḍas tām unmocya api mātaram /</l>
<l>balī bhakṣayituṃ nāgān kadrū-putrān pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.99' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sadā praviśya pātālaṃ so 'tha kāncij jaghāsa tān /</l>
<l>kāncin mamarda kecit tu svayaṃ trāsād vipedire //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.99'>
<lg>
<l>sadā praviśya pātālaṃ so 'tha kān-cij jaghāsa tān /</l>
<l>kān-cin mamarda ke-cit tu svayaṃ trāsād vipedire //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.100' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvaikapade sarvakṣayam āśaṅkya nāgarāṭ /</l>
<l>vāsukiḥ prārthanāpūrvaṃ tārkṣyasya samayaṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.100'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭva aika-pade sarva-kṣayam āśaṅkya nāga-rāṭ /</l>
<l>vāsukiḥ prārthanā-pūrvaṃ tārkṣyasya samayaṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.101' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ekam ekam ahaṃ nāgam āhārārthaṃ khagendra te /</l>
<l>pratyahaṃ preṣayāmy atra puline dakṣiṇodadheḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.101'>
<lg>
<l>ekam ekam ahaṃ nāgam āhāra-arthaṃ kha-ga-indra te /</l>
<l>praty-ahaṃ preṣayāmy atra puline dakṣiṇa-uda-dheḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.102' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tvayā tu na praveṣṭavyaṃ pātāle 'smin kathamcana /</l>
<l>ko hi svārtho vinaṣṭeṣu nāgeṣv ekapade tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.102'>
<lg>
<l>tvayā tu na praveṣṭavyaṃ pātāle 'smin katham-cana /</l>
<l>ko hi sva-artho vinaṣṭeṣu nāgeṣv eka-pade tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.103' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity ukte nāgarājena samayaṃ pratyapadyata /</l>
<l>svārthadarśī tathety eva garuḍo guruvikramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.103'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte nāga-rājena samayaṃ pratyapadyata /</l>
<l>sva-artha-darśī tatha īty eva garuḍo guru-vikramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.104' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tadāprabhṛti caikaikaṃ nāgaṃ bhuṅkte dine dine /</l>
<l>vāsukipreṣitaṃ so 'tra khagendraḥ puline 'mbudheḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.104'>
<lg>
<l>tadā-prabhṛti ca eka-ekaṃ nāgaṃ bhuṅkte dine dine /</l>
<l>vāsuki-preṣitaṃ so 'tra kha-ga-indraḥ puline 'mbu-dheḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.105' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>atas tadbhakṣyamāṇānāṃ nāganām asthisaṃcayāḥ /</l>
<l>ete 'tra giriśṛṅgābhā vṛddhiṃ kālakramād gatāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.105'>
<lg>
<l>atas tad-bhakṣyamāṇānāṃ nāganām asthi-saṃcayāḥ /</l>
<l>ete 'tra giri-śṛṅga-ābhā vṛddhiṃ kāla-kramād gatāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.106' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iti mitrāvasor vaktrāt sāntaḥduḥkho niśamya saḥ /</l>
<l>nijagāda dayādhairyanidhir jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.106'>
<lg>
<l>iti mitrāvasor vaktrāt sa-antaḥ-duḥkho niśamya saḥ /</l>
<l>nijagāda dayā-dhairya-nidhir jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.107' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>śocyaḥ sa vāsukī rājā yaḥ svahastena vidviṣe /</l>
<l>upahārīkaroti svāḥ prajāḥ klībo dine dine //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.107'>
<lg>
<l>śocyaḥ sa vāsukī rājā yaḥ sva-hastena vidviṣe /</l>
<l>upahārī-karoti svāḥ prajāḥ klībo dine dine //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.108' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>dhṛtānanasahasraḥ sann ekenāpy ānanena saḥ /</l>
<l>mām ādau bhuṅkṣva tārkṣyeti bhāṣituṃ nāśakat katham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.108'>
<lg>
<l>dhṛta-ānana-sahasraḥ sann ekena apy ānanena saḥ /</l>
<l>mām ādau bhuṅkṣva tārkṣya iti bhāṣituṃ na aśakat katham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.109' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>kathaṃ cābhyarthayāmāsa niḥsattvaḥ svakulakṣayam /</l>
<l>tārkṣyaṃ nāgāṅganākrandanityākarṇananiḥghṛṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.109'>
<lg>
<l>kathaṃ ca abhyarthayāmāsa niḥ-sattvaḥ sva-kula-kṣayam /</l>
<l>tārkṣyaṃ nāga-aṅganā-kranda-nitya-ākarṇana-niḥ-ghṛṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.110' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tārkṣyo 'pi kāśyapir vīraḥ kṛṣṇādhiṣṭhānapāvanaḥ /</l>
<l>īdṛśaṃ kurute pāpam aho mohasya gāḍhatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.110'>
<lg>
<l>tārkṣyo 'pi kāśyapir vīraḥ kṛṣṇa-adhiṣṭhāna-pāvanaḥ /</l>
<l>īdṛśaṃ kurute pāpam aho mohasya gāḍhatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.111' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktvā sa mahāsattvo hṛdi cakre manaḥratham /</l>
<l>apy asāreṇa dehena sāram atrāpnuyām aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.111'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā sa mahā-sattvo hṛdi cakre manaḥ-ratham /</l>
<l>apy a-sāreṇa dehena sāram atrā apnuyām aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.112' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ekasyāpy adya nāgasya kuryāṃ jīvitarakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>abāndhavasya bhītasya dattvātmānaṃ garutmate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.112'>
<lg>
<l>ekasya apy adya nāgasya kuryāṃ jīvita-rakṣaṇam /</l>
<l>a-bāndhavasya bhītasya dattvā ātmānaṃ garutmate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.113' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iti saṃcintayaty eva tasmiñ jīmūtavāhane /</l>
<l>mitrāvasoḥ pituḥ pārśvāt kṣattāhvānārtham āyayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.113'>
<lg>
<l>iti saṃcintayaty eva tasmiñ jīmūtavāhane /</l>
<l>mitrāvasoḥ pituḥ pārśvāt kṣattā āhvāna-artham āyayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.114' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>vraja tvam aham eṣyāmi paścād iti tataś ca tam /</l>
<l>mitrāvasuṃ sa jīmūtavāhano vyasṛjad gṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.114'>
<lg>
<l>vraja tvam aham eṣyāmi paścād iti tataś ca tam /</l>
<l>mitrāvasuṃ sa jīmūta-vāhano vyasṛjad gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>
