<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.115' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>gate tasmin sa cātraiko vāñchitārthonmukho bhraman /</l>
<l>kṛpālur aśṛnod dūrāt karuṇaṃ ruditadhvanim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.115'>
<lg>
<l>gate tasmin sa ca atra eko vāñchita-artha-unmukho bhraman /</l>
<l>kṛpālur aśṛnod dūrāt karuṇaṃ rudita-dhvanim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.116' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>gatvā dadarśa cottuṅgaśilātalasamīpagam /</l>
<l>yuvānam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ duḥkhitaṃ sundarākṛtim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.116'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā dadarśa ca uttuṅga-śilā-tala-samīpa-gam /</l>
<l>yuvānam ekaṃ puruṣaṃ duḥkhitaṃ sundara-ākṛtim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.117' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>puṃsā rājabhaṭeneva tyaktam ānīya tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>nivartayantaṃ rudatīṃ vṛddhāṃ sānunayaṃ striyam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.117'>
<lg>
<l>puṃsā rāja-bhaṭena iva tyaktam ānīya tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>nivartayantaṃ rudatīṃ vṛddhāṃ sa-anunayaṃ striyam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.118' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ko 'yaṃ syād iti yāvac ca jijñāsuḥ so 'tra tiṣṭhati /</l>
<l>karuṇākulitaś channaḥ śṛṇvañ jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.118'>
<lg>
<l>ko 'yaṃ syād iti yāvac ca jijñāsuḥ so 'tra tiṣṭhati /</l>
<l>karuṇā-ākulitaś channaḥ śṛṇvañ jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.119' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāvat sā tatra vṛddhā strī duḥkhabhārātipīḍitā /</l>
<l>prāvartata yuvānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvānuśocitum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.119'>
<lg>
<l>tāvat sā tatra vṛddhā strī duḥkha-bhāra-atipīḍitā /</l>
<l>prāvartata yuvānaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭva ānuśocitum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.120' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>hā śaṅkhacūḍa hā duḥkhaśatasaṃprāpta hā guṇin /</l>
<l>kulaikatanto hā putra kva tvāṃ drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.120'>
<lg>
<l>hā śaṅkhacūḍa hā duḥkha-śata-saṃprāpta hā guṇin /</l>
<l>kula-eka-tanto hā putra kva tvāṃ drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.121' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>vatsa tvanmukhacandre 'smin gate 'staṃ sa pitā tava /</l>
<l>sokāndhakārapatitaḥ kathaṃ vṛddho bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.121'>
<lg>
<l>vatsa tvan-mukha-candre 'smin gate 'staṃ sa pitā tava /</l>
<l>soka-andha-kāra-patitaḥ kathaṃ vṛddho bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.122' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>athārkakarasaṃsparśād aṅgaṃ dūyeta yat tava /</l>
<l>kathaṃ śakṣyati tat soḍhuṃ tārkṣyabhakṣaṇajāṃ rujam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.122'>
<lg>
<l>atha arka-kara-saṃsparśād aṅgaṃ dūyeta yat tava /</l>
<l>kathaṃ śakṣyati tat soḍhuṃ tārkṣya-bhakṣaṇa-jāṃ rujam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.123' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>vistīrṇe nāgaloke 'pi dhātrā nāgādhipena ca /</l>
<l>labdhas tvaṃ kim abhavyāyā vicityaikasuto mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.123'>
<lg>
<l>vistīrṇe nāga-loke 'pi dhātrā nāga-adhipena ca /</l>
<l>labdhas tvaṃ kim abhavyāyā vicitya eka-suto mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.124' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iti tāṃ vilapantīṃ ca sa yuvā tanayo 'bravīt /</l>
<l>duḥkhārtam api mām amba kiṃ duḥkhayasi hā bhṛśam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.124'>
<lg>
<l>iti tāṃ vilapantīṃ ca sa yuvā tanayo 'bravīt /</l>
<l>duḥkha-ārtam api mām amba kiṃ duḥkhayasi hā bhṛśam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.125' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nivartasva gṛhān eṣa praṇāmaḥ paścimas tava /</l>
<l>ihāgamanavelā hi bhavej jātu garutmataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.125'>
<lg>
<l>nivartasva gṛhān eṣa praṇāmaḥ paścimas tava /</l>
<l>ihā agamana-velā hi bhavej jātu garutmataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.126' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tac chrutvā hā hatāsmīha ko me pāsyati putrakam /</l>
<l>ita cakranda sā vṛddhā dikṣu kṣiptārtalocanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.126'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā hā hata āsmi iha ko me pāsyati putrakam /</l>
<l>ita cakranda sā vṛddhā dikṣu kṣipta-ārta-locanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.127' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāvac ca bodhisattvāṃśaḥ sa taj jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca kṛpayā gāḍhākrānto vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.127'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca bodhi-sattva-aṃśaḥ sa taj jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca kṛpayā gāḍha-ākrānto vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.128' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>hantāyaṃ śaṅkhacūḍākhyo nāgo vāsukinā bata /</l>
<l>āhārahetos tārkṣyasya tapasvī preṣito 'dhunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.128'>
<lg>
<l>hanta ayaṃ śaṅkhacūḍa-ākhyo nāgo vāsukinā bata /</l>
<l>āhāra-hetos tārkṣyasya tapasvī preṣito 'dhunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.129' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iyaṃ caitasya jananī snehenehānvag āgatā /</l>
<l>etadekasutā vṛddhā duḥkhadīnapralāpinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.129'>
<lg>
<l>iyaṃ ca etasya jananī snehena iha anvag āgatā /</l>
<l>etad-eka-sutā vṛddhā duḥkha-dīna-pralāpinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.130' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad enam ekam ārtaṃ ced dehenaikāntanāśinā /</l>
<l>rakṣāmi nāmunā nāgaṃ tan me dhig janma niḥphalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.130'>
<lg>
<l>tad enam ekam ārtaṃ ced dehena eka-anta-nāśinā /</l>
<l>rakṣāmi na amunā nāgaṃ tan me dhig janma niḥ-phalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.131' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity ālocyopagamyaiva mudā jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>vṛddhām uvāca tāṃ mātaḥ putraṃ rakṣāmy ahaṃ tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.131'>
<lg>
<l>ity ālocya upagamya eva mudā jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>vṛddhām uvāca tāṃ mātaḥ putraṃ rakṣāmy ahaṃ tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.132' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tac chrutvā bhāvitabhayā vṛddhā garuḍaśaṅkhinī /</l>
<l>saṃtrastā tārkṣya māṃ bhuṅkṣva māṃ bhuṅkṣveti jagāda sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.132'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā bhāvita-bhayā vṛddhā garuḍa-śaṅkhinī /</l>
<l>saṃtrastā tārkṣya māṃ bhuṅkṣva māṃ bhuṅkṣva iti jagāda sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.133' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>śaṅkhacūḍas tato 'vādīn naiṣas tārkṣyo 'mba mā trasīḥ /</l>
<l>kvāyaṃ candra ivāhlādī kva sa tārkṣyo bhayaṃkaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.133'>
<lg>
<l>śaṅkhacūḍas tato 'vādīn na eṣas tārkṣyo 'mba mā trasīḥ /</l>
<l>kva ayaṃ candra ivā ahlādī kva sa tārkṣyo bhayaṃ-karaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.134' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity ukte śaṅkhacūḍena prāha jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>vidyādharo 'ham āyāto rākṣituṃ sutam amba te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.134'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte śaṅkhacūḍena prāha jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>vidyādharo 'ham āyāto rākṣituṃ sutam amba te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.135' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>dāsyāmi hi śarīraṃ svaṃ vastrachannaṃ garutmate /</l>
<l>kṣudhitāya prayāhi tvam ādāyainaṃ sutaṃ gṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.135'>
<lg>
<l>dāsyāmi hi śarīraṃ svaṃ vastra-channaṃ garutmate /</l>
<l>kṣudhitāya prayāhi tvam ādāya enaṃ sutaṃ gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.136' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tac chrutvā sābravīd vṛddhā maivaṃ tvaṃ hy adhiko mama /</l>
<l>putro yasyedṛśe kāle kṛpāsmāsv iyam īdṛśī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.136'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa ābravīd vṛddhā ma aivaṃ tvaṃ hy adhiko mama /</l>
<l>putro yasyā idṛśe kāle kṛpā-asmāsv iyam īdṛśī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.137' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>etac chrutvā sa jīmūtavāhanaḥ punar abravīt /</l>
<l>na me manaḥrathasyāsya bhaṅgaṃ kartum ihārhatha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.137'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutvā sa jīmūta-vāhanaḥ punar abravīt /</l>
<l>na me manaḥ-rathasya asya bhaṅgaṃ kartum iha arhatha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.138' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>grahād evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ ca śaṅkhacūḍo jagāda tam /</l>
<l>darśitaiva mahāsattva tvayā satyaṃ kṛpālutā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.138'>
<lg>
<l>grahād evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ ca śaṅkhacūḍo jagāda tam /</l>
<l>darśita aiva mahā-sattva tvayā satyaṃ kṛpālutā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.139' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>na tv ahaṃ tvaccharīreṇa rakṣyāmi svaśarīrakam /</l>
<l>ratnavyayena pāṣāṇaṃ ko hi rakṣitum arhati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.139'>
<lg>
<l>na tv ahaṃ tvac-charīreṇa rakṣyāmi sva-śarīrakam /</l>
<l>ratna-vyayena pāṣāṇaṃ ko hi rakṣitum arhati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.140' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>mādṛśais tu jagat pūrṇaṃ svātmamātrānukampibhiḥ /</l>
<l>anukampyaṃ jagad yeṣāṃ viralās te bhavādṛśāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.140'>
<lg>
<l>mādṛśais tu jagat pūrṇaṃ sva-ātma-mātra-anukampibhiḥ /</l>
<l>anukampyaṃ jagad yeṣāṃ viralās te bhavādṛśāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.141' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>na cāhaṃ malinīkartuṃ śaṅkhapālakulaṃ śuci /</l>
<l>kalaṅka iva tīkṣṇāṃśubimbaṃ śakṣyāmi sanmate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.141'>
<lg>
<l>na ca ahaṃ malinī-kartuṃ śaṅkhapāla-kulaṃ śuci /</l>
<l>kalaṅka iva tīkṣṇa-aṃśu-bimbaṃ śakṣyāmi san-mate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.142' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iti taṃ pratiṣidhyaiva śaṅkhacūḍaḥ svamātaram /</l>
<l>jagādāmba nivartasva kāntārād duḥgamād itaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.142'>
<lg>
<l>iti taṃ pratiṣidhya eva śaṅkhacūḍaḥ sva-mātaram /</l>
<l>jagāda amba nivartasva kāntārād duḥ-gamād itaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.143' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>na paśyasi kim atraitan nāgāsṛkkardamokṣitam /</l>
<l>kṛtāntalīlāparyaṅkaraudraṃ vadhyaśilātalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.143'>
<lg>
<l>na paśyasi kim atra etan nāga-asṛk-kardama-ukṣitam /</l>
<l>kṛta-anta-līlā-paryaṅka-raudraṃ vadhya-śilā-talam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.144' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ahaṃ cābdhitaṭe gatvā natvā gokarṇam īśvaram /</l>
<l>āgacchāmi drutaṃ yāvan nāyāti garuḍo 'tra saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.144'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ ca ab-dhi-taṭe gatvā natvā gokarṇam īśvaram /</l>
<l>āgacchāmi drutaṃ yāvan nā ayāti garuḍo 'tra saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.145' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktvā kṛpaṇākrandāṃ praṇamyāpṛcchya mātaram /</l>
<l>sa gokarṇapraṇāmārthaṃ śaṅkhacūḍo yayau tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.145'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā kṛpaṇa-ākrandāṃ praṇamyā apṛcchya mātaram /</l>
<l>sa gokarṇa-praṇāma-arthaṃ śaṅkhacūḍo yayau tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.146' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>asmiṃś ced antare prāptas tārkṣyaḥ siddho mamepsitaḥ /</l>
<l>parārtheti jīmūtavāhano 'py akarod dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.146'>
<lg>
<l>asmiṃś ced antare prāptas tārkṣyaḥ siddho mamā ipsitaḥ /</l>
<l>para-artha iti jīmūtavāhano 'py akarod dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.147' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāvac cāsannapakṣīndrapakṣānilacalāṃs tarūn /</l>
<l>vilokyātra sa mā meti nivāraṇaparān iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.147'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac cā asanna-pakṣi-indra-pakṣa-anila-calāṃs tarūn /</l>
<l>vilokya atra sa mā ma īti nivāraṇa-parān iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.148' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>matvā garuḍavelāṃ ca prāptāṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>parārthaprāṇado vadhyaśilām adhyāruroha tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.148'>
<lg>
<l>matvā garuḍa-velāṃ ca prāptāṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>para-artha-prāṇa-do vadhya-śilām adhyāruroha tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.149' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>pavanāghūrṇite cābdhau sphuradratnaprabhādṛśā /</l>
<l>taṃ sattvātiśayaṃ tasya paśyatīva savismayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.149'>
<lg>
<l>pavana-āghūrṇite ca ab-dhau sphurad-ratna-prabhā-dṛśā /</l>
<l>taṃ sattva-atiśayaṃ tasya paśyati iva sa-vismayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.150' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>āgatyācchāditanabhā nipatyaitacchilātalāt /</l>
<l>cañcvā garutmān āhatya mahāsattvaṃ jahāra tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.150'>
<lg>
<l>āgatyā acchādita-nabhā nipatya etac-chilā-talāt /</l>
<l>cañcvā garutmān āhatya mahā-sattvaṃ jahāra tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.151' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>srutāsṛgdhāram utkhātaśiraḥratnaṃ ca taṃ javāt /</l>
<l>nītvā bhakṣayituṃ śṛṅge malayādreḥ pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.151'>
<lg>
<l>sruta-asṛg-dhāram utkhāta-śiraḥ-ratnaṃ ca taṃ javāt /</l>
<l>nītvā bhakṣayituṃ śṛṅge malaya-adreḥ pracakrame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.152' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evam eva parārthāya dehaḥ syāt pratijanma me /</l>
<l>mā bhūtāṃ svargamokṣau tu paropakṛtivarjitau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.152'>
<lg>
<l>evam eva para-arthāya dehaḥ syāt prati-janma me /</l>
<l>mā bhūtāṃ svarga-mokṣau tu para-upakṛti-varjitau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.153' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iti tārkṣyādyamānasya tasyānudhyāyatas tadā /</l>
<l>vidyādharendor apatat puṣpavṛṣṭir nabhaḥtalāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.153'>
<lg>
<l>iti tārkṣya-adyamānasya tasya anudhyāyatas tadā /</l>
<l>vidyādhara-indor apatat puṣpa-vṛṣṭir nabhaḥ-talāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.154' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>atrāntare sa tad raktadhārāsravaśiraḥmaṇiḥ /</l>
<l>tasyā malayavatyāś ca tatpatnyāḥ prāpatat puraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.154'>
<lg>
<l>atra-antare sa tad rakta-dhārā-srava-śiraḥ-maṇiḥ /</l>
<l>tasyā malayavatyāś ca tat-patnyāḥ prāpatat puraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.155' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>sā tad dṛṣṭvā parijñāya cūḍāratnaṃ suvihvalā /</l>
<l>antikasthā śvaśurayos tābhyāṃ sāśrur adarśayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.155'>
<lg>
<l>sā tad dṛṣṭvā parijñāya cūḍā-ratnaṃ su-vihvalā /</l>
<l>antika-sthā śvaśurayos tābhyāṃ sa-aśrur adarśayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.156' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tau ca jāyāpatī sūnoḥ śiraḥratnaṃ vilokya tam /</l>
<l>kim etad iti saṃbhrāntau sahasaiva babhūvatuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.156'>
<lg>
<l>tau ca jāyā-patī sūnoḥ śiraḥ-ratnaṃ vilokya tam /</l>
<l>kim etad iti saṃbhrāntau sahasa aiva babhūvatuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.157' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tataḥ svavidyānudhyānād yathāvṛttam avetya tat /</l>
<l>rājā jīmūtaketuḥ sā rājnī kanakavaty api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.157'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sva-vidyā-anudhyānād yathā-vṛttam avetya tat /</l>
<l>rājā jīmūtaketuḥ sā rājnī kanakavaty api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.158' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>vadhvā malayavatyā tau prāvartetāṃ saha drutam /</l>
<l>gantuṃ tatraiva tau yatra tārkṣyajīmūtavāhanau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.158'>
<lg>
<l>vadhvā malayavatyā tau prāvartetāṃ saha drutam /</l>
<l>gantuṃ tatra eva tau yatra tārkṣya-jīmūtavāhanau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.159' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tāvat sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra natvā gokarṇam āgataḥ /</l>
<l>dadarśa rudhirārdraṃ tad vigno vadhyaśilātalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.159'>
<lg>
<l>tāvat sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra natvā gokarṇam āgataḥ /</l>
<l>dadarśa rudhira-ardraṃ tad vigno vadhya-śilā-talam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.160' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>hā hato 'smi mahāpāpo dhruvaṃ tena mahātmanā /</l>
<l>ātmā garutmate datto matkṛte sukṛpālunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.160'>
<lg>
<l>hā hato 'smi mahā-pāpo dhruvaṃ tena mahā-ātmanā /</l>
<l>ātmā garutmate datto mat-kṛte su-kṛpālunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.161' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad anviṣyāmi nītaḥ sa kṣaṇe 'smin kvāhivairiṇā /</l>
<l>majjeyaṃ nā-yaśaḥpaṅke jīvantaṃ cet tam āpnuyām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.161'>
<lg>
<l>tad anviṣyāmi nītaḥ sa kṣaṇe 'smin kva ahi-vairiṇā /</l>
<l>majjeyaṃ na a-yaśaḥ-paṅke jīvantaṃ cet tam āpnuyām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.162' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity udaśrur vadan so 'tha sādhur dṛṣṭvā niḥantarām /</l>
<l>patitāṃ bhuvi tadraktadhārām anusaran yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.162'>
<lg>
<l>ity udaśrur vadan so 'tha sādhur dṛṣṭvā niḥ-antarām /</l>
<l>patitāṃ bhuvi tad-rakta-dhārām anusaran yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.163' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>atrāntare bhakṣayaṃs taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>hṛṣṭaṃ viramya garuḍaś cintayāmāsa tat kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.163'>
<lg>
<l>atra-antare bhakṣayaṃs taṃ dṛṣṭvā jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>hṛṣṭaṃ viramya garuḍaś cintayāmāsa tat kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.164' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>aho apūrvaḥ ko 'py eṣa bhakṣyamāno 'pi yo mayā /</l>
<l>prahṛṣyati mahāsattvo na tu prāṇair viyujyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.164'>
<lg>
<l>aho a-pūrvaḥ ko 'py eṣa bhakṣyamāno 'pi yo mayā /</l>
<l>prahṛṣyati mahā-sattvo na tu prāṇair viyujyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.165' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>bibharti luptaśeṣe ca gātre romāñcakañcukam /</l>
<l>kiṃ copakāriṇīvāsya mayi dṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.165'>
<lg>
<l>bibharti lupta-śeṣe ca gātre roma-añca-kañcukam /</l>
<l>kiṃ ca upakāriṇi iva asya mayi dṛṣṭiḥ prasīdati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.166' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tan naiṣo nāgaḥ ko 'py eṣa sādhuḥ pṛcchāmi nādmy amum /</l>
<l>iti tārkṣyaṃ vimṛśyantaṃ prāha jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.166'>
<lg>
<l>tan na eṣo nāgaḥ ko 'py eṣa sādhuḥ pṛcchāmi na admy amum /</l>
<l>iti tārkṣyaṃ vimṛśyantaṃ prāha jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.167' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>pakṣīndra kiṃ nivṛtto 'si na hi me māṃsaśoṇitam /</l>
<l>dehe nāsti na cādyāpi paritṛpto 'si buṅkṣva tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.167'>
<lg>
<l>pakṣi-indra kiṃ nivṛtto 'si na hi me māṃsa-śoṇitam /</l>
<l>dehe na asti na ca adya api paritṛpto 'si buṅkṣva tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.168' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>etac chrutvātisāścaryas taṃ papraccha sa pakṣirāṭ /</l>
<l>nāgo naivāsi tad brūhi mahātman ko bhavān iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.168'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutva āti-sa-āścaryas taṃ papraccha sa pakṣi-rāṭ /</l>
<l>nāgo na eva asi tad brūhi mahā-ātman ko bhavān iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.169' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nāga evāsmi ko 'yaṃ te praśnaḥ prakṛtam ācara /</l>
<l>prastutārthaviruddhaṃ hi ko 'bhidadhyād abāliśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.169'>
<lg>
<l>nāga eva asmi ko 'yaṃ te praśnaḥ prakṛtam ācara /</l>
<l>prastuta-artha-viruddhaṃ hi ko 'bhidadhyād a-bāliśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.170' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evaṃ prativadaty eva tārkṣyaṃ jīmūtavāhane /</l>
<l>prāptaḥ sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra dūrād evābhyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.170'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ prativadaty eva tārkṣyaṃ jīmūtavāhane /</l>
<l>prāptaḥ sa śaṅkhacūḍo 'tra dūrād eva abhyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.171' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>mā mā kṛthā mahāpāpaṃ sāhasaṃ vinatātmaja /</l>
<l>ko 'yaṃ bhramas te na hy eṣa nāgo nāgo 'ham eṣa te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.171'>
<lg>
<l>mā mā kṛthā mahā-pāpaṃ sāhasaṃ vinatā-ātma-ja /</l>
<l>ko 'yaṃ bhramas te na hy eṣa nāgo nāgo 'ham eṣa te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.172' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity uktvā drutam āgatya madhye sthitvā tayor dvayoḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca tārkṣyaṃ vibhrāntaṃ śaṅkhacūḍo 'bravīt punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.172'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā drutam āgatya madhye sthitvā tayor dvayoḥ /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca tārkṣyaṃ vibhrāntaṃ śaṅkhacūḍo 'bravīt punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.173' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>kiṃ bhrāmyasi phaṇāḥ kiṃ me jihve dve ca na paśyasi /</l>
<l>vidyādharasya kiṃ cāsya saumyāṃ paśyasi nākṛtim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.173'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ bhrāmyasi phaṇāḥ kiṃ me jihve dve ca na paśyasi /</l>
<l>vidyādharasya kiṃ ca asya saumyāṃ paśyasi nā akṛtim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.174' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>śaṅkhacūḍe vadaty evaṃ bhāryā ca pitarau ca tau /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhanasyātra sarve satvaram āyayuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.174'>
<lg>
<l>śaṅkhacūḍe vadaty evaṃ bhāryā ca pitarau ca tau /</l>
<l>jīmūtavāhanasya atra sarve sa-tvaram āyayuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.175' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>viluptāṅgaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā pitarau tasya tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>cakrandatus tau hā putra hā hā jīmūtavāhana //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.175'>
<lg>
<l>vilupta-aṅgaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā pitarau tasya tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>cakrandatus tau hā putra hā hā jīmūtavāhana //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.176' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>hā kāruṇika hā vatsa parārthaprattajīvita /</l>
<l>hā kathaṃ vainateyedam avimṛśya kṛtaṃ tvayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.176'>
<lg>
<l>hā kāruṇika hā vatsa para-artha-pratta-jīvita /</l>
<l>hā kathaṃ vainateya idam a-vimṛśya kṛtaṃ tvayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.177' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>etac chrutvaiva tārkṣyo 'tra so 'nutapto vyacintayat /</l>
<l>hā kathaṃ bodhisattvāṃśaḥ saṃmohād bhakṣito mayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.177'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutva aiva tārkṣyo 'tra so 'nutapto vyacintayat /</l>
<l>hā kathaṃ bodhi-sattva-aṃśaḥ saṃmohād bhakṣito mayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.178' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>jīmūtavāhanaḥ so 'yaṃ parārthaprāṇadāyakaḥ /</l>
<l>yasya bhramati kṛtsne 'smiṃs trailokye kīrtighoṣaṇā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.178'>
<lg>
<l>jīmūtavāhanaḥ so 'yaṃ para-artha-prāṇa-dāyakaḥ /</l>
<l>yasya bhramati kṛtsne 'smiṃs trailokye kīrti-ghoṣaṇā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.179' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tan me mṛte 'smin pāpasya prāptam agnipraveśanam /</l>
<l>adharmaviṣavṛkṣasya pacyate svādu kiṃ phalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.179'>
<lg>
<l>tan me mṛte 'smin pāpasya prāptam agni-praveśanam /</l>
<l>a-dharma-viṣa-vṛkṣasya pacyate svādu kiṃ phalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.180' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>iti cintākule tārkṣye dṛṣṭvā bandhūn nipatya saḥ /</l>
<l>vraṇavyathāyāṃ pañcatvaṃ prāpa jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.180'>
<lg>
<l>iti cintā-ākule tārkṣye dṛṣṭvā bandhūn nipatya saḥ /</l>
<l>vraṇa-vyathāyāṃ pañcatvaṃ prāpa jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.181' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tato vilapatos tatra tatpitroḥ śokadīnayoḥ /</l>
<l>utkruśya muhur ātmānaṃ śaṅkhacūḍe ca nindati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.181'>
<lg>
<l>tato vilapatos tatra tat-pitroḥ śoka-dīnayoḥ /</l>
<l>utkruśya muhur ātmānaṃ śaṅkhacūḍe ca nindati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.182' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>bhāryā malayavaty asya nabho dṛṣṭvāśrugadgadam /</l>
<l>pūrvaprasannāṃ varadām ity upālabhatāmbikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.182'>
<lg>
<l>bhāryā malayavaty asya nabho dṛṣṭva āśru-gadgadam /</l>
<l>pūrva-prasannāṃ vara-dām ity upālabhata ambikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.183' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>vidyādharādhipo bhāvicakravartī patis tava /</l>
<l>bhavitety aham ādiṣṭā devi gaurī tadā tvayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.183'>
<lg>
<l>vidyādhara-adhipo bhāvi-cakra-vartī patis tava /</l>
<l>bhavita īty aham ādiṣṭā devi gaurī tadā tvayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.184' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tan mithyāvādinī jātā tvam apy asi kathaṃ mayi /</l>
<l>ity uktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ sā gaurī pratyakṣatām agāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.184'>
<lg>
<l>tan mithyā-vādinī jātā tvam apy asi kathaṃ mayi /</l>
<l>ity uktavatyāṃ tasyāṃ sā gaurī pratyakṣatām agāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.185' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>na me mithyā vacaḥ putrīty uktvā sā svakamaṇḍaloḥ /</l>
<l>amṛtenāśu jīmūtavāhanaṃ siñcati sma tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.185'>
<lg>
<l>na me mithyā vacaḥ putri īty uktvā sā sva-kamaṇḍaloḥ /</l>
<l>amṛtenā aśu jīmūta-vāhanaṃ siñcati sma tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.186' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tena so 'kṣatasarvāṅgaḥ pūrvādhikataradyutiḥ /</l>
<l>jīvan sadyaḥ samuttasthau kṛtī jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.186'>
<lg>
<l>tena so '-kṣata-sarva-aṅgaḥ pūrva-adhikatara-dyutiḥ /</l>
<l>jīvan sadyaḥ samuttasthau kṛtī jīmūtavāhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.187' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>utthitaṃ praṇataṃ taṃ ca sarveṣu praṇamatsu sā /</l>
<l>uvāca devī tuṣṭāsmi dehadānena te 'munā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.187'>
<lg>
<l>utthitaṃ praṇataṃ taṃ ca sarveṣu praṇamatsu sā /</l>
<l>uvāca devī tuṣṭa āsmi deha-dānena te 'munā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.188' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad eṣā tvābhiṣiñcāmi putrātmīyena pāṇinā /</l>
<l>vidyādharāṇām ākalpaṃ cakravartipade 'dhunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.188'>
<lg>
<l>tad eṣā tva ābhiṣiñcāmi putrā atmīyena pāṇinā /</l>
<l>vidyādharāṇām ā-kalpaṃ cakra-varti-pade 'dhunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.189' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evaṃ vadantī jīmūtavāhanaṃ kalaśāmbudhiḥ /</l>
<l>tam abhyaṣiñcac charvānī pūjitā ca tiraḥdadhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.189'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ vadantī jīmūta-vāhanaṃ kalaśa-ambudhiḥ /</l>
<l>tam abhyaṣiñcac charvānī pūjitā ca tiraḥ-dadhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.190' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>nipetuś cātra tat kālaṃ divyāḥ kusumavṛṣṭayaḥ /</l>
<l>nadanti sma ca sānandaṃ devadundubhayo divi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.190'>
<lg>
<l>nipetuś ca atra tat kālaṃ divyāḥ kusuma-vṛṣṭayaḥ /</l>
<l>nadanti sma ca sa-ānandaṃ deva-dundubhayo divi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.191' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>athovāca sa taṃ prahvas tārkṣyo jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>cakravartinn ahaṃ prītaḥ puruṣātiśaye tvayi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.191'>
<lg>
<l>atha uvāca sa taṃ prahvas tārkṣyo jīmūtavāhanam /</l>
<l>cakra-vartinn ahaṃ prītaḥ puruṣa-atiśaye tvayi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.192' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>apūrvodāramatinā trijagatkautukāvaham /</l>
<l>brahmāṇḍabhittilikhitaṃ yena citram idaṃ kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.192'>
<lg>
<l>a-pūrva-udāra-matinā tri-jagat-kautuka-āvaham /</l>
<l>brahmā-aṇḍa-bhitti-likhitaṃ yena citram idaṃ kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.193' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tan māṃ praśādhi mattaś ca vṛṇuṣvābhīpsitaṃ varam /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ garuḍaṃ mahāsattvo jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.193'>
<lg>
<l>tan māṃ praśādhi mattaś ca vṛṇuṣva abhīpsitaṃ varam /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ garuḍaṃ mahā-sattvo jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.194' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>na bhakṣyāḥ sānutāpena bhūtvā nāgāḥ punas tvayā /</l>
<l>te 'py asthiśeṣā jīvantu ye tvayā pūrvabhakṣitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.194'>
<lg>
<l>na bhakṣyāḥ sa-anutāpena bhūtvā nāgāḥ punas tvayā /</l>
<l>te 'py asthi-śeṣā jīvantu ye tvayā pūrva-bhakṣitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.195' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>evam astu na bhokṣye 'haṃ nāgāñ śāntamataḥ param /</l>
<l>prāg ye ca bhuktās te jīvantv iti tārkṣyo 'py uvāca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.195'>
<lg>
<l>evam astu na bhokṣye 'haṃ nāgāñ śānta-mataḥ param /</l>
<l>prāg ye ca bhuktās te jīvantv iti tārkṣyo 'py uvāca saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.196' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tato 'stiśeṣā ye 'py āsan nāgās tatpūrvabhakṣitāḥ /</l>
<l>te 'pi sarve samuttasthus tadvarāmṛtajīvitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.196'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'sti-śeṣā ye 'py āsan nāgās tat-pūrva-bhakṣitāḥ /</l>
<l>te 'pi sarve samuttasthus tad-vara-amṛta-jīvitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.197' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>surair nagair muniganaiḥ sānandair militair atha /</l>
<l>sa lokatritayābhikhyām uvāha malayācalaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.197'>
<lg>
<l>surair nagair muni-ganaiḥ sa-ānandair militair atha /</l>
<l>sa loka-tritaya-abhikhyām uvāha malaya-acalaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.198' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tat kālaṃ taṃ ca jīmūtavāhanodantam adbhutam /</l>
<l>gauryāḥ prasādād vividuḥ sarve vidyādhareśvarāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.198'>
<lg>
<l>tat kālaṃ taṃ ca jīmūta-vāhana-udantam adbhutam /</l>
<l>gauryāḥ prasādād vividuḥ sarve vidyā-dhara-īśvarāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.199' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>āgatya te ca caraṇāvanatā himādriṃ ninyuḥ kṣaṇān muditabandhusuhṛtsametam /</l>
<l>taṃ pārvatīsvakarakḷptamahābhiṣekaṃ saccakravartinam atha pratimuktatārkṣyam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.199'>
<lg>
<l>āgatya te ca caraṇa-avanatā hima-adriṃ ninyuḥ kṣaṇān mudita-bandhu-su-hṛt-sametam /</l>
<l>taṃ pārvatī-sva-kara-kḷpta-mahā-abhiṣekaṃ sac-cakra-vartinam atha pratimukta-tārkṣyam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.200' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tatra sa pitrā mātrā mitrāvasunā ca malayavatyā ca /</l>
<l>nijagṛhagatāgatena ca saṃyuktaḥ śaṅkhacūḍena //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.200'>
<lg>
<l>tatra sa pitrā mātrā mitrāvasunā ca malayavatyā ca /</l>
<l>nija-gṛha-gata-āgatena ca saṃyuktaḥ śaṅkhacūḍena //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.201' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>lokottaracaritādbhutasiddhāṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ suciram /</l>
<l>abhajata ratnopacitāṃ vidyādharacakravartidhuram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.201'>
<lg>
<l>loka-uttara-carita-adbhuta-siddhāṃ jīmūtavāhanaḥ su-ciram /</l>
<l>abhajata ratna-upacitāṃ vidyā-dhara-cakra-varti-dhuram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.202' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity atyudārasarasām ākhyāya kathāṃ tadā sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>puna eva taṃ trivikramasenaṃ papraccha rājānam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.202'>
<lg>
<l>ity atyudāra-sa-rasām ākhyāya kathāṃ tadā sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>puna eva taṃ trivikramasenaṃ papraccha rājānam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.203' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>tad brūhi śaṅkhacūḍaḥ kiṃ vā jīmūtavāhano 'bhyadhikaḥ /</l>
<l>sattvena tayor ubhayoḥ pūrvoktaś cātra samayas te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.203'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūhi śaṅkhacūḍaḥ kiṃ vā jīmūtavāhano 'bhyadhikaḥ /</l>
<l>sattvena tayor ubhayoḥ pūrva-uktaś ca atra samayas te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.204' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>ity asmād vetālāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya śāpabhayāt /</l>
<l>tam uvāca sa trivikramaseno nṛpatir niḥudvegaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.204'>
<lg>
<l>ity asmād vetālāc chrutvā maunaṃ vihāya śāpa-bhayāt /</l>
<l>tam uvāca sa trivikramaseno nṛ-patir niḥ-udvegaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.205' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>bahujanmasiddham etac citraṃ jīmūtavāhanasya kiyat /</l>
<l>ślāghyaḥ sa śaṅkhacūḍo maraṇottīrṇo 'pi yo ripave //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.205'>
<lg>
<l>bahu-janma-siddham etac citraṃ jīmūtavāhanasya kiyat /</l>
<l>ślāghyaḥ sa śaṅkhacūḍo maraṇa-uttīrṇo 'pi yo ripave //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.206' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>anyaprattātmānaṃ prāpya sudūraṃ gatāya tārkṣyāya /</l>
<l>paścād dhāvan gatvā svaṃ deham upānayat prasabham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.206'>
<lg>
<l>anya-pratta-ātmānaṃ prāpya su-dūraṃ gatāya tārkṣyāya /</l>
<l>paścād dhāvan gatvā svaṃ deham upānayat prasabham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.23.207' corresp='Vet_16'>
<l>etan niśamyaiva nṛpasya tasya vākyaṃ sa vetālavaro jagāma /</l>
<l>punaḥ svadhāmaiva tadaṃsapṛṣṭhān nṛpo 'pi taṃ so 'nuyayau tathaiva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.23.207'>
<lg>
<l>etan niśamya eva nṛ-pasya tasya vākyaṃ sa vetāla-varo jagāma /</l>
<l>punaḥ sva-dhāma eva tad-aṃsa-pṛṣṭhān nṛ-po 'pi taṃ so 'nuyayau tatha aiva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.1' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tato gatvā punas tasmāt sa rājā śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramaseno 'ṃse vīro vetālam agrahīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punas tasmāt sa rājā śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramaseno 'ṃse vīro vetālam agrahīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.2' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>prasthitaṃ ca tatas taṃ sa vetālaḥ skandhato 'bravīt /</l>
<l>rājañ śramavinodāya śṛṇv etāṃ vacmi te kathām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.2'>
<lg>
<l>prasthitaṃ ca tatas taṃ sa vetālaḥ skandhato 'bravīt /</l>
<l>rājañ śrama-vinodāya śṛṇv etāṃ vacmi te kathām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.3' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>akhaṇḍadharmamaryādaṃ gaṅgākūle kṛtāspadam /</l>
<l>kaler agamyaṃ kanakapuraṃ nāmnābhavat puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.3'>
<lg>
<l>a-khaṇḍa-dharma-maryādaṃ gaṅgā-kūle kṛta-āspadam /</l>
<l>kaler a-gamyaṃ kanaka-puraṃ nāmna ābhavat puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.4' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tasmin yaśodhanākhyo 'bhūd anvartho vasudhādhipaḥ /</l>
<l>raraKṣa viplavāmbhaḥdher yo velādrir iva kṣitim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.4'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin yaśodhana-ākhyo 'bhūd anvartho vasu-dhā-adhipaḥ /</l>
<l>raraKṣa viplava-ambhaḥ-dher yo velā-adrir iva kṣitim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.5' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>jagādāhlādakaś caṇḍapratāpo 'khaṇḍamaṇḍalaḥ /</l>
<l>vidhinā yaś ca candrārkāv ekīkṛtyeva nirmame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.5'>
<lg>
<l>jagād-āhlādakaś caṇḍa-pratāpo '-khaṇḍa-maṇḍalaḥ /</l>
<l>vidhinā yaś ca candra-arkāv ekīkṛtya iva nirmame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.6' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>maurkhyaṃ paraparīvāde na śāstrārthe daridratā /</l>
<l>doṣe na koṣadaṇḍābhyāṃ yasyāsīc ca mahīpateḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.6'>
<lg>
<l>maurkhyaṃ para-parīvāde na śāstra-arthe daridratā /</l>
<l>doṣe na koṣa-daṇḍābhyāṃ yasyā asīc ca mahī-pateḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.7' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>pāpabhīrur yaśaḥlubdhaḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ parapuraṃdhriṣu /</l>
<l>yaḥ śauryaudāryaśṛṅgāramayo janatayā jage //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.7'>
<lg>
<l>pāpa-bhīrur yaśaḥ-lubdhaḥ ṣaṇḍhaḥ para-puraṃdhriṣu /</l>
<l>yaḥ śaurya-audārya-śṛṅgāra-mayo janatayā jage //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.8' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tasya rājñaḥ pure tasminn abhūd eko mahāvaṇik /</l>
<l>unmādinīti khyātā ca kanyā tasyābhavat sutā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.8'>
<lg>
<l>tasya rājñaḥ pure tasminn abhūd eko mahā-vaṇik /</l>
<l>unmādini īti khyātā ca kanyā tasya abhavat sutā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.9' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>yo yas tāṃ hi dadarśātra sa sa tadrūpasaṃpadā /</l>
<l>unmādyati sma madanasyāpi mohanaśaktayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.9'>
<lg>
<l>yo yas tāṃ hi dadarśa atra sa sa tad-rūpa-saṃpadā /</l>
<l>unmādyati sma madanasya api mohana-śaktayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.10' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tasyāṃ ca yauvanasthāyāṃ sa gatvā tatpitā vaṇik /</l>
<l>yaśodhanaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ nītivedī vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.10'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ ca yauvana-sthāyāṃ sa gatvā tat-pitā vaṇik /</l>
<l>yaśodhanaṃ taṃ rājānaṃ nīti-vedī vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.11' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>trailokyaratnabhūtā me pradeyāsti sutā prabho /</l>
<l>tām anāvedya devasya nānyasmai dātum utsahe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.11'>
<lg>
<l>trailokya-ratna-bhūtā me pradeya āsti sutā prabho /</l>
<l>tām an-āvedya devasya na anyasmai dātum utsahe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.12' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>devo 'pi sarvaratnānāṃ prabhuḥ kṛtsne 'pi bhūtale /</l>
<l>tatsvīkṛtyānugṛhṇātu devas tāṃ pratimucya vā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.12'>
<lg>
<l>devo 'pi sarva-ratnānāṃ prabhuḥ kṛtsne 'pi bhū-tale /</l>
<l>tat-svī-kṛtya anugṛhṇātu devas tāṃ pratimucya vā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.13' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>ity ākarṇya vaṇigvākyaṃ sa rājā brāhmaṇān nijān /</l>
<l>sādaraṃ vyasṛjat tasyāḥ saulakṣaṇyam avekṣitum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.13'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākarṇya vaṇig-vākyaṃ sa rājā brāhmaṇān nijān /</l>
<l>sa-ādaraṃ vyasṛjat tasyāḥ saulakṣaṇyam avekṣitum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.14' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>te gatvā brāhmaṇā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ trailokyaikasundarīm /</l>
<l>sadyaḥ kṣobhaṃ yayuḥ kṣiprāl labdhvā dhairyam acintayan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.14'>
<lg>
<l>te gatvā brāhmaṇā dṛṣṭvā tāṃ trailokya-eka-sundarīm /</l>
<l>sadyaḥ kṣobhaṃ yayuḥ kṣiprāl labdhvā dhairyam acintayan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.15' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>imāṃ prāpnoti ced rājā tad rāṣṭram avasīdati /</l>
<l>etanmohitacitto hi kiṃ sa rājyam avekṣate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.15'>
<lg>
<l>imāṃ prāpnoti ced rājā tad rāṣṭram avasīdati /</l>
<l>etan-mohita-citto hi kiṃ sa rājyam avekṣate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.16' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tasmāt sulakṣaṇety eṣā nākhyeyā kṣitipāya naḥ /</l>
<l>ity eva mantraṃ saṃmantrya rājñas te jagmur antikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.16'>
<lg>
<l>tasmāt su-lakṣaṇa ity eṣā nā akhyeyā kṣiti-pāya naḥ /</l>
<l>ity eva mantraṃ saṃmantrya rājñas te jagmur antikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.17' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>kulakṣaṇā sā deveti tam ūcuś cātra te mṛṣā /</l>
<l>tena rājā sa naivaitāṃ svīcakāra vaṇiksutām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.17'>
<lg>
<l>ku-lakṣaṇā sā deva iti tam ūcuś ca atra te mṛṣā /</l>
<l>tena rājā sa na eva etāṃ svīcakāra vaṇik-sutām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.18' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tatas tadājñayā tāṃ sa kanyām unmādinīṃ pitā /</l>
<l>vaṇig baladharākhyāya tat senāpataye dadau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.18'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tad-ājñayā tāṃ sa kanyām unmādinīṃ pitā /</l>
<l>vaṇig baladhara-ākhyāya tat senā-pataye dadau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.19' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>atha sā tadgṛhe tasthau bhartrā tena samaṃ sukham /</l>
<l>kulakṣaṇety ahaṃ rajñā tyaktety āttavimānanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.19'>
<lg>
<l>atha sā tad-gṛhe tasthau bhartrā tena samaṃ sukham /</l>
<l>ku-lakṣaṇa īty ahaṃ rajñā tyakta īty ātta-vimānanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.20' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>yāti kāle ca jātv atra hatvā hemantahastinam /</l>
<l>phullakundalatādantaṃ mathitāmbujinīvanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.20'>
<lg>
<l>yāti kāle ca jātv atra hatvā hemanta-hastinam /</l>
<l>phulla-kunda-latā-dantaṃ mathita-ambujinī-vanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.21' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>ājagāma lasatpuṣpamañjarīkesarāvaliḥ /</l>
<l>cūtāṅkuranakhaḥ krīdan kānane madhukesarī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.21'>
<lg>
<l>ājagāma lasat-puṣpa-mañjarī-kesara-āvaliḥ /</l>
<l>cūta-aṅkura-nakhaḥ krīdan kānane madhu-kesarī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.22' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tat kālaṃ cātra nagare taṃ vasantamahotsavam /</l>
<l>sa rājā niryayau draṣṭuṃ gajārūḍho yaśodhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.22'>
<lg>
<l>tat kālaṃ ca atra nagare taṃ vasanta-mahā-utsavam /</l>
<l>sa rājā niryayau draṣṭuṃ gaja-ārūḍho yaśodhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.23' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tadrūpālokasaṃbhāvyaviplavāḥ kulayoṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>apasārayituṃ dattaṃ tadā codghoṣaḍiṇḍimam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.23'>
<lg>
<l>tad-rūpa-āloka-saṃbhāvya-viplavāḥ kula-yoṣitaḥ /</l>
<l>apasārayituṃ dattaṃ tadā ca udghoṣa-ḍiṇḍimam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.24' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>sā śrutvonmādinī tasmai rājñe svagṛhaharmyataḥ /</l>
<l>ātmānaṃ darśayāmāsa parityāgāvamānataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.24'>
<lg>
<l>sā śrutva ūnmādinī tasmai rājñe sva-gṛha-harmyataḥ /</l>
<l>ātmānaṃ darśayāmāsa parityāga-avamānataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.25' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>sa ca tāṃ cakṣubhe dṛṣṭvā rājā jvālām ivodgatām /</l>
<l>saṃdhukṣitasya kāmāgner madhunā malayānilaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.25'>
<lg>
<l>sa ca tāṃ cakṣubhe dṛṣṭvā rājā jvālām iva udgatām /</l>
<l>saṃdhukṣitasya kāma-agner madhunā malaya-anilaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.26' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>nirvarṇayaṃś ca tadrūpaṃ jaitram astraṃ manaḥbhuvaḥ /</l>
<l>gāḍhaṃ praviṣṭaṃ hṛdaye kṣaṇān moham upāyayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.26'>
<lg>
<l>nirvarṇayaṃś ca tad-rūpaṃ jaitram astraṃ manaḥ-bhuvaḥ /</l>
<l>gāḍhaṃ praviṣṭaṃ hṛdaye kṣaṇān moham upāyayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.27' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>bhṛtyair āśvāsitaś cātra rājadhānīṃ praviśya saḥ /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭebhyo bubudhe tebhyas tāṃ prāgupanatojjhitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.27'>
<lg>
<l>bhṛtyair āśvāsitaś ca atra rāja-dhānīṃ praviśya saḥ /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭebhyo bubudhe tebhyas tāṃ prāg-upanatā-ujjhitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.28' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tato nirvāsya deśāt tāṃs tatkulakṣaṇavādinaḥ /</l>
<l>viprān anudinaṃ dadhyau tām evotkaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.28'>
<lg>
<l>tato nirvāsya deśāt tāṃs tat-ku-lakṣaṇa-vādinaḥ /</l>
<l>viprān anu-dinaṃ dadhyau tām eva utkaḥ sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.29' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>aho jaḍātmā niḥlajjaś candro nityam udeti yat /</l>
<l>jagannetrotsave tasyā niḥkalaṅke mukhe sati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.29'>
<lg>
<l>aho jaḍa-ātmā niḥ-lajjaś candro nityam udeti yat /</l>
<l>jagan-netra-utsave tasyā niḥ-kalaṅke mukhe sati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.30' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>kaṭhorau hemakalaśau gajakumbhau ca karkaśau /</l>
<l>labhete nopamām asyāḥ stanayoḥ pīnatuṅgayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.30'>
<lg>
<l>kaṭhorau hema-kalaśau gaja-kumbhau ca karkaśau /</l>
<l>labhete na upamām asyāḥ stanayoḥ pīna-tuṅgayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.31' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>kāñcīnakṣatramālāṅkaṃ tat tasyā jaghanasthalam /</l>
<l>kaṃ na kaṃdarpamātaṅgamastakābhaṃ vilobhayet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.31'>
<lg>
<l>kāñcī-nakṣatra-mālā-aṅkaṃ tat tasyā jaghana-sthalam /</l>
<l>kaṃ na kaṃdarpa-mātaṅga-mastaka-ābhaṃ vilobhayet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.32' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>iti tāṃ cintayann antaḥ kṣīyate sma dine dine /</l>
<l>kāmāgnipuṭapākena pacyamānaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.32'>
<lg>
<l>iti tāṃ cintayann antaḥ kṣīyate sma dine dine /</l>
<l>kāma-agni-puṭa-pākena pacyamānaḥ sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.33' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>hriyā nigūhamānaś ca pṛcchadbhyo bāhyalakṣaṇaiḥ /</l>
<l>kṛcchrāc chaśaṃsa cāptebhyaḥ svapīḍākāraṇaṃ sa tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.33'>
<lg>
<l>hriyā nigūhamānaś ca pṛcchadbhyo bāhya-lakṣaṇaiḥ /</l>
<l>kṛcchrāc chaśaṃsa cā aptebhyaḥ sva-pīḍā-kāraṇaṃ sa tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.34' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>alaṃ saṃtapya bhajase svādhīnāṃ tarhi kiṃ na tām /</l>
<l>ity uktas taiś ca naivaitad anumene sa dhārmikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.34'>
<lg>
<l>alaṃ saṃtapya bhajase sva-adhīnāṃ tarhi kiṃ na tām /</l>
<l>ity uktas taiś ca na eva etad anumene sa dhārmikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.35' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tato baladharo buddhvā sa senāpatir etya tam /</l>
<l>prabhum abhyarthayāmāsa sadbhaktaś caraṇānataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.35'>
<lg>
<l>tato baladharo buddhvā sa senā-patir etya tam /</l>
<l>prabhum abhyarthayāmāsa sad-bhaktaś caraṇa-ānataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.36' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>dāsastrī tava dāsy eva sā deva na parāṅganā /</l>
<l>svayaṃ cāhaṃ prayacchāmi tad bhāryāṃ svīkuruṣva me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.36'>
<lg>
<l>dāsa-strī tava dāsy eva sā deva na para-aṅganā /</l>
<l>svayaṃ ca ahaṃ prayacchāmi tad bhāryāṃ svī-kuruṣva me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.37' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>athavā tāṃ tyajāmīha deva devakule tataḥ /</l>
<l>na doṣo grahaṇe tasyās tava devakulastriyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.37'>
<lg>
<l>athavā tāṃ tyajāmi iha deva deva-kule tataḥ /</l>
<l>na doṣo grahaṇe tasyās tava deva-kula-striyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.38' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>iti svasenāpatinā nirbandhena sa pārthivaḥ /</l>
<l>tenānunāthyamāno 'pi sāntaḥkopam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.38'>
<lg>
<l>iti sva-senā-patinā nirbandhena sa pārthivaḥ /</l>
<l>tena anunāthyamāno 'pi sa-antaḥ-kopam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.39' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>rājā bhūtvā kathaṃ kuryām adharmam aham īdṛśam /</l>
<l>mayy ullaṅghitamaryāde ko hi tiṣṭhet svavartmani //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.39'>
<lg>
<l>rājā bhūtvā kathaṃ kuryām a-dharmam aham īdṛśam /</l>
<l>mayy ullaṅghita-maryāde ko hi tiṣṭhet sva-vartmani //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.40' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>bhakto 'pi ca bhavān pāpe niyojayati māṃ katham /</l>
<l>paralokamahāduḥkhahetau kṣaṇasukhāvahe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.40'>
<lg>
<l>bhakto 'pi ca bhavān pāpe niyojayati māṃ katham /</l>
<l>para-loka-mahā-duḥkha-hetau kṣaṇa-sukha-āvahe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.41' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>na kṣamiṣye ca te dharmyān dārān yadi vihāsyasi /</l>
<l>sahate mādṛśaḥ ko hi tādṛśaṃ dharmaviplavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.41'>
<lg>
<l>na kṣamiṣye ca te dharmyān dārān yadi vihāsyasi /</l>
<l>sahate mādṛśaḥ ko hi tādṛśaṃ dharma-viplavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.42' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tad varaṃ mṛtyur ity uktvā sa rājā niṣiṣedha tam /</l>
<l>tyajanty uttamasattvā hi prāṇān api na satpatham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.42'>
<lg>
<l>tad varaṃ mṛtyur ity uktvā sa rājā niṣiṣedha tam /</l>
<l>tyajanty uttama-sattvā hi prāṇān api na sat-patham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.43' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tathaivārthayamānāṃś ca paurajānapadān api /</l>
<l>militān sa nirācakre rājā sudṛḍhaniścayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.43'>
<lg>
<l>tatha aiva arthayamānāṃś ca paura-jāna-padān api /</l>
<l>militān sa nirācakre rājā sudṛḍha-niścayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.44' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tataḥ krameṇa tenaiva smarajvarabharoṣmaṇā /</l>
<l>prakṣīṇadehaḥ prayayau sa yaśaḥśeṣatāṃ nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.44'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ krameṇa tena eva smara-jvara-bhara-uṣmaṇā /</l>
<l>prakṣīṇa-dehaḥ prayayau sa yaśaḥ-śeṣatāṃ nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.45' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>senāpatiś cā-sahiṣṇus taṃ tathā pramayaṃ prabhoḥ /</l>
<l>so 'gniṃ viveśa bhaktānām anirvācyaṃ hi ceṣṭitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.45'>
<lg>
<l>senā-patiś ca a-sahiṣṇus taṃ tathā pramayaṃ prabhoḥ /</l>
<l>so 'gniṃ viveśa bhaktānām a-nirvācyaṃ hi ceṣṭitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.46' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>ity ākhyātakathāścaryo vetālo 'ṃsasthitas tadā /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ bhūyaḥ papraccha pārthivam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.46'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākhyāta-kathā-āścaryo vetālo 'ṃsa-sthitas tadā /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ bhūyaḥ papraccha pārthivam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.47' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tad etayoḥ ko nṛpateḥ senāpatimahībhṛtoḥ /</l>
<l>sattvenābhyadhiko brūhi pūrvoktaḥ samayaś ca te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.47'>
<lg>
<l>tad etayoḥ ko nṛpateḥ senā-pati-mahī-bhṛtoḥ /</l>
<l>sattvena abhyadhiko brūhi pūrva-uktaḥ samayaś ca te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.48' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā muktamaunaḥ sa taṃ nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>pratyuvāca dvayor rājā sattvavān adhikas tayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.48'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā mukta-maunaḥ sa taṃ nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>pratyuvāca dvayor rājā sattvavān adhikas tayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.49' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>tad ākarṇyaiva vetālaḥ sākṣepas tam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>senāpatiḥ kathaṃ nātra rājann abhyadhiko vada //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.49'>
<lg>
<l>tad ākarṇya eva vetālaḥ sa-ākṣepas tam abhāṣata /</l>
<l>senā-patiḥ kathaṃ na atra rājann abhyadhiko vada //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.50' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>yas tathā svāmine bhaktyā svabhāryāṃ tāṃ tathāvidhām /</l>
<l>sucirajñātatadbhogasukhāsvādo 'py upānayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.50'>
<lg>
<l>yas tathā svāmine bhaktyā sva-bhāryāṃ tāṃ tathā-vidhām /</l>
<l>sucira-jñāta-tad-bhoga-sukha-āsvādo 'py upānayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.51' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>ātmānaṃ cāgnisāc cakre tasmin pañcatvam āgate /</l>
<l>anāsvāditatadbhogas tatkāntāṃ tu jahau nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.51'>
<lg>
<l>ātmānaṃ ca agnisāc cakre tasmin pañcatvam āgate /</l>
<l>an-āsvādita-tad-bhogas tat-kāntāṃ tu jahau nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.52' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>vetālenaivam uktas tu vihasya sa nṛpo 'bravīt /</l>
<l>yady apy evaṃ tathāpy etat kiṃ citraṃ kulaputrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.52'>
<lg>
<l>vetālena evam uktas tu vihasya sa nṛ-po 'bravīt /</l>
<l>yady apy evaṃ tatha āpy etat kiṃ citraṃ kula-putrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.53' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>senāpatiḥ sa bhaktyā yat svāmyarthe tat tathākarot /</l>
<l>prāṇair api hi bhṛtyānāṃ svāmisaṃrakṣaṇaṃ vratam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.53'>
<lg>
<l>senā-patiḥ sa bhaktyā yat svāmy-arthe tat tatha ākarot /</l>
<l>prāṇair api hi bhṛtyānāṃ svāmi-saṃrakṣaṇaṃ vratam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.54' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>rājānas tu madādhmātā gajā iva niḥaṅkuśāḥ /</l>
<l>chindanti dharmamaryādāśṛṅkhalāṃ viṣayonmukhāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.54'>
<lg>
<l>rājānas tu mada-ādhmātā gajā iva niḥ-aṅkuśāḥ /</l>
<l>chindanti dharma-maryādā-śṛṅkhalāṃ viṣaya-unmukhāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.55' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>teṣāṃ hy udriktacittānām abhiṣekāmbubhiḥ samam /</l>
<l>viveko vigalaty oghenohyamāna ivākhilaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.55'>
<lg>
<l>teṣāṃ hy udrikta-cittānām abhiṣeka-ambubhiḥ samam /</l>
<l>viveko vigalaty oghena uhyamāna iva akhilaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.56' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>kṣipyanta iva coddhūya calaccāmaramārutaiḥ /</l>
<l>vṛddhopadiṣṭaśāstrārtharajomaśakamakṣikāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.56'>
<lg>
<l>kṣipyanta iva ca uddhūya calac-cāmara-mārutaiḥ /</l>
<l>vṛddha-upadiṣṭa-śāstra-artha-rajo-maśaka-makṣikāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.57' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>ātapatreṇa satyaṃ ca sūryāloko nivāryate /</l>
<l>vibhūtivātyopahatā dṛṣṭir mārgaṃ ca nekṣate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.57'>
<lg>
<l>ātapatreṇa satyaṃ ca sūrya-āloko nivāryate /</l>
<l>vibhūti-vātyā-upahatā dṛṣṭir mārgaṃ ca nā ikṣate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.58' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>te te ca vipadaṃ prāptā māramohitacetasaḥ /</l>
<l>jagadvijayino 'pīha rājāno nahuṣādayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.58'>
<lg>
<l>te te ca vipadaṃ prāptā māra-mohita-cetasaḥ /</l>
<l>jagad-vijayino 'pi iha rājāno nahuṣa-ādayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.59' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>eṣo rājā punaḥ pṛthvyām ekachatro 'pi yat tayā /</l>
<l>unmadinyā capalayā lakṣmyeva na vimohitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.59'>
<lg>
<l>eṣo rājā punaḥ pṛthvyām eka-chatro 'pi yat tayā /</l>
<l>unmadinyā capalayā lakṣmya īva na vimohitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.60' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>prāṇān api sa dharmātmā tatyāja na punaḥ padam /</l>
<l>amārge nidadhe dhīras tenāsau me 'dhiko mataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.60'>
<lg>
<l>prāṇān api sa dharma-ātmā tatyāja na punaḥ padam /</l>
<l>a-mārge nidadhe dhīras tena asau me 'dhiko mataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.24.61' corresp='Vet_17'>
<l>ity ākarṇya nṛpasya tasya vacanaṃ bhūyas tadaṃsasthalād vatālaḥ sahasā svam eva sa padaṃ māyāprabhāvād yayau /</l>
<l>rājāpy anvasarat tathaiva sa punaḥ saṃprāptum etaṃ javād ārabdhe hi suduḥkare 'pi mahatāṃ madhye virāmaḥ kutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.24.61'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākarṇya nṛ-pasya tasya vacanaṃ bhūyas tad-aṃsa-sthalād vatālaḥ sahasā svam eva sa padaṃ māyā-prabhāvād yayau /</l>
<l>rāja āpy anvasarat tatha aiva sa punaḥ saṃprāptum etaṃ javād ārabdhe hi su-duḥ-kare 'pi mahatāṃ madhye virāmaḥ kutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.1' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tataḥ pitṛvane tasmin kravyabhakṣibhir āvṛte /</l>
<l>jvālāvilolarasanair bhūtair iva citāgnibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.1'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ pitṛ-vane tasmin kravya-bhakṣibhir āvṛte /</l>
<l>jvālā-vilola-rasanair bhūtair iva citā-agnibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.2' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>gatvaiva tasyām akṣobhyaḥ kṣapāyāṃ śiṃśapātarum /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam āsasāda punar nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.2'>
<lg>
<l>gatva aiva tasyām a-kṣobhyaḥ kṣapāyāṃ śiṃśapā-tarum /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam āsasāda punar nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.3' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatrāpaśyac ca vetālavikṛtān sadṛśākṛtīn /</l>
<l>ullambamānān subahūn pretakāyān aśaṅkitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.3'>
<lg>
<l>tatra apaśyac ca vetāla-vikṛtān sadṛśa-ākṛtīn /</l>
<l>ullambamānān su-bahūn preta-kāyān a-śaṅkitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.4' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>aho kim etat kiṃ vānyan māyī kālaṃ kṣipaty ayam /</l>
<l>vetālo me na vedmy eṣāṃ grāhyaṃ yeneha bhūyaṣām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.4'>
<lg>
<l>aho kim etat kiṃ va ānyan māyī kālaṃ kṣipaty ayam /</l>
<l>vetālo me na vedmy eṣāṃ grāhyaṃ yena iha bhūyaṣām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.5' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>asiddhārthasya ced rātrir iyaṃ mama gamiṣyati /</l>
<l>tato vahniṃ pravekṣyāmi na sahiṣye tu hāsyatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.5'>
<lg>
<l>a-siddha-arthasya ced rātrir iyaṃ mama gamiṣyati /</l>
<l>tato vahniṃ pravekṣyāmi na sahiṣye tu hāsyatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.6' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>iti cintayatas tasya rājño vijñāya niścayam /</l>
<l>sattvatuṣṭaḥ sa vetālaḥ svamāyāṃ saṃjahāra tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.6'>
<lg>
<l>iti cintayatas tasya rājño vijñāya niścayam /</l>
<l>sattva-tuṣṭaḥ sa vetālaḥ sva-māyāṃ saṃjahāra tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.7' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tato dṛṣṭvaikam evātra vetālaṃ nṛkalevare /</l>
<l>avatīrya gṛhītvāṃse sa pratasthe punar nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.7'>
<lg>
<l>tato dṛṣṭva aikam eva atra vetālaṃ nṛ-kalevare /</l>
<l>avatīrya gṛhītva āṃse sa pratasthe punar nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.8' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>prakrāmantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyaḥ sa vetālo 'bhyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>rājan nodvijase citraṃ tad imāṃ me kathāṃ sṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.8'>
<lg>
<l>prakrāmantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyaḥ sa vetālo 'bhyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>rājan na udvijase citraṃ tad imāṃ me kathāṃ sṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.9' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>asti gaurītapaḥkleśavṛtena tripurāriṇā /</l>
<l>asāmānyaguṇotkarṣalubdheneva svayamvṛtā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.9'>
<lg>
<l>asti gaurī-tapaḥ-kleśa-vṛtena tripurāriṇā /</l>
<l>a-sāmānya-guṇa-utkarṣa-lubdhena iva svayam-vṛtā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.10' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>bhogavatyamarāvatyos tṛtīyojjayinī purī /</l>
<l>udārasukṛtaprāpyanānābhogopabṛṃhitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.10'>
<lg>
<l>bhogavaty-amarāvatyos tṛtīya-ujjayinī purī /</l>
<l>udāra-su-kṛta-prāpya-nānā-bhoga-upabṛṃhitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.11' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>yasyāṃ stabdhatvakārkaśye kuceṣu varayoṣitām /</l>
<l>tāsām eva bhruvor bhaṅgo locaneṣu ca cāpalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.11'>
<lg>
<l>yasyāṃ stabdhatva-kārkaśye kuceṣu vara-yoṣitām /</l>
<l>tāsām eva bhruvor bhaṅgo locaneṣu ca cāpalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.12' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tamo niśāsu vakratvaṃ yasyāṃ kavivaroktiṣu /</l>
<l>mado dantiṣu jāḍyaṃ ca muktāmalayajenduṣu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.12'>
<lg>
<l>tamo niśāsu vakratvaṃ yasyāṃ kavi-vara-uktiṣu /</l>
<l>mado dantiṣu jāḍyaṃ ca muktā-malaya-ja-induṣu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.13' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tasyāṃ candraprabhākhyasya rājño 'mātyo bahuśrutaḥ /</l>
<l>devasvāmīty abhūd vipro bhūriyajño mahādhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.13'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ candraprabha-ākhyasya rājño 'mātyo bahu-śrutaḥ /</l>
<l>devasvāmi īty abhūd vipro bhūri-yajño mahā-dhanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.14' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tasya kālena tanayaś candrasvāmīty ajāyata /</l>
<l>so 'dhītavidyo 'pi yuvā dyūtaikavyasano 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.14'>
<lg>
<l>tasya kālena tanayaś candrasvāmi īty ajāyata /</l>
<l>so 'dhīta-vidyo 'pi yuvā dyūta-eka-vyasano 'bhavat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.15' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ekadā ca dvijasutaś candrasvāmī sa kāṃcana /</l>
<l>dyūtakāramahāṭhiṇṭhāṃ dyūtena krīḍituṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.15'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca dvi-ja-sutaś candrasvāmī sa kāṃ-cana /</l>
<l>dyūta-kāra-mahā-ṭhiṇṭhāṃ dyūtena krīḍituṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.16' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>āśliṣyāmaḥ kam atreti vipadbhir iva vīkṣitum /</l>
<l>vikṣiptaiḥ kṛṣṇaśārābhair netrair akṣair nirantarām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.16'>
<lg>
<l>āśliṣyāmaḥ kam atra iti vipadbhir iva vīkṣitum /</l>
<l>vikṣiptaiḥ kṛṣṇa-śāra-ābhair netrair akṣair nirantarām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.17' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>kaḥ so 'sti na śriyaṃ yasya harāmy apy alakāpateḥ /</l>
<l>itīva tanvatīṃ nādān dyūtakṛtkalahasvanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.17'>
<lg>
<l>kaḥ so 'sti na śriyaṃ yasya harāmy apy alakā-pateḥ /</l>
<l>iti iva tanvatīṃ nādān dyūta-kṛt-kalaha-svanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.18' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tāṃ praviśya kramād dīvyann akṣaiḥ sa kitavaiḥ saha /</l>
<l>vastrādi hārayitvāpi dhanam anyad ahārayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.18'>
<lg>
<l>tāṃ praviśya kramād dīvyann akṣaiḥ sa kitavaiḥ saha /</l>
<l>vastra-ādi hārayitva āpi dhanam anyad ahārayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.19' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>mṛgyamāṇaṃ ca yan nādāt sa tad dhanam asaṃbhavi /</l>
<l>tad avaṣṭabhya sabhyena laguḍaiḥ paryatāḍyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.19'>
<lg>
<l>mṛgyamāṇaṃ ca yan nā adāt sa tad dhanam asaṃbhavi /</l>
<l>tad avaṣṭabhya sabhyena laguḍaiḥ paryatāḍyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.20' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>laguḍāhatasarvāṅgaḥ pāṣāṇam iva niḥcalam /</l>
<l>kṛtvā mṛtam ivātmānaṃ tasthau viprasuto 'tha saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.20'>
<lg>
<l>laguḍa-āhata-sarva-aṅgaḥ pāṣāṇam iva niḥ-calam /</l>
<l>kṛtvā mṛtam ivā atmānaṃ tasthau vipra-suto 'tha saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.21' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tathaiva divasān dvitrāṃs tatra tasminn avasthite /</l>
<l>kruddhaḥ sa sabhyaṣ ṭhiṇṭhāyāṃ kitavān svān abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.21'>
<lg>
<l>tatha aiva divasān dvi-trāṃs tatra tasminn avasthite /</l>
<l>kruddhaḥ sa sabhyaṣ ṭhiṇṭhāyāṃ kitavān svān abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.22' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>śritānenāśmatā tāvat tad etaṃ kṣipata kvacit /</l>
<l>nītvāndhakūpe niḥsattvaṃ dhanaṃ dāsyāmy ahaṃ tu vaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.22'>
<lg>
<l>śrita ānena aśmatā tāvat tad etaṃ kṣipata kva-cit /</l>
<l>nītva āndha-kūpe niḥ-sattvaṃ dhanaṃ dāsyāmy ahaṃ tu vaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.23' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity uktās tena kitavās taṃ candrasvāminaṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>araṇyaṃ ninyur utkṣipya dūraṃ kūpagaveṣiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.23'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktās tena kitavās taṃ candrasvāminaṃ tataḥ /</l>
<l>araṇyaṃ ninyur utkṣipya dūraṃ kūpa-gaveṣiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.24' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatraiko vṛddhakitavas tān anyān evam abhyadhāt /</l>
<l>mṛto 'yaṃ prāyaśas tat kiṃ kūpe kṣiptena no 'munā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.24'>
<lg>
<l>tatra eko vṛddha-kitavas tān anyān evam abhyadhāt /</l>
<l>mṛto 'yaṃ prāyaśas tat kiṃ kūpe kṣiptena no 'munā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.25' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tad ihaivainam ujjhitvā vakṣyāmaḥ kūpa ujjhitam /</l>
<l>iti te tadvacaḥ sarve tatheti pratipedire //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.25'>
<lg>
<l>tad iha eva enam ujjhitvā vakṣyāmaḥ kūpa ujjhitam /</l>
<l>iti te tad-vacaḥ sarve tatha īti pratipedire //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.26' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatas tyaktvā gateṣv eṣu kitaveṣu sa utthitaḥ /</l>
<l>candrasvāmī viveśātra śūnyam ekaṃ śivālayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.26'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tyaktvā gateṣv eṣu kitaveṣu sa utthitaḥ /</l>
<l>candrasvāmī viveśa atra śūnyam ekaṃ śiva-ālayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.27' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatra kimcit samāśvasya cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ /</l>
<l>viśvasto māyayā kaṣṭaṃ muṣitaḥ kitavair aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.27'>
<lg>
<l>tatra kim-cit samāśvasya cintayāmāsa duḥkhitaḥ /</l>
<l>viśvasto māyayā kaṣṭaṃ muṣitaḥ kitavair aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.28' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tad īdṛśaḥ kva gacchāmi nāgnopahatapāṃśulaḥ /</l>
<l>pitā bandhuḥ suhṛd vāpi dṛṣṭvā kiṃ hi vaden mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.28'>
<lg>
<l>tad īdṛśaḥ kva gacchāmi nāgna-upahata-pāṃśulaḥ /</l>
<l>pitā bandhuḥ suhṛd va āpi dṛṣṭvā kiṃ hi vaden mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.29' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tat saṃprati sthito 'smīha naktaṃ ca kṣutpraśāntaye /</l>
<l>paśyāmi nirgatya kathaṃ yatiṣye bhojanaṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.29'>
<lg>
<l>tat saṃprati sthito 'smi iha naktaṃ ca kṣut-praśāntaye /</l>
<l>paśyāmi nirgatya kathaṃ yatiṣye bhojanaṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.30' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity ālocayatas tasya klāntasyānambarasya ca /</l>
<l>mandīkṛtātapo 'stādriṃ ravis tyaktāmbaro yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.30'>
<lg>
<l>ity ālocayatas tasya klāntasya an-ambarasya ca /</l>
<l>mandī-kṛta-ātapo 'sta-adriṃ ravis tyakta-ambaro yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.31' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tāvac ca bhūtidigdhāṅgas tatrāyāti sma tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>mahāvratī jaṭāśūladharo hara ivāparaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.31'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca bhūti-digdha-aṅgas tatrā ayāti sma tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>mahā-vratī jaṭā-śūla-dharo hara iva aparaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.32' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>sa candrasvāminaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko 'sīti paripṛcchya ca /</l>
<l>srutvā tasmāc ca vṛttāntaṃ prahvaṃ taṃ tāpaso 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.32'>
<lg>
<l>sa candrasvāminaṃ dṛṣṭvā ko 'si iti paripṛcchya ca /</l>
<l>srutvā tasmāc ca vṛtta-antaṃ prahvaṃ taṃ tāpaso 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.33' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tvaṃ mamehāśramaṃ prāptaḥ kṣutklānto 'cintito 'tithiḥ /</l>
<l>tad uttiṣṭha kṛtasnāno bhikṣābhāgaṃ mamāhara //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.33'>
<lg>
<l>tvaṃ mama ihā aśramaṃ prāptaḥ kṣut-klānto 'cintito 'tithiḥ /</l>
<l>tad uttiṣṭha kṛta-snāno bhikṣā-bhāgaṃ mamā ahara //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.34' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity ukto vratinā so 'tha candrasvāmī jagāda tam /</l>
<l>vipro 'haṃ bhagavan bhokṣye bhikṣābhāgaṃ kathaṃ tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.34'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto vratinā so 'tha candrasvāmī jagāda tam /</l>
<l>vipro 'haṃ bhagavan bhokṣye bhikṣā-bhāgaṃ kathaṃ tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.35' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa vratī siddhaḥ praviśya maṭhikāṃ nijām /</l>
<l>iṣṭasaṃpādinīṃ vidyāṃ sasmārātithivallabhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.35'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa vratī siddhaḥ praviśya maṭhikāṃ nijām /</l>
<l>iṣṭa-saṃpādinīṃ vidyāṃ sasmāra atithi-vallabhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.36' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>saṃsmṛtopasthitāṃ tāṃ ca kiṃ karomīti vādinīm /</l>
<l>amuṣyātithyam atitheḥ kuruṣveti śaśāsa tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.36'>
<lg>
<l>saṃsmṛta-upasthitāṃ tāṃ ca kiṃ karomi iti vādinīm /</l>
<l>amuṣyā atithyam atitheḥ kuruṣva iti śaśāsa tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.37' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tathety ukte tayā tatra sodyānaṃ sāṅganājanam /</l>
<l>puraṃ sauvarṇam utpannaṃ candrasvāmī dadarśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.37'>
<lg>
<l>tatha īty ukte tayā tatra sa-udyānaṃ sa-aṅganā-janam /</l>
<l>puraṃ sauvarṇam utpannaṃ candrasvāmī dadarśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.38' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>vismitaṃ ca tam abhyetya tasmād vārāṅganāḥ purāt /</l>
<l>ūcur uttiṣṭha bhadraihi snāhi bhuṅkṣva tyaja śramam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.38'>
<lg>
<l>vismitaṃ ca tam abhyetya tasmād vāra-aṅganāḥ purāt /</l>
<l>ūcur uttiṣṭha bhadra ehi snāhi bhuṅkṣva tyaja śramam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.39' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity uktvābhyantaraṃ nītvā snāpayitvānulipya ca /</l>
<l>tābhiḥ sa dattasadvastro ninye 'nyad vāsakottamam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.39'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktva ābhyantaraṃ nītvā snāpayitva ānulipya ca /</l>
<l>tābhiḥ sa datta-sad-vastro ninye 'nyad vāsaka-uttamam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.40' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatrāntaḥ sa dadarśaikāṃ pradhānayuvatiṃ yuvā /</l>
<l>sarvāṅgasundarīṃ dhātrā kautukād iva nirmitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.40'>
<lg>
<l>tatra antaḥ sa dadarśa ekāṃ pradhāna-yuvatiṃ yuvā /</l>
<l>sarva-aṅga-sundarīṃ dhātrā kautukād iva nirmitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.41' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tayā sa sotkayotthāya svāsanārdhopaveśitaḥ /</l>
<l>bubhuje divyam āhāraṃ tayaivātra samaṃ tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.41'>
<lg>
<l>tayā sa sa-utkaya ūtthāya sva-āsana-ardha-upaveśitaḥ /</l>
<l>bubhuje divyam āhāraṃ taya aiva atra samaṃ tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.42' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>bhuktapakvaphalasvādutāmbūlaḥ svarasena ca /</l>
<l>paryaṅkaśayane bheje tatsaṃbhogasukhaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.42'>
<lg>
<l>bhukta-pakva-phala-svādu-tāmbūlaḥ sva-rasena ca /</l>
<l>paryaṅka-śayane bheje tat-saṃbhoga-sukhaṃ niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.43' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>prātaḥ prabuddhaś cāpaśyat tad evātra śivāyalam /</l>
<l>nāpi divyāṅganāṃ nāpi puraṃ tan na paricchadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.43'>
<lg>
<l>prātaḥ prabuddhaś ca apaśyat tad eva atra śiva-āyalam /</l>
<l>na api divya-aṅganāṃ na api puraṃ tan na paricchadam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.44' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tataḥ sa vigno niryātaṃ maṭhikātaḥ smitānanam /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭarātrisukhaṃ prātas tāpasaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.44'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa vigno niryātaṃ maṭhikātaḥ smita-ānanam /</l>
<l>pṛṣṭa-rātri-sukhaṃ prātas tāpasaṃ taṃ vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.45' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatprasādād ahaṃ rātrāv uṣito bhagavan sukham /</l>
<l>kiṃ tu yāsyanti me prāṇās tayā divyastriyā vinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.45'>
<lg>
<l>tat-prasādād ahaṃ rātrāv uṣito bhagavan sukham /</l>
<l>kiṃ tu yāsyanti me prāṇās tayā divya-striyā vinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.46' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tac chrutvā sa tapasvī taṃ hasan kāruṇiko 'bravīt /</l>
<l>ihaivāssva punar naktaṃ bhaviṣyati tathaiva te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.46'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā sa tapasvī taṃ hasan kāruṇiko 'bravīt /</l>
<l>iha evā assva punar naktaṃ bhaviṣyati tatha aiva te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.47' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity ukte vratinā tena tadyuktyaiva pratikṣapam /</l>
<l>candrasvāmy atra so 'bhuṅkta bhogāṃs tāṃs tatprasādataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.47'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte vratinā tena tad-yuktya eva prati-kṣapam /</l>
<l>candrasvāmy atra so 'bhuṅkta bhogāṃs tāṃs tat-prasādataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.48' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>buddhvā ca taṃ śanair vidyāprabhāvaṃ vidhicoditaḥ /</l>
<l>ekadā tāpasendraṃ taṃ sa prasādyānvayācata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.48'>
<lg>
<l>buddhvā ca taṃ śanair vidyā-prabhāvaṃ vidhi-coditaḥ /</l>
<l>ekadā tāpasa-indraṃ taṃ sa prasādya anvayācata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.49' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>satyaṃ kṛpā ced bhagavan mayi te śaraṇāgate /</l>
<l>tad etāṃ dehi me vidyāṃ yatprabhāvo 'yam īdṛśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.49'>
<lg>
<l>satyaṃ kṛpā ced bhagavan mayi te śaraṇa-āgate /</l>
<l>tad etāṃ dehi me vidyāṃ yat-prabhāvo 'yam īdṛśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.50' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>iti bruvāṇaṃ nirbandhāt taṃ pratyāha sa tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>asādhyā tava vidyeyaṃ sādhyate 'ntarjale hy asau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.50'>
<lg>
<l>iti bruvāṇaṃ nirbandhāt taṃ pratyāha sa tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>asādhyā tava vidya īyaṃ sādhyate 'ntar-jale hy asau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.51' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatra caiṣā sṛjaty āśu japataḥ sādhakasya tat /</l>
<l>māyājālaṃ vimohāya yena siddhiṃ na so 'śnute //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.51'>
<lg>
<l>tatra ca eṣā sṛjaty āśu japataḥ sādhakasya tat /</l>
<l>māyā-jālaṃ vimohāya yena siddhiṃ na so 'śnute //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.52' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>sa hi tatra punar jātaṃ bālam ātmānam īkṣate /</l>
<l>tato yuvānam udvyūḍhadāraṃ jātātmajaṃ tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.52'>
<lg>
<l>sa hi tatra punar jātaṃ bālam ātmānam īkṣate /</l>
<l>tato yuvānam udvyūḍha-dāraṃ jāta-ātma-jaṃ tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.53' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>suhṛn me 'yam ayaṃ śatrur iti mithyā sa muhyati /</l>
<l>na ca smarati janmedaṃ na vidyāsādhane kriyām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.53'>
<lg>
<l>su-hṛn me 'yam ayaṃ śatrur iti mithyā sa muhyati /</l>
<l>na ca smarati janma idaṃ na vidyā-sādhane kriyām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.54' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>yas tu triḥaṣṭavarṣaḥ san guruvidyāprabodhitaḥ /</l>
<l>janma smṛtvā viditvā tad dhīro māyāvijṛmbhitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.54'>
<lg>
<l>yas tu triḥ-aṣṭa-varṣaḥ san guru-vidyā-prabodhitaḥ /</l>
<l>janma smṛtvā viditvā tad dhīro māyā-vijṛmbhitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.55' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tadvaśo 'py atra kurute tathaivāgnipraveśanam /</l>
<l>paramārthaṃ jalottīrṇaḥ siddhavidyaḥ sa paśyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.55'>
<lg>
<l>tad-vaśo 'py atra kurute tatha aiva agni-praveśanam /</l>
<l>parama-arthaṃ jala-uttīrṇaḥ siddha-vidyaḥ sa paśyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.56' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>anyasya na paraṃ vidyā śiṣyasyaiṣā hi sidhyati /</l>
<l>asthānārpaṇato yāvad guror api vinaśyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.56'>
<lg>
<l>anyasya na paraṃ vidyā śiṣyasya eṣā hi sidhyati /</l>
<l>a-sthāna-arpaṇato yāvad guror api vinaśyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.57' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>matsiddhyaiva phale siddhe kiṃ graheṇāmunā tava /</l>
<l>matsiddhihānyā mā jātu tavaitad api naṅkṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.57'>
<lg>
<l>mat-siddhya aiva phale siddhe kiṃ graheṇa amunā tava /</l>
<l>mat-siddhi-hānyā mā jātu tava etad api naṅkṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.58' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>evaṃ tapasvinokte 'pi candrasvāmī graheṇa saḥ /</l>
<l>śikṣyāmi sarvaṃ mā bhūd vaś cintātreti tam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.58'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ tapasvina ūkte 'pi candrasvāmī graheṇa saḥ /</l>
<l>śikṣyāmi sarvaṃ mā bhūd vaś cinta ātra iti tam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.59' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tato 'smai pratipede tāṃ vidyāṃ dātuṃ sa tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>batāśritānurodhena kiṃ na kurvanti sādhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.59'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'smai pratipede tāṃ vidyāṃ dātuṃ sa tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>batā aśrita-anurodhena kiṃ na kurvanti sādhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.60' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tato nītvā nadītīraṃ sa taṃ smāha mahāvratī /</l>
<l>vatsa vidyāṃ japan māyāṃ yadi drakṣyasi tāṃ tadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.60'>
<lg>
<l>tato nītvā nadī-tīraṃ sa taṃ smā aha mahā-vratī /</l>
<l>vatsa vidyāṃ japan māyāṃ yadi drakṣyasi tāṃ tadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.61' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>māyāgnim eva praviśer vidhyayā bodhito mayā /</l>
<l>ahaṃ ca tāvat sthāsyāmi tavehaiva nadītaṭe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.61'>
<lg>
<l>māyā-agnim eva praviśer vidhyayā bodhito mayā /</l>
<l>ahaṃ ca tāvat sthāsyāmi tava iha eva nadī-taṭe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.62' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity uktvādhyāpayāmāsa tam ācāntaṃ śuciṃ śuciḥ /</l>
<l>sa candrasvāminaṃ vidyāṃ samyak tāṃ vratināṃ varaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.62'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktva ādhyāpayāmāsa tam ācāntaṃ śuciṃ śuciḥ /</l>
<l>sa candrasvāminaṃ vidyāṃ samyak tāṃ vratināṃ varaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.63' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatas tīre sthite tasmin gurau mūrdhnā praṇamya tam /</l>
<l>candrasvāmī sa rabhasān nadīm avatatāra tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.63'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tīre sthite tasmin gurau mūrdhnā praṇamya tam /</l>
<l>candrasvāmī sa rabhasān nadīm avatatāra tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.64' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tasyām antaḥjale vidyāṃ tāṃ japan sahasaiva saḥ /</l>
<l>tanmāyāmohito mithyā sarvaṃ vismṛtya janma tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.64'>
<lg>
<l>tasyām antaḥ-jale vidyāṃ tāṃ japan sahasa aiva saḥ /</l>
<l>tan-māyā-mohito mithyā sarvaṃ vismṛtya janma tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.65' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>vīkṣate yāvad anyasyām utpannaḥ svātmanā puri /</l>
<l>putro viprasya kasyāpi buddhiṃ sa śanakair gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.65'>
<lg>
<l>vīkṣate yāvad anyasyām utpannaḥ sva-ātmanā puri /</l>
<l>putro viprasya kasya api buddhiṃ sa śanakair gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.66' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>kṛtopanayano 'dhītavidyo dārān avāpya ca /</l>
<l>tadduḥkhasukhasaṃmūḍhaḥ saṃpūrṇo 'patyavān kramāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.66'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-upanayano 'dhīta-vidyo dārān avāpya ca /</l>
<l>tad-duḥkha-sukha-saṃmūḍhaḥ saṃpūrṇo 'patyavān kramāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.67' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tataś cātra sutasnehasvīkṛtas tat tad ācarat /</l>
<l>sthito baddharatiḥ sārdhaṃ pitṛbhyāṃ bandhubhis tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.67'>
<lg>
<l>tataś ca atra suta-sneha-svī-kṛtas tat tad ācarat /</l>
<l>sthito baddha-ratiḥ sārdhaṃ pitṛbhyāṃ bandhubhis tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.68' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>evaṃ janmāntaraṃ mithyā tasyānubhavato 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>kāle prabodhinīṃ vidyāṃ guruḥ prāyuṅkta tāpasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.68'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ janma-antaraṃ mithyā tasya anubhavato 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>kāle prabodhinīṃ vidyāṃ guruḥ prāyuṅkta tāpasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.69' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>sa tadvidyāprayogeṇa sadyas tena prabodhitaḥ /</l>
<l>smṛtvātmānaṃ guruṃ taṃ ca māyājālam avetya tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.69'>
<lg>
<l>sa tad-vidyā-prayogeṇa sadyas tena prabodhitaḥ /</l>
<l>smṛtvā ātmānaṃ guruṃ taṃ ca māyā-jālam avetya tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.70' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>udyato 'gnipraveśāya divyāsādhyaphalāptaye /</l>
<l>paryavāri niṣedhadbhir vṛddhāptagurubandhubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.70'>
<lg>
<l>udyato 'gni-praveśāya divya-asādhya-phala-āptaye /</l>
<l>paryavāri niṣedhadbhir vṛddha-āpta-guru-bandhubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.71' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>bahudhā bodhyamāno 'pi tair divyasukhalolupaḥ /</l>
<l>sa sajjitacitaṃ prāyān nadītīraṃ sabāndhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.71'>
<lg>
<l>bahudhā bodhyamāno 'pi tair divya-sukha-lolupaḥ /</l>
<l>sa sajjita-citaṃ prāyān nadī-tīraṃ sa-bāndhavaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.72' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>dṛṣṭvātra vṛddhau pitarau bhāryāṃ ca maraṇodyatām /</l>
<l>krandanti bālāpatyāni so 'tha mohād acintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.72'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭva ātra vṛddhau pitarau bhāryāṃ ca maraṇa-udyatām /</l>
<l>krandanti bāla-apatyāni so 'tha mohād acintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.73' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ mriyante svajanāḥ sarve me viśato 'nalam /</l>
<l>na ca jānāmi kiṃ satyaṃ guros tad vacanaṃ na vā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.73'>
<lg>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ mriyante sva-janāḥ sarve me viśato 'nalam /</l>
<l>na ca jānāmi kiṃ satyaṃ guros tad vacanaṃ na vā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.74' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tat kiṃ nu praviśāmy agnim uta na praviśāmi kim /</l>
<l>athavā tat kathaṃ mithyā syāt saṃvādi guror vacaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.74'>
<lg>
<l>tat kiṃ nu praviśāmy agnim uta na praviśāmi kim /</l>
<l>athavā tat kathaṃ mithyā syāt saṃvādi guror vacaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.75' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tad viśāmy analaṃ kāmam ity antaḥ pravimṛśya saḥ /</l>
<l>agnipraveśaṃ vidadhe candrasvāmī kila dvijaḥ //</l>
</lg>
