<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.75'>
<lg>
<l>tad viśāmy analaṃ kāmam ity antaḥ pravimṛśya saḥ /</l>
<l>agni-praveśaṃ vidadhe candrasvāmī kila dvi-jaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.76' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>anubhūtahimasparśo vahneś ca sa savismayaḥ /</l>
<l>śāntamāyo nadītīrād utthāyopayayau taṭam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.76'>
<lg>
<l>anubhūta-hima-sparśo vahneś ca sa sa-vismayaḥ /</l>
<l>śānta-māyo nadī-tīrād utthāya upayayau taṭam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.77' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatra sthitaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ guruṃ natvā ca pādayoḥ /</l>
<l>pṛcchantaṃ cāgniśaityāntaṃ svam udantam abodhayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.77'>
<lg>
<l>tatra sthitaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā taṃ guruṃ natvā ca pādayoḥ /</l>
<l>pṛcchantaṃ ca agni-śaitya-antaṃ svam udantam abodhayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.78' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tatas taṃ sa guruḥ prāha vatsa śaṅke kṛtas tvayā /</l>
<l>apacāro 'tra śītas te kathaṃ jāto 'gnir anyathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.78'>
<lg>
<l>tatas taṃ sa guruḥ prāha vatsa śaṅke kṛtas tvayā /</l>
<l>apacāro 'tra śītas te kathaṃ jāto 'gnir anyathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.79' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>adṛṣṭam etad etasyā vidyāyāḥ sādhane yataḥ /</l>
<l>etad guror vacaḥ śrutvā candrasvāmī jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.79'>
<lg>
<l>a-dṛṣṭam etad etasyā vidyāyāḥ sādhane yataḥ /</l>
<l>etad guror vacaḥ śrutvā candrasvāmī jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.80' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>nāpacāro mayā kaḥcid vihito bhagavann iti /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa tadgurur vidyāṃ jijñāsus tāṃ samasmarat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.80'>
<lg>
<l>na apacāro mayā kaḥ-cid vihito bhagavann iti /</l>
<l>tataḥ sa tad-gurur vidyāṃ jijñāsus tāṃ samasmarat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.81' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>na ca sāviḥabhūt tasya na tacchiṣyasya tasya vā /</l>
<l>naṣṭavidyāv athobhau tau viṣaṇṇau jagmatus tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.81'>
<lg>
<l>na ca sā āviḥ-abhūt tasya na tac-chiṣyasya tasya vā /</l>
<l>naṣṭa-vidyāv atha ubhau tau viṣaṇṇau jagmatus tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.82' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathām atha vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān sa taṃ bhūyaḥ /</l>
<l>pṛthvīpatiṃ trivikramasenaṃ samayaṃ nigadya pūrvoktam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.82'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathām atha vetālaḥ pṛṣṭavān sa taṃ bhūyaḥ /</l>
<l>pṛthvī-patiṃ trivikramasenaṃ samayaṃ nigadya pūrva-uktam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.83' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>rājan saṃśayam etaṃ chinddhi mama brūhi hetunā kena /</l>
<l>vihite 'pi yathoddiṣṭe karmaṇi vidyobhayos tayor naṣṭā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.83'>
<lg>
<l>rājan saṃśayam etaṃ chinddhi mama brūhi hetunā kena /</l>
<l>vihite 'pi yatha ūddiṣṭe karmaṇi vidya ūbhayos tayor naṣṭā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.84' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>etat sa vetālavaco niśamya taṃ pratyavocan manujendravīraḥ /</l>
<l>jāne bhavān me kṣipatīha kālaṃ yogeśvaraivaṃ tad api bravīmi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.84'>
<lg>
<l>etat sa vetāla-vaco niśamya taṃ pratyavocan manu-ja-indra-vīraḥ /</l>
<l>jāne bhavān me kṣipati iha kālaṃ yoga-īśvara evaṃ tad api bravīmi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.85' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>na duṣkareṇāpi hi karmaṇaiva śuddhena siddhiḥ puruṣasya labhyā /</l>
<l>yāvan na niṣkramya vikalpaśuddhaṃ dhīraṃ mano nirmalasattvavṛtti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.85'>
<lg>
<l>na duṣkareṇa api hi karmaṇa eva śuddhena siddhiḥ puruṣasya labhyā /</l>
<l>yāvan na niṣkramya vikalpa-śuddhaṃ dhīraṃ mano nirmala-sattva-vṛtti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.86' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>tasyātra mandasya tu viprayūnaś cittaṃ prabudhyāpi vikalpate sma /</l>
<l>vidyā na sā tena gatāsya siddhir asthānadānāc ca guror vinaṣṭā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.86'>
<lg>
<l>tasya atra mandasya tu vipra-yūnaś cittaṃ prabudhya api vikalpate sma /</l>
<l>vidyā na sā tena gata āsya siddhir asthāna-dānāc ca guror vinaṣṭā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.25.87' corresp='Vet_18'>
<l>iti tasya nṛpasya sṛṣṭavāco bata vetālavaro 'ṃsataḥ sa bhūyaḥ /</l>
<l>nijam eva padaṃ yayāv alakṣyo nṛpatis taṃ tathaiva so 'nvayāsīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.25.87'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasya nṛ-pasya sṛṣṭa-vāco bata vetāla-varo 'ṃsataḥ sa bhūyaḥ /</l>
<l>nijam eva padaṃ yayāv a-lakṣyo nṛ-patis taṃ tatha aiva so 'nvayāsīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.1' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ skandhe vetālaṃ śiṃśapādrumāt /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ gṛhītvodacalan nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.1'>
<lg>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ skandhe vetālaṃ śiṃśapā-drumāt /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ gṛhītva ūdacalan nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.2' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyo vetālaḥ so 'bhyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>rājañ śṛṇu katham ekāṃ hṛdyāṃ te kathayāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.2'>
<lg>
<l>āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyo vetālaḥ so 'bhyabhāṣata /</l>
<l>rājañ śṛṇu katham ekāṃ hṛdyāṃ te kathayāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.3' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>asti vakrolakaṃ nāma puraṃ surapuropamam /</l>
<l>tasmin sūryaprabhākhyo 'bhūd rājā janbhārisaṃnibhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.3'>
<lg>
<l>asti vakrolakaṃ nāma puraṃ sura-pura-upamam /</l>
<l>tasmin sūryaprabha-ākhyo 'bhūd rājā janbhāri-saṃnibhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.4' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>saukaryodyatayā mūrtyā dattānando vasuṃdharām /</l>
<l>imāṃ harir ivoddhṛtya yo babhāra ciraṃ bhuje //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.4'>
<lg>
<l>saukarya-udyatayā mūrtyā datta-ānando vasuṃ-dharām /</l>
<l>imāṃ harir iva uddhṛtya yo babhāra ciraṃ bhuje //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.5' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dhūmāsaṅge 'śrusaṃpātaḥ śṛṅgāre mārasaṃkathāḥ /</l>
<l>dvāḥstheṣu hemadaṇḍāś ca rāṣṭre yasyābhavan prabhoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.5'>
<lg>
<l>dhūma-āsaṅge 'śru-saṃpātaḥ śṛṅgāre māra-saṃkathāḥ /</l>
<l>dvāḥ-stheṣu hema-daṇḍāś ca rāṣṭre yasya abhavan prabhoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.6' corresp='Vet_19'>
  <l>sarvasaṃpatsamṛddhasya tasyaikābhūd anirvṛtiḥ /</l>
  <l>nodapadyata yat putro bahuṣv antaḥpureṣv api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.6'>
<lg>
  <l>sarva-saṃpat-samṛddhasya tasya eka ābhūd a-nirvṛtiḥ /</l>
  <l>na udapadyata yat putro bahuṣv antaḥ-pureṣv api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.7' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>etasmiṃś ca kathāsaṃdhau tāmraliptyāṃ mahāpuri /</l>
<l>babhūva dhanapālākhyo dhuryo dhanavatāṃ vanik //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.7'>
<lg>
<l>etasmiṃś ca kathā-saṃdhau tāmraliptyāṃ mahā-puri /</l>
<l>babhūva dhanapāla-ākhyo dhuryo dhanavatāṃ vanik //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.8' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tasya cājāyataikaiva nāmnā dhanavatī sutā /</l>
<l>vidyādharī cyutā śāpāt saundaryeṇaiva sūcitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.8'>
<lg>
<l>tasya ca ajāyata eka aiva nāmnā dhanavatī sutā /</l>
<l>vidyādharī cyutā śāpāt saundaryeṇa eva sūcitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.9' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tasyāṃ ca yauvanasthāyāṃ sa vaṇik pañcatāṃ yayau /</l>
<l>taddhanaṃ rājasānāthyaād ākrāntam atha gotrajaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.9'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ ca yauvana-sthāyāṃ sa vaṇik pañcatāṃ yayau /</l>
<l>tad-dhanaṃ rāja-sānāthyaād ākrāntam atha gotra-jaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.10' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tato hiraṇyavatyākhyā vaṇijas tasya gehinī /</l>
<l>ādāya ratnabharaṇaṃ nijam aprakaṭasthitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.10'>
<lg>
<l>tato hiraṇyavaty-ākhyā vaṇijas tasya gehinī /</l>
<l>ādāya ratna-bharaṇaṃ nijam a-prakaṭa-sthitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.11' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dhanavatyā tayā sākaṃ svaduhitrā niśāmukhe /</l>
<l>palāyya dāyādabhayād gṛhād guptaṃ viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.11'>
<lg>
<l>dhanavatyā tayā sākaṃ sva-duhitrā niśā-mukhe /</l>
<l>palāyya dāyāda-bhayād gṛhād guptaṃ viniryayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.12' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dhvāntena bahir antaś ca sā duḥkhenāndhakāritā /</l>
<l>kṛcchrād bahiḥpuraṃ prāyāt sutāhastāvalambinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.12'>
<lg>
<l>dhvāntena bahir antaś ca sā duḥkhena andha-kāritā /</l>
<l>kṛcchrād bahiḥ-puraṃ prāyāt sutā-hasta-avalambinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.13' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatra saṃtamase yāntī vidhiyogād alakṣitam /</l>
<l>aṃsenātāḍayac cauraṃ śūlāgrāropitasthitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.13'>
<lg>
<l>tatra saṃtamase yāntī vidhi-yogād a-lakṣitam /</l>
<l>aṃsena atāḍayac cauraṃ śūla-agra-āropita-sthitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.14' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>sa sajīvas tadaṃsāgraghaṭṭanādhikapīḍitaḥ /</l>
<l>āḥ kṣate kṣāram etan me kṣiptaṃ kenety abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.14'>
<lg>
<l>sa sa-jīvas tad-aṃsa-agra-ghaṭṭana-adhika-pīḍitaḥ /</l>
<l>āḥ kṣate kṣāram etan me kṣiptaṃ kena ity abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.15' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatas tatraiva sā ko 'sīty apṛcchat taṃ vaṇigvadhūḥ /</l>
<l>pratyuvāca tataś cauraś cauro 'ham iha sūcitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.15'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tatra eva sā ko 'si ity apṛcchat taṃ vaṇig-vadhūḥ /</l>
<l>pratyuvāca tataś cauraś cauro 'ham iha sūcitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.16' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>śūle pāpasya cādyāpi notkrāmanti mamāsavaḥ /</l>
<l>tad ārye tvaṃ mama brūhi kāsikvaivaṃ prayāsi ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.16'>
<lg>
<l>śūle pāpasya ca adya api na utkrāmanti mama asavaḥ /</l>
<l>tad ārye tvaṃ mama brūhi ka āsikva evaṃ prayāsi ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.17' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tac chrutvā taṃ vaṇigbhāryā yāvat svodantam āha sā /</l>
<l>tāvat tilakitaṃ prācyā mukham udbhāsitendunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.17'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutvā taṃ vaṇig-bhāryā yāvat sva-udantam āha sā /</l>
<l>tāvat tilakitaṃ prācyā mukham udbhāsita-indunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.18' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tato dikṣu prakāśāsu sa cauras tāṃ vaṇiksutām /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā dhanavatīṃ kanyāṃ tanmātaram uvāca tām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.18'>
<lg>
<l>tato dikṣu prakāśāsu sa cauras tāṃ vaṇik-sutām /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā dhanavatīṃ kanyāṃ tan-mātaram uvāca tām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.19' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>śṛṇu me prārthanām ekāṃ sahasraṃ kāñcanasya te /</l>
<l>dadāmi tad imāṃ mahyaṃ svasutāṃ dehi kanyakām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.19'>
<lg>
<l>śṛṇu me prārthanām ekāṃ sahasraṃ kāñcanasya te /</l>
<l>dadāmi tad imāṃ mahyaṃ sva-sutāṃ dehi kanyakām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.20' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>kim etayā tavety ukto hasantyātha tayātra saḥ /</l>
<l>punaś cauro 'bravīn nāsti putro mama gatāyuṣaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.20'>
<lg>
<l>kim etayā tava ity ukto hasantya ātha taya ātra saḥ /</l>
<l>punaś cauro 'bravīn na asti putro mama gata-āyuṣaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.21' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>na cā-putro 'śnate lokāṃs tad eṣā yaṃ madājñayā /</l>
<l>kutracij janayet putraṃ kṣetrajaḥ sa bhaven mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.21'>
<lg>
<l>na ca a-putro 'śnate lokāṃs tad eṣā yaṃ mad-ājñayā /</l>
<l>kutra-cij janayet putraṃ kṣetra-jaḥ sa bhaven mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.22' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ity etāṃ prārthaye tvaṃ tu tad vidhatsva mamepsitam /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā sā vaṇigyoṣil lobhāt tat pratyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.22'>
<lg>
<l>ity etāṃ prārthaye tvaṃ tu tad vidhatsva mamā ipsitam /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā sā vaṇig-yoṣil lobhāt tat pratyapadyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.23' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ānīya ca kuto 'py ambu pāṇau caurasya tasya sā /</l>
<l>eṣā sutā mayā tubhyaṃ kanyā dattety apātayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.23'>
<lg>
<l>ānīya ca kuto 'py ambu pāṇau caurasya tasya sā /</l>
<l>eṣā sutā mayā tubhyaṃ kanyā datta īty apātayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.24' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>so 'pi tadduhitur dattayathoktājño jagāda tām /</l>
<l>gacchāmuṣya vaṭasyādhaḥ khātvā svarṇaṃ gṛhāṇa tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.24'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi tad-duhitur datta-yathā-ukta-ājño jagāda tām /</l>
<l>gaccha amuṣya vaṭasya adhaḥ khātvā svarṇaṃ gṛhāṇa tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.25' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>gatāsor dāhayitvā me dehaṃ yuktyā visṛjya ca /</l>
<l>asthīni tīrthe sasutā gaccher vakrolakaṃ puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.25'>
<lg>
<l>gata-āsor dāhayitvā me dehaṃ yuktyā visṛjya ca /</l>
<l>asthīni tīrthe sa-sutā gaccher vakrolakaṃ puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.26' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatra sūryaprabhe rājñi saurājyasukhite jane /</l>
<l>niḥupadravaniḥcintā sthāsyasi tvaṃ yathecchasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.26'>
<lg>
<l>tatra sūryaprabhe rājñi saurājya-sukhite jane /</l>
<l>niḥ-upadrava-niḥ-cintā sthāsyasi tvaṃ yatha īcchasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.27' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ity uktvā tṛṣitaḥ pītvā tayaivopahṛtaṃ jalam /</l>
<l>śūlavyadhavyathotkrāntajīvaś cauro babhūva saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.27'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā tṛṣitaḥ pītvā taya aiva upahṛtaṃ jalam /</l>
<l>śūla-vyadha-vyathā-utkrānta-jīvaś cauro babhūva saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.28' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tato gatvā vaṇikstrī sā svarṇaṃ vaṭataros talāt /</l>
<l>gṛhītvā sasutā guptam agād bhartṛsuhṛdgṛham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.28'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā vaṇik-strī sā svarṇaṃ vaṭa-taros talāt /</l>
<l>gṛhītvā sa-sutā guptam agād bhartṛ-suhṛd-gṛham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.29' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatra sthitvā ca yuktyā tad dāhayitvā kalevaram /</l>
<l>caurasya tasya tīrthe 'sthikṣepādikam akārayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.29'>
<lg>
<l>tatra sthitvā ca yuktyā tad dāhayitvā kalevaram /</l>
<l>caurasya tasya tīrthe 'sthi-kṣepa-ādikam akārayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.30' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>anyedyuś cāttaguptārthā tato nirgatya sātmajā /</l>
<l>prayāntī kramaśaḥ prāpa sā tad vakrolakaṃ puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.30'>
<lg>
<l>anye-dyuś cā atta-gupta-arthā tato nirgatya sa-ātma-jā /</l>
<l>prayāntī kramaśaḥ prāpa sā tad vakrolakaṃ puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.31' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatraikaṃ vasudattākhyād gṛhaṃ krītvā vaṇigvarāt /</l>
<l>tasminn uvāsa sutayā dhanavatyā tayā saha //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.31'>
<lg>
<l>tatra ekaṃ vasudatta-ākhyād gṛhaṃ krītvā vaṇig-varāt /</l>
<l>tasminn uvāsa sutayā dhanavatyā tayā saha //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.32' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tadā ca tatropādhyāyo viṣṇusvāmīty abhūt pure /</l>
<l>manaḥsvāmīti tasyāsīc chiṣyo vipro 'tirūpavān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.32'>
<lg>
<l>tadā ca tatra upādhyāyo viṣṇusvāmi īty abhūt pure /</l>
<l>manaḥsvāmi īti tasyā asīc chiṣyo vipro 'tirūpavān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.33' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>vidhyābhijanayukto 'pi sa yauvanavaśīkṛtaḥ /</l>
<l>tatra haṃsāvalīṃ nāma vāñchati sma vilāsinīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.33'>
<lg>
<l>vidhyā-abhijana-yukto 'pi sa yauvana-vaśī-kṛtaḥ /</l>
<l>tatra haṃsāvalīṃ nāma vāñchati sma vilāsinīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.34' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>sā ca sauvarṇadīnāraśatapañcakam agrahīt /</l>
<l>bhāṭiṃ tasya ca tan nābhūd vyaṣīdat tena so 'nvaham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.34'>
<lg>
<l>sā ca sauvarṇa-dīnāra-śatapañcakam agrahīt /</l>
<l>bhāṭiṃ tasya ca tan na abhūd vyaṣīdat tena so 'nv-aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.35' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ekadā ca tam adrākṣīt tādṛśaṃ sā vaṇiksutā /</l>
<l>kṣāmābhirāmavapuṣaṃ dhanavaty atra harmyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.35'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca tam adrākṣīt tādṛśaṃ sā vaṇik-sutā /</l>
<l>kṣāma-abhirāma-vapuṣaṃ dhanavaty atra harmyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.36' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tadrūpahṛtacitta ca bhartuś caurasya tasya sā /</l>
<l>smṛtvānujñāṃ samīpasthāṃ yuktyāvocat svamātaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.36'>
<lg>
<l>tad-rūpa-hṛta-citta ca bhartuś caurasya tasya sā /</l>
<l>smṛtva ānujñāṃ samīpa-sthāṃ yuktya āvocat sva-mātaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.37' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>amba viprasutasyāsya paśyaite rūpayauvane /</l>
<l>kīdṛśe bata viśvasya nayanāmṛtavarṣiṇī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.37'>
<lg>
<l>amba vipra-sutasya asya paśya ete rūpa-yauvane /</l>
<l>kīdṛśe bata viśvasya nayana-amṛta-varṣiṇī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.38' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>etac chrutvaiva tasmiṃs tāṃ baddhabhāvām avetya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.38'>
<lg>
<l>etac chrutva aiva tasmiṃs tāṃ baddha-bhāvām avetya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.39' corresp='Vet_19'>
  <l>tan mātā sā vaṇigbhāryā manasy evam acintayat /</l>
<l>madduhitrānayā tāvad varaṇīyaḥ sutāptaye /</l>
<l>kaścid bhartrājñayā tasmād eṣa evārthyate na kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.39'>
<lg>
  <l>tan mātā sā vaṇig-bhāryā manasy evam acintayat /</l>
<l>mad-duhitra ānayā tāvad varaṇīyaḥ suta-āptaye /</l>
<l>kaścid bhartr-ājñayā tasmād eṣa eva arthyate na kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.40' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ity ākalayya vyasṛjat tat saṃdiśya manīṣitam /</l>
<l>rahasyadhāriṇīṃ ceṭīṃ tam ānetuṃ sutākṛte //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.40'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākalayya vyasṛjat tat saṃdiśya manīṣitam /</l>
<l>rahasya-dhāriṇīṃ ceṭīṃ tam ānetuṃ sutā-kṛte //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.41' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>sā gatvā vijane nītvā ceṭī tasmai śaśaṃsa tat /</l>
<l>sa ca śrutvā dvijayuvā vyasanī tām abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.41'>
<lg>
<l>sā gatvā vijane nītvā ceṭī tasmai śaśaṃsa tat /</l>
<l>sa ca śrutvā dvija-yuvā vyasanī tām abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.42' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>yadi haṃsāvalīhetor dīnāraśatapañcakam /</l>
<l>sauvarṇaṃ dīyate sahyaṃ tad ekām emi yāminīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.42'>
<lg>
<l>yadi haṃsāvalī-hetor dīnāra-śatapañcakam /</l>
<l>sauvarṇaṃ dīyate sahyaṃ tad ekām emi yāminīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.43' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>iti tenoktayā ceṭyā tayā gatvā tathaiva sā /</l>
<l>uktā vaṇikstrī tasmai tat taddhaste prāhiṇod dhanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.43'>
<lg>
<l>iti tena uktayā ceṭyā tayā gatvā tatha aiva sā /</l>
<l>uktā vaṇik-strī tasmai tat tad-dhaste prāhiṇod dhanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.44' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tad gṛhītvā manaḥsvāmī tatputryā vāsakaṃ yayau /</l>
<l>tasyāḥ sa tannisṛṣṭāyā dhanavatyaḥ saceṭikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.44'>
<lg>
<l>tad gṛhītvā manaḥsvāmī tat-putryā vāsakaṃ yayau /</l>
<l>tasyāḥ sa tan-nisṛṣṭāyā dhanavatyaḥ sa-ceṭikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.45' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatra tāṃ vitatotkaṇṭhāṃ kāntāṃ bhūṣitabhūtalām /</l>
<l>sa cakora iva jyotsnāṃ dadarśa ca jaharṣa ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.45'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tāṃ vitata-utkaṇṭhāṃ kāntāṃ bhūṣitabhūtalām /</l>
<l>sa cakora iva jyotsnāṃ dadarśa ca jaharṣa ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.46' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tayā samaṃ ca nītvā tāṃ rātriṃ saṃbhogalīlayā /</l>
<l>nirgatya sa tato guptaṃ yayau prātar yathāgatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.46'>
<lg>
<l>tayā samaṃ ca nītvā tāṃ rātriṃ saṃbhoga-līlayā /</l>
<l>nirgatya sa tato guptaṃ yayau prātar yathā-āgatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.47' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>sāpi tasmād dhanavatī sagarbhābhūd vaṇiksutā /</l>
<l>kāle ca suṣuve putraṃ lakṣaṇānumitāyatim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.47'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi tasmād dhanavatī sagarbhābhūd vaṇik-sutā /</l>
<l>kāle ca suṣuve putraṃ lakṣaṇa-anumita-āyatim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.48' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>parituṣṭāṃ tadā tāṃ ca sutotpattyā samātṛkām /</l>
<l>ādideśa haraḥ svapne darśitasvavapur niśi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.48'>
<lg>
<l>parituṣṭāṃ tadā tāṃ ca suta-utpattyā samātṛkām /</l>
<l>ādideśa haraḥ svapne darśita-sva-vapur niśi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.49' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>yuktaṃ hemasahasreṇa nītvā bālam uṣasy amum /</l>
<l>sūryaprabhanṛpasyeha mañcasthaṃ dvāri muñcatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.49'>
<lg>
<l>yuktaṃ hema-saha-sreṇa nītvā bālam uṣasy amum /</l>
<l>sūryaprabha-nṛ-pasya iha mañca-sthaṃ dvāri muñcatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.50' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>evaṃ syāt kṣemam ity uktā śūlinā sā vaṇiksutā /</l>
<l>tanmātā ca prabudhyaitaṃ svapnann anyo'nyam ūcatuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.50'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ syāt kṣemam ity uktā śūlinā sā vaṇik-sutā /</l>
<l>tan-mātā ca prabudhya etaṃ svapnann anyo'nyam ūcatuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.51' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>nītvā ca taṃ tatyajatur bhagavatpratyayāc chiśum /</l>
<l>rājñaḥ sūryaprabhasyāsya siṃhadvāre sahemakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.51'>
<lg>
<l>nītvā ca taṃ tatyajatur bhagavat-pratyayāc chiśum /</l>
<l>rājñaḥ sūryaprabhasya asya siṃha-dvāre sa-hemakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.52' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tāvac ca tam api svapne sutacintāturaṃ sadā /</l>
<l>tatra sūryaprabhaṃ bhūpam ādideśa vṛṣadhvajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.52'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca tam api svapne suta-cintā-āturaṃ sadā /</l>
<l>tatra sūryaprabhaṃ bhūpam ādideśa vṛṣa-dhvajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.53' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>uttiṣṭha rājan bālas te siṃhadvāre sakāñcanaḥ /</l>
<l>kenāpi sthāpito bhavyo mañcakasthaṃ gṛhāṇa tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.53'>
<lg>
<l>uttiṣṭha rājan bālas te siṃha-dvāre sa-kāñcanaḥ /</l>
<l>kena-api sthāpito bhavyo mañcaka-sthaṃ gṛhāṇa tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.54' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ity uktaḥ śaṃbhunā prātaḥ prabuddho 'pi tathaiva saḥ /</l>
<l>dvāḥsthaiḥ praviśya vijñapto niryayau nṛpatiḥ svayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.54'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktaḥ śaṃbhunā prātaḥ prabuddho 'pi tatha aiva saḥ /</l>
<l>dvāḥ-sthaiḥ praviśya vijñapto niryayau nṛ-patiḥ svayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.55' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca siṃhadvāre taṃ bālaṃ sakanakotkaram /</l>
<l>rekhāchattradhvajādyaṅkapāṇipādaṃ śubhākṛtim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.55'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca siṃha-dvāre taṃ bālaṃ sa-kanaka-utkaram /</l>
<l>rekhā-chattra-dhvaja-ādy-aṅka-pāṇi-pādaṃ śubha-ākṛtim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.56' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>datto mamocitaḥ putraḥ śaṃbhunāyam iti bruvan /</l>
<l>svayaṃ gṛhītvā bāhubhyāṃ rājadhānīṃ viveśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.56'>
<lg>
<l>datto mama ucitaḥ putraḥ śaṃbhuna āyam iti bruvan /</l>
<l>svayaṃ gṛhītvā bāhubhyāṃ rāja-dhānīṃ viveśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.57' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>cakāra cotsavaṃ tāvad asaṃkhyātaṃ dadad vasu /</l>
<l>daridraśabdasyaikasya yāvad āsīn niḥarthatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.57'>
<lg>
<l>cakāra ca utsavaṃ tāvad a-saṃkhyātaṃ dadad vasu /</l>
<l>daridra-śabdasya ekasya yāvad āsīn niḥ-arthatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.58' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>nṛttavādyādibhir nītvā dvādaśāhaṃ tataḥ sa tam /</l>
<l>putraṃ candraprabhaṃ nāmnā cakre suryaprabho nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.58'>
<lg>
<l>nṛtta-vādyā-ādibhir nītvā dvādaśa-ahaṃ tataḥ sa tam /</l>
<l>putraṃ candraprabhaṃ nāmnā cakre suryaprabho nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.59' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>vavṛdhe rājaputro 'tra so 'tha candraprabhaḥ kramāt /</l>
<l>vapuṣeva guṇaughenāpy āśritānandadāyinā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.59'>
<lg>
<l>vavṛdhe rāja-putro 'tra so 'tha candraprabhaḥ kramāt /</l>
<l>vapuṣa iva guṇa-oghena apy āśrita-ānanda-dāyinā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.60' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>śanair yuvā ca saṃjañje śauryaudāryaśrutādibhiḥ /</l>
<l>āvarjitaprakṛtikaḥ kṣmābhārodvahanakṣamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.60'>
<lg>
<l>śanair yuvā ca saṃjañje śaurya-audārya-śruta-ādibhiḥ /</l>
<l>āvarjita-prakṛtikaḥ kṣmā-bhāra-udvahana-kṣamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.61' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tādṛśaṃ ca tato dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa sūryaprabhaḥ pitā /</l>
<l>rājaye 'bhiṣijyaiva kṛtī vṛddho vārāṇasīṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.61'>
<lg>
<l>tādṛśaṃ ca tato dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa sūryaprabhaḥ pitā /</l>
<l>rājaye 'bhiṣijya eva kṛtī vṛddho vārāṇasīṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.62' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>pṛthvīṃ śāsati tasmiṃś ca tanaye nayaśālina /</l>
<l>sa rājā tatra tatyāja caraṃs tīvratapas tanum //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.62'>
<lg>
<l>pṛthvīṃ śāsati tasmiṃś ca tanaye naya-śālina /</l>
<l>sa rājā tatra tatyāja caraṃs tīvra-tapas tanum //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.63' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>buddhvā pitṛvipattiṃ tām anuśocya kṛtakriyaḥ /</l>
<l>so 'tha candraprabho rājā sacivān dhārmiko 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.63'>
<lg>
<l>buddhvā pitṛ-vipattiṃ tām anuśocya kṛta-kriyaḥ /</l>
<l>so 'tha candraprabho rājā sacivān dhārmiko 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.64' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tātasya tāvat kenāham anṛṇo bhavituṃ kṣamaḥ /</l>
<l>tathāpy ekāṃ svahastena dadāmy etasya niṣkṛtim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.64'>
<lg>
<l>tātasya tāvat kena aham an-ṛṇo bhavituṃ kṣamaḥ /</l>
<l>tatha āpy ekāṃ sva-hastena dadāmy etasya niṣkṛtim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.65' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>nītvā kṣipāmi gaṅgāyām asthīny asya yathāvidhi /</l>
<l>gatvā sarvapitṛhyaś ca gayāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.65'>
<lg>
<l>nītvā kṣipāmi gaṅgāyām asthīny asya yathā-vidhi /</l>
<l>gatvā sarva-pitṛhyaś ca gayāṃ piṇḍaṃ dadāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.66' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>prasaṅgāt tīrthayātrāṃ ca karomy āpūrvasāgaram /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ mantriṇas taṃ vyajijñapan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.66'>
<lg>
<l>prasaṅgāt tīrtha-yātrāṃ ca karomy ā-pūrva-sāgaram /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ rājānaṃ mantriṇas taṃ vyajijñapan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.67' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>na deva yujyate kartum etad rājñaḥ kathamcana /</l>
<l>na hi rājyaṃ bahuchidraṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhaty arakṣitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.67'>
<lg>
<l>na deva yujyate kartum etad rājñaḥ katham-cana /</l>
<l>na hi rājyaṃ bahu-chidraṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭhaty a-rakṣitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.68' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tad eṣā parahastena kāryā te pitrupakriyā /</l>
<l>svadharmapālanād anyā tīrthayātrā ca kā tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.68'>
<lg>
<l>tad eṣā para-hastena kāryā te pitr-upakriyā /</l>
<l>sva-dharmapālanād anyā tīrtha-yātrā ca kā tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.69' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>bahvapāyaṃ kva pānthatvāṃ nityaguptaāḥ kva pārthivāḥ /</l>
<l>iti mantrivacaḥ śrutvā rājā candraprabho 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.69'>
<lg>
<l>bahv-apāyaṃ kva pānthatvāṃ nitya-guptaāḥ kva pārthivāḥ /</l>
<l>iti mantri-vacaḥ śrutvā rājā candraprabho 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.70' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>alaṃ vikalpaiḥ pitrarthe gantavyaṃ niścitaṃ mayā /</l>
<l>draṣṭavyāni ca tīrthāni yāvan me kṣamate vayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.70'>
<lg>
<l>alaṃ vikalpaiḥ pitr-arthe gantavyaṃ niścitaṃ mayā /</l>
<l>draṣṭavyāni ca tīrthāni yāvan me kṣamate vayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.71' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>paścā ko vetti kiṃ bhāvi śarire kṣaṇanaśvare /</l>
<l>rājyaṃ cāgamanaṃ yāvad rakṣyaṃ yuṣmābhir eva me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.71'>
<lg>
<l>paścā ko vetti kiṃ bhāvi śarire kṣaṇa-naśvare /</l>
<l>rājyaṃ cā agamanaṃ yāvad rakṣyaṃ yuṣmābhir eva me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.72' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>śrutvaitaṃ niścayaṃ rājñas tūṣṇīm āsata mantriṇaḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ prayaṇasaṃbhāraṃ sajjīcakre sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.72'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitaṃ niścayaṃ rājñas tūṣṇīm āsata mantriṇaḥ /</l>
<l>tataḥ prayaṇa-saṃbhāraṃ sajjī-cakre sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.73' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>athāhni sa śubhe snāto hutāgniḥ pūjitadvijaḥ /</l>
<l>suyuktaṃ ratham āsthāya prayataḥ śāntaveṣabhṛt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.73'>
<lg>
<l>atha ahni sa śubhe snāto huta-agniḥ pūjita-dvijaḥ /</l>
<l>su-yuktaṃ ratham āsthāya prayataḥ śānta-veṣa-bhṛt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.74' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>sāmantān rajaputrāṃś ca paurāñ janapadān api /</l>
<l>nivartyānicchataḥ kṛcchrād āsīmāntānuyāyinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.74'>
<lg>
<l>sāmantān raja-putrāṃś ca paurāñ jana-padān api /</l>
<l>nivartya an-icchataḥ kṛcchrād ā-sīma-anta-anuyāyinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.75' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>brāhmaṇair vāhanārūḍhaiḥ samaṃ sa sapurohitaḥ /</l>
<l>pratasthe sacivanyastarājyaś candraprabho nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.75'>
<lg>
<l>brāhmaṇair vāhana-ārūḍhaiḥ samaṃ sa sa-purohitaḥ /</l>
<l>pratasthe saciva-nyasta-rājyaś candraprabho nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.76' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>vicitraveṣabhāṣādivilokanavinoditaḥ /</l>
<l>paśyan nānāvidhān deśān kramāt prāpa ca jāhnavīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.76'>
<lg>
<l>vicitra-veṣa-bhāṣa-ādi-vilokana-vinoditaḥ /</l>
<l>paśyan nānā-vidhān deśān kramāt prāpa ca jāhnavīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.77' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dadarśa tā ca jantūnāṃ jalakallolapaṅktibhiḥ /</l>
<l>tridivārohasopānapaddhatiṃ sṛjatīm iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.77'>
<lg>
<l>dadarśa tā ca jantūnāṃ jala-kallola-paṅktibhiḥ /</l>
<l>tri-diva-āroha-sopāna-paddhatiṃ sṛjatīm iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.78' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>himavatprabhavāṃ śaṃbhoḥ kṛtakrīḍākacagrahām /</l>
<l>bibhratīṃ cāmbikālīlāṃ devarṣigaṇavanditām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.78'>
<lg>
<l>himavat-prabhavāṃ śaṃbhoḥ kṛta-krīḍā-kaca-grahām /</l>
<l>bibhratīṃ ca ambikā-līlāṃ deva-rṣi-gaṇa-vanditām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.79' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>rathāvatīrṇas tasyāṃ ca kṛtasnāno yathāvidhi /</l>
<l>cikṣepāsthīni bhūpasya tasya sūryaprabhasya saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.79'>
<lg>
<l>ratha-avatīrṇas tasyāṃ ca kṛta-snāno yathā-vidhi /</l>
<l>cikṣepa-asthīni bhū-pasya tasya sūryaprabhasya saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.80' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dattadānaḥ kṛtaśrāddho rathārūḍhas tato 'pi ca /</l>
<l>prasthitaḥ kramaśaḥ prāpa prayāgam ṛṣisaṃstutam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.80'>
<lg>
<l>datta-dānaḥ kṛta-śrāddho ratha-ārūḍhas tato 'pi ca /</l>
<l>prasthitaḥ kramaśaḥ prāpa prayāgam ṛṣi-saṃstutam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.81' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>yatrārciḥādyadhūmādim āgrāv iva samāgatau /</l>
<l>gaṅgāyamunayor vāhau bhātaḥ sugataye nṛṇām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.81'>
<lg>
<l>yatra arciḥ-ādya-dhūma-ādim āgrāv iva samāgatau /</l>
<l>gaṅgā-yamunayor vāhau bhātaḥ su-gataye nṛṇām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.82' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tatropoṣya kṛtasnānadānaśrāddhādisatkṛiyaḥ /</l>
<l>vārāṇasīṃ jagāmātha sa candraprabhabhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.82'>
<lg>
<l>tatra upoṣya kṛta-snāna-dāna-śrāddha-ādi-sat-kṛiyaḥ /</l>
<l>vārāṇasīṃ jagāma atha sa candraprabha-bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.83' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>eta mokṣaṃ prayāteti vadantām iva dūrataḥ /</l>
<l>vātākṣiptasamutkṣiptaiḥ surasadmadhvajāṃśukaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.83'>
<lg>
<l>eta mokṣaṃ prayāta iti vadantām iva dūrataḥ /</l>
<l>vāta-ākṣipta-samutkṣiptaiḥ sura-sadma-dhvaja-aṃśukaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.84' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tasyāṃ dināny upoṣya trīṇy abhyarcyātha vṛṣadhvajam /</l>
<l>bhogair nijocitais tais taiḥ prayayau sa gayāṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.84'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ dināny upoṣya trīṇy abhyarcya atha vṛṣa-dhvajam /</l>
<l>bhogair nija-ucitais tais taiḥ prayayau sa gayāṃ prati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.85' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tataḥ phalaughanamitair mañjuguñjadvihaṃgamaiḥ /</l>
<l>pade pade sapraṇāmaṃ stūyamāna ivāṅghripaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.85'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ phala-ogha-namitair mañju-guñjad-vihaṃ-gamaiḥ /</l>
<l>pade pade sa-praṇāmaṃ stūyamāna iva aṅghri-paiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.86' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>vikṣiptavanyakusumair arcyamāna ivānilaiḥ /</l>
<l>nānāraṇyāny atikramya puṇyaṃ prāpa gayāśiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.86'>
<lg>
<l>vikṣipta-vanya-kusumair arcyamāna iva anilaiḥ /</l>
<l>nānā-araṇyāny atikramya puṇyaṃ prāpa gayāśiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.87' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>vidhāya tatra ca śrāddhaṃ vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇam /</l>
<l>candraprabhaḥ sa rājātra dharmāraṇyam upeyivān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.87'>
<lg>
<l>vidhāya tatra ca śrāddhaṃ vidhivad bhūri-dakṣiṇam /</l>
<l>candraprabhaḥ sa rāja ātra dharma-araṇyam upeyivān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.88' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>gayākūpe 'sya dadataḥ pituḥ piṇḍaṃ tadantarāt /</l>
<l>samuttasthus tam ādātuṃ trayo mānuṣapaṇayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.88'>
<lg>
<l>gayā-kūpe 'sya dadataḥ pituḥ piṇḍaṃ tad-antarāt /</l>
<l>samuttasthus tam ādātuṃ trayo mānuṣa-paṇayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.89' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvaiva sa vibhrāntaḥ kim etad iti pārthavaḥ /</l>
<l>kasmin haste kṣipe piṇḍam ity apṛcchan nijān dvijān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.89'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭva aiva sa vibhrāntaḥ kim etad iti pārthavaḥ /</l>
<l>kasmin haste kṣipe piṇḍam ity apṛcchan nijān dvijān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.90' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>te tam ūcur ayaṃ tāvad ekaś caurasya niścatam /</l>
<l>hasto lohamayaḥ śaṅkur yasmin devaiṣo dṛśyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.90'>
<lg>
<l>te tam ūcur ayaṃ tāvad ekaś caurasya niścatam /</l>
<l>hasto loha-mayaḥ śaṅkur yasmin deva eṣo dṛśyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.91' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>dvitīyo brāhmaṇasyāyaṃ karo dhṛtapavitrakaḥ /</l>
<l>rājñaḥ pāṇis tṛtīyo 'yaṃ sāṅgulīyaḥ sulakṣaṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.91'>
<lg>
<l>dvitīyo brāhmaṇasya ayaṃ karo dhṛta-pavitrakaḥ /</l>
<l>rājñaḥ pāṇis tṛtīyo 'yaṃ sa-aṅgulīyaḥ su-lakṣaṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.92' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tan na vidmaḥ kva piṇḍo 'yaṃ nikṣepyaḥ kim idaṃ bhavet /</l>
<l>ity uktas tair dvijaiḥ so 'tra rājā lebhe na niścayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.92'>
<lg>
<l>tan na vidmaḥ kva piṇḍo 'yaṃ nikṣepyaḥ kim idaṃ bhavet /</l>
<l>ity uktas tair dvi-jaiḥ so 'tra rājā lebhe na niścayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.93' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathāścaryaṃ vetālo 'ṃsasthitas tadā /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ jagāda nṛpatiṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.93'>
<lg>
<l>ity ākhyāya kathā-āścaryaṃ vetālo 'ṃsa-sthitas tadā /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ jagāda nṛ-patiṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.94' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tat kasya haste deyaḥ syāt sa piṇḍa iti vaktu me /</l>
<l>bhavāṃs tāvat sa evātra prāktanaḥ samayaś ca te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.94'>
<lg>
<l>tat kasya haste deyaḥ syāt sa piṇḍa iti vaktu me /</l>
<l>bhavāṃs tāvat sa eva atra prāktanaḥ samayaś ca te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.95' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā muktamaunaḥ sa bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramaseno 'tra dharmajñaḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.95'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā mukta-maunaḥ sa bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramaseno 'tra dharma-jñaḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.96' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>caurasya haste dātavyaḥ sa piṇḍaḥ kṣetrajo yataḥ /</l>
<l>candraprabaḥ sa nṛpatiḥ putras tasyaiva nānyayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.96'>
<lg>
<l>caurasya haste dātavyaḥ sa piṇḍaḥ kṣetra-jo yataḥ /</l>
<l>candraprabaḥ sa nṛ-patiḥ putras tasya eva na anyayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.97' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>viprasya janakasyāpi sa hi putro na budhyate /</l>
<l>vikrīto hi dhanenātmā tām ekāṃ tena yāminīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.97'>
<lg>
<l>viprasya janakasya api sa hi putro na budhyate /</l>
<l>vikrīto hi dhanenā atmā tām ekāṃ tena yāminīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.98' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>rājñaḥ sūraprabasyāpi saṃskārādānavardhanaiḥ /</l>
<l>bhavet sa putro na syāc cet svadhanaṃ tasya tatkṛte //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.98'>
<lg>
<l>rājñaḥ sūraprabasya api saṃskāra-ādāna-vardhanaiḥ /</l>
<l>bhavet sa putro na syāc cet sva-dhanaṃ tasya tat-kṛte //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.99' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>śiśos tasya hi śīrṣānte mañcasthasyaiva hema yat /</l>
<l>nyastam āsīt tad evāsya mūlyaṃ saṃvardhanādike //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.99'>
<lg>
<l>śiśos tasya hi śīrṣa-ante mañcasthasya eva hema yat /</l>
<l>nyastam āsīt tad eva asya mūlyaṃ saṃvardhana-ādike //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.100' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tasmād dhastodakaprāptā tanmātā yasya yena sā /</l>
<l>ajñā tajjanane dattā yasya tan nikhilaṃ dhanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.100'>
<lg>
<l>tasmād dhasta-udaka-prāptā tan-mātā yasya yena sā /</l>
<l>ajñā taj-janane dattā yasya tan nikhilaṃ dhanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.101' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>tasya sa kṣetrajaḥ putaś caurasyaiva mahīpatiḥ /</l>
<l>piṇḍas tasyaiva haste ca deyas teneti me matiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.101'>
<lg>
<l>tasya sa kṣetra-jaḥ putaś caurasya eva mahī-patiḥ /</l>
<l>piṇḍas tasya eva haste ca deyas tena iti me matiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.26.102' corresp='Vet_19'>
<l>ity uktvato nṛpates tasyāṃsāt svapadam eva vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>prayayau sa ca trivikramaseno rājā tam anvayād bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.26.102'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvato nṛ-pates tasya aṃsāt sva-padam eva vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>prayayau sa ca trivikramaseno rājā tam anvayād bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.1' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tato gatvā gṛhītvāṃse vetālaṃ śiṃśapātaroḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam uccacāla punar nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā gṛhītva āṃse vetālaṃ śiṃśapā-taroḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas tam uccacāla punar nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.2' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>maunena prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālo 'ṃsād uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>rājan kas te 'nubandho 'yaṃ gaccha rātrisukhaṃ bhaja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.2'>
<lg>
<l>maunena prasthitaṃ taṃ ca vetālo 'ṃsād uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>rājan kas te 'nubandho 'yaṃ gaccha rātri-sukhaṃ bhaja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.3' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>na yuktaṃ tava netuṃ māṃ kubhikṣos tasya gocaram /</l>
<l>graho vā tatra ced astu kathām ekām imāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.3'>
<lg>
<l>na yuktaṃ tava netuṃ māṃ ku-bhikṣos tasya gocaram /</l>
<l>graho vā tatra ced astu kathām ekām imāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.4' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>asti svarekhānutkrāntavarṇabhedavyavasthiti /</l>
<l>nagaraṃ citrakūṭākhyaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ satyanāmatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.4'>
<lg>
<l>asti sva-rekhā-anutkrānta-varṇa-bheda-vyavasthiti /</l>
<l>nagaraṃ citrakūṭa-ākhyaṃ bibhrāṇaṃ satya-nāmatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.5' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatrāmṛtarasāsāravarṣī praṇayicakṣuṣām /</l>
<l>candrāvaloka ity āsīd rājā rājaśikhāmaṇiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.5'>
<lg>
<l>tatra amṛta-rasa-āsāra-varṣī praṇayi-cakṣuṣām /</l>
<l>candrāvaloka ity āsīd rājā rāja-śikhā-maṇiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.6' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ālānaṃ śauryakariṇas tyāgasyotpattiketanam /</l>
<l>vilāsaveśma rūpasya śaśaṃsur yaṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.6'>
<lg>
<l>ālānaṃ śaurya-kariṇas tyāgasya utpatti-ketanam /</l>
<l>vilāsa-veśma rūpasya śaśaṃsur yaṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.7' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>satīṣu sarvasaṃpatsu yan na prāpa nijocitām /</l>
<l>bhāryāṃ saikā paraṃ cintā yūnas tasyābhavad dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.7'>
<lg>
<l>satīṣu sarva-saṃpatsu yan na prāpa nija-ucitām /</l>
<l>bhāryāṃ sa aikā paraṃ cintā yūnas tasya abhavad dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.8' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ekadā ca tadudvegavinodāya mahāṭavīm /</l>
<l>jagāmāśvīyasahito mṛgayāyai sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.8'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca tad-udvega-vinodāya mahā-aṭavīm /</l>
<l>jagāma aśvīya-sahito mṛgayāyai sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.9' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatra sūkaravṛndāni bhindan bāṇair niḥantaraiḥ /</l>
<l>śyāmalāmbararociṣṇus tamāṃsīva raviḥ karaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.9'>
<lg>
<l>tatra sūkara-vṛndāni bhindan bāṇair niḥ-antaraiḥ /</l>
<l>śyāmala-ambara-rociṣṇus tamāṃsi iva raviḥ karaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.10' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>śāyayañ śaraśayyāsu siṃhān samaraduḥmadān /</l>
<l>mūrdhajair dhavalair bhīṣmān arjunādhikavikramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.10'>
<lg>
<l>śāyayañ śara-śayyāsu siṃhān samara-duḥ-madān /</l>
<l>mūrdha-jair dhavalair bhīṣmān arjuna-adhika-vikramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.11' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>vipakṣīkṛtya śarabhān pātayan parvatopamān /</l>
<l>dambholikarkaśaprāsapātair jambhārivikramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.11'>
<lg>
<l>vipakṣī-kṛtya śarabhān pātayan parvata-upamān /</l>
<l>dambholi-karkaśa-prāsa-pātair jambha-ari-vikramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.12' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>rasād vivikṣuḥ sa nṛpo vanābhyantaram ekakaḥ /</l>
<l>tīvrapārṣṇiprahāreṇa prerayāmāsa vājinam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.12'>
<lg>
<l>rasād vivikṣuḥ sa nṛ-po vana-abhyantaram ekakaḥ /</l>
<l>tīvra-pārṣṇi-prahāreṇa prerayāmāsa vājinam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.13' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>sa vājī tena ca kaśāghātenottejito bhṛśam /</l>
<l>pārṣṇighātena viṣamaṃ samaṃ cā-gaṇayan kṣaṇāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.13'>
<lg>
<l>sa vājī tena ca kaśā-ghātena uttejito bhṛśam /</l>
<l>pārṣṇi-ghātena viṣamaṃ samaṃ ca a-gaṇayan kṣaṇāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.14' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>vanāntaraṃ tato 'naiṣīd vātādhikajavo nṛpam /</l>
<l>mohitendriyavṛttiṃ taṃ vyatītya daśayojanīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.14'>
<lg>
<l>vana-antaraṃ tato 'naiṣīd vāta-adhika-javo nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>mohita-indriya-vṛttiṃ taṃ vyatītya daśa-yojanīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.15' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatra tasmin sthite vāhe rājā diṅmoham etya saḥ /</l>
<l>bhramañ śrānto dadarśaikam ārāt suvipulaṃ saraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.15'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tasmin sthite vāhe rājā diṅ-moham etya saḥ /</l>
<l>bhramañ śrānto dadarśa ekam ārāt su-vipulaṃ saraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.16' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>mārutenābhimukhyena namitonnamitair muhuḥ /</l>
<l>ita ehīti hastābhaiḥ saṃjñāṃ kurvad ivāmbujaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.16'>
<lg>
<l>mārutenā abhimukhyena namita-unnamitair muhuḥ /</l>
<l>ita ehi iti hasta-ābhaiḥ saṃjñāṃ kurvad iva ambu-jaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.17' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatra gatvā ca turagaṃ viparyāṇopavartitam /</l>
<l>snātapītaṃ taruchāyābaddhaṃ dattatṛṇotkaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.17'>
<lg>
<l>tatra gatvā ca turagaṃ viparyāṇa-upavartitam /</l>
<l>snāta-pītaṃ taru-chāyā-baddhaṃ datta-tṛṇa-utkaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.18' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>kṛtvā svayaṃ kṛtasnānaḥ pītāmbur galitaśramaḥ /</l>
<l>ramyeṣu tatpradeśeṣu dadau dṛṣṭim itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.18'>
<lg>
<l>kṛtvā svayaṃ kṛta-snānaḥ pīta-ambur galita-śramaḥ /</l>
<l>ramyeṣu tat-pradeśeṣu dadau dṛṣṭim itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.19' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ekatra cāśokataror adhastān munikanyakām /</l>
<l>āmuktapuṣpābharaṇāṃ valkalāṃśukaśobhinīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.19'>
<lg>
<l>ekatra ca aśoka-taror adhastān muni-kanyakām /</l>
<l>āmukta-puṣpa-ābharaṇāṃ valkala-aṃśuka-śobhinīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.20' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>mugdhabaddhajaṭājūṭasaviśeṣamanaḥramām /</l>
<l>sakhīdvitīyām āścaryarūpāṃ rājā dadarśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.20'>
<lg>
<l>mugdha-baddha-jaṭā-jūṭa-sa-viśeṣa-manaḥ-ramām /</l>
<l>sakhī-dvitīyām āścarya-rūpāṃ rājā dadarśa saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.21' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>acintayac ca puṣpeṣoḥ patitaḥ śaragocare /</l>
<l>keyaṃ syāt sarasi snātuṃ sāvitrī kiṃ svid āgatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.21'>
<lg>
<l>acintayac ca puṣpa-iṣoḥ patitaḥ śara-gocare /</l>
<l>ka īyaṃ syāt sarasi snātuṃ sāvitrī kiṃ svid āgatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.22' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>kiṃ harasyāṅkavibhraṣṭā gaurī bhūyaḥ śritā tapaḥ /</l>
<l>ahany astamgatasyendoḥ kāntiḥ kiṃ vā dhṛtavratā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.22'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ harasya aṅka-vibhraṣṭā gaurī bhūyaḥ śritā tapaḥ /</l>
<l>ahany astam-gatasya indoḥ kāntiḥ kiṃ vā dhṛta-vratā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.23' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tad etām upasṛtyeha śanair upalabhe varam /</l>
<l>ity ālocya yayau tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ so 'ntikaṃ nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.23'>
<lg>
<l>tad etām upasṛtya iha śanair upalabhe varam /</l>
<l>ity ālocya yayau tasyāḥ kanyāyāḥ so 'ntikaṃ nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.24' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>sāpi dṛṣṭvā tam āyāntaṃ tadrūpākulitekṣaṇā /</l>
<l>pūrvaprārabdhapuṣpasraksannahastā vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.24'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi dṛṣṭvā tam āyāntaṃ tad-rūpa-ākulita-īkṣaṇā /</l>
<l>pūrva-prārabdha-puṣpa-srak-sanna-hastā vyacintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.25' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ko 'yam īdṛg araṇye 'smin siddho vidyādharo nu kim /</l>
<l>batāsya rūpaṃ viśvasya kṛtārthīkaraṇaṃ dṛśoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.25'>
<lg>
<l>ko 'yam īdṛg araṇye 'smin siddho vidyādharo nu kim /</l>
<l>bata asya rūpaṃ viśvasya kṛta-arthī-karaṇaṃ dṛśoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.26' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>evaṃ vitarkya paśyantī tiryak taṃ trapayā tataḥ /</l>
<l>utthāya sorustambhāpi gantuṃ prāvartataiva sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.26'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ vitarkya paśyantī tiryak taṃ trapayā tataḥ /</l>
<l>utthāya sa-ūru-stambha āpi gantuṃ prāvartata eva sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.27' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>athopetya sa rājā tām evaṃ nāgariko 'bravīt /</l>
<l>āstāṃ prathamadṛṣṭasya darśanaikaphalārthinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.27'>
<lg>
<l>atha upetya sa rājā tām evaṃ nāgariko 'bravīt /</l>
<l>āstāṃ prathama-dṛṣṭasya darśana-eka-phala-arthinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.28' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>janasya dūrāyātasya sundari svāgatādikam /</l>
<l>ko 'yaṃ nv āśramiṇāṃ dharmo yad etasmāt palāyyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.28'>
<lg>
<l>janasya dūra-āyātasya sundari sva-āgata-adikam /</l>
<l>ko 'yaṃ nv āśramiṇāṃ dharmo yad etasmāt palāyyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.29' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ity ukte bhūbhujā tasyāḥ sakhī tadvad vicakṣaṇā /</l>
<l>tatropaveśya nṛpateh cakārātithyasatkriyām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.29'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte bhū-bhujā tasyāḥ sakhī tadvad vicakṣaṇā /</l>
<l>tatra upaveśya nṛ-pateh cakārā atithya-sat-kriyām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.30' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>atha sapraṇayaṃ rājā tāṃ sa papraccha sotsukaḥ /</l>
<l>bhadre kaḥ puṇyavān vaṃśas tvatsakhyālaṃkṛto 'nayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.30'>
<lg>
<l>atha sa-praṇayaṃ rājā tāṃ sa papraccha sa-utsukaḥ /</l>
<l>bhadre kaḥ puṇyavān vaṃśas tvat-sakhya ālaṃ-kṛto 'nayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.31' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>kāni śrotrāmṛtasyandīny asyā nāmākṣarāṇi ca /</l>
<l>kiṃ caivam anayā puṣpasukumāram idaṃ vapuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.31'>
<lg>
<l>kāni śrotra-amṛta-syandīny asyā nāma-akṣarāṇi ca /</l>
<l>kiṃ ca evam anayā puṣpa-sukumāram idaṃ vapuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.32' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tāpasocitayā vṛttyā vijane 'smin kadarthyate /</l>
<l>iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā tatsakhī pratyuvāca sā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.32'>
<lg>
<l>tāpasa-ucitayā vṛttyā vijane 'smin kadarthyate /</l>
<l>iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā tat-sakhī pratyuvāca sā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.33' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>eṣā mahāṛṣeḥ kaṇvasya duhitā vardhitāśrame /</l>
<l>menakāsaṃbhavā kanyā nāmnā cendīvaraprabhā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.33'>
<lg>
<l>eṣā mahā-ṛṣeḥ kaṇvasya duhitā vardhita-āśrame /</l>
<l>menakā-saṃbhavā kanyā nāmnā ca indīvaraprabhā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.34' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ihāsmin sarasi snātum āgatānujñayā pituḥ /</l>
<l>ito 'tra nātidūre 'sti tasyaitat pitur āśramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.34'>
<lg>
<l>iha asmin sarasi snātum āgata ānujñayā pituḥ /</l>
<l>ito 'tra na atidūre 'sti tasya etat pitur āśramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.35' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ity uktaḥ sa tayā hṛṣṭo rājāruhya turaṅgamam /</l>
<l>yācituṃ tāṃ sutāṃ tasya kaṇvarṣer āśramaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.35'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktaḥ sa tayā hṛṣṭo rājā āruhya turaṅgamam /</l>
<l>yācituṃ tāṃ sutāṃ tasya kaṇva-rṣer āśramaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.36' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>viveśa ca vinītas taṃ bahiḥ sthāpitavāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>jaṭāvalkalibhiḥ pūrṇaṃ pādapair iva tāpasaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.36'>
<lg>
<l>viveśa ca vinītas taṃ bahiḥ sthāpita-vāhanaḥ /</l>
<l>jaṭā-valkalibhiḥ pūrṇaṃ pāda-pair iva tāpasaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.37' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tanmadhye ca tam adrākṣīd ṛṣibhiḥ parivāritam /</l>
<l>tejasāhlādanaṃ kaṇvamuniṃ candram iva grahaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.37'>
<lg>
<l>tan-madhye ca tam adrākṣīd ṛṣibhiḥ parivāritam /</l>
<l>tejasā āhlādanaṃ kaṇva-muniṃ candram iva grahaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.38' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>upetya pādayos taṃ ca vavande so 'pi taṃ muniḥ /</l>
<l>kalpitātithyaviśrāntaṃ jñānī kṣiprād abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.38'>
<lg>
<l>upetya pādayos taṃ ca vavande so 'pi taṃ muniḥ /</l>
<l>kalpita-ātithya-viśrāntaṃ jñānī kṣiprād abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.39' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>vatsa candravalokaitac chṛṇu yad vacmi te hitam /</l>
<l>jānāsi yādṛk saṃsāre prāṇināṃ mṛtyuto bhayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.39'>
<lg>
<l>vatsa candravaloka etac chṛṇu yad vacmi te hitam /</l>
<l>jānāsi yādṛk saṃsāre prāṇināṃ mṛtyuto bhayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.40' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tan niḥkāraṇam evaitān varākān haṃsi kiṃ mṛgān /</l>
<l>śastraṃ hi bhītarakṣārthaṃ dhātrā kṣatrasya nirmitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.40'>
<lg>
<l>tan niḥ-kāraṇam eva etān varākān haṃsi kiṃ mṛgān /</l>
<l>śastraṃ hi bhīta-rakṣa-arthaṃ dhātrā kṣatrasya nirmitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.41' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tat prajā rakṣa dharmeṇa samun mūlaya kaṇṭakān /</l>
<l>hastyaśvāstrādiyogyābhiś calalakṣmyādi sādhaya //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.41'>
<lg>
<l>tat prajā rakṣa dharmeṇa samun mūlaya kaṇṭakān /</l>
<l>hasty-aśva-astra-ādi-yogyābhiś cala-lakṣmya-ādi sādhaya //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.42' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>bhuṅkṣva rājyasukhaṃ dehi dhanaṃ dikṣu yaśaḥ kira /</l>
<l>kṛtāntakrīḍitaṃ hiṃsraṃ mṛgayāvyasanaṃ tyaja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.42'>
<lg>
<l>bhuṅkṣva rājya-sukhaṃ dehi dhanaṃ dikṣu yaśaḥ kira /</l>
<l>kṛtānta-krīḍitaṃ hiṃsraṃ mṛgayā-vyasanaṃ tyaja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.43' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>hantur vadhyasya cānyasya yatra tulyā pramāditā /</l>
<l>kiṃ tena bahvanarthena pāṇḍor vṛttaṃ na kiṃ śrutam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.43'>
<lg>
<l>hantur vadhyasya ca anyasya yatra tulyā pramāditā /</l>
<l>kiṃ tena bahv-an-arthena pāṇḍor vṛttaṃ na kiṃ śrutam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.44' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>etat kaṇvamuner vākyaṃ śrutvā samabhinandya ca /</l>
<l>rājā candrāvalokas tam arthajñaḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.44'>
<lg>
<l>etat kaṇva-muner vākyaṃ śrutvā samabhinandya ca /</l>
<l>rājā candrāvalokas tam artha-jñaḥ pratyabhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.45' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>anuśiṣṭo 'smi bhagavan kṛto me 'nugrahaḥ paraḥ /</l>
<l>mṛgayāyā nivṛtto 'haṃ prāṇinaḥ santu niḥbhayāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.45'>
<lg>
<l>anuśiṣṭo 'smi bhagavan kṛto me 'nugrahaḥ paraḥ /</l>
<l>mṛgayāyā nivṛtto 'haṃ prāṇinaḥ santu niḥ-bhayāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.46' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tac chrutvovāca sa munis tuṣṭo 'ham amunā tava /</l>
<l>prāṇiṣv abhayadānena tad vṛṇīṣvepsitaṃ varam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.46'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutva ūvāca sa munis tuṣṭo 'ham amunā tava /</l>
<l>prāṇiṣv a-bhaya-dānena tad vṛṇīṣvā ipsitaṃ varam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.47' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ity uktas tena muninā kālajñaḥ sa nṛpo 'bhyadhāt /</l>
<l>tuṣṭo 'si cet sutāṃ dehi mahyam indīvaraprabhām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.47'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktas tena muninā kāla-jñaḥ sa nṛ-po 'bhyadhāt /</l>
<l>tuṣṭo 'si cet sutāṃ dehi mahyam indīvaraprabhām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.48' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ity arthitavate so 'smai rājñe snānagatāṃ muniḥ /</l>
<l>apsaraḥsaṃbhavāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ dadāv anurūpikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.48'>
<lg>
<l>ity arthitavate so 'smai rājñe snāna-gatāṃ muniḥ /</l>
<l>apsaraḥ-saṃbhavāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ dadāv anurūpikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.49' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tataḥ kṛtavivāhas tāṃ munibhāryāprasādhitām /</l>
<l>kṛtānuyātrām udbāṣpais tāpasair ā nijāśramāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.49'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kṛta-vivāhas tāṃ muni-bhāryā-prasādhitām /</l>
<l>kṛta-anuyātrām udbāṣpais tāpasair ā nija-āśramāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.50' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>indīvaraprabhāṃ bhāryām ādāyāruhya vājinam /</l>
<l>candrāvalokas tarasā pratasthe sa tato nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.50'>
<lg>
<l>indīvaraprabhāṃ bhāryām ādāyā aruhya vājinam /</l>
<l>candrāvalokas tarasā pratasthe sa tato nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.51' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>gacchataś cāsya vitataṃ dṛṣṭvā taddinaceṣṭitam /</l>
<l>raviḥ khinna ivāstādrim astake samupāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.51'>
<lg>
<l>gacchataś ca asya vitataṃ dṛṣṭvā tad-dina-ceṣṭitam /</l>
<l>raviḥ khinna iva asta-adrim astake samupāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.52' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>dadṛśe mṛganetrā ca kramād udriktamanmathā /</l>
<l>dhvāntanīlapaṭachannarūpā rātryabhisārikā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.52'>
<lg>
<l>dadṛśe mṛga-netrā ca kramād udrikta-manmathā /</l>
<l>dhvānta-nīla-paṭa-channa-rūpā rātry-abhisārikā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.53' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tasmin kāle pathi prāpa sa rājāśvatthapādapam /</l>
<l>sajjanāśayasusvacchavāpījalataṭasthitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.53'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin kāle pathi prāpa sa rāja āśvattha-pāda-pam /</l>
<l>saj-jana-āśaya-su-svaccha-vāpī-jala-taṭa-sthitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.54' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>śākhāpattraughasaṃchannaśādvalaśyāmalasthalam /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ vasāmīha rātrim ity akarod dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.54'>
<lg>
<l>śākhā-pattra-ogha-saṃchanna-śādvala-śyāmala-sthalam /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ vasāmi iha rātrim ity akarod dhṛdi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.55' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tato 'vatīrya turagād dattvā tasmai tṛṇodakam /</l>
<l>viśramya puline vāpyā upayuktāmbumārutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.55'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'vatīrya tura-gād dattvā tasmai tṛṇa-udakam /</l>
<l>viśramya puline vāpyā upayukta-ambu-mārutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.56' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>muniputrikayā sārdhaṃ tayā tasya taros tale /</l>
<l>priyayā puṣpaśayyāyāṃ saṃviveśa sa bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.56'>
<lg>
<l>muni-putrikayā sārdhaṃ tayā tasya taros tale /</l>
<l>priyayā puṣpa-śayyāyāṃ saṃviveśa sa bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.57' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatkṣaṇaṃ ca samākramya timirāṃśukahāriṇā /</l>
<l>sarāgam ānanaṃ prācyāś cucumbe śaśalakṣmaṇā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.57'>
<lg>
<l>tat-kṣaṇaṃ ca samākramya timira-aṃśuka-hāriṇā /</l>
<l>sa-rāgam ānanaṃ prācyāś cucumbe śaśa-lakṣmaṇā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.58' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>virejuś candrakiraṇaiḥ samāśliṣya prasāritāḥ /</l>
<l>vītamānāvakāśāś cā-śeṣā vitamaso diśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.58'>
<lg>
<l>virejuś candra-kiraṇaiḥ samāśliṣya prasāritāḥ /</l>
<l>vīta-māna-avakāśāś ca a-śeṣā vitamaso diśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.59' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>atrāntare latāgulmavivaraprasṛtaiḥ karaiḥ /</l>
<l>aindavaī ratnadīpābhais tarumūle vibhāsite //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.59'>
<lg>
<l>atra antare latā-gulma-vivara-prasṛtaiḥ karaiḥ /</l>
<l>aindavaī ratna-dīpa-ābhais taru-mūle vibhāsite //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.60' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>so 'pi rājā siṣeve tām āśliṣyendīvaraprabhām /</l>
<l>navasaṃgamasotkaṇṭhasarasaṃ suratotsavam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.60'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi rājā siṣeve tām āśliṣya indīvaraprabhām /</l>
<l>nava-saṃgama-sa-utkaṇṭha-sa-rasaṃ su-rata-utsavam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.61' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>visraṃsayāmāsa śanair nīvīṃ tasyās trapām iva /</l>
<l>akhaṇḍayac ca daśanair mugdhabhāvam ivādharam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.61'>
<lg>
<l>visraṃsayāmāsa śanair nīvīṃ tasyās trapām iva /</l>
<l>akhaṇḍayac ca daśanair mugdha-bhāvam iva adharam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.62' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>racayāmāsa kucayor yauvanadvipakumbhayoḥ /</l>
<l>karajakṣatasadratnanavanakṣatramālikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.62'>
<lg>
<l>racayāmāsa kucayor yauvana-dvi-pa-kumbhayoḥ /</l>
<l>kara-ja-kṣata-sad-ratna-nava-nakṣatra-mālikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.63' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>mukhaṃ kapolau nayane muhuḥ paricucumba ca /</l>
<l>lāvaṇyāmṛtaniḥṣyandam āpibann iva sarvataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.63'>
<lg>
<l>mukhaṃ kapolau nayane muhuḥ paricucumba ca /</l>
<l>lāvaṇya-amṛta-niḥṣyandam āpibann iva sarvataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.64' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>itthan nidhuvanakrīḍāsukhena sa tayā saha /</l>
<l>nināya kāntayā tatra rājā kṣaṇam iva kṣapām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.64'>
<lg>
<l>itthan nidhuvana-krīḍā-sukhena sa tayā saha /</l>
<l>nināya kāntayā tatra rājā kṣaṇam iva kṣapām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.65' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>prātaś ca muktaśayanaḥ sāṃdhyasyānantaraṃ vidheḥ /</l>
<l>svasainyāvāptaye yātum unmukho 'bhūd vadhūsakhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.65'>
<lg>
<l>prātaś ca mukta-śayanaḥ sāṃdhyasya anantaraṃ vidheḥ /</l>
<l>sva-sainya-avāptaye yātum unmukho 'bhūd vadhū-sakhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.66' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tāvac ca naktaṃ luptābjakhaṇḍaśobhaṃ niśāpatim /</l>
<l>bhiyevāstādrikuharapralīnaṃ dhvastatejasam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.66'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca naktaṃ lupta-ab-ja-khaṇḍa-śobhaṃ niśā-patim /</l>
<l>bhiya īva asta-adri-kuhara-pralīnaṃ dhvasta-tejasam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.67' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>hantukāma iva krodhād ātāmratararociṣi /</l>
<l>prasāritakarotkṣiptamaṇḍalāgre vivasvati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.67'>
<lg>
<l>hantu-kāma iva krodhād ātāmratara-rociṣi /</l>
<l>prasārita-kara-utkṣipta-maṇḍala-agre vivasvati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.68' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>akasmād ājagāmātra vidyutpiṅgaśiraḥruhaḥ /</l>
<l>kajjalaśyāmalaḥ kālameghābho brahmarākṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.68'>
<lg>
<l>akasmād ājagāma atra vidyut-piṅga-śiraḥ-ruhaḥ /</l>
<l>kajjala-śyāmalaḥ kāla-megha-ābho brahma-rākṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.69' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>antramālākṛtottaṃsaḥ keśayajñopavītabhṛt /</l>
<l>khādan naraśiraḥmāṃsaṃ kapālena pibann asṛk //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.69'>
<lg>
<l>antra-mālā-kṛta-uttaṃsaḥ keśa-yajña-upavīta-bhṛt /</l>
<l>khādan nara-śiraḥ-māṃsaṃ kapālena pibann asṛk //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.70' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>so 'ṭṭahāsaṃ vimucyograṃ mukhenāgniṃ vaman krudhā /</l>
<l>daṃṣṭrākarālo rājānaṃ bhartsayan nijagāda tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.70'>
<lg>
<l>so 'ṭṭa-hāsaṃ vimucya ugraṃ mukhena agniṃ vaman krudhā /</l>
<l>daṃṣṭrā-karālo rājānaṃ bhartsayan nijagāda tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.71' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>pāpa jvālāmukhaṃ nāma viddhi māṃ brahmarākṣasam /</l>
<l>nivāsaś caiṣa me 'śvattho devair api na laṅghyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.71'>
<lg>
<l>pāpa jvālāmukhaṃ nāma viddhi māṃ brahma-rākṣasam /</l>
<l>nivāsaś ca eṣa me 'śvattho devair api na laṅghyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.72' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>so 'yaṃ tvayā samākramya paribhuktaḥ striyā saha /</l>
<l>rātricaryāgatasyādya tad bhuṅkṣvā-vinayāt phalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.72'>
<lg>
<l>so 'yaṃ tvayā samākramya paribhuktaḥ striyā saha /</l>
<l>rātri-carya-āgatasya adya tad bhuṅkṣva a-vinayāt phalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.73' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>eṣo 'haṃ te duḥācāra kāmopahatacetasaḥ /</l>
<l>utpāṭya hṛdayaṃ bhokṣye pāsyāmy eva ca śoṇitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.73'>
<lg>
<l>eṣo 'haṃ te duḥ-ācāra kāma-upahata-cetasaḥ /</l>
<l>utpāṭya hṛdayaṃ bhokṣye pāsyāmy eva ca śoṇitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.74' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tac chrutvaiva tathā ghoraṃ tam avadhyam avekṣya ca /</l>
<l>trastāṅganaḥ savinayaṃ bhayāt pratyabravīn nṛpaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.74'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutva aiva tathā ghoraṃ tam a-vadhyam avekṣya ca /</l>
<l>trasta-aṅganaḥ sa-vinayaṃ bhayāt pratyabravīn nṛ-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.75' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ajānatāparāddhaṃ yan mayā te tat kṣamasva me /</l>
<l>tavāham āśrame hy asminn atithiḥ śaraṇāśritaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.75'>
<lg>
<l>a-jānata āparāddhaṃ yan mayā te tat kṣamasva me /</l>
<l>tava aham āśrame hy asminn atithiḥ śaraṇa-āśritaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.76' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>dāsyāmi cepsitaṃ tubhyam ānīya puruṣaṃ paśum /</l>
<l>yena te bhavitā tṛptis tat prasīda krudhaṃ tyaja //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.76'>
<lg>
<l>dāsyāmi cā ipsitaṃ tubhyam ānīya puruṣaṃ paśum /</l>
<l>yena te bhavitā tṛptis tat prasīda krudhaṃ tyaja //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.77' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā śāntaḥ sa brahmarāksasaḥ /</l>
<l>astu ko doṣa ity anto vicintyaivam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.77'>
<lg>
<l>iti rājño vacaḥ śrutvā śāntaḥ sa brahma-rāksasaḥ /</l>
<l>astu ko doṣa ity anto vicintya evam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.78' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>yaḥ saptavarṣadeśyo 'pi mahāsattvo vivekavān /</l>
<l>tvadarthe svecchayātmānaṃ dadyād brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.78'>
<lg>
<l>yaḥ sapta-varṣa-deśyo 'pi mahā-sattvo vivekavān /</l>
<l>tvad-arthe sva-icchayā ātmānaṃ dadyād brāhmaṇa-putrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.79' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>hanyamānaṃ ca yaṃ mātā hastayoḥ pādayoḥ pitā /</l>
<l>avaṣṭabhyātisudṛḍhaṃ saṃniveśya mahītale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.79'>
<lg>
<l>hanyamānaṃ ca yaṃ mātā hastayoḥ pādayoḥ pitā /</l>
<l>avaṣṭabhya ati-su-dṛḍhaṃ saṃniveśya mahī-tale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.80' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ mahyam upahārīkaroṣi cet /</l>
<l>svayaṃ khaḍgaprahāreṇa hatvā saptadināntare //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.80'>
<lg>
<l>tādṛśaṃ puruṣaṃ mahyam upahārī-karoṣi cet /</l>
<l>svayaṃ khaḍga-prahāreṇa hatvā sapta-dina-antare //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.81' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tat te kṣamiṣye nyakkāram anyathā tu mahīpate /</l>
<l>sadyo vināśayiṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ saparicchadam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.81'>
<lg>
<l>tat te kṣamiṣye nyak-kāram anyathā tu mahī-pate /</l>
<l>sadyo vināśayiṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ sa-paricchadam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.82' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>śrutvaitat sa bhayād rājā pratipede tatheti tat /</l>
<l>tiraḥbabhūva ca brahmarākṣasaḥ so 'pi tat kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.82'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aitat sa bhayād rājā pratipede tatha īti tat /</l>
<l>tiraḥ-babhūva ca brahma-rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tat kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.83' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>atha candrāvaloko 'sau rājā sendīvaraprabhaḥ /</l>
<l>hayārūḍhas tataḥ prāyāt sainyaṃ cinvan sudurmanāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.83'>
<lg>
<l>atha candrāvaloko 'sau rājā sa-indīvaraprabhaḥ /</l>
<l>haya-ārūḍhas tataḥ prāyāt sainyaṃ cinvan su-durmanāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.84' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>aho ahaṃ mṛgayayā madanena ca mohitaḥ /</l>
<l>gataḥ pāṇḍur ivā-kāṇḍe vināśaṃ bata bāliśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.84'>
<lg>
<l>aho ahaṃ mṛgayayā madanena ca mohitaḥ /</l>
<l>gataḥ pāṇḍur iva a-kāṇḍe vināśaṃ bata bāliśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.85' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>prāpyate hy upahāro 'sya rākṣasas tādṛśaḥ kutaḥ /</l>
<l>tan nijaṃ nagaraṃ tāvad yāmi paśyāmi bhāvi kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.85'>
<lg>
<l>prāpyate hy upahāro 'sya rākṣasas tādṛśaḥ kutaḥ /</l>
<l>tan nijaṃ nagaraṃ tāvad yāmi paśyāmi bhāvi kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.86' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti dhyāyan sa ca prāpa svasainyaṃ cinvad āgatam /</l>
<l>tadyuktaś ca sadāraḥ svaṃ citrakūṭam agāt puram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.86'>
<lg>
<l>iti dhyāyan sa ca prāpa sva-sainyaṃ cinvad āgatam /</l>
<l>tad-yuktaś ca sa-dāraḥ svaṃ citrakūṭam agāt puram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.87' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatra tasyocitāṃ bhāryāprāptiṃ vīkṣya kṛtotsave /</l>
<l>rāṣṭre 'ntargataduḥkhasya dinaśeṣo jagāma saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.87'>
<lg>
<l>tatra tasya ucitāṃ bhāryā-prāptiṃ vīkṣya kṛta-utsave /</l>
<l>rāṣṭre 'ntargata-duḥkhasya dina-śeṣo jagāma saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.88' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>dvitīye 'hni rahaḥ sarvaṃ svavṛttāntaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ /</l>
<l>mantribhyas teṣu caikas taṃ mantrī sumatir abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.88'>
<lg>
<l>dvitīye 'hni rahaḥ sarvaṃ sva-vṛtta-antaṃ śaśaṃsa saḥ /</l>
<l>mantribhyas teṣu ca ekas taṃ mantrī su-matir abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.89' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>viṣādo deva te mā bhūd upahāraṃ hi tādṛśam /</l>
<l>āneṣyāmy aham anviṣya bahvāścaryā hi medinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.89'>
<lg>
<l>viṣādo deva te mā bhūd upahāraṃ hi tādṛśam /</l>
<l>āneṣyāmy aham anviṣya bahv-āścaryā hi medinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.90' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>evam āśvāsya rājānaṃ sa sauvarṇīm akārayat /</l>
<l>mantrī saptābdadeśīyabālakapratimāṃ drutam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.90'>
<lg>
<l>evam āśvāsya rājānaṃ sa sauvarṇīm akārayat /</l>
<l>mantrī sapta-abda-deśīya-bālaka-pratimāṃ drutam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.91' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ratnair alaṃkṛtāṃ tāṃ ca kṛtvā karṇirathārpitām /</l>
<l>bhrāmayāmāsa nagaragrāmaghoṣeṣv itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.91'>
<lg>
<l>ratnair alaṃ-kṛtāṃ tāṃ ca kṛtvā karṇi-ratha-arpitām /</l>
<l>bhrāmayāmāsa nagara-grāma-ghoṣeṣv itas tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.92' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>yaḥ saptavarṣadeśīyaḥ svecchayā vipraputrakaḥ /</l>
<l>dadāti sarvasattvārtham ātmānaṃ brahmarakṣase //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.92'>
<lg>
<l>yaḥ sapta-varṣa-deśīyaḥ sva-icchayā vipra-putrakaḥ /</l>
<l>dadāti sarva-sattva-artham ātmānaṃ brahma-rakṣase //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.93' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>upahārāya sattvastho mātāpitror anujñayā /</l>
<l>hanyamānaś ca yas tābhyāṃ hastapāde pragṛhyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.93'>
<lg>
<l>upahārāya sattvastho mātā-pitror anujñayā /</l>
<l>hanyamānaś ca yas tābhyāṃ hasta-pāde pragṛhyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.94' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tasmai grāmaśatopetāṃ hemaratnamayīm imām /</l>
<l>dadāti pratimāṃ rājā pitror upacikīrṣave //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.94'>
<lg>
<l>tasmai grāma-śata-upetāṃ hema-ratna-mayīm imām /</l>
<l>dadāti pratimāṃ rājā pitror upacikīrṣave //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.95' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti ca bhrāmyamānāyās tasyāḥ pratikṛteḥ śiśoḥ /</l>
<l>paṭahodghoṣaṇāṃ mantrī so 'gre 'jasram adāpayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.95'>
<lg>
<l>iti ca bhrāmyamānāyās tasyāḥ pratikṛteḥ śiśoḥ /</l>
<l>paṭaha-udghoṣaṇāṃ mantrī so 'gre '-jasram adāpayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.96' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tāvac chrutvā tad ekasminn agrahāre dvijārbhakaḥ /</l>
<l>ko 'pi saptābdadeśīyo 'py atidhīro 'dbhutākṛtiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.96'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac chrutvā tad ekasminn agra-hāre dvi-ja-arbhakaḥ /</l>
<l>ko 'pi sapta-abda-deśīyo 'py atidhīro 'dbhuta-ākṛtiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.97' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>pūrvābhyāsena bālye 'pi sadā parahite rataḥ /</l>
<l>prajāpuṇyaparīpāka iva sākāratāṃ gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.97'>
<lg>
<l>pūrva-abhyāsena bālye 'pi sadā para-hite rataḥ /</l>
<l>prajā-puṇya-parī-pāka iva sa-ākāratāṃ gataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.98' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>uvācodghoṣakān etya yuṣmadarthe dadāmy aham /</l>
<l>ātmānaṃ pitarau gatvā bodhayitvābhyupaimi ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.98'>
<lg>
<l>uvāca udghoṣakān etya yuṣmad-arthe dadāmy aham /</l>
<l>ātmānaṃ pitarau gatvā bodhayitva ābhyupaimi ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.99' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti ūcivāṃs tān muditān sa bālo 'numataś ca taiḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā gṛhaṃ jagāda svau pitarau racitāñjaliḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.99'>
<lg>
<l>iti ūcivāṃs tān muditān sa bālo 'numataś ca taiḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā gṛhaṃ jagāda svau pitarau racita-añjaliḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.100' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>dadāmi sarvasattvārthaṃ deham etaṃ vinaśvaram /</l>
<l>tan mām abhyanujānītaṃ hatāṃ cāpadam ātmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.100'>
<lg>
<l>dadāmi sarva-sattva-arthaṃ deham etaṃ vinaśvaram /</l>
<l>tan mām abhyanujānītaṃ hatāṃ cā apadam ātmanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.101' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ātmapratikṛtiṃ hy etāṃ gṛhītvā vitarāmi vām /</l>
<l>hemaratnamayīṃ rājñā dattāṃ grāmaśatānvitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.101'>
<lg>
<l>ātma-pratikṛtiṃ hy etāṃ gṛhītvā vitarāmi vām /</l>
<l>hema-ratna-mayīṃ rājñā dattāṃ grāma-śata-anvitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.102' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>evaṃ me yuṣmadānṛṇyaṃ parārthaś caiva sidhyati /</l>
<l>yuvāṃ ca dhvastadāridryau bahūn putrān avāpsyathaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.102'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ me yuṣmad-ānṛṇyaṃ para-arthaś ca eva sidhyati /</l>
<l>yuvāṃ ca dhvasta-dāridryau bahūn putrān avāpsyathaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.103' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ sahasā pitarau tau tam ūcatuḥ /</l>
<l>kim etad bhāṣase putra vātena kṣubhito 'si kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.103'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ sahasā pitarau tau tam ūcatuḥ /</l>
<l>kim etad bhāṣase putra vātena kṣubhito 'si kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.104' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>kiṃ vā grahagṛhīto 'si pralapasy anyathā katham /</l>
<l>ko hy arthair ghātayet putraṃ dehaṃ dadyāc ca kaḥ śiśuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.104'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ vā graha-gṛhīto 'si pralapasy anyathā katham /</l>
<l>ko hy arthair ghātayet putraṃ dehaṃ dadyāc ca kaḥ śiśuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.105' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>etat pitror vacaḥ śrutvā bālaḥ puna uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>na buddhimohāj jalpāmi śṛṇutaṃ me 'rthavad vacaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.105'>
<lg>
<l>etat pitror vacaḥ śrutvā bālaḥ puna uvāca saḥ /</l>
<l>na buddhi-mohāj jalpāmi śṛṇutaṃ me 'rthavad vacaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.106' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>avācyā-śucisaṃpūrṇam utpattyaiva sugupsitam /</l>
<l>duḥkhakṣetraṃ vināśy eva śarīram acirād idam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.106'>
<lg>
<l>a-vācya a-śuci-saṃpūrṇam utpattya aiva su-gupsitam /</l>
<l>duḥkha-kṣetraṃ vināśy eva śarīram acirād idam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.107' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tad etenātya-sāreṇa sukṛtaṃ yad upārjyate /</l>
<l>tad eva sāraṃ saṃsāre kṛtabuddhibhir ucyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.107'>
<lg>
<l>tad etena aty-a-sāreṇa su-kṛtaṃ yad upārjyate /</l>
<l>tad eva sāraṃ saṃsāre kṛta-buddhibhir ucyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.108' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>sarvabhūtopakārāc ca kim anyat sukṛtaṃ param /</l>
<l>tatrāpi pitror bhaktiś cet kiṃ dehād dṛśyate phalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.108'>
<lg>
<l>sarva-bhūta-upakārāc ca kim anyat su-kṛtaṃ param /</l>
<l>tatra api pitror bhaktiś cet kiṃ dehād dṛśyate phalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.109' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ityādivākyaiḥ sa śiśuḥ śocantau dṛḍhaniścayaḥ /</l>
<l>tāv aṅgīkārayāmāsa pitarau svamanīṣitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.109'>
<lg>
<l>ity-ādi-vākyaiḥ sa śiśuḥ śocantau dṛḍha-niścayaḥ /</l>
<l>tāv aṅgī-kārayāmāsa pitarau sva-manīṣitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.110' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>gatvā ca rājabhṛtyebhyaḥ pratimāṃ taṃ hiraṇmayīm /</l>
<l>ānīya pradadau tābhyāṃ sagrāmaśataśāsanām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.110'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā ca rāja-bhṛtyebhyaḥ pratimāṃ taṃ hiraṇmayīm /</l>
<l>ānīya pradadau tābhyāṃ sa-grāma-śata-śāsanām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.111' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tataḥ kṛtvāgrato rājabhṛtyāṃs tān eva sa drutam /</l>
<l>pitṛbhyām anvitaḥ prāyāc citrakūṭaṃ nṛpāntikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.111'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ kṛtva āgrato rāja-bhṛtyāṃs tān eva sa drutam /</l>
<l>pitṛbhyām anvitaḥ prāyāc citrakūṭaṃ nṛ-pa-antikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.112' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatra candrāvalokas taṃ vīkṣyā-khaṇḍitatejasam /</l>
<l>rakṣāratnam iva prāptaṃ bālaṃ rājā nananda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.112'>
<lg>
<l>tatra candrāvalokas taṃ vīkṣya a-khaṇḍita-tejasam /</l>
<l>rakṣā-ratnam iva prāptaṃ bālaṃ rājā nananda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.113' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>āropya gajapṛṣṭaṃ ca racitasragvilepanam /</l>
<l>nīnāya taṃ sapitṛkaṃ ketanaṃ brahmarakṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.113'>
<lg>
<l>āropya gaja-pṛṣṭaṃ ca racita-srag-vilepanam /</l>
<l>nīnāya taṃ sa-pitṛkaṃ ketanaṃ brahma-rakṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.114' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tatra maṇḍalam ālikhya tasyāśvatthasya pārśvataḥ /</l>
<l>vihitocitapūjena hute vahnau puraḥdhasā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.114'>
<lg>
<l>tatra maṇḍalam ālikhya tasya aśvatthasya pārśvataḥ /</l>
<l>vihita-ucita-pūjena hute vahnau puraḥ-dhasā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.115' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>āvirbabhūva muktāṭṭahāsaḥ so 'dhyayanaṃ paṭhan /</l>
<l>ghūrṇan raktāsavakṣībo jṛmbhamāṇo muhuḥ śvasan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.115'>
<lg>
<l>āvirbabhūva mukta-aṭṭa-hāsaḥ so 'dhyayanaṃ paṭhan /</l>
<l>ghūrṇan rakta-āsava-kṣībo jṛmbhamāṇo muhuḥ śvasan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.116' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>jvalannetro diśaḥ kurvan dehachāyāndhakāritāḥ /</l>
<l>jvālāmukho mahāraudradarśano brahmarākṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.116'>
<lg>
