<l>jvalan-netro diśaḥ kurvan deha-chāyā-andha-kāritāḥ /</l>
<l>jvālā-mukho mahā-raudra-darśano brahma-rākṣasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.117' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tataś candrāvalokas taṃ dṛṣṭvā prahvo 'bravīn nṛpaḥ /</l>
<l>naropahāro bhagavann ānītaḥ sa mayā tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.117'>
<lg>
<l>tataś candrāvalokas taṃ dṛṣṭvā prahvo 'bravīn nṛ-paḥ /</l>
<l>nara-upahāro bhagavann ānītaḥ sa mayā tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.118' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>saptamo divasaś cādya pratijñātasya so 'sya te /</l>
<l>tat prasīda gṛhāṇaitam upahāraṃ yathāvidhi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.118'>
<lg>
<l>saptamo divasaś ca adya pratijñātasya so 'sya te /</l>
<l>tat prasīda gṛhāṇa etam upahāraṃ yathā-vidhi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.119' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti rāñjārthito viprakumāraṃ brahmarākṣasaḥ /</l>
<l>sa tam ālokayāmāsa jihvayā sṛkkiṇī lihan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.119'>
<lg>
<l>iti rāñja ārthito vipra-kumāraṃ brahma-rākṣasaḥ /</l>
<l>sa tam ālokayāmāsa jihvayā sṛkkiṇī lihan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.120' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ sa mahāsattvo bālo hṛṣyann acintayat /</l>
<l>svadehadānenānena sukṛtaṃ yan mayārjitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.120'>
<lg>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ sa mahā-sattvo bālo hṛṣyann acintayat /</l>
<l>sva-deha-dānena anena su-kṛtaṃ yan maya ārjitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.121' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tena mā bhūn mama svargo mokṣo vā niḥupakriyaḥ /</l>
<l>bhūyāt tu me parārthāya deho janmani janmani //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.121'>
<lg>
<l>tena mā bhūn mama svargo mokṣo vā niḥ-upakriyaḥ /</l>
<l>bhūyāt tu me para-arthāya deho janmani janmani //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.122' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti saṃkalpayaty eva tasminn āpūryata kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>vimānaiḥ surasaṃghānāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭimucāṃ nabhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.122'>
<lg>
<l>iti saṃkalpayaty eva tasminn āpūryata kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>vimānaiḥ sura-saṃghānāṃ puṣpa-vṛṣṭi-mucāṃ nabhaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.123' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>athāgre prāpitaṃ tasya bālaṃ taṃ brahmarakṣasaḥ /</l>
<l>mātā jagrāha karayoḥ pitā caraṇayos tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.123'>
<lg>
<l>atha agre prāpitaṃ tasya bālaṃ taṃ brahma-rakṣasaḥ /</l>
<l>mātā jagrāha karayoḥ pitā caraṇayos tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.124' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tato yāvat tam ākṛṣṭakhaḍgo rājā jighāṃsati /</l>
<l>tāvaj jahāsa sa śiśus tathā sarve 'tra te yathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.124'>
<lg>
<l>tato yāvat tam ākṛṣṭa-khaḍgo rājā jighāṃsati /</l>
<l>tāvaj jahāsa sa śiśus tathā sarve 'tra te yathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.125' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>sabrahmarākṣasās tyaktvā svaṃ svaṃ karma savismayāḥ /</l>
<l>racitāñjalayaḥ prahvās tanmukhaprekṣiṇo 'bhavan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.125'>
<lg>
<l>sa-brahma-rākṣasās tyaktvā svaṃ svaṃ karma sa-vismayāḥ /</l>
<l>racita-añjalayaḥ prahvās tan-mukha-prekṣiṇo 'bhavan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.126' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti vyākhyāya vetālo vicitrasarasāṃ kathām /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramasenaṃ sa nijagāda nṛpaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.126'>
<lg>
<l>iti vyākhyāya vetālo vicitra-sa-rasāṃ kathām /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramasenaṃ sa nijagāda nṛ-paṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.127' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tad brūhi rājan ko hetur yat tena hasitaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>bālenaitādṛśe 'py asmin prāṇāntasamaye 'py aho //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.127'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūhi rājan ko hetur yat tena hasitaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>bālena etādṛśe 'py asmin prāṇa-anta-samaye 'py aho //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.128' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>kautukaṃ ca mahan me 'tra tad etac cen na vakṣyasi /</l>
<l>jānāno 'pi tato mūrdhā śatadhā te sphuṭiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.128'>
<lg>
<l>kautukaṃ ca mahan me 'tra tad etac cen na vakṣyasi /</l>
<l>jānāno 'pi tato mūrdhā śatadhā te sphuṭiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.129' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā sa rājā pratyuvāca tam /</l>
<l>śṛṇu yo 'bhūd abhiprāyo hāse tasya śiśos tadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.129'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā sa rājā pratyuvāca tam /</l>
<l>śṛṇu yo 'bhūd abhiprāyo hāse tasya śiśos tadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.130' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>yo nāma duḥbalo jantuḥ sa bhaye pratyupasthite /</l>
<l>krandati prāṇahetoḥ svaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.130'>
<lg>
<l>yo nāma duḥ-balo jantuḥ sa bhaye pratyupasthite /</l>
<l>krandati prāṇa-hetoḥ svaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.131' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tadvyapāye ca rājānam ārtatrāṇāya nirmitam /</l>
<l>tadalābhe 'pi yady atra yathāsaṃbhavi daivatam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.131'>
<lg>
<l>tad-vyapāye ca rājānam ārta-trāṇāya nirmitam /</l>
<l>tad-alābhe 'pi yady atra yathā-saṃbhavi daivatam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.132' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>tasya tv ekastham apy etat sarvaṃ saṃjātam anyathā /</l>
<l>pitṛbhyāṃ hastapādaṃ hi ruddhaṃ tasyārthatṛṣṇayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.132'>
<lg>
<l>tasya tv eka-stham apy etat sarvaṃ saṃjātam anyathā /</l>
<l>pitṛbhyāṃ hasta-pādaṃ hi ruddhaṃ tasya artha-tṛṣṇayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.133' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>rājā ca trātum ātmānaṃ svayaṃ taṃ hantum udyataḥ /</l>
<l>daivataṃ tatra yad brahmarakṣas tat tasya bhakṣakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.133'>
<lg>
<l>rājā ca trātum ātmānaṃ svayaṃ taṃ hantum udyataḥ /</l>
<l>daivataṃ tatra yad brahma-rakṣas tat tasya bhakṣakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.134' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>adhruvasyāntavirasasyādhivyādhikṣatasya ca /</l>
<l>dehasyārthe vimūḍhānāṃ teṣām īdṛg viḍambanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.134'>
<lg>
<l>adhruvasya anta-virasasya adhivyādhi-kṣatasya ca /</l>
<l>dehasya arthe vimūḍhānāṃ teṣām īdṛg viḍambanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.135' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>brahmendraviṣṇurudrādyā yatrāvaśyaṃ vināśinaḥ /</l>
<l>tatraiṣām īdṛśī kāpi śarīrasthairyavāsanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.135'>
<lg>
<l>brahmā-indra-viṣṇu-rudra-ādyā yatra avaśyaṃ vināśinaḥ /</l>
<l>tatra eṣām īdṛśī ka āpi śarīra-sthai-rya-vāsanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.136' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>etat tan mohavaicitryaṃ dṛṣṭvā matvā ca vāñchitam /</l>
<l>siddham āścaryaharṣābhyāṃ sa jahāsa dvijārbhākaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.136'>
<lg>
<l>etat tan moha-vaicitryaṃ dṛṣṭvā matvā ca vāñchitam /</l>
<l>siddham āścarya-harṣābhyāṃ sa jahāsa dvija-arbhākaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.27.137' corresp='Vet_20'>
<l>ity uktvā viratasya tasya nṛpater aṃsāt sa bhūyo 'pi tad vetālo jhagiti svakaṃ padam agād antarhito māyayā /</l>
<l>rājā so 'py avikalpam eva punar apy anvag yayau taṃ javād akṣobhyaṃ hṛdayaṃ bateha mahatām ambhaḥnidhīnām iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.27.137'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā viratasya tasya nṛ-pater aṃsāt sa bhūyo 'pi tad vetālo jhagiti svakaṃ padam agād antarhito māyayā /</l>
<l>rājā so 'py avikalpam eva punar apy anvag yayau taṃ javād a-kṣobhyaṃ hṛdayaṃ bata iha mahatām ambhaḥ-nidhīnām iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.1' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapātas tato 'grahīt /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'ṃse vetālaṃ taṃ narādhipaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.1'>
<lg>
<l>atha gatvā punaḥ prāpya śiṃśapātas tato 'grahīt /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'ṃse vetālaṃ taṃ nara-adhipaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.2' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyaḥ sa vetālo 'bravīn nṛpam /</l>
<l>rājann udgāḍhakandarpāṃ śṛṇv ekāṃ vacmi te kathām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.2'>
<lg>
<l>āgacchantaṃ ca taṃ bhūyaḥ sa vetālo 'bravīn nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>rājann udgāḍha-kandarpāṃ śṛṇv ekāṃ vacmi te kathām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.3' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>asti śakrapurīvānyā dhātrā sukṛtināṃ kṛte /</l>
<l>divaś cyutānāṃ vihitā viśālākhyā purī bhūvi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.3'>
<lg>
<l>asti śakra-puri īva anyā dhātrā su-kṛtināṃ kṛte /</l>
<l>divaś cyutānāṃ vihitā viśālā-ākhyā purī bhūvi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.4' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tasyāṃ babhūva nṛpatiḥ padmanābha iti śrutaḥ /</l>
<l>saccakranandakaḥ srīmān ākrāntabalirājakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.4'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ babhūva nṛ-patiḥ padmanābha iti śrutaḥ /</l>
<l>sac-cakra-nandakaḥ srīmān ākrānta-bali-rājakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.5' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tasmin pṛthvīpatau tasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sumahāvaṇik /</l>
<l>arthadattābhidhāno 'bhūd dhanair vijitavittapaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin pṛthvī-patau tasyāṃ nagaryāṃ su-mahā-vaṇik /</l>
<l>arthadatta-abhidhāno 'bhūd dhanair vijita-vittapaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.6' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tasyaikā ca sutānaṅgamañjarīty udapadyata /</l>
<l>svaḥsundarīpratikṛtir bhuvi dhātreva darśitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.6'>
<lg>
<l>tasya ekā ca suta ānaṅgamañjari īty udapadyata /</l>
<l>svaḥ-sundarī-pratikṛtir bhuvi dhātra īva darśitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.7' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>dattā ca tena vaṇijā vaṇigvarasutāya sā /</l>
<l>maṇivarmābhidhānāya tāmraliptīnivāsine //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.7'>
<lg>
<l>dattā ca tena vaṇijā vaṇig-vara-sutāya sā /</l>
<l>maṇivarma-abhidhānāya tāmraliptī-nivāsine //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.8' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ekāpatyatayā cātivatsalaḥ sa na tāṃ vaṇik /</l>
<l>bhartṛyuktāṃ sutāṃ gehāt tatyājānaṅgamañjarīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.8'>
<lg>
<l>ekā-patyatayā ca ati-vatsalaḥ sa na tāṃ vaṇik /</l>
<l>bhartṛ-yuktāṃ sutāṃ gehāt tatyāja anaṅgamañjarīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.9' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tasyāś cānaṅgamañjaryāḥ patir dveṣyo babhūva saḥ /</l>
<l>maṇivarmā sarogasya kaṭutiktam ivauṣadham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.9'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāś ca anaṅgamañjaryāḥ patir dveṣyo babhūva saḥ /</l>
<l>maṇivarmā sa-rogasya kaṭu-tiktam ivā oṣadham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.10' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>patyus tu sāsya sumukhī jīvitād apy abhūt priyā /</l>
<l>dhanaṛddhiḥ kṛpaṇasyeva kṛcchrāt sucirasaṃcitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.10'>
<lg>
<l>patyus tu sa āsya su-mukhī jīvitād apy abhūt priyā /</l>
<l>dhana-ṛddhiḥ kṛpaṇasya iva kṛcchrāt su-cira-saṃcitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.11' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ekadā cāntikaṃ pitros tāmraliptīṃ nijaṃ gṛham /</l>
<l>utkaṇṭhādinimittena maṇivarmā jagāma saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.11'>
<lg>
<l>ekadā ca antikaṃ pitros tāmraliptīṃ nijaṃ gṛham /</l>
<l>utkaṇṭha-ādi-nimittena maṇivarmā jagāma saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.12' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tato dineṣu yāteṣu tīkṣṇasūryāṃśusāyakaiḥ /</l>
<l>proṣitānāṃ niruddhādhvā gharmakāla ihābhyagāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.12'>
<lg>
<l>tato dineṣu yāteṣu tīkṣṇa-sūrya-aṃśu-sāyakaiḥ /</l>
<l>proṣitānāṃ niruddha-adhvā gharma-kāla iha abhyagāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.13' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>vasantavirahād uṣṇā niḥśvāsāḥ kakubhām iva /</l>
<l>mallikāpāṭalāmodamedurā maruto vavuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.13'>
<lg>
<l>vasanta-virahād uṣṇā niḥśvāsāḥ kakubhām iva /</l>
<l>mallikā-pāṭalā-āmoda-medurā maruto vavuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.14' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>utpetuḥ pavanoddhūtā gagane reṇurājayaḥ /</l>
<l>dūtyo ghanāgamāyeva prahitās taptayā bhuvā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.14'>
<lg>
<l>utpetuḥ pavana-uddhūtā gagane reṇu-rājayaḥ /</l>
<l>dūtyo ghana-āgamāya iva prahitās taptayā bhuvā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.15' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ākāṅkṣitataruchāyāḥ kaṭhorātapatāpitāḥ /</l>
<l>pathikā iva yānti sma cireṇa divasā api //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.15'>
<lg>
<l>ākāṅkṣita-taru-chāyāḥ kaṭhora-ātapa-tāpitāḥ /</l>
<l>pathikā iva yānti sma cireṇa divasā api //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.16' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>candrāṃśupāṇḍurucayo gāḍhāśleṣasukhapradam /</l>
<l>vinā hemantam agamann atidurbalatāṃ niśāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.16'>
<lg>
<l>candra-aṃśu-pāṇḍu-rucayo gāḍha-āśleṣa-sukha-pradam /</l>
<l>vinā hemantam agamann ati-durbalatāṃ niśāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.17' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tatkālaṃ candanālepadhavalā sā vaṇiksutā /</l>
<l>saṃvītatanukauśeyaśobhitānaṅgamañjarī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.17'>
<lg>
<l>tat-kālaṃ candana-ālepa-dhavalā sā vaṇik-sutā /</l>
<l>saṃvīta-tanu-kauśeya-śobhita ānaṅgamañjarī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.18' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>dadarśa svagṛhottuṅgavātāyanagataikadā /</l>
<l>āptasakhyā yutā bhavyaṃ yuvānaṃ vipraputrakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.18'>
<lg>
<l>dadarśa sva-gṛha-uttuṅga-vāta-ayana-gata aikadā /</l>
<l>āpta-sakhyā yutā bhavyaṃ yuvānaṃ vipra-putrakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.19' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>saṃcarantaṃ ratiprāptyai navotpannam iva smaram /</l>
<l>kamalākaranāmānaṃ putraṃ rājapuraḥdhasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.19'>
<lg>
<l>saṃcarantaṃ rati-prāptyai nava-utpannam iva smaram /</l>
<l>kamalākara-nāmānaṃ putraṃ rāja-puraḥ-dhasaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.20' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>so 'pīndor iva mūrtiṃ tāṃ kāntāṃ dṛṣṭvopari sthitām /</l>
<l>kumudākaratāṃ bheje sānandaḥ kamalākaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.20'>
<lg>
<l>so 'pi indor iva mūrtiṃ tāṃ kāntāṃ dṛṣṭva ūpari sthitām /</l>
<l>kumuda-ākaratāṃ bheje sa-ānandaḥ kamalākaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.21' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tayor abhūd amūlyaṃ tan manaḥsaṃvananaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>smaragurvājñayā yūnor anyao'nyasyāvalokanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.21'>
<lg>
<l>tayor abhūd a-mūlyaṃ tan manaḥ-saṃvananaṃ tadā /</l>
<l>smara-gurv-ājñayā yūnor anyao'nyasya avalokanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.22' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>unmūlitahriyau tau ca dūravikṣiptacetasā /</l>
<l>rajo'bhibhūtau jahrāte manmathāvegavātyayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.22'>
<lg>
<l>unmūlita-hriyau tau ca dūra-vikṣipta-cetasā /</l>
<l>rajo'bhibhūtau jahrāte manmatha-āvega-vātyayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.23' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca madanāviṣṭaḥ sakhyā sa kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>sahasthitena nīto 'bhūt kathamcid bhavanaṃ nijam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.23'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca madana-āviṣṭaḥ sakhyā sa kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>saha-sthitena nīto 'bhūt katham-cid bhavanaṃ nijam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.24' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>sāpi taṃ nāmato 'nviṣya vivaśānaṅgamañjarī /</l>
<l>tayā svayā samaṃ sakhyā prāviśad vāsakaṃ śanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.24'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi taṃ nāmato 'nviṣya vivaśa ānaṅgamañjarī /</l>
<l>tayā svayā samaṃ sakhyā prāviśad vāsakaṃ śanaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.25' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tatra saṃcintayantī ca kāntaṃ kāmajvarāturā /</l>
<l>nāpaśyan nāśṛṇot kimcil luṭhantī śayanīyake //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.25'>
<lg>
<l>tatra saṃcintayantī ca kāntaṃ kāma-jvara-āturā /</l>
<l>na apaśyan na aśṛṇot kim-cil luṭhantī śayanīyake //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.26' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>gateṣv ahaḥsu dvitreṣu satrapā sabhayā ca sā /</l>
<l>asahā virahonmādaṃ visoḍhuṃ kṛśapāṇḍurā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.26'>
<lg>
<l>gateṣv ahaḥsu dvi-treṣu sa-trapā sa-bhayā ca sā /</l>
<l>a-sahā viraha-unmādaṃ visoḍhuṃ kṛśa-pāṇḍurā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.27' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>duḥprāpapriyasaṃyoganiḥāsthā naktam ekadā /</l>
<l>gavākṣapreritakareṇākṛṣṭeva himāṃśunā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.27'>
<lg>
<l>duḥ-prāpa-priya-saṃyoga-niḥ-āsthā naktam ekadā /</l>
<l>gava-akṣa-prerita-kareṇā akṛṣṭa īva hima-aṃśunā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.28' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>supte parijane svairaṃ nirgatya maraṇonmukhī /</l>
<l>jagāma svagṛhodyānavāpīṃ tarulatāvṛtām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.28'>
<lg>
<l>supte parijane svairaṃ nirgatya maraṇa-unmukhī /</l>
<l>jagāma sva-gṛha-udyāna-vāpīṃ taru-latā-vṛtām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.29' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tatra pitrā kṛtodārapratiṣṭhāṃ kuladevatām /</l>
<l>upetya caṇḍikāṃ devīṃ natvā stutvā vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.29'>
<lg>
<l>tatra pitrā kṛta-udāra-pratiṣṭhāṃ kula-devatām /</l>
<l>upetya caṇḍikāṃ devīṃ natvā stutvā vyajijñapat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.30' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>asmiñ janmani ced bhartā na mayā kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>prāptas tad devi bhūyān me so 'nyasminn api janmani //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.30'>
<lg>
<l>asmiñ janmani ced bhartā na mayā kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>prāptas tad devi bhūyān me so 'nyasminn api janmani //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.31' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ity uktvā puratas tasyā devyāḥ sāśokapādape /</l>
<l>pāśaṃ viracayāmāsa svottarīyeṇa rāgiṇī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.31'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā puratas tasyā devyāḥ sa āśoka-pāda-pe /</l>
<l>pāśaṃ viracayāmāsa sva-uttarīyeṇa rāgiṇī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.32' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tāvad āptā sakhī tasyāḥ sā prabudhyātra vāsake /</l>
<l>tām adṛṣṭvā tad udyānaṃ daivād āgād vicinvatī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.32'>
<lg>
<l>tāvad āptā sakhī tasyāḥ sā prabudhya atra vāsake /</l>
<l>tām a-dṛṣṭvā tad udyānaṃ daivād āgād vicinvatī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.33' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ pāśam arpayantīṃ tathā gale /</l>
<l>mā mety uktvā pradhāvyaiva pāśaṃ tasyāh tam acchinat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.33'>
<lg>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ pāśam arpayantīṃ tathā gale /</l>
<l>mā ma īty uktvā pradhāvya eva pāśaṃ tasyāh tam acchinat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.34' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>sāpi tāṃ vīkṣya saṃprāptāṃ kṛttapāśāṃ nijāṃ sakhīm /</l>
<l>anaṅgamañjarī bhūmau papātādhikaduḥkhitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.34'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi tāṃ vīkṣya saṃprāptāṃ kṛtta-pāśāṃ nijāṃ sakhīm /</l>
<l>anaṅgamañjarī bhūmau papāta adhika-duḥkhitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.35' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>āśvāsitā svasakhyā ca tayā pṛṣṭā ca sā kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>duḥkhahetuṃ samākhyāya puna enām abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.35'>
<lg>
<l>āśvāsitā sva-sakhyā ca tayā pṛṣṭā ca sā kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>duḥkha-hetuṃ samākhyāya puna enām abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.36' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>sakhi mālatike tan me duḥlabhe priyasaṃgame /</l>
<l>gurvādiparatantrāyā na sukhaṃ maraṇāt param //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.36'>
<lg>
<l>sakhi mālatike tan me duḥ-labhe priya-saṃgame /</l>
<l>gurv-ādi-para-tantrāyā na sukhaṃ maraṇāt param //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.37' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>iti bruvāṇaivānaṅgaśarāgnijvalitā bhṛśam /</l>
<l>sānaṅgamañjarī mohaṃ yayau nairāśyaniḥsahā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.37'>
<lg>
<l>iti bruvāṇa aiva anaṅga-śara-agni-jvalitā bhṛśam /</l>
<l>sa ānaṅgamañjarī mohaṃ yayau nairāśya-niḥ-sahā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.38' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ smarājñā duḥlaṅghyā yayā nītā daśām imām /</l>
<l>anyā-vinītavanitāhāsinīyaṃ sakhī mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.38'>
<lg>
<l>kaṣṭaṃ smara-ājñā duḥ-laṅghyā yayā nītā daśām imām /</l>
<l>anya-a-vinīta-vanitā-hāsini īyaṃ sakhī mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.39' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ityādivilapantī ca tāṃ sā mālatikā sakhī /</l>
<l>śanair āśvāsayāmāsa śītāmbupavanādibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.39'>
<lg>
<l>ity-ādi-vilapantī ca tāṃ sā mālatikā sakhī /</l>
<l>śanair āśvāsayāmāsa śīta-ambu-pavana-ādibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.40' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tāpopaśāntaye cāsyāś cakāra nalinīdalaiḥ /</l>
<l>śayyāṃ dadau ca hṛdaye hāraṃ tuhinaśītalam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.40'>
<lg>
<l>tāpa-upaśāntaye ca asyāś cakāra nalinī-dalaiḥ /</l>
<l>śayyāṃ dadau ca hṛdaye hāraṃ tuhina-śītalam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.41' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tataḥ sāśrur uvācaitāṃ sakhīṃ sānaṅgamañjarī /</l>
<l>sakhi hārādibhir nāyaṃ dāho 'nto mama śāmyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.41'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sa-aśrur uvāca etāṃ sakhīṃ sa ānaṅgamañjarī /</l>
<l>sakhi hāra-ādibhir na ayaṃ dāho 'nto mama śāmyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.42' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>yena praśāmyati punaḥ svabuddhyaiva vidhatsva tat /</l>
<l>māṃ saṃyojaya kāntena jīvitaṃ me yadīcchasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.42'>
<lg>
<l>yena praśāmyati punaḥ sva-buddhya aiva vidhatsva tat /</l>
<l>māṃ saṃyojaya kāntena jīvitaṃ me yadi icchasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.43' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ sā snehān mālatikābravīt /</l>
<l>sakhi bhūyiṣṭayātādya rātriḥ prātar ahaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.43'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktavatīṃ tāṃ sā snehān mālatika ābravīt /</l>
<l>sakhi bhūyiṣṭayāta ādya rātriḥ prātar ahaṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.44' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ihaiva kṛtasaṃketam āneṣyāmi priyaṃ tava /</l>
<l>tad ālambya dhṛtiṃ tāvan nijaṃ praviśa mandiram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.44'>
<lg>
<l>iha eva kṛta-saṃketam āneṣyāmi priyaṃ tava /</l>
<l>tad ālambya dhṛtiṃ tāvan nijaṃ praviśa mandiram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.45' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ityuktavatyai saṃtuṣya tasyai sānaṅgamañjarī /</l>
<l>hāraṃ svakaṇṭhād ākṛṣya pradadau pāritoṣikam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.45'>
<lg>
<l>ity-uktavatyai saṃtuṣya tasyai sa ānaṅgamañjarī /</l>
<l>hāraṃ sva-kaṇṭhād ākṛṣya pradadau pāritoṣikam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.46' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>gacchādhunaiva svagṛhaṃ prātaḥ siddhyai tato vraja /</l>
<l>iti caitāṃ sakhīṃ preṣya sā viveśa svavāsakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.46'>
<lg>
<l>gaccha adhuna aiva sva-gṛhaṃ prātaḥ siddhyai tato vraja /</l>
<l>iti ca etāṃ sakhīṃ preṣya sā viveśa sva-vāsakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.47' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>prātaś ca sā mālatikā kenāpy anupalakṣitā /</l>
<l>tatsakhī tasya kamalākarasya bhavanaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.47'>
<lg>
<l>prātaś ca sā mālatikā kena-apy an-upalakṣitā /</l>
<l>tat-sakhī tasya kamalākarasya bhavanaṃ yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.48' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>cinvatī tatra codyāne tarumūle dadarśa tam /</l>
<l>candanārdrāmburuhiṇīpattraśayyāvivartinam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.48'>
<lg>
<l>cinvatī tatra ca udyāne taru-mūle dadarśa tam /</l>
<l>candana-ārdra-ambu-ruhiṇī-pattra-śayyā-vivartinam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.49' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>rahasyadhāriṇaikena kadalīdalamārutaiḥ /</l>
<l>āśvāsyamānaṃ suhṛdā dahyamānaṃ smarāgninā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.49'>
<lg>
<l>rahasya-dhāriṇa aikena kadalī-dala-mārutaiḥ /</l>
<l>āśvāsyamānaṃ suhṛdā dahyamānaṃ smara-agninā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.50' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tasyā vineyam asya syāt kāmāvasthedṛśīti sā /</l>
<l>vicintya tasthau pracchannā jñātuṃ tatra viniścayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.50'>
<lg>
<l>tasyā vina īyam asya syāt kāma-avasthā-īdṛśi īti sā /</l>
<l>vicintya tasthau pracchannā jñātuṃ tatra viniścayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.51' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tāvac ca suhṛdā tena sa ūce kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>kṣaṇam ekam ihodyāne dattvā dṛṣṭiṃ manaḥrame //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.51'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca suhṛdā tena sa ūce kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>kṣaṇam ekam iha udyāne dattvā dṛṣṭiṃ manaḥ-rame //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.52' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>vinodaya mano mitra mātra viklavatām agāḥ /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā taṃ svasuhṛdaṃ vipraputro jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.52'>
<lg>
<l>vinodaya mano mitra ma ātra viklavatām agāḥ /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā taṃ sva-suhṛdaṃ vipra-putro jagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.53' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>yan mamānaṅgamañjaryā vaṇikputryā tayā hṛtam /</l>
<l>vinodayāmi tad idaṃ kutaḥ śūnyāśayo manaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.53'>
<lg>
<l>yan mama anaṅgamañjaryā vaṇik-putryā tayā hṛtam /</l>
<l>vinodayāmi tad idaṃ kutaḥ śūnya-āśayo manaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.54' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>smareṇa śūnyahṛdayo bāṇatūṇīkṛto hy aham /</l>
<l>tat prāpsyāmi manaḥcaurīṃ tāṃ yathā kuru me tathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.54'>
<lg>
<l>smareṇa śūnya-hṛdayo bāṇa-tūṇī-kṛto hy aham /</l>
<l>tat prāpsyāmi manaḥ-caurīṃ tāṃ yathā kuru me tathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.55' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ity ukte vipraputreṇa tenātmānaṃ pradarśya sā /</l>
<l>hṛṣṭā mālatikābhyetya tam uvācāstasaṃśayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.55'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte vipra-putreṇa tenā atmānaṃ pradarśya sā /</l>
<l>hṛṣṭā mālatika ābhyetya tam uvāca asta-saṃśayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.56' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tavāsmy anaṅgamañjaryā subhaga prahitāntikam /</l>
<l>saṃdeśaṃ cāham evaiṣā vispaṣṭārthaṃ bravīmi te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.56'>
<lg>
<l>tava asmy anaṅgamañjaryā su-bhaga prahita āntikam /</l>
<l>saṃdeśaṃ ca aham eva eṣā vispaṣṭa-arthaṃ bravīmi te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.57' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>eṣa kaḥ śiṣṭadharmo yat praviśya hṛdayaṃ haṭhāt /</l>
<l>mano muṣitvā mugdhāyā gamyate sthagitātmanā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.57'>
<lg>
<l>eṣa kaḥ śiṣṭa-dharmo yat praviśya hṛdayaṃ haṭhāt /</l>
<l>mano muṣitvā mugdhāyā gamyate sthagita-ātmanā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.58' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>citraṃ ca yad vāmadṛśā tubhyam eva tayādhunā /</l>
<l>manaḥharāya deho 'pi dātuṃ prāṇaiḥ saheṣyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.58'>
<lg>
<l>citraṃ ca yad vāma-dṛśā tubhyam eva taya ādhunā /</l>
<l>manaḥ-harāya deho 'pi dātuṃ prāṇaiḥ sahā iṣyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.59' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>niḥśvāsān sā hi saṃtaptān vimuñcati divāniśam /</l>
<l>jvalato hṛdi kandarpavahner dhūmodgamān iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.59'>
<lg>
<l>niḥśvāsān sā hi saṃtaptān vimuñcati divā-niśam /</l>
<l>jvalato hṛdi kandarpa-vahner dhūma-udgamān iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.60' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>saṃpatanti muhuś cāsyāḥ sāñjanā bāṣpabindavaḥ /</l>
<l>vadanāmbhaḥjasaugandhyalubdhā madhukarā iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.60'>
<lg>
<l>saṃpatanti muhuś ca asyāḥ sa-añjanā bāṣpa-bindavaḥ /</l>
<l>vadana-ambhaḥ-ja-saugandhya-lubdhā madhu-karā iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.61' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tad yadīcchasi tad vacmi śivaṃ vām ubhayor aham /</l>
<l>ity ukto mālatikayā so 'bravīt kamalākaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.61'>
<lg>
<l>tad yadi icchasi tad vacmi śivaṃ vām ubhayor aham /</l>
<l>ity ukto mālatikayā so 'bravīt kamalākaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.62' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>bhadre bhayaṃ karoty eṣā vāk tavāśvāsayaty api /</l>
<l>vadantī vidhurāvasthāṃ baddhabhāvāṃ ca me priyām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.62'>
<lg>
<l>bhadre bhayaṃ karoty eṣā vāk tavā aśvāsayaty api /</l>
<l>vadantī vidhura-avasthāṃ baddha-bhāvāṃ ca me priyām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.63' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tad ekā gatir atra tvaṃ yathā vetsi tathā kuru /</l>
<l>ityuktavākye kamalākare mālatikābravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.63'>
<lg>
<l>tad ekā gatir atra tvaṃ yathā vetsi tathā kuru /</l>
<l>ity-ukta-vākye kamalāk-are mālatika ābravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.64' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>anaṅgamañjarīm adya guptaṃ tāṃ prāpayāmy aham /</l>
<l>naktaṃ svabhavanodyānaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhes tatra bāhyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.64'>
<lg>
<l>anaṅgamañjarīm adya guptaṃ tāṃ prāpayāmy aham /</l>
<l>naktaṃ sva-bhavana-udyānaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhes tatra bāhyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.65' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tataḥ praveśayiṣyāmi tvām atrāntaḥ svayuktitaḥ /</l>
<l>evaṃ yatheṣṭo yuvayor bhaviṣyati samāgamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.65'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ praveśayiṣyāmi tvām atra antaḥ sva-yuktitaḥ /</l>
<l>evaṃ yathā-iṣṭo yuvayor bhaviṣyati samāgamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.66' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ity uktvānandya taṃ vipraputraṃ mālatikā tataḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā kṛtārthā sānaṅgamañjarīm apy anandayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.66'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā ānandya taṃ vipra-putraṃ mālatikā tataḥ /</l>
<l>gatvā kṛta-arthā sa ānaṅgamañjarīm apy anandayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.67' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>athāhnā saha yāte 'rke kvāpi saṃdhyānurāgiṇi /</l>
<l>aindryā diśendutilakenānane suprasādhite //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.67'>
<lg>
<l>atha ahnā saha yāte 'rke kva-api saṃdhyā-anurāgiṇi /</l>
<l>aindryā diśa īndu-tilakenā anane su-prasādhite //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.68' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tyaktapadmākarā prāptā śrīr mayetīva harṣataḥ /</l>
<l>hasaty uphullavadane viśade kumudākare //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.68'>
<lg>
<l>tyakta-padma-ākarā prāptā śrīr maya īti iva harṣataḥ /</l>
<l>hasaty uphulla-vadane viśade kumuda-ākare //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.69' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>kṛtaprasādhanaḥ sotkaḥ svairaṃ sa kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>kāmī kāntāgṛhodyānadvārabāhyam upāgamat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.69'>
<lg>
<l>kṛta-prasādhanaḥ sa-utkaḥ svairaṃ sa kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>kāmī kāntā-gṛha-udyāna-dvāra-bāhyam upāgamat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.70' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tāvac ca sā mālatikā tāṃ yuktyānaṅgamañjarīm /</l>
<l>ānināya tad udyānaṃ kṛcchrād gamitavāsarām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.70'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca sā mālatikā tāṃ yuktya ānaṅgamañjarīm /</l>
<l>ānināya tad udyānaṃ kṛcchrād gamita-vāsarām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.71' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>upaveśya ca tāṃ madhye gulmake cūtaśākhinām /</l>
<l>prāveśayat taṃ nirgatya tatraiva kamalākaram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.71'>
<lg>
<l>upaveśya ca tāṃ madhye gulmake cūta-śākhinām /</l>
<l>prāveśayat taṃ nirgatya tatra eva kamalākaram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.72' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>sa ca praviśya pattraughaghanapādapamadhyagām /</l>
<l>tām adhvaga iva chāyāṃ dadarśānaṅgamañjarīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.72'>
<lg>
<l>sa ca praviśya pattra-ogha-ghana-pāda-pa-madhya-gām /</l>
<l>tām adhva-ga iva chāyāṃ dadarśa anaṅgamañjarīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.73' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>upaiti yāvac ca sa tāṃ tāvad dṛṣṭvā pradhāvya sā /</l>
<l>kāmavegahṛtavrīḍā kaṇṭhe taṃ sahasāgrahīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.73'>
<lg>
<l>upaiti yāvac ca sa tāṃ tāvad dṛṣṭvā pradhāvya sā /</l>
<l>kāma-vega-hṛta-vrīḍā kaṇṭhe taṃ sahasa āgrahīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.74' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>kva yāsi labdho 'si mamety ālapantī ca tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>sātiharṣabharastabdhaniḥśvāsā pañcatām agāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.74'>
<lg>
<l>kva yāsi labdho 'si mama ity ālapantī ca tat kṣaṇam /</l>
<l>sa āti-harṣa-bhara-stabdha-niḥśvāsā pañcatām agāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.75' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>papāta ca mahīpṛṣṭhe vātarugṇā lateva sā /</l>
<l>vicitro bata kāmasya vipākaviṣamaḥ kramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.75'>
<lg>
<l>papāta ca mahī-pṛṣṭhe vāta-rugṇā lata īva sā /</l>
<l>vicitro bata kāmasya vipāka-viṣamaḥ kramaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.76' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvāśanipātograṃ sadyaḥ sa kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>hā hā kim etad ity uktvā mūrcchito nyapatad bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.76'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭva āśani-pāta-ugraṃ sadyaḥ sa kamalākaraḥ /</l>
<l>hā hā kim etad ity uktvā mūrcchito nyapatad bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.77' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>labdhasaṃjñaḥ kṣaṇenātha tām aṅkāropitāṃ priyām /</l>
<l>āliṅgan paricumbaṃś ca tat tac ca vilapan bahu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.77'>
<lg>
<l>labdha-saṃjñaḥ kṣaṇena atha tām aṅka-āropitāṃ priyām /</l>
<l>āliṅgan paricumbaṃś ca tat tac ca vilapan bahu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.78' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tathā dukhātibhāreṇa sa prasahya nipīḍitaḥ /</l>
<l>yathā tasya ṭasatkṛtya kṣaṇād dhṛdayam asphuṭat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.78'>
<lg>
<l>tathā dukha-ati-bhāreṇa sa prasahya nipīḍitaḥ /</l>
<l>yathā tasya ṭasat-kṛtya kṣaṇād dhṛdayam asphuṭat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.79' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>atha tau mālatikayā śocyamānāv ubhāv api /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā prāptakṣayau śokād iva kṣīṇābhavat kṣapā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.79'>
<lg>
<l>atha tau mālatikayā śocyamānāv ubhāv api /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvā prāpta-kṣayau śokād iva kṣīṇa ābhavat kṣapā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.80' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>prāta udyānapālebhyo jñātvā bandhujanas tayoḥ /</l>
<l>tatrāyayau trapāścaryaduḥkhamohākulīkṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.80'>
<lg>
<l>prāta udyāna-pālebhyo jñātvā bandhu-janas tayoḥ /</l>
<l>tatrā ayayau trapā-āścarya-duḥkha-moha-ākulī-kṛtaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.81' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>āsīt kartavyatāmūḍhaś ciraṃ khedād avāṅmukhaḥ /</l>
<l>kaṣṭāḥ kulakhalīkārahetavo bata kustriyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.81'>
<lg>
<l>āsīt kartavyatā-mūḍhaś ciraṃ khedād avāṅ-mukhaḥ /</l>
<l>kaṣṭāḥ kula-khalī-kāra-hetavo bata ku-striyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.82' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tāvac ca tāmraliptītaḥ sa tasyāḥ patir āgamat /</l>
<l>sotkaṇṭho 'naṅgamañjaryā maṇivarmā pitur gṛhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.82'>
<lg>
<l>tāvac ca tāmraliptītaḥ sa tasyāḥ patir āgamat /</l>
<l>sa-utkaṇṭho 'naṅgamañjaryā maṇivarmā pitur gṛhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.83' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>sa śvāśuraṃ gṛhaṃ prāpya yathātattvam avetya tat /</l>
<l>bāṣpāndhalocano dhyāyaṃs tad evodyānam āyayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.83'>
<lg>
<l>sa śvāśuraṃ gṛhaṃ prāpya yathā-tattvam avetya tat /</l>
<l>bāṣpa-andha-locano dhyāyaṃs tad eva udyānam āyayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.84' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tatra bhāryāṃ gatāsuṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭvānyasahitām api /</l>
<l>śokāgnijvalito rāgī sadyaḥ so 'pi jahāv asūn //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.84'>
<lg>
<l>tatra bhāryāṃ gata-asuṃ tāṃ dṛṣṭva ānya-sahitām api /</l>
<l>śoka-agni-jvalito rāgī sadyaḥ so 'pi jahāv asūn //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.85' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tataḥ krandati tatrasthe jane kolāhalākulāḥ /</l>
<l>āyayur jñātavṛttāntāḥ paurāḥ sarve 'tra vismitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.85'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ krandati tatra-sthe jane kolāhala-ākulāḥ /</l>
<l>āyayur jñāta-vṛtta-antāḥ paurāḥ sarve 'tra vismitāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.86' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>athātrānaṅgamañjaryāḥ pitrā pūrvāvatārītā /</l>
<l>devī saṃnihitā caṇḍī vijñaptābhūn nijair gaṇaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.86'>
<lg>
<l>atha atra anaṅgamañjaryāḥ pitrā pūrva-avatārītā /</l>
<l>devī saṃnihitā caṇḍī vijñapta ābhūn nijair gaṇaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.87' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tvadākārapratiṣṭhākṛd arthadattaḥ sadaiṣas te /</l>
<l>bhakto vaṇik tad asyāsmin duḥkhe devi dayāṃ kuru //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.87'>
<lg>
<l>tvad-ākāra-pratiṣṭhā-kṛd arthadattaḥ sada aiṣas te /</l>
<l>bhakto vaṇik tad asya asmin duḥkhe devi dayāṃ kuru //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.88' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>etad gaṇebhyaḥ śrutvā sā śaraṇyā śaṅkarapriyā /</l>
<l>śāntānaṅgās trayo 'py ete jīvantv iti samādiśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.88'>
<lg>
<l>etad gaṇebhyaḥ śrutvā sā śaraṇyā śaṅkara-priyā /</l>
<l>śānta-anaṅgās trayo 'py ete jīvantv iti samādiśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.89' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>atha sarve 'pi te suptapratibuddhā iva kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>tatprasādāt samuttasthur jīvanto vītamanmathāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.89'>
<lg>
<l>atha sarve 'pi te supta-pratibuddhā iva kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>tat-prasādāt samuttasthur jīvanto vīta-manmathāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.90' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>tato dṛṣṭvā tad āścaryaṃ sānande sakale jane /</l>
<l>lajjānatamukhaḥ prāyāt svagṛhaṃ kamalākaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.90'>
<lg>
<l>tato dṛṣṭvā tad āścaryaṃ sa-ānande sa-kale jane /</l>
<l>lajjā-nata-mukhaḥ prāyāt sva-gṛhaṃ kamalākaraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.91' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>arthadatto 'pi tāṃ hrītām ādāyānaṅgamañjarīm /</l>
<l>sutāṃ svabhartṛsahitāṃ yayau baddhotsavo gṛhān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.91'>
<lg>
<l>arthadatto 'pi tāṃ hrītām ādāya anaṅgamañjarīm /</l>
<l>sutāṃ sva-bhartṛ-sahitāṃ yayau baddha-utsavo gṛhān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.92' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>iti kathayitvā tasyāṃ rātrau mārge kathāṃ sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>nijagāda taṃ trivikramasenaṃ kṣoṇīpatiṃ bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.92'>
<lg>
<l>iti kathayitvā tasyāṃ rātrau mārge kathāṃ sa vetālaḥ /</l>
<l>nijagāda taṃ trivikramasenaṃ kṣoṇī-patiṃ bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.93' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>rājan kasya vadaiteṣv adhiko moho 'nurāgamūḍheṣu /</l>
<l>so 'tra ca pūrvoktas te śāpo jānan na ced vadasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.93'>
<lg>
<l>rājan kasya vada eteṣv adhiko moho 'nurāga-mūḍheṣu /</l>
<l>so 'tra ca pūrva-uktas te śāpo jānan na ced vadasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.94' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>ity etad vetālāc chrutvā sa pratyuvāca taṃ nṛpatiḥ /</l>
<l>eteṣu rāgamūḍhaḥ pratibhāti mamādhikaḥ sa maṇivarmā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.94'>
<lg>
<l>ity etad vetālāc chrutvā sa pratyuvāca taṃ nṛ-patiḥ /</l>
<l>eteṣu rāga-mūḍhaḥ pratibhāti mama adhikaḥ sa maṇivarmā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.95' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>itarau hi tāv ubhāv api kālakramapakvamanmathāvasthau /</l>
<l>anyo'nyasānurāgau yadi jīvitam ujjhataḥ sma tad bhavatu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.95'>
<lg>
<l>itarau hi tāv ubhāv api kāla-krama-pakva-manmatha-avasthau /</l>
<l>anyo'nya-sa-anurāgau yadi jīvitam ujjhataḥ sma tad bhavatu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.96' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>maṇivarmā tv atimūḍho yo bhāryām anyapuruṣasaktamṛtām /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭvaiva kopakāle pratyuta raktaḥ śucāmucat prāṇān //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.96'>
<lg>
<l>maṇivarmā tv ati-mūḍho yo bhāryām anya-puruṣa-sakta-mṛtām /</l>
<l>dṛṣṭva aiva kopa-kāle pratyuta raktaḥ śuca āmucat prāṇān //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.28.97' corresp='Vet_21'>
<l>iti gadita vataḥ sa tasya rājño bata vetālapatiḥ punar jagāma /</l>
<l>nijam eva padaṃ tad aṃsapīṭhād atha rājāpi tam anvagāt sa bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.28.97'>
<lg>
<l>iti gadita vataḥ sa tasya rājño bata vetāla-patiḥ punar jagāma /</l>
<l>nijam eva padaṃ tad aṃsa-pīṭhād atha rāja āpi tam anvagāt sa bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.1' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tato rājā punar gatvā vetālaṃ śiṃśapāgrataḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ prāpyāṃsāropitaṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato rājā punar gatvā vetālaṃ śiṃśapā-agrataḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ prāpya aṃsa-āropitaṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.2' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>āyāntaṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ sa vetālo 'bravīt pathi /</l>
<l>rājan sādhuḥ susattvas tvaṃ tad apūrvāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.2'>
<lg>
<l>āyāntaṃ taṃ ca rājānaṃ sa vetālo 'bravīt pathi /</l>
<l>rājan sādhuḥ su-sattvas tvaṃ tad a-pūrvāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.3' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>babhūva pūrvaṃ kusumapurākhyanagareśvaraḥ /</l>
<l>pṛthvītale 'smin dharaṇīvarāho nāma bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.3'>
<lg>
<l>babhūva pūrvaṃ kusuma-pura-ākhya-nagara-īśvaraḥ /</l>
<l>pṛthvī-tale 'smin dharaṇī-varāho nāma bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.4' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tasya brāhmaṇabhūyiṣṭhe rāṣṭre brahmasthalābhidhaḥ /</l>
<l>agrahāro 'bhavat tatra viṣṇusvāmīty abhūd dvijaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.4'>
<lg>
<l>tasya brāhmaṇa-bhūyiṣṭhe rāṣṭre brahmasthala-abhidhaḥ /</l>
<l>agra-hāro 'bhavat tatra viṣṇusvāmi īty abhūd dvi-jaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.5' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tasyānurūpā bhāryābhūd yathā svāhā havir bhujaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāṃ ca tasya catvāraḥ kramād utpedire sutāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.5'>
<lg>
<l>tasya anurūpā bhārya ābhūd yathā svāhā havir bhujaḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāṃ ca tasya catvāraḥ kramād utpedire sutāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.6' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>adhītavedeṣūtkrāntaśaiśaveṣu ca teṣu saḥ /</l>
<l>viṣṇusvāmī divaṃ prāyād bhāryayānugatas tayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.6'>
<lg>
<l>adhīta-vedeṣu utkrānta-śaiśaveṣu ca teṣu saḥ /</l>
<l>viṣṇusvāmī divaṃ prāyād bhāryaya ānugatas tayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.7' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tatas te tatra tatputrāḥ sarve 'py ānāyya duḥsthitāḥ /</l>
<l>gotrajair hṛtasarvasvā mantrayāṃcakrire mithaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.7'>
<lg>
<l>tatas te tatra tat-putrāḥ sarve 'py ānāyya duḥ-sthitāḥ /</l>
<l>gotra-jair hṛta-sarva-svā mantrayāṃcakrire mithaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.8' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>nāstīha gatir asmākaṃ tad vrajāmo vayaṃ na kim /</l>
<l>ito mātāmahagṛhaṃ grāmaṃ yañjasthalābhidham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.8'>
<lg>
<l>na asti iha gatir asmākaṃ tad vrajāmo vayaṃ na kim /</l>
<l>ito mātā-maha-gṛhaṃ grāmaṃ yañjasthala-abhidham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.9' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>etad eva viniścitya prasthitā bhaikṣyabhojanāḥ /</l>
<l>mātāmahagṛhaṃ prāpus te 'tha tad bahubhir dinaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.9'>
<lg>
<l>etad eva viniścitya prasthitā bhaikṣya-bhojanāḥ /</l>
<l>mātā-maha-gṛhaṃ prāpus te 'tha tad bahubhir dinaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.10' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tatra mātāmahā-bhāvān mātulair dattasaṃśrayāḥ /</l>
<l>bhuñjānās tadgṛhe tasthuḥ svādhyāyābhyāsatatparāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.10'>
<lg>
<l>tatra mātā-maha-a-bhāvān mātulair datta-saṃśrayāḥ /</l>
<l>bhuñjānās tad-gṛhe tasthuḥ sva-adhyāya-abhyāsa-tat-parāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.11' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>kālakramāc ca teṣāṃ te mātulānām akimcanāḥ /</l>
<l>avajñāpātratāṃ jagmur bhojanācchādanādiṣu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.11'>
<lg>
<l>kāla-kramāc ca teṣāṃ te mātulānām a-kim-canāḥ /</l>
<l>avajñā-pātratāṃ jagmur bhojana-ācchādana-ādiṣu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.12' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tataḥ svajanasaṃsphūrjadavamānahatātmanām /</l>
<l>teṣāṃ rahaḥ sacintānāṃ jyeṣṭho bhrātābravīd idam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.12'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ sva-jana-saṃsphūrjad-avamāna-hata-ātmanām /</l>
<l>teṣāṃ rahaḥ sa-cintānāṃ jyeṣṭho bhrāta ābravīd idam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.13' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>bho bhrātaraḥ kiṃ kriyate sarvam āceṣṭate vidhiḥ /</l>
<l>na śakyaṃ puruṣasyeha kvacit kimcit kadācana //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.13'>
<lg>
<l>bho bhrātaraḥ kiṃ kriyate sarvam āceṣṭate vidhiḥ /</l>
<l>na śakyaṃ puruṣasya iha kva-cit kim-cit kadā-cana //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.14' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>ahaṃ hy udvegato bhrāmyan prāpto 'dya pitṛkānane /</l>
<l>vipannasthitam adrākṣaṃ trastāṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.14'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ hy udvegato bhrāmyan prāpto 'dya pitṛ-kānane /</l>
<l>vipanna-sthitam adrākṣaṃ trasta-aṅgaṃ puruṣaṃ bhuvi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.15' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>acintayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tam ahaṃ tāṃ spṛhayan gatim /</l>
<l>dhanyo 'yam evaṃ viśrānto duḥkhabhāraṃ vimucya yaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.15'>
<lg>
<l>acintayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā tam ahaṃ tāṃ spṛhayan gatim /</l>
<l>dhanyo 'yam evaṃ viśrānto duḥkha-bhāraṃ vimucya yaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.16' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>iti saṃcintya tat kālaṃ kṛtvā maraṇaniścayam /</l>
<l>vṛkṣāgrasaṅginā pāśenātmānam udalambayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.16'>
<lg>
<l>iti saṃcintya tat kālaṃ kṛtvā maraṇa-niścayam /</l>
<l>vṛkṣa-agra-saṅginā pāśenā atmānam udalambayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.17' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>yāvac ca me visaṃjñasya tadā niryānti nāsavaḥ /</l>
<l>tāvat truṭitapāśo 'tra patito 'smi mahītale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.17'>
<lg>
<l>yāvac ca me visaṃjñasya tadā niryānti na asavaḥ /</l>
<l>tāvat truṭita-pāśo 'tra patito 'smi mahī-tale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.18' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>labdhasaṃjñaś ca kenāpi puṃsā kṣiprāt kṛpālunā /</l>
<l>āśvāsyamānam ātmānam apaśyaṃ paṭamārutaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.18'>
<lg>
<l>labdha-saṃjñaś ca kena-api puṃsā kṣiprāt kṛpālunā /</l>
<l>āśvāsyamānam ātmānam apaśyaṃ paṭa-mārutaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.19' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>sakhe kathaya vidvān apy evaṃ kaṃ prati khidyase /</l>
<l>sukhaṃ hi sukṛtād duḥkhaṃ duḥkṛtād eti nānyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.19'>
<lg>
<l>sakhe kathaya vidvān apy evaṃ kaṃ prati khidyase /</l>
<l>sukhaṃ hi sukṛtād duḥkhaṃ duḥ-kṛtād eti na anyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.20' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>duḥkhād yadi tavodvegaḥ sukṛtaṃ tat samācara /</l>
<l>kathaṃ tu nārakaṃ duḥkham ātmatyāgena vāñchasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.20'>
<lg>
<l>duḥkhād yadi tava udvegaḥ sukṛtaṃ tat samācara /</l>
<l>kathaṃ tu nārakaṃ duḥkham ātma-tyāgena vāñchasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.21' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>ity uktvā māṃ samāśvāsya sa ca kvāpi gataḥ pumān /</l>
<l>ahaṃ cehāgatas tyaktvā tādṛśaṃ maraṇodyamam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.21'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā māṃ samāśvāsya sa ca kva api gataḥ pumān /</l>
<l>ahaṃ ca ihā agatas tyaktvā tādṛśaṃ maraṇa-udyamam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.22' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tad evaṃ necchati vidhau na martum api labhyate /</l>
<l>idānīṃ ca tanuṃ tīrthe tapasā dāhayāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.22'>
<lg>
<l>tad evaṃ na icchati vidhau na martum api labhyate /</l>
<l>idānīṃ ca tanuṃ tīrthe tapasā dāhayāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.23' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>yena niḥdhanatāduḥkhabhāgī na syām ahaṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ taṃ kaniṣṭhā bhrātaro 'bruvan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.23'>
<lg>
<l>yena niḥ-dhanatā-duḥkha-bhāgī na syām ahaṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ taṃ kaniṣṭhā bhrātaro 'bruvan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.24' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>arthair vinā kathaṃ prājño 'py ārya duḥkena bādhyase /</l>
<l>kiṃ na vetsi yad arthānāṃ śaradabhracalā gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.24'>
<lg>
<l>arthair vinā kathaṃ prājño 'py ārya duḥkena bādhyase /</l>
<l>kiṃ na vetsi yad arthānāṃ śarad-abhra-calā gatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.25' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>āhṛtya rakṣyamāṇāpi yatnenāntavirāgiṇī /</l>
<l>asanmaitrī ca veśyā ca śrīś ca kasya kadā sthirā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.25'>
<lg>
<l>āhṛtya rakṣyamāṇa āpi yatnena anta-virāgiṇī /</l>
<l>a-san-maitrī ca veśyā ca śrīś ca kasya kadā sthirā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.26' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tad udyogena sa guṇaḥ ko 'py upārjyo manasvinā /</l>
<l>ānīyante haṭād baddhvā yenārthahariṇā muhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.26'>
<lg>
<l>tad udyogena sa guṇaḥ ko 'py upārjyo manasvinā /</l>
<l>ānīyante haṭād baddhvā yena artha-hariṇā muhuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.27' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>ity ukto bhrātṛbhir dhairyaṃ kṣaṇāj jyeṣṭho 'valambya saḥ /</l>
<l>uvāca ko guṇas tādṛgarjanīyo bhaved iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.27'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukto bhrātṛbhir dhairyaṃ kṣaṇāj jyeṣṭho 'valambya saḥ /</l>
<l>uvāca ko guṇas tādṛg-arjanīyo bhaved iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.28' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tato vicitya sarve te vadanti sma parasparam /</l>
<l>vicintya pṛthvīṃ vijñānaṃ kimcic chikṣāmahe vayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.28'>
<lg>
<l>tato vicitya sarve te vadanti sma parasparam /</l>
<l>vicintya pṛthvīṃ vijñānaṃ kim-cic chikṣāmahe vayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.29' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>niścityaitac ca saṃketasthānam uktvā samāgame /</l>
<l>ekaikaśas te catvāraś catasraḥ prayayur diśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.29'>
<lg>
<l>niścitya etac ca saṃketa-sthānam uktvā samāgame /</l>
<l>eka-ekaśas te catvāraś catasraḥ prayayur diśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.30' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>yāti kāle ca militās te saṃketaniketane /</l>
<l>kiṃ kena śikṣitam iti bhrātaro 'nyo'nyam abruvan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.30'>
<lg>
<l>yāti kāle ca militās te saṃketa-niketane /</l>
<l>kiṃ kena śikṣitam iti bhrātaro 'nyo'nyam abruvan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.31' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>athātraiko 'bravīd īdṛg vijñānaṃ śikṣitaṃ mayā /</l>
<l>yenāsthiśakalaṃ prāpya prāṇino yasya kasyacit //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.31'>
<lg>
<l>atha atra eko 'bravīd īdṛg vijñānaṃ śikṣitaṃ mayā /</l>
<l>yena asthi-śakalaṃ prāpya prāṇino yasya kasya-cit //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.32' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>utpādayāmy ahaṃ tasmin māṃsaṃ taducitaṃ kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>etat tasya vacaḥ śrutvā dvitīyas teṣv abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.32'>
<lg>
<l>utpādayāmy ahaṃ tasmin māṃsaṃ tad-ucitaṃ kṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>etat tasya vacaḥ śrutvā dvitīyas teṣv abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.33' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>ahaṃ tatraiva saṃjātamāṃse 'sthiśakale kila /</l>
<l>jāne janayituṃ lomatvacaṃ tatprāṇisaṃbhavi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.33'>
<lg>
<l>ahaṃ tatra eva saṃjāta-māṃse 'sthi-śakale kila /</l>
<l>jāne janayituṃ loma-tvacaṃ tat-prāṇi-saṃbhavi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.34' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tatas tṛtīyo 'py avadaj jāne tatraiva cāsmy aham /</l>
<l>tatprānyavayavān sraṣṭuṃ jātatvaṅmāṃsalomani //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.34'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tṛtīyo 'py avadaj jāne tatra eva ca asmy aham /</l>
<l>tat-prāny-avayavān sraṣṭuṃ jāta-tvaṅ-māṃsa-lomani //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.35' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>caturthaś ca tato 'vādīd utpannāvayavākṛtim /</l>
<l>tam eva prāṇinaṃ prānair yuktaṃ kartum avaimy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.35'>
<lg>
<l>caturthaś ca tato 'vādīd utpanna avayava-ākṛtim /</l>
<l>tam eva prāṇinaṃ prānair yuktaṃ kartum avaimy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.36' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>evam uktvā mithaḥ svasvavijñānaprathanāya te /</l>
<l>catvāro 'py asthikhaṇḍāya prayayur bhrātaro 'ṭavīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.36'>
<lg>
<l>evam uktvā mithaḥ sva-sva-vijñāna-prathanāya te /</l>
<l>catvāro 'py asthi-khaṇḍāya prayayur bhrātaro 'ṭavīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.37' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tatra siṃhasya te prāpur asthikhaṇḍaṃ vidher vaśāt /</l>
<l>avijñātaviśeṣāś ca gṛhnanti sma tathaiva tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.37'>
<lg>
<l>tatra siṃhasya te prāpur asthi-khaṇḍaṃ vidher vaśāt /</l>
<l>a-vijñāta-viśeṣāś ca gṛhnanti sma tatha aiva tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.38' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>ekaś ca tat samucitais tato māṃsair ayojayat /</l>
<l>dvitīyo 'janayat tasya tadvat tvaglomasaṃhatīḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.38'>
<lg>
<l>ekaś ca tat samucitais tato māṃsair ayojayat /</l>
<l>dvitīyo 'janayat tasya tadvat tvag-loma-saṃhatīḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.39' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>tṛtīyaś cā-khilair aṅgais tadyogyais tad apūrayat /</l>
<l>caturthaś ca dadau tasya siṃhībhūtasya jīvitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.39'>
<lg>
<l>tṛtīyaś ca a-khilair aṅgais tad-yogyais tad apūrayat /</l>
<l>caturthaś ca dadau tasya siṃhī-bhūtasya jīvitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.40' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>udatiṣṭhad athoddhūtasaṭābhāro 'tibhairavaḥ /</l>
<l>sa daṃṣṭrāsaṃkaṭamukhaḥ siṃhaḥ kharanakhāṅkuśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.40'>
<lg>
<l>udatiṣṭhad atha uddhūta-saṭā-bhāro 'ti-bhairavaḥ /</l>
<l>sa daṃṣṭrā-saṃkaṭa-mukhaḥ siṃhaḥ khara-nakha-aṅkuśaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.41' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>dhāvitvā ca svanirmātṝṃs tān eva caturo 'pi saḥ /</l>
<l>avadhīt kesarī tṛpto viveśa ca vanaṃ tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.41'>
<lg>
<l>dhāvitvā ca sva-nirmātṝṃs tān eva caturo 'pi saḥ /</l>
<l>avadhīt kesarī tṛpto viveśa ca vanaṃ tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.42' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>evaṃ te siṃhanirmāṇadoṣān naṣṭā dvijātayaḥ /</l>
<l>duṣṭaṃ hi jantum utthāpya kasyātmani sukhaṃ bhavet //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.42'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ te siṃha-nirmāṇa-doṣān naṣṭā dvi-jātayaḥ /</l>
<l>duṣṭaṃ hi jantum utthāpya kasyā atmani sukhaṃ bhavet //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.43' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>itthaṃ copārjito yatnād guṇo 'pi vidhure vidhau /</l>
<l>saṃpattaye na na paraṃ jāyate tu vipattaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.43'>
<lg>
<l>itthaṃ ca upārjito yatnād guṇo 'pi vidhure vidhau /</l>
<l>saṃpattaye na na paraṃ jāyate tu vipattaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.44' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>mūle hy avikṛte daive sikte prajñānavāriṇā /</l>
<l>nayālavālaḥ phalati prāyaḥ pauruṣapādapaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.44'>
<lg>
<l>mūle hy a-vikṛte daive sikte prajñāna-vāriṇā /</l>
<l>naya-ālavālaḥ phalati prāyaḥ pauruṣa-pāda-paḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.45' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>iti tasyāṃ niśi mārge vetālenāṃsataḥ kathāṃ tena /</l>
<l>ākhyāya sa trivikramaseno rājā punar jagade //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.45'>
<lg>
<l>iti tasyāṃ niśi mārge vetālena aṃsataḥ kathāṃ tena /</l>
<l>ākhyāya sa trivikramaseno rājā punar jagade //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.46' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>rājaṃs teṣv aparādhyati caturṣu kas tatra siṃhanirmāṇe /</l>
<l>yan nyavadhīt tatkḷpto vada samayaḥ so 'tra pūrvas te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.46'>
<lg>
<l>rājaṃs teṣv aparādhyati caturṣu kas tatra siṃha-nirmāṇe /</l>
<l>yan nyavadhīt tat-kḷpto vada samayaḥ so 'tra pūrvas te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.47' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>iti vetālāc chrutvā rājā so 'cintayad vimaunasya /</l>
<l>icchati gantum ayaṃ me yātv āneṣyāmy amuṃ bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.47'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālāc chrutvā rājā so 'cintayad vimaunasya /</l>
<l>icchati gantum ayaṃ me yātv āneṣyāmy amuṃ bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.48' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>iti hṛdi niścitya sa taṃ mahīpatiḥ pratyuvāca vetālam /</l>
<l>yas tasya jīvadāyī siṃhasya sa pāpabhāk teṣu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.48'>
<lg>
<l>iti hṛdi niścitya sa taṃ mahī-patiḥ pratyuvāca vetālam /</l>
<l>yas tasya jīva-dāyī siṃhasya sa pāpa-bhāk teṣu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.49' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>prāṇiviśeṣam abuddhvā māṃsatvaglomagātranirmāṇam /</l>
<l>yuktibalāt tu kṛtaṃ yais teṣāṃ doṣo 'sti nājñānāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.49'>
<lg>
<l>prāṇi-viśeṣam a-buddhvā māṃsa-tvag-loma-gātra-nirmāṇam /</l>
<l>yukti-balāt tu kṛtaṃ yais teṣāṃ doṣo 'sti na ajñānāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.50' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>yena tu siṃhākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyāprakāśanotkena /</l>
<l>prāṇās tasya vitīrṇās tena kṛtā brahmahatyās tāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.50'>
<lg>
<l>yena tu siṃha-ākāraṃ dṛṣṭvā vidyā-prakāśana-utkena /</l>
<l>prāṇās tasya vitīrṇās tena kṛtā brahma-hatyās tāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.29.51' corresp='Vet_22'>
<l>etat sa rājño vacanaṃ niśamya svadhāma vetālavaro jagāma /</l>
<l>tasyāṃsatas tat puna eva māyī rājāpi taṃ so 'nusasāra bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.29.51'>
<lg>
<l>etat sa rājño vacanaṃ niśamya sva-dhāma vetāla-varo jagāma /</l>
<l>tasya aṃsatas tat puna eva māyī rāja āpi taṃ so 'nusasāra bhūyaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.1' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpa śiṃśapāpādapāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ vetālaṃ rājasattamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.1'>
<lg>
<l>tato gatvā punaḥ prāpa śiṃśapā-pādapāt tataḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ vetālaṃ rāja-sattamaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.2' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>skandhe kṛtvā ca taṃ maunī darśitānekavaikṛtam /</l>
<l>yāvat pratiṣṭhate tāvat sa vetālas tam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.2'>
<lg>
<l>skandhe kṛtvā ca taṃ maunī darśita-aneka-vaikṛtam /</l>
<l>yāvat pratiṣṭhate tāvat sa vetālas tam abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.3' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>rājann akārye 'py etasmin duḥvāro 'yaṃ grahas tava /</l>
<l>tat te śramavinodāya kathayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.3'>
<lg>
<l>rājann akārye 'py etasmin duḥ-vāro 'yaṃ grahas tava /</l>
<l>tat te śrama-vinodāya kathayāmi kathāṃ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.4' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>āsīt kaliṅgaviṣaye nāmnā śobhāvatī purī /</l>
<l>divīva śakranagarī vasatiḥ śubhakarmaṇām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.4'>
<lg>
<l>āsīt kaliṅga-viṣaye nāmnā śobhāvatī purī /</l>
<l>divi iva śakra-nagarī vasatiḥ śubha-karmaṇām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.5' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>yāṃ pradyumna ivaiśvaryavīryātiśayaviśrutaḥ /</l>
<l>pradyumnanāmā nṛpatiḥ śaśāsorjitaśāsanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.5'>
<lg>
<l>yāṃ pradyumna ivā eśvarya-vīrya-atiśaya-viśrutaḥ /</l>
<l>pradyumna-nāmā nṛ-patiḥ śaśāsā urjita-śāsanaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.6' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>guṇāpakarṣaś cāpeṣu murajeṣu karāhatiḥ /</l>
<l>yugeṣv aśrūyata kalir yasyāṃ prajñāsu tīkṣṇatā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.6'>
<lg>
<l>guṇa-apakarṣaś cāpeṣu murajeṣu kara-āhatiḥ /</l>
<l>yugeṣv aśrūyata kalir yasyāṃ prajñāsu tīkṣṇatā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.7' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>ekadeśe puras tasyā nṛpeṇa pratipāditaḥ /</l>
<l>yajñasthalābhidhāno 'bhūd agrahāro bahudvijaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.7'>
<lg>
<l>eka-deśe puras tasyā nṛ-peṇa pratipāditaḥ /</l>
<l>yajñasthala-abhidhāno 'bhūd agrahāro bahu-dvijaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.8' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tatrāsīd yajñasomākhyo brāhmaṇo vedapāragaḥ /</l>
<l>mahādhano 'gnihotrī ca pūjitātithidevataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.8'>
<lg>
<l>tatrā asīd yajñasoma-ākhyo brāhmaṇo veda-pāra-gaḥ /</l>
<l>mahā-dhano 'gni-hotrī ca pūjita-atithi-devataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.9' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tasya vyatīte tāruṇye manaḥrathaśataiḥ sutaḥ /</l>
<l>bhāryāyām anurūpāyām eka evodapadyata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.9'>
<lg>
<l>tasya vyatīte tāruṇye manaḥ-ratha-śataiḥ sutaḥ /</l>
<l>bhāryāyām anurūpāyām eka eva udapadyata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.10' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>vavṛdhe ca pituḥ so 'sya gṛhe bālaḥ sulakṣaṇaḥ /</l>
<l>kṛtābhidhāno vidhivad devasoma iti dvijaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.10'>
<lg>
<l>vavṛdhe ca pituḥ so 'sya gṛhe bālaḥ su-lakṣaṇaḥ /</l>
<l>kṛta-abhidhāno vidhivad devasoma iti dvijaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.11' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>prāptaṣoḍaśavarṣaś ca sa vidyāvinayādibhiḥ /</l>
<l>āvarjitajano 'kasmāj jvareṇa prāpa pañcatām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.11'>
<lg>
<l>prāpta-ṣoḍaśa-varṣaś ca sa vidyā-vinaya-ādibhiḥ /</l>
<l>āvarjita-jano '-kasmāj jvareṇa prāpa pañcatām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.12' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tataḥ parāsuṃ snehāt tam āśliṣya saha bhāryayā /</l>
<l>yajñasenaḥ pitā śocan na dāhāya jahau ciram //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.12'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ parāsuṃ snehāt tam āśliṣya saha bhāryayā /</l>
<l>yajñasenaḥ pitā śocan na dāhāya jahau ciram //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.13' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>brahman saṃsāragandharvanagarasya na vetsi kim /</l>
<l>parāvarajño 'pi gatiṃ vāribudbudabhaṅgurām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.13'>
<lg>
<l>brahman saṃsāra-gandharva-nagarasya na vetsi kim /</l>
<l>para-avara-jño 'pi gatiṃ vāri-budbuda-bhaṅgurām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.14' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>ye sainyaiḥ pūritadharā harmyapṛṣṭheṣu hāriṣu /</l>
<l>lasatsaṃgītanādeṣu ratnaparyaṅkavartinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.14'>
<lg>
<l>ye sainyaiḥ pūrita-dharā harmya-pṛṣṭheṣu hāriṣu /</l>
<l>lasat-saṃgīta-nādeṣu ratna-paryaṅka-vartinaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.15' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>śrīkhaṇḍadravaliptāṅgā varastrīparivāritāḥ /</l>
<l>vyalasann amarammanyā bhūloke 'smin narādhipāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.15'>
<lg>
<l>śrī-khaṇḍa-drava-lipta-aṅgā vara-strī-parivāritāḥ /</l>
<l>vyalasann amaram-manyā bhū-loke 'smin nara-adhipāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.16' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>te 'py ekakāḥ śmaśāneṣu rudatpretānuyāyiṣu /</l>
<l>citādhiśayino yatra jagdhāḥ kravyātkṛśānubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.16'>
<lg>
<l>te 'py ekakāḥ śmaśāneṣu rudat-preta-anuyāyiṣu /</l>
<l>cita-adhiśayino yatra jagdhāḥ kravya-at-kṛśānubhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.17' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>śivābhir valitopāntāḥ kālena kavalīkṛtāḥ /</l>
<l>na roddhuṃ śakitāḥ kaiḥcit tatrānyeṣāṃ kathaiva kā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.17'>
<lg>
<l>śivābhir valita-upāntāḥ kālena kavalī-kṛtāḥ /</l>
<l>na roddhuṃ śakitāḥ kaiḥ-cit tatra anyeṣāṃ katha aiva kā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.18' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tad etaṃ pretam āśliṣya vidvan vada karoṣi kim /</l>
<l>ityādy abodhayan vṛddhā militās taṃ dvijaṃ tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.18'>
<lg>
<l>tad etaṃ pretam āśliṣya vidvan vada karoṣi kim /</l>
<l>ity-ādy abodhayan vṛddhā militās taṃ dvi-jaṃ tataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.19' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tatas tena kathamcit taṃ muktam āropya tatsutam /</l>
<l>śibikāyāṃ gataprāṇaṃ kṛtapretaprasādhanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.19'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tena katham-cit taṃ muktam āropya tat-sutam /</l>
<l>śibikāyāṃ gata-prāṇaṃ kṛta-preta-prasādhanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.20' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>bāndhavā vaiśasodaśrumiladbandhujanānvitāḥ /</l>
<l>śmaśānaṃ prāpayāmāsuḥ kolāhalasamākulāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.20'>
<lg>
<l>bāndhavā vaiśasa-udaśru-milad-bandhu-jana-anvitāḥ /</l>
<l>śmaśānaṃ prāpayāmāsuḥ kolāhala-samākulāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.21' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>atrāntare ca tatrāsīc chmaśāne ko 'pi tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>vṛddhaḥ pāśupato yogī maṭhikāyāṃ kṛtasthitiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.21'>
<lg>
<l>atra antare ca tatrā asīc chmaśāne ko 'pi tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>vṛddhaḥ pāśupato yogī maṭhikāyāṃ kṛta-sthitiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.22' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>vayasā tapasā cātibhūyasā sukṛśāṃ tanum /</l>
<l>bibhrāṇo bhaṅgabhītyeva sirābhiḥ pariveṣṭitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.22'>
<lg>
<l>vayasā tapasā ca ati-bhūyasā su-kṛśāṃ tanum /</l>
<l>bibhrāṇo bhaṅga-bhītya īva sirābhiḥ pariveṣṭitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.23' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>nāmnā vāmaśivo bhasmapāṇḍuromāvṛtākṛtiḥ /</l>
<l>vidyutpiṅgajaṭājūṭo maheśvara ivā-paraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.23'>
<lg>
<l>nāmnā vāmaśivo bhasma-pāṇḍu-roma-āvṛta-ākṛtiḥ /</l>
<l>vidyut-piṅga-jaṭā-jūṭo maheśvara iva a-paraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.24' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>sa tāpaso 'tra tat kālaṃ dattopālambhakheditam /</l>
<l>mūrkhaṃ śaṭhaṃ dhyānayogādyavaliptam ahamkṛtam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.24'>
<lg>
<l>sa tāpaso 'tra tat kālaṃ datta-upālambha-kheditam /</l>
<l>mūrkhaṃ śaṭhaṃ dhyāna-yoga-ādy-avaliptam aham-kṛtam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.25' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>bhikṣāphalavratadharaṃ śiṣyam antikavāsinam /</l>
<l>jagāda dūrāc chrutvā taṃ janakolāhalaṃ bahiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.25'>
<lg>
<l>bhikṣā-phala-vrata-dharaṃ śiṣyam antika-vāsinam /</l>
<l>jagāda dūrāc chrutvā taṃ jana-kolāhalaṃ bahiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.26' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>uttiṣṭha gatvātra bahir vijñāyāgaccha satvaram /</l>
<l>kuto 'trā-śrutapūrvo 'yaṃ śmaśāne tumulāravaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.26'>
<lg>
<l>uttiṣṭha gatva ātra bahir vijñāyā agaccha sa-tvaram /</l>
<l>kuto 'tra a-śruta-pūrvo 'yaṃ śmaśāne tumula-āravaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.27' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>ity ukte guruṇā tena sa śiṣyaḥ pratyuvāca tam /</l>
<l>nāhaṃ yāmi svayaṃ yāhi bhikṣāvelā hy apaiti me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.27'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte guruṇā tena sa śiṣyaḥ pratyuvāca tam /</l>
<l>na ahaṃ yāmi svayaṃ yāhi bhikṣā-velā hy apaiti me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.28' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tac chrutvovāca sa gurur dhiṅ mūrkhodaratatpara /</l>
<l>ahno 'rdhaprahare yāte bhikṣāvelātra kā tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.28'>
<lg>
<l>tac chrutva ūvāca sa gurur dhiṅ mūrkha udara-tat-para /</l>
<l>ahno 'rdha-prahare yāte bhikṣā-vela ātra kā tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.29' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>śrutvaivaitat sa taṃ kruddhaḥ kuśiṣyaḥ prāha tāpasam /</l>
<l>dhig jarājīrṇa nāhaṃ te śiṣyo na tvaṃ gurur mama //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.29'>
<lg>
<l>śrutva aiva etat sa taṃ kruddhaḥ ku-śiṣyaḥ prāha tāpasam /</l>
<l>dhig jarā-jīrṇa na ahaṃ te śiṣyo na tvaṃ gurur mama //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.30' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>aham anyatra yāsyāmi vaha pātrīm imāṃ svayam /</l>
<l>ity uktvotthāya sa prāyāt tyaktvāgre daṇḍakuṇḍikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.30'>
<lg>
<l>aham anyatra yāsyāmi vaha pātrīm imāṃ svayam /</l>
<l>ity uktva ūtthāya sa prāyāt tyaktva āgre daṇḍa-kuṇḍikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.31' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>vihasann atha nirgatya maṭhikāyāḥ sa tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>tatrāgād yatra dāhārtham ānītaḥ sa dvijārbhakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.31'>
<lg>
<l>vihasann atha nirgatya maṭhikāyāḥ sa tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>tatrā agād yatra dāha-artham ānītaḥ sa dvi-ja-arbhakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.32' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ janatayā śocyamānāgryayauvanam /</l>
<l>yogī praveṣṭuṃ taddehaṃ matiṃ cakre jarārditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.32'>
<lg>
<l>dṛṣṭvā ca taṃ janatayā śocyamāna-agrya-yauvanam /</l>
<l>yogī praveṣṭuṃ tad-dehaṃ matiṃ cakre jarā-arditaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.33' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>gatvā ca drutam ekānte muktakaṇṭhaṃ prarudya ca /</l>
<l>nanarta sa tataḥ kṣipram aṅgahārair yathocitaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.33'>
<lg>
<l>gatvā ca drutam eka-ante mukta-kaṇṭhaṃ prarudya ca /</l>
<l>nanarta sa tataḥ kṣipram aṅga-hārair yathā-ucitaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.34' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tato viveśa yogāt tad dvijaputrakalevaram /</l>
<l>kṣaṇāt sa svatanuṃ tyaktvā tapasvī yauvanecchayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.34'>
<lg>
<l>tato viveśa yogāt tad dvi-ja-putra-kalevaram /</l>
<l>kṣaṇāt sa sva-tanuṃ tyaktvā tapasvī yauvana-icchayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.35' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ racitāyāṃ ca citāyāṃ sahasaiva saḥ /</l>
<l>labdhajīvo dvijayuvā prottasthau kṛtajṛmbhikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.35'>
<lg>
<l>tat kṣaṇaṃ racitāyāṃ ca citāyāṃ sahasa aiva saḥ /</l>
<l>labdha-jīvo dvi-ja-yuvā prottasthau kṛta-jṛmbhikaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.36' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā bandhuvargasya diṣṭyā jīvati jīvati /</l>
<l>ity udbabhūva nādo 'tra nikhilasya janasya ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.36'>
<lg>
<l>tad dṛṣṭvā bandhu-vargasya diṣṭyā jīvati jīvati /</l>
<l>ity udbabhūva nādo 'tra nikhilasya janasya ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.37' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>athā-mokṣyan vrataṃ sarvān mṛṣā yogesvaraḥ sa tān /</l>
<l>vipraputraśarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭas tāpaso 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.37'>
<lg>
<l>atha a-mokṣyan vrataṃ sarvān mṛṣā yoga-īsvaraḥ sa tān /</l>
<l>vipra-putra-śarīra-antaḥ-praviṣṭas tāpaso 'bravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.38' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>lokāntaragatasyādya mahāpāśupatavratam /</l>
<l>grāhyaṃ sākṣān mamā-bhāṣya dattaṃ śarveṇa jīvitam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.38'>
<lg>
<l>loka-antara-gatasya adya mahā-pāśupata-vratam /</l>
<l>grāhyaṃ sākṣān mama a-bhāṣya dattaṃ śarveṇa jīvitam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.39' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>adhunaiva ca dhāryaṃ tad gatvaikānte vrataṃ mayā /</l>
<l>jīvitaṃ me 'nyathā nāsti tad yūyaṃ yāta yāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.39'>
<lg>
<l>adhuna aiva ca dhāryaṃ tad gatva aika-ante vrataṃ mayā /</l>
<l>jīvitaṃ me 'nyathā na asti tad yūyaṃ yāta yāmy aham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.40' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>iti sarvān sa tatrasthān saṃbodhya dṛḍhaniścayaḥ /</l>
<l>svagṛhān preṣayāmāsa harṣaśokākulān vratī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.40'>
<lg>
<l>iti sarvān sa tatra-sthān saṃbodhya dṛḍha-niścayaḥ /</l>
<l>sva-gṛhān preṣayāmāsa harṣa-śoka-ākulān vratī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.41' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>svayaṃ ca gatvā śvabhre tat kṣiptvā pūrvakalevaram /</l>
<l>āttavrato mahāyogī yuvībhūto 'nyato yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.41'>
<lg>
<l>svayaṃ ca gatvā śvabhre tat kṣiptvā pūrva-kalevaram /</l>
<l>ātta-vrato mahā-yogī yuvī-bhūto 'nyato yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.42' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>iti vyākhyāya vetālaḥ kathāṃ niśi tadā pathi /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramasenaṃ sa rājānaṃ punar abravīt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.42'>
<lg>
<l>iti vyākhyāya vetālaḥ kathāṃ niśi tadā pathi /</l>
<l>taṃ trivikramasenaṃ sa rājānaṃ punar abravīt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.43' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>rājan brūhi sa yogīndraḥ kasmāt parapure vasan /</l>
<l>praruroda nanartātha kautukaṃ mahad atra me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.43'>
<lg>
<l>rājan brūhi sa yogī-indraḥ kasmāt parapure vasan /</l>
<l>praruroda nanarta atha kautukaṃ mahad atra me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.44' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā śāpaśaṅkī sa bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>vimucya maunam evaṃ tam avādīd dhīmatāṃ varaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.44'>
<lg>
<l>iti vetālataḥ śrutvā śāpa-śaṅkī sa bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>vimucya maunam evaṃ tam avādīd dhīmatāṃ varaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.45' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>śṛṇu tatra babhūvāsya yo 'bhiprāyas tapasvinaḥ /</l>
<l>saha vṛddhaṃ cirāyedaṃ śarīraṃ siddhisādhanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.45'>
<lg>
<l>śṛṇu tatra babhūva asya yo 'bhiprāyas tapasvinaḥ /</l>
<l>saha vṛddhaṃ cirāya idaṃ śarīraṃ siddhi-sādhanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.46' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>pitṛbhyāṃ lālitaṃ bālye tyajāmy adyeti duḥkhitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa jarat tāpaso 'rodīd dehasneho hi duḥtyajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.46'>
<lg>
<l>pitṛbhyāṃ lālitaṃ bālye tyajāmy adya iti duḥkhitaḥ /</l>
<l>sa jarat tāpaso 'rodīd deha-sneho hi duḥ-tyajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.47' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>navaṃ dehaṃ pravekṣyāmi sādhayiṣyāmy ato 'dhikam /</l>
<l>iti harṣād anṛtyac ca kasya neṣṭaṃ hi yauvanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.47'>
<lg>
<l>navaṃ dehaṃ pravekṣyāmi sādhayiṣyāmy ato 'dhikam /</l>
<l>iti harṣād anṛtyac ca kasya na iṣṭaṃ hi yauvanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.30.48' corresp='Vet_23'>
<l>etat tasya vaco niśamya nṛpater aṃsat sa bhūyo 'py agād vetālo mṛtapūruṣāntaragatas taṃ śiṃśapāpādapam /</l>
<l>rājā so 'pi tam anvadhāvad adhikotsāhaḥ punaḥ prepsayā kalpānte 'py acalaṃ kulādrivijayi sthairyaṃ hi dhīrātmanām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.30.48'>
<lg>
<l>etat tasya vaco niśamya nṛpater aṃsat sa bhūyo 'py agād vetālo mṛta-pūruṣa-antaragatas taṃ śiṃśapā-pādapam /</l>
<l>rājā so 'pi tam anvadhāvad adhika-utsāhaḥ punaḥ prepsayā kalpa-ante 'py acalaṃ kula-adri-vijayi sthairyaṃ hi dhīra-ātmanām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.1' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatas tāṃ timiraśyāmāṃ citāgnijvalitekṣaṇām /</l>
<l>smaśāne bhīṣaṇe tasmin vīro rajanirākṣasīm //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.1'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tāṃ timira-śyāmāṃ citā-agni-jvalita-īkṣaṇām /</l>
<l>smaśāne bhīṣaṇe tasmin vīro rajani-rākṣasīm //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.2' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ghorām agaṇayan rājā gatvā tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ tasyā vetālam ādade //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.2'>
<lg>
<l>ghorām agaṇayan rājā gatvā tāṃ śiṃśapāṃ punaḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenas taṃ tasyā vetālam ādade //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.3' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>skandhe kṛtvā ca taṃ yāvat prakrāmati sa pūrvavat /</l>
<l>tāvad bhūyaḥ sa vetālo naradevam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.3'>
<lg>
<l>skandhe kṛtvā ca taṃ yāvat prakrāmati sa pūrvavat /</l>
<l>tāvad bhūyaḥ sa vetālo nara-devam uvāca tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.4' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>bho rājann aham udvigno na punas tvaṃ gatāgataiḥ /</l>
<l>tad ekaṃ me mahāpraśnam imaṃ kathayataḥ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.4'>
<lg>
<l>bho rājann aham udvigno na punas tvaṃ gata-āgataiḥ /</l>
<l>tad ekaṃ me mahā-praśnam imaṃ kathayataḥ śṛṇu //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.5' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>āsīn māṇḍalikaḥ ko 'pi nṛpatir dakṣiṇāpathe /</l>
<l>dharmābhidhāno dhaureyaḥ sādhūnāṃ bahugotrajaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.5'>
<lg>
<l>āsīn māṇḍalikaḥ ko 'pi nṛ-patir dakṣiṇā-pathe /</l>
<l>dharma-abhidhāno dhaureyaḥ sādhūnāṃ bahu-gotra-jaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.6' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tasya candravatīnāma bhāryā mālavadeśajā /</l>
<l>abhūn mahākulotpannā varastrīmaulimālikā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.6'>
<lg>
<l>tasya candravatī-nāma bhāryā mālava-deśa-jā /</l>
<l>abhūn mahā-kula-utpannā vara-strī-mauli-mālikā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.7' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tasyāṃ ca tasya bhāryāyāṃ bhūpater udapadyata /</l>
<l>ekaiva lāvaṇyavatī nāmānvarthābhidhā sutā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.7'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ ca tasya bhāryāyāṃ bhū-pater udapadyata /</l>
<l>eka aiva lāvaṇyavatī nāma anvartha-abhidhā sutā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.8' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>pradeyāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sa sutāyāṃ dharmabhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>unmūlito 'bhūn militair dāyādaī rāṣṭrabhedibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.8'>
<lg>
<l>pradeyāyāṃ ca tasyāṃ sa sutāyāṃ dharma-bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>unmūlito 'bhūn militair dāyādaī rāṣṭra-bhedibhiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.9' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tataḥ palāyya niragāt sa deśād bhāryayā saha /</l>
<l>duhitrā ca tayā rātrav āttasadratnasaṃcayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.9'>
<lg>
<l>tataḥ palāyya niragāt sa deśād bhāryayā saha /</l>
<l>duhitrā ca tayā rātrav ātta-sad-ratna-saṃcayaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.10' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>mālavaṃ prati ca svairaṃ prasthitaḥ śvaśurāspadam /</l>
<l>vindhyāṭavīṃ tayā rātryā prāpa bhāryāsutāyutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.10'>
<lg>
<l>mālavaṃ prati ca svairaṃ prasthitaḥ śvaśura-āspadam /</l>
<l>vindhya-aṭavīṃ tayā rātryā prāpa bhāryā-sutā-yutaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.11' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tasyāṃ praviṣṭasyodaśrur ivāvaśyāyaśīkaraiḥ /</l>
<l>niśānuyātrāṃ dattveva yayau tasya mahīkṣitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.11'>
<lg>
<l>tasyāṃ praviṣṭasya udaśrur iva avaśyāya-śīkaraiḥ /</l>
<l>niśa ānuyātrāṃ dattva īva yayau tasya mahī-kṣitaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.12' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ārurohātha pūrvādrim utkṣiptāgrakaro raviḥ /</l>
<l>mā gāś caurāṭavīm etām iti taṃ vārayann iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.12'>
<lg>
<l>āruroha atha pūrva-adrim utkṣipta-agra-karo raviḥ /</l>
<l>mā gāś caura-aṭavīm etām iti taṃ vārayann iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.13' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tato 'tra sasutājāniḥ kṣatāṅghriḥ kuśakaṇṭakaiḥ /</l>
<l>padātiḥ sa nṛpo gacchan bhillānāṃ prāpa pallikām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.13'>
<lg>
<l>tato 'tra sa-sutā-jāniḥ kṣata-aṅghriḥ kuśa-kaṇṭakaiḥ /</l>
