<l>padātiḥ sa nṛ-po gacchan bhillānāṃ prāpa pallikām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.14' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>pareṣāṃ prāṇasarvasvahāribhiḥ puṃbhir āvṛtām /</l>
<l>varjitāṃ dhārmikair durgāṃ kṛtāntanagarīm iva //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.14'>
<lg>
<l>pareṣāṃ prāṇa-sarva-sva-hāribhiḥ puṃbhir āvṛtām /</l>
<l>varjitāṃ dhārmikair durgāṃ kṛta-anta-nagarīm iva //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.15' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ dūrāt savastrābharaṇaṃ nṛpam /</l>
<l>moṣituṃ bahavo 'dhāvañ śabarā vividhāyudhāḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.15'>
<lg>
<l>tatra dṛṣṭva aiva taṃ dūrāt sa-vastra-ābharaṇaṃ nṛ-pam /</l>
<l>moṣituṃ bahavo 'dhāvañ śabarā vividha-āyudhāḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.16' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tān vilokya sutābhārye rājā dharmo jagāda saḥ /</l>
<l>purā spṛśanti vāṃ mlecchās tad ito viśataṃ vanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.16'>
<lg>
<l>tān vilokya sutā-bhārye rājā dharmo jagāda saḥ /</l>
<l>purā spṛśanti vāṃ mlecchās tad ito viśataṃ vanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.17' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>iti rājñoditā rajñī vanamadhyaṃ viveśa sā /</l>
<l>lāvaṇyavatyā sutayā sārdhaṃ candravatī bhayāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.17'>
<lg>
<l>iti rājña ūditā rajñī vana-madhyaṃ viveśa sā /</l>
<l>lāvaṇyavatyā sutayā sārdhaṃ candravatī bhayāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.18' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>rājāpy abhimukhāyātān khaḍgacarmadharo 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>avadhīt tān bahūñ śūraḥ śabarāñ śaravartiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.18'>
<lg>
<l>rāja āpy abhimukha-āyātān khaḍga-carma-dharo 'tra saḥ /</l>
<l>avadhīt tān bahūñ śūraḥ śabarāñ śara-vartiṇaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.19' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatas tenā-khilā pallī patyājñaptā nipatya tam /</l>
<l>prahārakṣatacarmāṇam avadhīn nṛpam ekakam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.19'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tena a-khilā pallī patyā ājñaptā nipatya tam /</l>
<l>prahāra-kṣata-carmāṇam avadhīn nṛ-pam ekakam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.20' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>gṛhītābharaṇe yāte dasyusainye vilokya tam /</l>
<l>bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dūrād vanagulmāntarasthitā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.20'>
<lg>
<l>gṛhīta-ābharaṇe yāte dasyu-sainye vilokya tam /</l>
<l>bhartāraṃ nihataṃ dūrād vana-gulma-antara-sthitā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.21' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>rājñī candravatī sātra duhitrā saha vihvalā /</l>
<l>palāyamānā gahanaṃ dūram anvag agād vanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.21'>
<lg>
<l>rājñī candravatī sa ātra duhitrā saha vihvalā /</l>
<l>palāyamānā gahanaṃ dūram anvag agād vanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.22' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatra madhyāhnatāpārtāsv iva mūlāni śākhinām /</l>
<l>chāyāsv api praviṣṭāsu śiśirāṇi sahādhvagaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.22'>
<lg>
<l>tatra madhya-ahna-tāpa-ārtāsv iva mūlāni śākhinām /</l>
<l>chāyāsv api praviṣṭāsu śiśirāṇi saha adhva-gaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.23' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ekadeśe 'bjasarasas tīre 'śokataros tale /</l>
<l>śokārtā rudatī śrāntā sasutā samupāviśat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.23'>
<lg>
<l>eka-deśe 'b-ja-sarasas tīre 'śoka-taros tale /</l>
<l>śoka-ārtā rudatī śrāntā sa-sutā samupāviśat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.24' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tāvat tad vanam abhyarṇanivāsī mṛgayākṛte /</l>
<l>mahāmanuṣyaḥ ko 'py āgād aśvārūḍhaḥ saputrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.24'>
<lg>
<l>tāvat tad vanam abhyarṇa-nivāsī mṛgayā-kṛte /</l>
<l>mahā-manuṣyaḥ ko 'py āgād aśva-ārūḍhaḥ sa-putrakaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.25' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>sa caṇḍasiṃhanāmā taṃ putraṃ siṃhaparākramam /</l>
<l>uvāca dṛṣṭvātra tayoḥ pāṃsūtthe padapaddhatī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.25'>
<lg>
<l>sa caṇḍasiṃha-nāmā taṃ putraṃ siṃhaparākramam /</l>
<l>uvāca dṛṣṭva ātra tayoḥ pāṃsu-utthe pada-paddhatī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.26' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ete surekhe subhage anusṛtyāpnuvo yadi /</l>
<l>strīyau te tat tayor ekāṃ svīkuruṣva yathāruci //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.26'>
<lg>
<l>ete surekhe subhage anusṛtyā apnuvo yadi /</l>
<l>strīyau te tat tayor ekāṃ svī-kuruṣva yathā-ruci //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.27' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ taṃ smāha putraḥ siṃhaparākramaḥ /</l>
<l>yasyāḥ sūkṣmāv imau pādau sā bhāryā pratibhāti me //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.27'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ taṃ smā aha putraḥ siṃhaparākramaḥ /</l>
<l>yasyāḥ sūkṣmāv imau pādau sā bhāryā pratibhāti me //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.28' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>sā hi svalpavayā nūnaṃ jāne samucitā mama /</l>
<l>bṛhatpādā tu yogyeyam etajjyeṣṭhavayās tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.28'>
<lg>
<l>sā hi svalpa-vayā nūnaṃ jāne samucitā mama /</l>
<l>bṛhat-pādā tu yogya īyam etaj-jyeṣṭha-vayās tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.29' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>iti sūnor vacaḥ śrutvā caṇḍasiṃho jagāda tam /</l>
<l>kaiṣā kathā bhavanmātā pratyagraṃ hi gatā divam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.29'>
<lg>
<l>iti sūnor vacaḥ śrutvā caṇḍasiṃho jagāda tam /</l>
<l>ka aiṣā kathā bhavan-mātā pratyagraṃ hi gatā divam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.30' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tādṛśe sukalatre ca gate kānyatra vāsanā /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'pi putras taṃ caṇḍasiṃham abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.30'>
<lg>
<l>tādṛśe su-kalatre ca gate ka ānyatra vāsanā /</l>
<l>tac chrutvā so 'pi putras taṃ caṇḍasiṃham abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.31' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tāta maivam abhāryaṃ hi śūnyaṃ gṛhapater gṛham /</l>
<l>anyac ca mūladevoktā gāthā kiṃ na śrutā tvayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.31'>
<lg>
<l>tāta ma aivam a-bhāryaṃ hi śūnyaṃ gṛha-pater gṛham /</l>
<l>anyac ca mūladeva-uktā gāthā kiṃ na śrutā tvayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.32' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>yatra ghanastanajaghanā nāste mārgāvalokinī kāntā /</l>
<l>ajaḍaḥ kas tad anigaḍaṃ praviśati gṛhasaṃjñakaṃ durgam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.32'>
<lg>
<l>yatra ghana-stana-jaghanā nā aste mārga-avalokinī kāntā /</l>
<l>a-jaḍaḥ kas tad a-nigaḍaṃ praviśati gṛha-saṃjñakaṃ durgam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.33' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>taj jīvitena me tāta śāpito 'si na tāṃ yadi /</l>
<l>dvitīyāṃ madabhīṣṭāyāṃ bhāryārthe svīkarīṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.33'>
<lg>
<l>taj jīvitena me tāta śāpito 'si na tāṃ yadi /</l>
<l>dvitīyāṃ mad-abhīṣṭāyāṃ bhāryā-arthe svī-karīṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.34' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>etat putravacaḥ śrutvā pratipadya ca tatsakhaḥ /</l>
<l>sa caṇḍasiṃho 'nusaran padapaṅktiṃ śanair yayau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.34'>
<lg>
<l>etat putra-vacaḥ śrutvā pratipadya ca tat-sakhaḥ /</l>
<l>sa caṇḍasiṃho 'nusaran pada-paṅktiṃ śanair yayau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.35' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>prāpya tac ca saraḥsthānaṃ muktātāraughamaṇḍitām /</l>
<l>śyāmāṃ caṇdravatīṃ rājñīṃ tāṃ dadarśāvabhāsitām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.35'>
<lg>
<l>prāpya tac ca saraḥ-sthānaṃ muktā-tārā-ogha-maṇḍitām /</l>
<l>śyāmāṃ caṇdravatīṃ rājñīṃ tāṃ dadarśa avabhāsitām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.36' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>lāvaṇyavatyā sutayā jyotsnayevāvadātayā /</l>
<l>naiśīṃ dyām iva madhyāhne tarucchāyām upāśritām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.36'>
<lg>
<l>lāvaṇyavatyā sutayā jyotsnaya īva avadātayā /</l>
<l>naiśīṃ dyām iva madhya-ahne taru-cchāyām upāśritām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.37' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>upāyayau ca putreṇa sākaṃ tāṃ sa sakautukaḥ /</l>
<l>sāpi dṛṣṭvā tam uttasthau vitrastā cauraśaṅkinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.37'>
<lg>
<l>upāyayau ca putreṇa sākaṃ tāṃ sa sa-kautukaḥ /</l>
<l>sa āpi dṛṣṭvā tam uttasthau vitrastā caura-śaṅkinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.38' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>alaṃ trāsena nāmbaitau caurau saumyākṛtī imau /</l>
<l>suveṣau kaucid ākheṭakṛte nūnam ihāgatau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.38'>
<lg>
<l>alaṃ trāsena na amba etau caurau saumya-ākṛtī imau /</l>
<l>su-veṣau kau-cid ākheṭa-kṛte nūnam ihā agatau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.39' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ity uktā sutayā rājñī yāvad dolāyate 'tra sā /</l>
<l>tāvad aśvāvatīrṇas te caṇḍasiṃḥo 'bravīd ubhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.39'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktā sutayā rājñī yāvad dolāyate 'tra sā /</l>
<l>tāvad aśva-avatīrṇas te caṇḍasiṃḥo 'bravīd ubhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.40' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>kiṃ saṃbhrameṇa vām āvāṃ praṇayād draṣṭum āgatau /</l>
<l>tad visvasya niḥātaṅke vadataṃ ke yuvām iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.40'>
<lg>
<l>kiṃ saṃbhrameṇa vām āvāṃ praṇayād draṣṭum āgatau /</l>
<l>tad visvasya niḥ-ātaṅke vadataṃ ke yuvām iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.41' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>haranetrānalajvālādagdhamanmathaduḥsthite /</l>
<l>ratiprītī ivāraṇyam idam evam upāgate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.41'>
<lg>
<l>hara-netra-anala-jvālā-dagdha-manmatha-duḥsthite /</l>
<l>rati-prītī iva araṇyam idam evam upāgate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.42' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>praviṣṭe sthaḥ kathaṃ ceha bata niḥmānuṣe vane /</l>
<l>ratnaprāsādavāsārham idaṃ hi yuvayor vapuḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.42'>
<lg>
<l>praviṣṭe sthaḥ kathaṃ ca iha bata niḥ-mānuṣe vane /</l>
<l>ratna-prāsāda-vāsa-arham idaṃ hi yuvayor vapuḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.43' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>kathaṃ varāṅganotsaṅgayogyau kaṇṭakinīm imām /</l>
<l>bhuvaṃ vāṃ caraṇau bhrāntāv iti nau manasi vyathā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.43'>
<lg>
<l>kathaṃ vara-aṅganā-utsaṅga-yogyau kaṇṭakinīm imām /</l>
<l>bhuvaṃ vāṃ caraṇau bhrāntāv iti nau manasi vyathā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.44' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>eṣā ca citraṃ yuvayoḥ patantī dhūlir ānane /</l>
<l>vātoddhūtā hatachāyam āvayoḥ kurute mukham //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.44'>
<lg>
<l>eṣā ca citraṃ yuvayoḥ patantī dhūlir ānane /</l>
<l>vāta-uddhūtā hata-chāyam āvayoḥ kurute mukham //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.45' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>bhavatyor eṣaś cāṅge 'smin nipatan puṣpapeśale /</l>
<l>kiraṇoṣmā dahaty asmān uccaṇḍaś caṇḍadīdhiteḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.45'>
<lg>
<l>bhavatyor eṣaś ca aṅge 'smin nipatan puṣpa-peśale /</l>
<l>kiraṇa-uṣmā dahaty asmān uccaṇḍaś caṇḍa-dīdhiteḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.46' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tad brūtam ātmavṛttāntaṃ dūyate hṛdayaṃ hi naḥ /</l>
<l>draṣṭuṃ na śaknumo 'raṇye sthitiṃ vāṃ svāpadāvṛte //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.46'>
<lg>
<l>tad brūtam ātma-vṛtta-antaṃ dūyate hṛdayaṃ hi naḥ /</l>
<l>draṣṭuṃ na śaknumo 'raṇye sthitiṃ vāṃ svā-pada-āvṛte //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.47' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ity ukte caṇḍasiṃhena rājñī niḥsvasya sā śanaiḥ /</l>
<l>lajjāśokākulā tasmai svaṃ vṛttāntam avarṇayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.47'>
<lg>
<l>ity ukte caṇḍasiṃhena rājñī niḥsvasya sā śanaiḥ /</l>
<l>lajjā-śoka-ākulā tasmai svaṃ vṛtta-antam avarṇayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.48' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tato niḥsvāmikāṃ matvā tām āśvāsya ca sātmajām /</l>
<l>svīcakre madhurair vākyaiś caṇḍasiṃho 'nurañjayan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.48'>
<lg>
<l>tato niḥsvāmikāṃ matvā tām āśvāsya ca sa-ātma-jām /</l>
<l>svī-cakre madhurair vākyaiś caṇḍasiṃho 'nurañjayan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.49' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>āropya cāsvayoḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ saputras tāṃ saputrikām /</l>
<l>nināya vittapapurīsamṛddhāṃ vasatiṃ nijām //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.49'>
<lg>
<l>āropya ca asvayoḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ sa-putras tāṃ sa-putrikām /</l>
<l>nināya vittapapurī-samṛddhāṃ vasatiṃ nijām //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.50' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>sāpi janmāntaragatevā-vaśāṅgīcakāra tam /</l>
<l>anāthā kṛcchrapatitā videśe strī karoti kim //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.50'>
<lg>
<l>sa āpi janma-antara-gata īva a-vaśa āṅgī-cakāra tam /</l>
<l>a-nāthā kṛcchra-patitā videśe strī karoti kim //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.51' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatas tāṃ sūkṣmapādatvād rājñīṃ siṃhaparākramaḥ /</l>
<l>caṇḍasiṃhasutas tatra bhāryāṃ caṇdravatīṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.51'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tāṃ sūkṣma-pādatvād rājñīṃ siṃhaparākramaḥ /</l>
<l>caṇḍasiṃha-sutas tatra bhāryāṃ caṇdravatīṃ vyadhāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.52' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatsutāṃ tāṃ ca lāvaṇyavatīṃ nṛpatikanyakām /</l>
<l>bṛhattvāt pādayor bhāryāṃ caṇḍasiṃhaś cakāra saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.52'>
<lg>
<l>tat-sutāṃ tāṃ ca lāvaṇya-vatīṃ nṛ-pati-kanyakām /</l>
<l>bṛhattvāt pādayor bhāryāṃ caṇḍasiṃhaś cakāra saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.53' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>prāK hi sūkṣmabṛhatpādamudrāpaṅktidvayekṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>pratipannaṃ tathā tābhyāṃ satyaṃ kaś cātivartate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.53'>
<lg>
<l>prāK hi sūkṣma-bṛhat-pāda-mudrā-paṅkti-dvaya-īkṣaṇāt /</l>
<l>pratipannaṃ tathā tābhyāṃ satyaṃ kaś ca ativartate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.54' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>evaṃ pādaviparyāsāt te pitāputrayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>duhitāmātarau bhārye jāte śvaśrūsnuṣe tadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.54'>
<lg>
<l>evaṃ pāda-viparyāsāt te pitā-putrayos tayoḥ /</l>
<l>duhitā-mātarau bhārye jāte śvaśrū-snuṣe tadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.55' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>kālena ca tayos tābhyāṃ bhartṛbhyāṃ jajñire dvayoḥ /</l>
<l>putrā duhitaraś caiva teṣām anye 'py atha kramāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.55'>
<lg>
<l>kālena ca tayos tābhyāṃ bhartṛbhyāṃ jajñire dvayoḥ /</l>
<l>putrā duhitaraś ca eva teṣām anye 'py atha kramāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.56' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>itthaṃ saṃprāpya tau caṇḍasiṃhasiṃhaparākramau /</l>
<l>tasthatus tatra lāvaṇyavatīṃ candravatīṃ ca te //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.56'>
<lg>
<l>itthaṃ saṃprāpya tau caṇḍa-siṃha-siṃhaparākramau /</l>
<l>tasthatus tatra lāvaṇya-vatīṃ candravatīṃ ca te //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.57' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>iti vyāvarṇya vetālas tadā pathi kathāṃ niśi /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ papraccha nṛpatiṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.57'>
<lg>
<l>iti vyāvarṇya vetālas tadā pathi kathāṃ niśi /</l>
<l>sa trivikramasenaṃ taṃ papraccha nṛ-patiṃ punaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.58' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tayor mātāduhitror ye putrapitros tayor nṛpa /</l>
<l>sakāśāj jantavo jātāḥ kramād ubhayapakṣayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.58'>
<lg>
<l>tayor mātā-duhitror ye putra-pitros tayor nṛ-pa /</l>
<l>sakāśāj jantavo jātāḥ kramād ubhaya-pakṣayoḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.59' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>jñātvedaṃ brūhi me teṣām anyo'nyaṃ ke bhavanti te /</l>
<l>pūrvoktaḥ so 'tra śāpas te jānānaś cen na vakṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.59'>
<lg>
<l>jñātva īdaṃ brūhi me teṣām anyo'nyaṃ ke bhavanti te /</l>
<l>pūrva-uktaḥ so 'tra śāpas te jānānaś cen na vakṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.60' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>etad vetālataḥ śrutvā vimṛśan bahudhāpi saḥ /</l>
<l>nājñāsīt tad yadā rājā tūṣṇīkaḥ prayayau tadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.60'>
<lg>
<l>etad vetālataḥ śrutvā vimṛśan bahudha āpi saḥ /</l>
<l>na ajñāsīt tad yadā rājā tūṣṇīkaḥ prayayau tadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.61' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tatas tadaṃsakūṭastho vetālo vihasan hṛdi /</l>
<l>mṛtapūruṣadehānto niviṣṭaḥ samacintayat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.61'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tad-aṃsa-kūṭa-stho vetālo vihasan hṛdi /</l>
<l>mṛta-pūruṣa-deha-anto niviṣṭaḥ samacintayat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.62' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>nāyaṃ rājā mahāpraśne vetty asmin dātum uttaram /</l>
<l>tena tūṣṇīṃ vrajaty eṣa hṛṣṭo 'ticaturaiḥ padaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.62'>
<lg>
<l>na ayaṃ rājā mahā-praśne vetty asmin dātum uttaram /</l>
<l>tena tūṣṇīṃ vrajaty eṣa hṛṣṭo 'ti-caturaiḥ padaiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.63' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>na ca vañcayituṃ śakyaḥ sattvarāśir ayaṃ param /</l>
<l>krīḍan bhikṣuḥ sa cāsmābhir iyataiva na śāmyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.63'>
<lg>
<l>na ca vañcayituṃ śakyaḥ sattva-rāśir ayaṃ param /</l>
<l>krīḍan bhikṣuḥ sa ca asmābhir iyata aiva na śāmyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.64' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tad adya vañcayitvā taṃ durātmānam upāyataḥ /</l>
<l>tatsiddhiṃ bhāvikalyāṇe rājany asmin niveśaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.64'>
<lg>
<l>tad adya vañcayitvā taṃ dur-ātmānam upāyataḥ /</l>
<l>tat-siddhiṃ bhāvi-kalyāṇe rājany asmin niveśaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.65' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ity ālocya sa vetālo nṛpaṃ tam avadat tadā /</l>
<l>rājan kṛṣṇaniśāghore smaśāne 'smin gatāgataiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.65'>
<lg>
<l>ity ālocya sa vetālo nṛ-paṃ tam avadat tadā /</l>
<l>rājan kṛṣṇa-niśā-ghore smaśāne 'smin gata-āgataiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.66' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>etaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ sukhārhas tvaṃ na vikalpaś ca ko 'pi te /</l>
<l>tad āścaryeṇa dhairyeṇa tuṣṭo 'ham amunā tava //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.66'>
<lg>
<l>etaiḥ kliṣṭaḥ sukha-arhas tvaṃ na vikalpaś ca ko 'pi te /</l>
<l>tad āścaryeṇa dhairyeṇa tuṣṭo 'ham amunā tava //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.67' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>śavam etaṃ nayedānīṃ nirgacchāmy amuto hy aham /</l>
<l>idaṃ tu śṛṇu yad vacmi hitaṃ tava kuruṣva ca //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.67'>
<lg>
<l>śavam etaṃ naya idānīṃ nirgacchāmy amuto hy aham /</l>
<l>idaṃ tu śṛṇu yad vacmi hitaṃ tava kuruṣva ca //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.68' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>ānītam etad bhavatā yasyārthe nṛkalevaram /</l>
<l>kubhikṣuḥ so 'dya mām asmin samāhūyārcayiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.68'>
<lg>
<l>ānītam etad bhavatā yasya arthe nṛ-kalevaram /</l>
<l>ku-bhikṣuḥ so 'dya mām asmin samāhūya arcayiṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.69' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>upahārīcikīrṣuś ca tvām eva sa śaṭhas tataḥ /</l>
<l>bhūmau praṇāmam aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ kurv iti vakṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.69'>
<lg>
<l>upahārī-cikīrṣuś ca tvām eva sa śaṭhas tataḥ /</l>
<l>bhūmau praṇāmam aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ kurv iti vakṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.70' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tvaṃ prāg darśaya tāvan me kariṣye 'haṃ tathaiva tat /</l>
<l>iti so 'pi mahārāja vaktavyah śramaṇas tvayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.70'>
<lg>
<l>tvaṃ prāg darśaya tāvan me kariṣye 'haṃ tatha aiva tat /</l>
<l>iti so 'pi mahā-rāja vaktavyah śramaṇas tvayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.71' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tato nipatya bhūtau sa praṇāmaṃ yāvad eva te /</l>
<l>darśayiṣyati tāvat tvaṃ chindyās tasyāsinā śiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.71'>
<lg>
<l>tato nipatya bhūtau sa praṇāmaṃ yāvad eva te /</l>
<l>darśayiṣyati tāvat tvaṃ chindyās tasya asinā śiraḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.72' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tato vidyādharaiśvaryasiddhir yā tasya vāñchitā /</l>
<l>tāṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasi bhuṅkṣvemaṃ bhuvaṃ tadupahārataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.72'>
<lg>
<l>tato vidyādhara-aiśvarya-siddhir yā tasya vāñchitā /</l>
<l>tāṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasi bhuṅkṣva īmaṃ bhuvaṃ tad-upahārataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.73' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>anyathā tu sa bhikṣus tvām upahārīkariṣyati /</l>
<l>etadarthaṃ kṛto vighnas tavātreyac ciraṃ mayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.73'>
<lg>
<l>anyathā tu sa bhikṣus tvām upahārī-kariṣyati /</l>
<l>etad-arthaṃ kṛto vighnas tava atra iyac ciraṃ mayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.74' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>tat siddhir astu te gacchety uktvā tasyāṃsapṛṣṭhagāt /</l>
<l>nirgatya sa yayau tasmād vetālaḥ pretakāyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.74'>
<lg>
<l>tat siddhir astu te gaccha ity uktvā tasya aṃsa-pṛṣṭha-gāt /</l>
<l>nirgatya sa yayau tasmād vetālaḥ preta-kāyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.31.75' corresp='Vet_24'>
<l>atha sa narapatis taṃ prītavetālavākyāc chramaṇam ahitam eva kṣāntiśīlaṃ vicintya /</l>
<l>vaṭaviṭapitalaṃ tat tasya pārśvaṃ pratasthe mṛtapuruṣaśarīraṃ tad gṛhītvā prahṛṣṭaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.31.75'>
<lg>
<l>atha sa nara-patis taṃ prīta-vetāla-vākyāc chramaṇam ahitam eva kṣāntiśīlaṃ vicintya /</l>
<l>vaṭa-viṭapi-talaṃ tat tasya pārśvaṃ pratasthe mṛta-puruṣa-śarīraṃ tad gṛhītvā prahṛṣṭaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.1' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tatas tasyāntikaṃ bhikṣoḥ kṣāntiśīlasya bhūpatiḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tra prāpa skandhe śavaṃ vahan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.1'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tasya antikaṃ bhikṣoḥ kṣāntiśīlasya bhū-patiḥ /</l>
<l>sa trivikramaseno 'tra prāpa skandhe śavaṃ vahan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.2' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>dadarśa taṃ ca śramaṇaṃ mārgābhimukham ekakam /</l>
<l>kṛṣṇapakṣakṣapāraudre śmaśāne tarumūlagam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.2'>
<lg>
<l>dadarśa taṃ ca śramaṇaṃ mārga-abhimukham ekakam /</l>
<l>kṛṣṇa-pakṣa-kṣapā-raudre śmaśāne taru-mūla-gam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.3' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>asṛgliptasthale gaureṇāsthicūrṇena nirmite /</l>
<l>maṇḍale dikṣu vinyastapūrṇaśoṇitakumbhake //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.3'>
<lg>
<l>asṛg-lipta-sthale gaureṇa asthi-cūrṇena nirmite /</l>
<l>maṇḍale dikṣu vinyasta-pūrṇa-śoṇita-kumbhake //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.4' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>mahātailapradīpāḍhye hutapārśvasthavahnini /</l>
<l>saṃbhṛtocitasaṃbhāre sveṣṭadaivatapūjane //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.4'>
<lg>
<l>mahā-taila-pradīpa-āḍhye huta-pārśva-stha-vahnini /</l>
<l>saṃbhṛta-ucita-saṃbhāre sva-iṣṭa-daivata-pūjane //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.5' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>upāgāc ca sa taṃ rājā so 'pi bhikṣur vilokya tam /</l>
<l>ānītamaṭakaṃ harṣād utthāyovāca saṃstuvan //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.5'>
<lg>
<l>upāgāc ca sa taṃ rājā so 'pi bhikṣur vilokya tam /</l>
<l>ānīta-maṭakaṃ harṣād utthāya uvāca saṃstuvan //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.6' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>duḥkaro me mahārāja vihito 'nugrahas tvayā /</l>
<l>tvā dṛśāḥ kva kva ceṣṭeyaṃ deśakālau kva cedṛśau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.6'>
<lg>
<l>duḥ-karo me mahā-rāja vihito 'nugrahas tvayā /</l>
<l>tvā dṛśāḥ kva kva ceṣṭa īyaṃ deśa-kālau kva cā idṛśau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.7' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>niḥkampaṃ satyam evāhur mukhyaṃ tvāṃ kulabhūbhṛtām /</l>
<l>evam ātmānapekṣeṇa parārtho yena sādhyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.7'>
<lg>
<l>niḥ-kampaṃ satyam evā ahur mukhyaṃ tvāṃ kula-bhū-bhṛtām /</l>
<l>evam ātma-an-apekṣeṇa para-artho yena sādhyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.8' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>etad eva mahattvaṃ ca mahatām ucyate budhaiḥ /</l>
<l>pratipannād acalanaṃ prāṇānām atyaye 'pi yat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.8'>
<lg>
<l>etad eva mahattvaṃ ca mahatām ucyate budhaiḥ /</l>
<l>pratipannād acalanaṃ prāṇānām atyaye 'pi yat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.9' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>iti bruvan sa siddhārthamānī bhikṣur mahīpateḥ /</l>
<l>tasyāvatārayāmāsa skandhāt taṃ maṭakaṃ tadā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.9'>
<lg>
<l>iti bruvan sa siddha-artha-mānī bhikṣur mahī-pateḥ /</l>
<l>tasya avatārayāmāsa skandhāt taṃ maṭakaṃ tadā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.10' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>snapayitvā samālabhya baddhamālyaṃ vidhāya ca /</l>
<l>maṭakaṃ maṇḍalasyāntaḥ sthāpayāmāsa tasya tat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.10'>
<lg>
<l>snapayitvā samālabhya baddha-mālyaṃ vidhāya ca /</l>
<l>maṭakaṃ maṇḍalasya antaḥ sthāpayāmāsa tasya tat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.11' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>bhasmoddhūlitagātraś ca keśayajñopavītabhṛt /</l>
<l>prāvṛtapretavasano bhūtvā dhyānasthitaḥ kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.11'>
<lg>
<l>bhasma-uddhūlita-gātraś ca keśa-yajña-upavīta-bhṛt /</l>
<l>prāvṛta-preta-vasano bhūtvā dhyāna-sthitaḥ kṣaṇam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.12' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tasmin mantrabalāhūtaṃ praveśya nṛkalevare /</l>
<l>taṃ vetālavaraṃ bhikṣuḥ pūjayāmāsa sa kramāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.12'>
<lg>
<l>tasmin mantra-bala-āhūtaṃ praveśya nṛ-kalevare /</l>
<l>taṃ vetāla-varaṃ bhikṣuḥ pūjayāmāsa sa kramāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.13' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>dadau tasmai kapālārghapātreṇārghyaṃ suniḥmalaiḥ /</l>
<l>naradantais tataḥ puṣpaṃ sugāndhi ca vilepanam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.13'>
<lg>
<l>dadau tasmai kapāla-argha-pātreṇa arghyaṃ su-niḥ-malaiḥ /</l>
<l>nara-dantais tataḥ puṣpaṃ sugāndhi ca vilepanam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.14' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>dattvā mānuṣanetraiś ca dhūpaṃ māṃsair baliṃ tathā /</l>
<l>samāpya pūjāṃ rājānaṃ tam uvāca sa pārśvagam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.14'>
<lg>
<l>dattvā mānuṣa-netraiś ca dhūpaṃ māṃsair baliṃ tathā /</l>
<l>samāpya pūjāṃ rājānaṃ tam uvāca sa pārśva-gam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.15' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>rājann ihāsya mantrādhirājasya kṛtasaṃvidheḥ /</l>
<l>praṇāmam aṅgair aṣṭābhir nipatya kuru bhūtale //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.15'>
<lg>
<l>rājann iha asya mantra-adhi-rājasya kṛta-saṃvidheḥ /</l>
<l>praṇāmam aṅgair aṣṭābhir nipatya kuru bhū-tale //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.16' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>yenābhipretasiddhiṃ te dāsyaty eṣa varapradaḥ /</l>
<l>śrutvaitat smṛtavetālavacā rājābravīt sa tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.16'>
<lg>
<l>yena abhipreta-siddhiṃ te dāsyaty eṣa vara-pradaḥ /</l>
<l>śrutva aitat smṛta-vetāla-vacā rāja ābravīt sa tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.17' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>nāhaṃ jānāmi tat pūrvaṃ pradarśayatu me bhavān /</l>
<l>tatas tathaiva tad ahaṃ kariṣye bhagavann iti //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.17'>
<lg>
<l>na ahaṃ jānāmi tat pūrvaṃ pradarśayatu me bhavān /</l>
<l>tatas tatha aiva tad ahaṃ kariṣye bhagavann iti //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.18' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tato darśayituṃ yāvat sa bhikṣuḥ patito bhuvi /</l>
<l>tāvat khaḍgaprahāreṇa sa rājāsya śiro 'cchinat //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.18'>
<lg>
<l>tato darśayituṃ yāvat sa bhikṣuḥ patito bhuvi /</l>
<l>tāvat khaḍga-prahāreṇa sa rāja āsya śiro 'cchinat //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.19' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>ācakarṣa ca hṛtpadmam udarād asya pāṭitam /</l>
<l>vetālāya ca tasmai tacchiraḥhṛtkamalaṃ dadau //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.19'>
<lg>
<l>ācakarṣa ca hṛt-padmam udarād asya pāṭitam /</l>
<l>vetālāya ca tasmai tac-chiraḥ-hṛt-kamalaṃ dadau //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.20' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>sādhuvāde tato datte prītair bhūtagaṇais tataḥ /</l>
<l>tuṣṭo 'bravīt sa vetālo nṛpaṃ taṃ nṛkalevarāt //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.20'>
<lg>
<l>sādhu-vāde tato datte prītair bhūta-gaṇais tataḥ /</l>
<l>tuṣṭo 'bravīt sa vetālo nṛ-paṃ taṃ nṛ-kalevarāt //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.21' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>rājan vidyādharendratvaṃ bhikṣor āsīd yad īpsitam /</l>
<l>tat tāvad bhūmisāmrājyabhogānte te bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.21'>
<lg>
<l>rājan vidyādhara-indratvaṃ bhikṣor āsīd yad īpsitam /</l>
<l>tat tāvad bhūmi-sāmrājya-bhoga-ante te bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.22' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>kleśito 'si mayā yat tvaṃ tad abhīṣṭaṃ varaṃ vṛṇu /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ sa rājā tam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.22'>
<lg>
<l>kleśito 'si mayā yat tvaṃ tad abhīṣṭaṃ varaṃ vṛṇu /</l>
<l>ity uktavantaṃ vetālaṃ sa rājā tam abhāṣata //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.23' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tvaṃ cet prasannaḥ ko nāma na siddho 'bhimato varaḥ /</l>
<l>tathāpy amoghavacanād idaṃ tvatto 'ham arthaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.23'>
<lg>
<l>tvaṃ cet prasannaḥ ko nāma na siddho 'bhimato varaḥ /</l>
<l>tatha āpy a-mogha-vacanād idaṃ tvatto 'ham arthaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.24' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>ādyāḥ praśnakathā etā nānākhyānamanaḥramāḥ /</l>
<l>caturviṃśatir eṣā ca pañcaviṃśī samāptigā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.24'>
<lg>
<l>ādyāḥ praśna-kathā etā nānā-ākhyāna-manaḥ-ramāḥ /</l>
<l>caturviṃśatir eṣā ca pañcaviṃśī samāpti-gā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.25' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>sarvāḥ khyātā bhavantv etāḥ pūjanīyāś ca bhūtale /</l>
<l>iti tenārthito rājñā vetālo nijagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.25'>
<lg>
<l>sarvāḥ khyātā bhavantv etāḥ pūjanīyāś ca bhū-tale /</l>
<l>iti tena arthito rājñā vetālo nijagāda saḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.26' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>evam astu viśeṣaṃ ca śṛṇu vacmy atra bhūtale /</l>
<l>yāś caturviṃśatiḥ pūrvā yaiṣā caikā samāpinī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.26'>
<lg>
<l>evam astu viśeṣaṃ ca śṛṇu vacmy atra bhū-tale /</l>
<l>yāś caturviṃśatiḥ pūrvā ya aiṣā ca ekā samāpinī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.27' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>kathāvalīyaṃ vetālapañcaviṃśatikākhyayā /</l>
<l>khyātā jagati pūjyā ca śivā caiva bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.27'>
<lg>
<l>kathā-āvali īyaṃ vetāla-pañcaviṃśatika-ākhyayā /</l>
<l>khyātā jagati pūjyā ca śivā ca eva bhaviṣyati //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.28' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>yaḥ ślokamātram apy asyāḥ kathayiṣyati sādaraḥ /</l>
<l>yo vā śroṣyati tau sadyo muktapāpau bhaviṣyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.28'>
<lg>
<l>yaḥ śloka-mātram apy asyāḥ kathayiṣyati sa-ādaraḥ /</l>
<l>yo vā śroṣyati tau sadyo mukta-pāpau bhaviṣyataḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.29' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>yakṣavetālakūṣmāṇḍaḍākinīrākṣasādayaḥ /</l>
<l>na tatra prabhaviṣyanti yatraiṣā kīrtayiṣyate //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.29'>
<lg>
<l>yakṣa-vetāla-kūṣmāṇḍa-ḍākinī-rākṣasa-ādayaḥ /</l>
<l>na tatra prabhaviṣyanti yatra eṣā kīrtayiṣyate //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.30' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>ity uktvā sa yayau tasmān nirgatya nṛkalevarāt /</l>
<l>yathābhirucitaṃ dhāma vetālo yogamāyayā //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.30'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā sa yayau tasmān nirgatya nṛ-kalevarāt /</l>
<l>yatha ābhirucitaṃ dhāma vetālo yoga-māyayā //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.31' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tatas tatra suraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājñas tasya maheśvaraḥ /</l>
<l>sākṣād āvirabhūt tuṣṭaḥ praṇataṃ cādideśa tam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.31'>
<lg>
<l>tatas tatra suraiḥ sārdhaṃ rājñas tasya maheśvaraḥ /</l>
<l>sākṣād āvirabhūt tuṣṭaḥ praṇataṃ cā adideśa tam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.32' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>sādhu vatsa hato 'dyāyaṃ yat tvayā kūṭatāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>vidyādharamahācakravartitāhaṭhakāmukaḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.32'>
<lg>
<l>sādhu vatsa hato 'dya ayaṃ yat tvayā kūṭa-tāpasaḥ /</l>
<l>vidyādhara-mahā-cakra-vartitā-haṭha-kāmukaḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.33' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tvam ādau vikramādityaḥ sṛṣṭo 'bhūḥ svāṃśato mayā /</l>
<l>mleccharūpāvatīrṇānām asurāṇāṃ praśāntaye //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.33'>
<lg>
<l>tvam ādau vikramādityaḥ sṛṣṭo 'bhūḥ sva-aṃśato mayā /</l>
<l>mleccha-rūpa-avatīrṇānām asurāṇāṃ praśāntaye //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.34' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>adya coddāmaduḥvṛttadamanāya mayā punaḥ /</l>
<l>tvaṃ trivikramasenākhyo hīraḥ sṛṣṭo 'tra bhūpatiḥ //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.34'>
<lg>
<l>adya ca uddāma-duḥ-vṛtta-damanāya mayā punaḥ /</l>
<l>tvaṃ trivikramasena-ākhyo hīraḥ sṛṣṭo 'tra bhū-patiḥ //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.35' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>ataḥ sadvīpapātālāṃ sthāpayitvā mahīṃ vaśe /</l>
<l>vidyādharāṇam acirād adhirājo bhaviṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.35'>
<lg>
<l>ataḥ sa-dvīpa-pātālāṃ sthāpayitvā mahīṃ vaśe /</l>
<l>vidyādharāṇam a-cirād adhirājo bhaviṣyasi //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.36' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>bhuktvā divyāṃś ciraṃ bhogān udvignaḥ svecchayaiva tān /</l>
<l>tyaktvā mamaiva sāyujyam ante yāsyasy asaṃśayam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.36'>
<lg>
<l>bhuktvā divyāṃś ciraṃ bhogān udvignaḥ sva-icchaya aiva tān /</l>
<l>tyaktvā mama eva sāyujyam ante yāsyasy a-saṃśayam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.37' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>aparājitanāmānaṃ khaḍgaṃ caitaṃ gṛhāṇa me /</l>
<l>yasya prasādāt sarvaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasy etad yathoditam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.37'>
<lg>
<l>aparājita-nāmānaṃ khaḍgaṃ ca etaṃ gṛhāṇa me /</l>
<l>yasya prasādāt sarvaṃ tvaṃ prāpsyasy etad yatha ūditam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.38' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>ity uktvā khaḍgaratnaṃ tad dattvā tasmai mahībhṛte /</l>
<l>vākpuṣpābhyarcitas tena devaḥ śaṃbhus tiraḥdadhe //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.38'>
<lg>
<l>ity uktvā khaḍga-ratnaṃ tad dattvā tasmai mahī-bhṛte /</l>
<l>vāk-puṣpa-abhyarcitas tena devaḥ śaṃbhus tiraḥ-dadhe //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.39' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>atha dṛṣṭvā samāptaṃ kāryam aśeṣaṃ niśi prabhātāyām /</l>
<l>praviveśa sa trivikramasenaḥ svapuraṃ nṛpaḥ pratiṣṭhānam //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.39'>
<lg>
<l>atha dṛṣṭvā samāptaṃ kāryam a-śeṣaṃ niśi prabhātāyām /</l>
<l>praviveśa sa trivikramasenaḥ sva-puraṃ nṛ-paḥ pratiṣṭhānam //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.40' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>tatra kramāvagatarātriviceṣṭitābhir abhyarcitaḥ prakṛtibhir vitatotsavābhiḥ /</l>
<l>snānapradānagiriśārcananṛttagītavādyādibhis tad akhilaṃ sa dinaṃ nināya //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.40'>
<lg>
<l>tatra krama-avagata-rātri-viceṣṭitābhir abhyarcitaḥ prakṛtibhir vitata-utsavābhiḥ /</l>
<l>snāna-pradāna-giriśa-arcana-nṛtta-gīta-vādya-ādibhis tad a-khilaṃ sa dinaṃ nināya //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='SoKs_12.32.41' corresp='Vet_25'>
<l>alpair eva ca vāsaraiḥ sa nṛpatiḥ śārvasya vīryād aseḥ sadvīpāṃ sarasā talāṃ ca bubhuje niḥkaṇṭakāṃ medinīm /</l>
<l>saṃprāpyātha harājñayā sumahatīṃ vidyādharādhīśatāṃ bhuktvā tāṃ suciraṃ jagāma bhagavatsāyujyam ante kṛtī //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#SoKs_12.32.41'>
<lg>
<l>alpair eva ca vāsaraiḥ sa nṛ-patiḥ śārvasya vīryād aseḥ sa-dvīpāṃ sa-rasā talāṃ ca bubhuje niḥ-kaṇṭakāṃ medinīm /</l>
<l>saṃprāpya atha hara-ājñayā su-mahatīṃ vidyādhara-adhi-īśatāṃ bhuktvā tāṃ su-ciraṃ jagāma bhagavat-sāyujyam ante kṛtī //</l>
</lg>
</note>

  </body>
